column1: The Flipside(TM) brain child was born in late 2011.  It came from a realization that, although the iPhone is a phenomenal device, gaming on it is not.  The need for a realistic controller for the iPhone was evident on my first attempt at ""NOVA 2."" Trying to play first person shooter games on a touch screen where your fingers are covering half the visual field is often maddening.  So, I decided that if I was going to create the ultimate gaming device that I was not going to compromise on anything.  I want it all! I started at the top. My list was long.  I wanted it to be bluetooth, have all the game buttons I need, including shoulder and trigger buttons, work with all the games I love, and definitely not fall apart in my hands.  Lastly, I wanted it to be TRULY wireless - never having to plug in to charge.  Thanks to solid state, thin film batteries and solar cells, it's all possible now.

The next thing was to fine tune the design.  Through the work of a 3D modeler, we were able to ""see the future"" of the Flipside and use the designs to aid in the next step - building a prototype.  The first rough prototype for the case design was completed in summer 2012.  From there the work ramped up into high gear. The first electronics board was created, and we developed a working prototype. At that point we were confident that our idea would transform into reality.  Contacts were made with distribution companies, investors, and Apple, who gives their support!!  After research, knowing that the market has a place for us, that people have interest, and we would have IOS support has given us the momentum we need to push ahead with this exciting project.  In recent months we have hired an amazing Electrical Engineer to finish the electronics board and he is scaling it down to the final size of <

column1: This is a personal project that we want to see in the hands of our commrades/customers, and in our own hands as well.  Over the last year we have worked tirelessly. We have designs, patents(!), redesigns, electronics boards, financial reports, refined design, prototypes, partnerships, and last but not least finishing designs. Next up is bringing the finished design from prototype stage to market and distribution ready for you. Our team is ready to hit the ""start"" button and get moving!

Your contributions/support will immediately help fund the electronics to be made into a smaller package, and taking the prototype to the final production run. We are SO close to the finish line on this one!! In addition to this, upon succesful completion of this project, you will be the first owners of the Limited Edition solar Flipside""Founders"" gaming controller case. So, become a founder today!  Jump on board so we can shake up the gaming world and all start challenging each other to REAL gaming battles. And don't forget....gaming is always best done on the ""Flipside!""

Money contributed goes to the Flipside project whether we get our goal of $40,000 or not. If we hit $40,000 we receive an additional 5% back from Indiegogo (up until that point we receive 91%). We have a CPA firm handling our books, and all funds are used directly for the Flipside project.
Do I have to be a gamer to enjoy the Flipside case?

No! The Flipside is a specially designed case with serious gaming controls added that, in addition to just being fun, can help good gamers get better, and great gamers just go nuts!  But, if you are like my wife, and play maybe one or two games a year, it is still a fully functional phone case that looks awesome and is a great conversations piece. As per my wife ""I can't wait to have one. Even though I'm not a big gamer, at least I know that when I am playing that it will be comfortable, and ergonomic. And hopefully it will eventually cause me to overtake my husband and son as king of the gamers!!!"" (note from ""the boss"" that will never happen, sorry babe)
Now, all we need is for you to join the excitement by clicking the ""contribute"" button right now.

Secure your controller today!  We are running an early bird special.  The controllers will be identical.  All Limited Edition ""Founders"" Flipside cases in either black or white (you will be able to choose during the actual order phase - after the production, but prior to shipping.)  International supporters, please add $10 for shipping costs.
With your support we will be able to play better games in more places!

You're in luck! Indiegogo has these nifty ""share"" buttons that allow you to infest your friends social networks with just a few simple clicks. Go for it! You can do it! I suggest spreading the ""love."" It will do us by far the most benefit. Thank you!

","Featured on What
The fastest, lightest, hassle free gaming controller for your iOS, PC, Mac, or Tablet games.

Console Gaming should no longer be limited to ""at home play"". With advanced tablet graphics, massive game library's and the Flipside controller, an incredible gaming option is finally available to the masses.
With proper funding we can be market ready in 6 months. iOS 7 launches this fall, giving a 4 month head start for developers for gaming compatibility.

Using solid state thin film batteries, solar charging, and Bluetooth 4's low energy profile we can make a light, thin, overmolded plastic case for the iPhone or any mobile device that houses the controls we need for gaming.
This is the best part. Anywhere. Real games, real fun, real easy.

Flipside is a new and extremely simple way to play console games. It's the least amount of hassle for the maximum amount of gaming bliss. There is NO reason to lug around consoles, tv's and bags full of gear anymore. Flipside proposes to be the fastest, lightest, full featured gaming controller on the market. One of the best things about the controller is it NEVER needs to be plugged in to charge. It immediately starts working using ambient light and can hold a charge for over 6 hours with no light. It works directly with your iPhone, iPad, Windows PC, Mac, and yes, EVEN Android games. Imagine what iPhone gaming would be like with a real controller. Apple, has been imagining the same thing. It's with great excitement that we are joining in with Apples vision for the next level of gaming. It all begins with the launch of iOS 7 this fall, and it gets exciting with the launch of the Flipside controller. But we need your help to speed up our production.
Click Contribute to help speed up our production timeline. ----  >

(we will be making the controller regardless of this campaign. Contributions will go directly to funding and speeding up the production process and will not get lost or invalidated by us not hitting our $40k goal. Perks will still be filled regardless of hitting $40k, just a slightly later date. If you click contribute, you can contribute and select ""no perks"". Serious investors can contact invest@solarflipside.com)
The Flipside controller is the best choice for the gamer on the go.
The controller we are making is a dream device!
This means not a single cable, not to plug it into the phone, or into the wall. With this          case you won't have to stop and think about what else you need to bring.
Besides being 16x faster than older Bluetooth, this means we will have the highest compatibiilty with any device supporting Bluetooth. (Bluetooth 4.0 required for optimal battery life)

By using the iPhone body for rigidity we are able to make a very solid very lightweight controller that wraps and protects your phone whle providing the most coveted functionality to your phone. True gaming controls.

Solar charges inside and out faster than it depletes. Store your phone in your pocket? Not a problem, almost as soon as the case hits the light its ready to go. (think old school solar calculator) Dark place no light at all? The Flipside case holds over 5+ hrs of projected battery life and is usable while it charges.
* A FULL SET OF GAMING CONTROLS
This is not just a game controller for your phone, but your computer games as well. So we have added a full set of gaming controls (triggers, dual analog controls, shoulder buttons)

Controllers are only useful if you have games to use them with. With iOS 7 adding a standard for gaming controllers we now have the BEST SOLUTION for game compatibility. No Hacks! This is OFFICIAL APPLE support.
*  Will support future iPhone releases iPhone 5s/iPhone 6

And the best part is that we have a working prototype! This multifunctional device is already proving to be a serious ""game changer,"" so-to-speak in the gaming device community.  We wanted to give you the BEST.  Which is why this is such an exciting project to invest in. Join us in the beginning of the next generation of high-end gaming fun, but priced for REAL PEOPLE.
We believe we are the best solution for iPhone gaming

We are the only solar powered controller, so there is nothing to carry but your phone with its ""Flipside"" case. Unlike many of our competitors we are FULL FEATURED. We believe we are the easiest, most natural case to hold, meaning long gaming sessions will be fun, not painful. The Founder

Justice Frangipane, the founder of Solar Flipside LLC, is known world wide for his creative ingenuity and extreme athletisism. He has tied two world records, one for a twisting quadruple flip. The other for doing a backflip with 2,160 degrees of twisting rotation, as well as competing in the 2008 Olympic trails for trampoline. He has performed live on the show America's Got Talent as well as NBA and NHL games. He has done promotional work for the likes of Skechers, Vuly Trampolines, and Adidas. He has been head hunted by Jaybird Audio, Cirque Du Soleil, and Disney Entertainment. He has accomplished a wide variety of creative endeavors, including serving as Production Manager for Aerial Experience Productions.

If you ask him the secret to his success he will tell you this, ""Surround yourself with people who are great at what you want to do. Be humble, learn. Never look down on the day of small beginnings. Above all, be proud of your ability to work harder and longer than everyone else. Genius also comes in the flavor of work ethic.""
Justice is a thankful Christian, and son of the world reknown author Francis Frangipane.

Justice grew up an avid gamer in Cedar Rapids, Iowa. Owning and extensively using an Atari 2600, Commadore 64/128, NES, Sega Master System, SNES, Genesis, Sega 32x, Neo Geo, Sega CD, Saturn, N64, Gameboy, Nintendo Game Cube, Game Gear, Atari Lynx, Atari Jaguar, PsOne, PSP, Playstation 2, Xbox, Dreamcast (Japanese import), Dreamcast, Xbox 360, Wii, Playstation 3, just to name a few.

Every console had controllers with buttons. Transitioning to a touch screen had its many woes. Touch screen gaming has many limitations and only a few benefits. With the vast majority of games suffering from a lack of better controls, Justice knew a change would be coming. When it didn't come when, or how he had hoped, He knew he had to get involved in providing the solution he wanted. This is how the Flipside was born.

column2: >The Edge Desk System is the World's Best Desk for how we work today.  The All-in-One Desk, Chair and Easel comes fully assembled, folds to 6"" for easy storage, is incredibly comfortable, promotes good posture and allows for increased productivity/creativity at home, at work or on-the-go!  With more than 1,000 backers already in 27 countries, we want to help even more people fill their need for the best work/creative experience possible.

column3:
>Why The Edge?

The way we work has changed. Your laptop (or smartphone) can do more than an entire office full of typists, phones, and fax machines. So, why are we working on static, bulky, cluttered desks?

column1: That’s why The Edge is so important. Changing with the way we work, it provides a space to work anywhere, anytime.  The built-in chair naturally engages perfect posture and focus, making for a portable and positive work environment with a chic design discouraging clutter.

Today many users of commercial headsets is waiting for real applications.......

Many Start-ups have created Electroencephalogram (EEG) headsets, but  not real applications hve resulted.
It's always the same scenario: good hardware,plentiful publicity and some applications using the differents states of the brain (beta, alpha, theta and delta).
It is very easy to analyze a frequency. Such analysis promise more complex applications, but here it is more than just a frequency analysis and, as such, projects remain on paper.
Many nice video, beautiful advertisings, many beautiful headsets EEG and sdk was created....

At a few important moments in history, some discovery,
column5: >one that people have been waiting for for a long time, suddenly emerges and gives us access to a new age. One that's going to be a revolution for the world.

column1: Today many groups and organizations are starting in this race.
The next question is who will shake the big entreprises? Is it the control of applications with your mind?  Imagine the potential !
Thousands of software packages in hundred of domains. But, just imagine something other, something new.
We didn't offer you just a better system. We offer you a different system in its conception, distribution and concept.

Today we are at the dawn of a new era which will revolutionize many fields. Twelve years ago I started to get interested in neural networks and signal processing and their fabulous capacities to solve problems which nonheuristic mathematics cannot be solve.
Seven years ago a person I knew was constantly challenged by anxiety.
I knew that an eminent doctor was using neurofeedback to help patients. I wanted to help my friend, so I learned about this technique.
One publications for understanding neurofeedback is the Harvard Mental Health Letter.  http://www.isnr.net/index.cfm  (Search on: ""neurofeedback and autism"".)

I had in my possession an old EEG. By seeing the differences between the moments of calm and anguish on the EEG, we can recognize the premise of the crises.  My friend was able to take appropriate drugs before the crisis and with hard work, and learning to focus his brain, he was able stop some crises. With practice, we succeeded in improving his condition.
It's very difficult to recognise crisis on a EEG
I developed an application based on a network of neuron.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_neural_network
I developed an application based on a network of neurons.
He had learned  to recognize the premise of the crises.
This has become a project for me. During the last seven years, I developed a complex and refined system based on a system of analysis of signals by neural network.

I would like to thank all who help me. I was not alone. Many brilliant people in many organisations helped me when I was at an impasse. Many people and various software helped me to understand and create my system.
AND a particular thanks for my wife and my daughter. My wife supported my project and resulting investment of time and money.
SNNS (Stuttgart Neural Network Simulator) / Fast Artificial Neural
Each signal emitted by one of the sensors is connected to an independent network.  The results of each one are treated by a new network thus forming a complex.
Currently the results are beyond my expectation: attenuations of unwanted noise, detection of the movements of the eyes, detection of certain words, etc.
While Google and Microsoft have created monster networks to win the race of image learning, our approach is very diffenent.
Our brain isn't only a big neural network! With neurobiology, we know that the brain is a collection of millions of sub-networks, each used as a tool for a particular use.
It is on this idea that our system works.

We test the system with script character recogition and have 70% best results with a reduction of 80 % of time to find the result, relative to a standard ocr recognition.  (Don't know how to fix this one.  Sorry.)
A major feature of nnXbrain is the automatic creation of new dedicated networks when there is a need.
now we are a little international team with all skills for the success.

Wher are we now ? What remains to be done?

column1: ","Today many users of commercial headsets is waiting for real applications.......

Many Start-ups have created Electroencephalogram (EEG) headsets, but  not real applications hve resulted.It's always the same scenario: good hardware,plentiful publicity and some applications using the differents states of the brain (beta, alpha, theta and delta).
It is very easy to analyze a frequency. Such analysis promise more complex applications, but here it is more than just a frequency analysis and, as such, projects remain on paper.
Many nice video, beautiful advertisings, many beautiful headsets EEG and sdk was created....
The market of EEG gadgets is a gold mine.
VERY GOOOD NEWS AFTER TEST WE FUND THE REAL GOOD HARDWARE
can I write a text with my mind?NO!
Peoples with disabilities use it to improve theire lives? NO!
Can I play at call of duty with my brain? NO!
Current applications work on a simple principle, I focus or not
But for this, we need you.The problem is that real eeg have many sensors.
Yes, this isn't very nice and the sensors must be a specific places, not approximate
I can't publish the picture of such a beautifully designed headsets because the pictures are copyrighted but just Google ""headset"".
A part of our work is testing commercial headsets and creating software for them.
Another problem is all people have a different head morphology and the position of sensors is very important.
Provide a real solution to analyze
and using EEG waves in real applications.
electrodes are required for each specific use.
uses and adapted to the morphology of the user through 3D printing.
To provide those who do not have such
equipment, the best equipment at the best prices.

to the brain not only to hear its noise.

hey, look it take millions to make simple eeg headset and you don't
develop your project because you don't have such money ask in the world!!""

seven years in our ""garrage"" joke :-) for create a system that can
We are near the finish line,
compulsive disorder, depression...... (many studies uses EEG and
Detecting the state of brain, stress,

At a few important moments in history, some discovery,one that people have been waiting for for a long time, suddenly emerges and gives us access to a new age. One that's going to be a revolution for the world.
Today many groups and organizations are starting in this race.
Thousands of applications are being generated.existed
The next question is who will shake the big entreprises? Is it the control of applications with your mind?  Imagine the potential !
Thousands of software packages in hundred of domains. But, just imagine something other, something new.
We didn't offer you just a better system. We offer you a different system in its conception, distribution and concept.

Today we are at the dawn of a new era which will revolutionize many fields. Twelve years ago I started to get interested in neural networks and signal processing and their fabulous capacities to solve problems which nonheuristic mathematics cannot be solve.
Seven years ago a person I knew was constantly challenged by anxiety.
I knew that an eminent doctor was using neurofeedback to help patients. I wanted to help my friend, so I learned about this technique.
One publications for understanding neurofeedback is the Harvard Mental Health Letter.  http://www.isnr.net/index.cfm  (Search on: ""neurofeedback and autism"".)

I had in my possession an old EEG. By seeing the differences between the moments of calm and anguish on the EEG, we can recognize the premise of the crises.  My friend was able to take appropriate drugs before the crisis and with hard work, and learning to focus his brain, he was able stop some crises. With practice, we succeeded in improving his condition.
It's very difficult to recognise crisis on a EEG
But an idea appeared to me!
I developed an application based on a network of neuron.
I developed an application based on a network of neurons.
He had learned  to recognize the premise of the crises.
This has become a project for me. During the last seven years, I developed a complex and refined system based on a system of analysis of signals by neural network.

I would like to thank all who help me. I was not alone. Many brilliant people in many organisations helped me when I was at an impasse. Many people and various software helped me to understand and create my system.
AND a particular thanks for my wife and my daughter. My wife supported my project and resulting investment of time and money.
SNNS (Stuttgart Neural Network Simulator) / Fast Artificial Neural
Each signal emitted by one of the sensors is connected to an independent network.  The results of each one are treated by a new network thus forming a complex.
Currently the results are beyond my expectation: attenuations of unwanted noise, detection of the movements of the eyes, detection of certain words, etc.
While Google and Microsoft have created monster networks to win the race of image learning, our approach is very diffenent.
Our brain isn't only a big neural network! With neurobiology, we know that the brain is a collection of millions of sub-networks, each used as a tool for a particular use.
It is on this idea that our system works.

We test the system with script character recogition and have 70% best results with a reduction of 80 % of time to find the result, relative to a standard ocr recognition.  (Don't know how to fix this one.  Sorry.)
A major feature of nnXbrain is the automatic creation of new dedicated networks when there is a need.

When you hang up, just tap your  BlueCarbon ™  to your phone, and that last call will be transferred and saved to your mobile device and sent to your email inbox.

column1: Compatible with Any Headset on the Market

column3: >As long as it’s paired with your phone and in range, whether you’re using the
column7: >BlueCarbon ™ headset, another Bluetooth-enabled headset or device, or even your car’s hands-free system, Bluewire ™ will automatically record your conversations for you.

column1: So why do you I need to record my phone conversations?

Ever had a phone-call where you’ve not had a pen and paper to write down the details? Or simply forgotten what you were just told? It happens to the best of us. There’s also the ever-common hands-free situation where you’ll be talking on your handsfree system on your car and get told something you really wish you could write down.

That’s why the BlueCarbon ™ exists. Get told a key number?  The device has you covered. It’s like having a second memory, letting you focus on having a great conversation or simply having the piece of mind that you won’t miss anything.

Better yet, if you’re a professional, such as a reporter interviewing a source or an HR professional assessing a candidate, you don’t have to worry about missing key details. It’s right there, waiting to be backed up.

Ever try and record a VOIP call? It sucks. With BlueCarbon ™ it’s a few seconds of work, and you’ll never think about it again. Most Macs now include internal Bluetooth connectivity and if your PC doesn’t have it, you can pick up a simple USB Bluetooth connector from most electronics stores.
No more awkward software packages or dongles. If a computer has Bluetooth, BlueCarbon ™ will record the conversation.
Easy to Charge  Wirelessly through Qi Wireless Pad
If you don’t know what Qi charging is, it’s a standard that lets many phones and devices charge just by leaving it on the charger.

We want you to use BlueCarbon ™ as easily as possible, so we’ve integrated the Qi wireless antenna – not only is it a mark of true technological and design innovation, it makes your life just that much easier.

Additional Features

Find Your Keys With Just One Shake

column4: >With the BlueCarbon ™  comes with a ring to add it to your keys. This isn’t just to make sure you always have it with you.

column2: >With the BlueCarbon ™ App for iPhone (iOS) and Android, you can quickly find your keys around the home using the ""Find Bluewire™"" button. The  BlueCarbon ™  will then ring loudly, making it pretty obvious where you left your keys.
>Alternately, if you’ve lost your phone you can shake the BlueCarbon ™- your phone will start ringing.

components as well as fitting neatly on your key-ring or in your pocket. We
also didn’t want to make something ugly.
been refined several times to achieve the lowest power consumption possible.

you can rename, delete or email your call files anywhere in there world from
wherever you are without being tethered to your support desk.
BlueCarbon ™  offers the unique ability to either store your
calls on the 16GB onboard memory or syncing your data to your mobile device.  This feature allows you to playback your calls
privately through your Bluetooth Headset while still giving you the option of
file playback through your mobile device. Naturally, you may also use USB
transferring to enable playback of your recorded files.

Hi, I’m Avi, the creator of the BlueCarbon ™. I’m not new
to the world of tech, and I’m not here to ask for your money to maybe create
something. I’m a real guy creating real products for real people, from
governments to police forces to Hollywood movies.
As a child I always loved the James Bond movies.  I was always a fan of the action, but my
favorite part was Desmond Llewelyn as Q. He’d create those insane doodads and
gadgets that would get the job done, and I wanted to be somebody who would be
both Bond and Q mashed up.
So, I devoted my life creating cool and useful gadgets
that sold mainly to government agencies and law enforcement personnel. I did
this for twenty years, creating everything from a wristwatch-attached 720p
camera to the camera glasses from the first Mission Impossible movie. I’m a
unlike many movie props that are simulated. My process was always centered
around taking things further than something “just working.” For example, the
watch would automatically adjust using an accelerometer to the position of the
wrist – so that you didn’t have to constantly flip the image to watch the
To put it bluntly, I don’t half-bake anything. I don’t
want anything I’ve created to be done before, or done better. It’s not about
winning, it’s about doing things right.
The idea for the Bluewire came to me from one of the
most common and least interesting parts of the job - phone calls.  I’d frantically take notes, I’d get a call and
have to search for a pen and paper, or I’d simply hope I’d remember. I didn’t
want to pay an external service to do so for me, as it was both a security risk
Naturally, I assumed I’d find it easy to create a
small, wireless recording device. It wasn’t. As a small company creating an
affordable, mass-market device, it took eight months to create the product
design, and another five to find a Qi antenna to fit inside it. We could have
easily created a large, bulky device - but that would have been the opposite of
our goals. We wanted it to be so portable that you’d always be able to have it
with you, with low power consumption and so simple that anyone who could use a
smartphone could use it. We wanted it to work for educators, for business
people, or for people simply saving calls.
The most telling moment for me during the Bluewire’s
development was totally outside of the development cycle. My friend, a
locksmith, constantly got calls for jobs. He’d receive them and hastily write
down things while driving. It wasn’t
safe, but to him it was necessary. “I have no choice. It’s all about providing
It’s a little dramatic to say that this made me want
to save the world, but as much as I want business people to have an easier time
referring back to their calls, there’s such a larger opportunity. There’re
countless service jobs where people are driving from place to place and
constantly having to write things down (which you might get wrong if you’re
also driving). They have to do this –
otherwise how can they keep up with the demand of incoming business and still make it to their next job?
Sitting with my friend, I knew I was already making the solution.
Looking at the market, our competition wasn’t fierce,
but the challenge was. It has taken us a year to
get the Bluewire™ to this point. We didn’t want to start the campaign until we
had a functional prototype with software that was approaching completion.
Otherwise we’d be letting you down. We don’t want this to be a little gadget
you use once. We want it to be both essential and invisible
on every day and don’t have to worry about.
CEO, inventor of the Bluewire. I'm developing cutting
edge products for government agencies worldwide
for over 20 years. My global exposure and experience gives me and my team the
expertise to bring to market new, innovative. products.

As of today, we have finalized completely the electronics and PCB design of the Bluwire™. The hardware has been tested and is working. In plain English: we have the unit, it works well, and we are going to keep making it better. This isn’t a vaporware product
column2: it’s a device that we use ourselves that we are going to take many more months to make even better. We’re perfectionists. You’re putting your money into a device that even in its current state some companies would ship.

column1: Not us. We want it to be brilliant.

Okay, enough grandstanding. The Industrial design is complete, and most of the pictures you see above are real.  What you see is what you get  - but it’ll be much better after the tooling will be made  and the parts will be injected.

As far as the Firmware design goes, we are in the last stages of tweaking and improving it. By our anticipated delivery date of the Bluwire™ in July, we will have complete and fully tested stable product. Having great software to match great hardware is something that’s very, very important to us.

App Development is going well. We are working to improve our internal Android version, and have started on our iOS version. By delivery, we will have completed and fully tested a stable App design on both platforms.

Either way, the BlueCarbon ™ headset will support remote firmware updates and upgrades. We are not going to simply release the product and forget about you
column2: this is a device we want you to use, love and integrate into your life for a long time.

column1: So What Do We Need The Money For?
· We want to further improve our app design.
· We want to further refine our firmware.
A question we’re often asked is why we’re
better than any of the “free” recording apps out there for both smartphones and
To be blunt: have you used any of them?
On iOS, due to Apple’s rules, you use an app
that will call your phone back to
make the call, files are awkward-to-access, and very often don’t have great
call quality. They’re incredibly hard to use with a car’s hands-free system and
you’ll spend extra time fumbling around to make it work. The “free” options are
limited on how long you can record. If your call drops, you go through the
On Android, your options are less limited but
still lack in quality of recording and ease of use. Furthermore, you’re still
stuck with the limitations of your device’s memory.
horrendously expensive or immensely awkward, and in some cases record the
entire sound coming out of your computer,
including any notification noises. There are conversation-recording software
packages. They’re as expensive as the Bluewire, if not more so.
In some cases, the software also can’t record
both sides of the conversation. In all cases, it’s an absolute pain to do.
compensate for the undeniable hardware limitations that all phone manufacturers
are implementing, which cause poor sound quality one side recording only and
The level of quality control on these apps also
leads to some users finding their call isn’t recorded.
To be selfish for a second, we’re also making
Bluewire for ourselves. We can’t randomly lose our conversations. That’d annoy
us a lot. And it’d annoy you more after you bought the device.
That’s why Bluewire™ is a hardware solution
combined with software, enabling two-way recording to run seamlessly, reliably
business-critical situations. That sounds like jargon, but we started this
project with the quality goal to be for those who can’t afford to lose a conversation. By setting an insane quality
and reliability standard from the get-go, we wouldn’t let down even the most
We’re relying on the almost universal Bluetooth
standard, so that the Bluewire™ can record conversations using cellphones made
even 15 years ago. These older phones don’t have access to the Bluewire app, but
will still be able to record both sides of their conversation and store it on
the internal memory of the Bluewire™ headset. They’ll be waiting on the headset
until you plug it into a computer.
As Bluewire™ can connect to any Bluetooth
device, it enables any Bluetooth device to take advantage of two-way recording.
Any tablet, any PC, any Mac or anything
that can make a call works with our device.
Our team of engineers is experienced team and has developed many
complex products in the last 20 years. Avi, our founder, spent two decades
creating devices for governments agencies and big-budget movies (Mission Impossible and
Miss Congeniality). For example, Avi invented video glasses for covert operation 19 years ago and built other miniaturized complex devices  like a watch with a 720p
camera built into it for a government that would intelligently switch position
for active monitoring of a situation. <b>He
Our engineers have extensive experience in hardware and software
design, and we have been developing Bluewire™ for around a year. Throughout the

column2: D, we have created several iterations of prototypes and have

column1: continuously improved their functionality and quality. We actively refuse to
release something we’re not happy with.
We have a team of nine people working on the Bluewire™.
We understand that Indiegogo backers want their Bluewire™as soon
as possible, and on time, but quality control is at the top of the list. Even
though we are confident we can deliver on our deadline, there are always
unforeseen challenges, or small changes that could cause delays. We will
not, however, disappear or fail to answer your questions. We’re in this
As we push the Bluewire™ toward the finish line, we will focus
on real-life testing to make sure we deliver the best product possible that real people will use with ease. We
don’t just see this as a cool tech product but as something that could make the
We are dedicated to our timeline and Bluewire™’s quality, and
will keep you informed on the status of our the project’s progress on the first
of each month (at a minimum), and will continue to send further updates as we
have them. We are committed to being transparent and keeping Bluewire™ fans
We are far from new to manufacturing new and innovative hardware and software,
and have done so for the toughest, most mission-critical situations. We mean
Somebody is going to ask, and we’re here to answer it as
simply and plainly as possible. We want Bluwire™ to be a device that people use
There are two primary laws concerning the recording audio.
One Party Consent Laws: This is federal law and the law in 38
states. You can record a phone call or conversation so long as you are a party
to the conversation. Furthermore, if you are not a party to the conversation, a
one-party consent"" law will allow you to record the conversation or
phone call <b>so long as your source
consents and has full knowledge that the communication will be recorded.
Two Party Consent Laws: Twelve states require the consent of
every party to a phone call or conversation in order to make the recording
Florida, Illinois, Maryland, Massachusetts, Montana, Nevada, New Hampshire,
Pennsylvania and Washington). Although they are referred to as
two-party consent"" laws, consent must be obtained from every party
to a phone call or conversation if it involves more than two people.
In addition it is important to note a general
Privacy Expectation: Generally speaking, however, you will not
be liable for intrusion if you photograph or capture video of people in public
places, even if they have not consented to being recorded, because individuals
cannot have a reasonable expectation of privacy when in public.
Disclaimer: We are NOT lawyers, and the materials provided above
are informational and should not be relied upon as legal advice. If you are
concerned about using the Bluewire in a particular situation, seek legal advice

How long you can I record a voice memo on the BlueCarbon ™?
** Why we made a five minutes voice memo limitation?
Recording audio without a person’s permission is almost always illegal.
Since the microphone is hidden inside the headset, it theoretically could be
used as a covert Audio recorder. There are definitive federal and state laws
prohibiting surreptitious recording and monitoring of audio
conversations. We want this to be use for your own personal memos and we
have created it to be used as such. We do not condone, support nor take any
responsibility for any of any functionality of the Bluwire™.
Please note: the five minute limitation is only on relating to
the voice-recording option. Normal call recording has no time limit.

","World's smartest Bluetooth headset call recorderIntroducing BlueCarbon ™  (Patented) is the easiest-to-use smartphone and
VOIP call recorder. With simple Bluetooth connectivity, it’s the ONLY
Bluetooth headset on the market that can record both sides of a smartphone or
VoIP conversation and store the recordings securely on the headset itself. it’ll record whatever conversation is passing through the phone
already got a Bluetooth device you’re comfortable with,  BlueCarbon ™  can still record the
call and store the recordings on it's built-in memory, regardless of what Bluetooth device you’re going to use.
Record from any phone you own

Easy to Playback Recorded FilesAll of your calls are automatically saved on  BlueCarbon ™  and can be accessed through your  BlueCarbon ™  App.Send Files with a Single TapWhen you hang up, just tap your  BlueCarbon ™  to your phone, and that last call will be transferred and saved to your mobile device and sent to your email inbox.
Compatible with Any Headset on the Market

As long as it’s paired with your phone and in range, whether you’re using the BlueCarbon ™ headset, another Bluetooth-enabled headset or device, or even your car’s hands-free system, Bluewire ™ will automatically record your conversations for you.
So why do you I need to record my phone conversations?

Ever had a phone-call where you’ve not had a pen and paper to write down the details? Or simply forgotten what you were just told? It happens to the best of us. There’s also the ever-common hands-free situation where you’ll be talking on your handsfree system on your car and get told something you really wish you could write down.

That’s why the BlueCarbon ™ exists. Get told a key number?  The device has you covered. It’s like having a second memory, letting you focus on having a great conversation or simply having the piece of mind that you won’t miss anything.

Better yet, if you’re a professional, such as a reporter interviewing a source or an HR professional assessing a candidate, you don’t have to worry about missing key details. It’s right there, waiting to be backed up.
Record Skype or other VOIP Calls

Ever try and record a VOIP call? It sucks. With BlueCarbon ™ it’s a few seconds of work, and you’ll never think about it again. Most Macs now include internal Bluetooth connectivity and if your PC doesn’t have it, you can pick up a simple USB Bluetooth connector from most electronics stores.
No more awkward software packages or dongles. If a computer has Bluetooth, BlueCarbon ™ will record the conversation.
Easy to Charge  Wirelessly through Qi Wireless Pad
If you don’t know what Qi charging is, it’s a standard that lets many phones and devices charge just by leaving it on the charger.

We want you to use BlueCarbon ™ as easily as possible, so we’ve integrated the Qi wireless antenna – not only is it a mark of true technological and design innovation, it makes your life just that much easier.
Additional FeaturesFind Your Keys With Just One Shake
With the BlueCarbon ™  comes with a ring to add it to your keys. This isn’t just to make sure you always have it with you.

With the BlueCarbon ™ App for iPhone (iOS) and Android, you can quickly find your keys around the home using the ""Find Bluewire™"" button. The  BlueCarbon ™  will then ring loudly, making it pretty obvious where you left your keys.
Alternately, if you’ve lost your phone you can shake the BlueCarbon ™- your phone will start ringing.
Use BlueCarbon™ as a Burglar Alarm with BlueGuard
Have a two way communication, ""walkie talkie""  between your phone and BlueCarbon™ (provided that you in a Bluetooth range)
been in development for over seven months. The design has gone through more
than ten iterations to get a geometry and size that can fit all our complex
components as well as fitting neatly on your key-ring or in your pocket. We
also didn’t want to make something ugly.
been refined several times to achieve the lowest power consumption possible.
After you have ended you call on your BlueCarbon ™ device, retrieving
all your details is as simple as opening up our app. Calls can be located using
either your caller ID, time or date for seamless accessibility. Our features
menu allows you to augment your call details to suite your specific needs. Now
you can rename, delete or email your call files anywhere in there world from
wherever you are without being tethered to your support desk.
BlueCarbon ™  offers the unique ability to either store your
calls on the 16GB onboard memory or syncing your data to your mobile device.  This feature allows you to playback your calls
privately through your Bluetooth Headset while still giving you the option of
file playback through your mobile device. Naturally, you may also use USB
transferring to enable playback of your recorded files.
You can listen to your calls using three different methods
column2: using your earphones on the app, playing via your phone’s speaker, or transferring to computer.

Hi, I’m Avi, the creator of the BlueCarbon ™. I’m not new
to the world of tech, and I’m not here to ask for your money to maybe create
something. I’m a real guy creating real products for real people, from
governments to police forces to Hollywood movies.
As a child I always loved the James Bond movies.  I was always a fan of the action, but my
favorite part was Desmond Llewelyn as Q. He’d create those insane doodads and
gadgets that would get the job done, and I wanted to be somebody who would be
both Bond and Q mashed up.
So, I devoted my life creating cool and useful gadgets
that sold mainly to government agencies and law enforcement personnel. I did
this for twenty years, creating everything from a wristwatch-attached 720p
camera to the camera glasses from the first Mission Impossible movie. I’m a
unlike many movie props that are simulated. My process was always centered
around taking things further than something “just working.” For example, the
watch would automatically adjust using an accelerometer to the position of the
wrist – so that you didn’t have to constantly flip the image to watch the
To put it bluntly, I don’t half-bake anything. I don’t
want anything I’ve created to be done before, or done better. It’s not about
winning, it’s about doing things right.
The idea for the Bluewire came to me from one of the
most common and least interesting parts of the job - phone calls.  I’d frantically take notes, I’d get a call and
have to search for a pen and paper, or I’d simply hope I’d remember. I didn’t
want to pay an external service to do so for me, as it was both a security risk
Naturally, I assumed I’d find it easy to create a
small, wireless recording device. It wasn’t. As a small company creating an
affordable, mass-market device, it took eight months to create the product
design, and another five to find a Qi antenna to fit inside it. We could have
easily created a large, bulky device - but that would have been the opposite of
our goals. We wanted it to be so portable that you’d always be able to have it
with you, with low power consumption and so simple that anyone who could use a
smartphone could use it. We wanted it to work for educators, for business
people, or for people simply saving calls.
The most telling moment for me during the Bluewire’s
development was totally outside of the development cycle. My friend, a
locksmith, constantly got calls for jobs. He’d receive them and hastily write
down things while driving. It wasn’t
safe, but to him it was necessary. “I have no choice. It’s all about providing
It’s a little dramatic to say that this made me want
to save the world, but as much as I want business people to have an easier time
referring back to their calls, there’s such a larger opportunity. There’re
countless service jobs where people are driving from place to place and
constantly having to write things down (which you might get wrong if you’re
also driving). They have to do this –
otherwise how can they keep up with the demand of incoming business and still make it to their next job?
Sitting with my friend, I knew I was already making the solution.
Looking at the market, our competition wasn’t fierce,
but the challenge was. It has taken us a year to
get the Bluewire™ to this point. We didn’t want to start the campaign until we
had a functional prototype with software that was approaching completion.
Otherwise we’d be letting you down. We don’t want this to be a little gadget
you use once. We want it to be both essential and invisible
on every day and don’t have to worry about.
CEO, inventor of the Bluewire. I'm developing cutting
edge products for government agencies worldwide
for over 20 years. My global exposure and experience gives me and my team the
expertise to bring to market new, innovative. products.
David Chalkho, is passionate about design, entrepreneurship and great ideas, combining
a vast knowledge of product design and product engineering. He specializes in
Nir Levi, Holds 25 years’ experience in the management
and engineering of development in a number of high tech companies, including products
in video cameras and recorders, knowledge management and cyber-offense..
John Kraljic, graduated from The Pratt
Institute in 1984. He has over 30 years of product design and development
experience, and his passion for design is only
rivaled by his enthusiasm for innovation and ideation. John holds several U.S. Patents..
Nafeesa Hendricks, pioneered many projects, over the last three years, With
a degree in Languages and Business Management.I am currently endeavoring in my masters in language and
Haim Romashkano, develops and implements project management tools such as plans, schedules, and
responsibility and compliance matrices internally for
Bluewire to keep the project on track.
Where Are We With The Development?

As of today, we have finalized completely the electronics and PCB design of the Bluwire™. The hardware has been tested and is working. In plain English: we have the unit, it works well, and we are going to keep making it better. This isn’t a vaporware product
column2: it’s a device that we use ourselves that we are going to take many more months to make even better. We’re perfectionists. You’re putting your money into a device that even in its current state some companies would ship.

column1: Not us. We want it to be brilliant.

Okay, enough grandstanding. The Industrial design is complete, and most of the pictures you see above are real.  What you see is what you get  - but it’ll be much better after the tooling will be made  and the parts will be injected.

As far as the Firmware design goes, we are in the last stages of tweaking and improving it. By our anticipated delivery date of the Bluwire™ in July, we will have complete and fully tested stable product. Having great software to match great hardware is something that’s very, very important to us.

App Development is going well. We are working to improve our internal Android version, and have started on our iOS version. By delivery, we will have completed and fully tested a stable App design on both platforms.Either way, the BlueCarbon ™ headset will support remote firmware updates and upgrades. We are not going to simply release the product and forget about you
column2: this is a device we want you to use, love and integrate into your life for a long time.

column1: So What Do We Need The Money For?
· We want to further improve our app design.
· We want to further refine our firmware.
A question we’re often asked is why we’re
better than any of the “free” recording apps out there for both smartphones and
To be blunt: have you used any of them?
On iOS, due to Apple’s rules, you use an app
that will call your phone back to
make the call, files are awkward-to-access, and very often don’t have great
call quality. They’re incredibly hard to use with a car’s hands-free system and
you’ll spend extra time fumbling around to make it work. The “free” options are
limited on how long you can record. If your call drops, you go through the
On Android, your options are less limited but
still lack in quality of recording and ease of use. Furthermore, you’re still
stuck with the limitations of your device’s memory.
horrendously expensive or immensely awkward, and in some cases record the
entire sound coming out of your computer,
including any notification noises. There are conversation-recording software
packages. They’re as expensive as the Bluewire, if not more so.
In some cases, the software also can’t record
both sides of the conversation. In all cases, it’s an absolute pain to do.
compensate for the undeniable hardware limitations that all phone manufacturers
are implementing, which cause poor sound quality one side recording only and
The level of quality control on these apps also
leads to some users finding their call isn’t recorded.
To be selfish for a second, we’re also making
Bluewire for ourselves. We can’t randomly lose our conversations. That’d annoy
us a lot. And it’d annoy you more after you bought the device.
That’s why Bluewire™ is a hardware solution
combined with software, enabling two-way recording to run seamlessly, reliably
business-critical situations. That sounds like jargon, but we started this
project with the quality goal to be for those who can’t afford to lose a conversation. By setting an insane quality
and reliability standard from the get-go, we wouldn’t let down even the most
We’re relying on the almost universal Bluetooth
standard, so that the Bluewire™ can record conversations using cellphones made
even 15 years ago. These older phones don’t have access to the Bluewire app, but
will still be able to record both sides of their conversation and store it on
the internal memory of the Bluewire™ headset. They’ll be waiting on the headset
until you plug it into a computer.
As Bluewire™ can connect to any Bluetooth
device, it enables any Bluetooth device to take advantage of two-way recording.
Any tablet, any PC, any Mac or anything
that can make a call works with our device.
Our team of engineers is experienced team and has developed many
complex products in the last 20 years. Avi, our founder, spent two decades
creating devices for governments agencies and big-budget movies (Mission Impossible and
Miss Congeniality). For example, Avi invented video glasses for covert operation 19 years ago and built other miniaturized complex devices  like a watch with a 720p
camera built into it for a government that would intelligently switch position
for active monitoring of a situation. He
Our engineers have extensive experience in hardware and software
design, and we have been developing Bluewire™ for around a year. Throughout the
course of R&D, we have created several iterations of prototypes and have
continuously improved their functionality and quality. We actively refuse to
release something we’re not happy with.
We have a team of nine people working on the Bluewire™.
We understand that Indiegogo backers want their Bluewire™as soon
as possible, and on time, but quality control is at the top of the list. Even
though we are confident we can deliver on our deadline, there are always
unforeseen challenges, or small changes that could cause delays. We will
not, however, disappear or fail to answer your questions. We’re in this
As we push the Bluewire™ toward the finish line, we will focus
on real-life testing to make sure we deliver the best product possible that real people will use with ease. We
don’t just see this as a cool tech product but as something that could make the
We are dedicated to our timeline and Bluewire™’s quality, and
will keep you informed on the status of our the project’s progress on the first
of each month (at a minimum), and will continue to send further updates as we
have them. We are committed to being transparent and keeping Bluewire™ fans
We are far from new to manufacturing new and innovative hardware and software,
and have done so for the toughest, most mission-critical situations. We mean
Somebody is going to ask, and we’re here to answer it as
simply and plainly as possible. We want Bluwire™ to be a device that people use
There are two primary laws concerning the recording audio.
One Party Consent Laws: This is federal law and the law in 38
states. You can record a phone call or conversation so long as you are a party
to the conversation. Furthermore, if you are not a party to the conversation, a
one-party consent"" law will allow you to record the conversation or
phone call so long as your source
consents and has full knowledge that the communication will be recorded.
Two Party Consent Laws: Twelve states require the consent of
every party to a phone call or conversation in order to make the recording
Florida, Illinois, Maryland, Massachusetts, Montana, Nevada, New Hampshire,
Pennsylvania and Washington). Although they are referred to as
two-party consent"" laws, consent must be obtained from every party
to a phone call or conversation if it involves more than two people.
In addition it is important to note a general
Privacy Expectation: Generally speaking, however, you will not
be liable for intrusion if you photograph or capture video of people in public
places, even if they have not consented to being recorded, because individuals
cannot have a reasonable expectation of privacy when in public.
Disclaimer: We are NOT lawyers, and the materials provided above
are informational and should not be relied upon as legal advice. If you are
concerned about using the Bluewire in a particular situation, seek legal advice

column589: >We have teamed up with MiaSolé to deliver the best 70W solar panel to the market. MiaSolé is a producer of lightweight, flexible and powerful solar cells. The innovative solar cell is based on the highest efficiency thin film technology available today, and its flexible cell architecture makes it ideal for a wide variety of solutions ranging from commercial roofing solar panels to flexible mobile devices.
column596: >ADVANTAGES OF THIN FILM SOLAR PANEL
column603:
>High Efficiency
Our thin film solar cells provide a 16.5% conversion efficiency, providing competitive efficiency compared to traditional monocrystalline panels.

Lightweight
Our 70W CIGS panel only weighs 1.3kg, which is 38% lighter than crystalline silicon panels which would normally weigh about 2.1kg

Flexible
Our thin-film solar cells are among the thinnest on the market. With a flexible and durable build, it can withstand over 90° bends without cracking the panel.

Durable
A major benefit of thin film solar cells are their durability, allowing them to function even with minor damage.
*See drop test results below.

Low Light Performance
In dim light conditions, our silicon-based thin-film solar cells are still able to maintain a high conversion efficiency.

In a scenario where 10% of the panel is covered up, a conventional crystalline silicon panel will not generate any power, while CIGS could still maintain 85% efficiency.
*See comparison table below

High Temperature Performance
In high temperature conditions, our silicon based thin-film solar cells can generate 8% more electricity than traditional crystalline-silicon cells.

Laminated Encapsulation
The Solar Panel is laminated with Ethylene Tetrafluoroethylene. This material has a very high sunlight absorption to reflection ratio and provides water-resistance and UV-resistance.

Certification
Passes the IEC61646 and IEC61730, as well as UL1703 and UL790 certification standards. Provides A grade (highest) fire safety certification, with high reliability and security.

Drop Test Results
Drop both crystalline silicon solar panel and Miasole CIGS solar panel from 2 meters height 10 times.

>The Omni Ultimate is nearly complete. Our team of engineers has been working together with our manufacturing partner for over one year and we have already started tooling as this campaign is being launched. All of the Omnicharge power banks shown in the videos are fully functional samples that we have built and sent out to users for feedback and testing. We are currently in the process of conducting product certification so we can ship to various countries and meet the estimated delivery times.

Due to the success of our previous campaign we have already begun the process of ordering all of the components and materials to begin production. We already have commitments from all of our major component suppliers (Panasonic, ST Chips, etc.) and we have a very capable team of supply chain experts to ensure our timelines are met. However, should component delays and shortages occur in production, we will make sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problems.

We believe that we have developed a well-engineered and quality product, so we are offering a 1 year limited manufacturer's warranty to all of our backers. We stand behind our product and the trust you have placed in us.

","The Omni Ultimate provides a charging experience unlike any other. Taking the best from all Omnicharge products, the Omni Ultimate brings you an unparalleled feature set and a capacity that can charge all your portable devices.A NEW GENERATION OF POWERA brand new innovation that comes equipped with best-in-class charging technologies for professionals on the go.Whether you're out in the world doing field research, shooting a nature documentary, helping in a disaster zone, or just want to camp out with your family and friends, the Omni Ultimate is there to keep you going.ALL THE PORTSYOU'LL EVER NEEDMultiple Input & Output Options for All Your DevicesThe Omni Ultimate is equipped with four different output ports, providing flexible and convenient charging options. With an adjustable DC output, AC socket, bi-directional USB-C port and two QC 3.0 compatible USB-A ports, you can easily power all your devices.AC OUTPUTWith its 120W AC Output, the Omni Ultimate offers a flexible power solution for any situation.BEST IN CLASSUSB-C PORTOur PD enabled USB-C port can provide up to 60W input & output. Compared with similar products, it can provide nearly twice the wattage output.INDUSTRY-FIRST ADJUSTABLEVOLTAGE & AMPERAGEWith its 150W high power adjustable DC Port, the Omni Ultimate sets a new industry standard for DC output. Providing you with an adjustable voltage and amperage, the Omni Ultimate ensures a tailored charging experience.QC 3.0 COMPATIBLEUSB PORTSEach of the two fast-charging USB ports can outputup to 5V/3A for all your smart devices.FAST RECHARGINGWITHIN 3 HOURS!The Omni Ultimate can input up to 90W and can recharge in under 3 hours. With its built-in charge controller, it can be recharged from nearly any source.HIGH-END TECHNOLOGY TOSERVE YOU FOR A LIFETIMEThis Industry-first interchangeable battery system allows you to replace the batteries once they are depleted. Powering your adventures for years to come.According to FAA regulations, you can bring two 160Wh batteries, with airline approval. This is a simple process, where you fill out a form at check-in. We recommend checking with the airline prior to traveling.CAPABLE OF POWERING OR CHARGINGYOUR FAVORITE DEVICES, ANYWHERE.This Industry-first interchangeable battery system allows you to replace the batteries once they are depleted. Powering your adventures for years to come.AN INTELLIGENT PORTABLEPOWER SOURCEThe Patented Power Management System™ adapts tooptimal power levels for each device.The Omni Ultimate actively manages input and output to ensure that both your device and the Omni Ultimate are operating safely and under ideal conditions, while displaying all the metrics you need on its OLED display. USB POWER DELIVERYThe Latest Charging TechnologyUSB Power Delivery is the latest charging technology which allows devices to communicate and deliver the optimal power level for each device. Our PD compatible USB-C ports can power laptops like the MacBook Pro, Razer Blade, Dell XPS series and many more.INDUSTRY-FIRST ADJUSTABLEVOLTAGE & AMPERAGELeave your bulky chargers at home.With its 150W high power adjustable DC Port, the Omni Ultimate sets a new industry standard for DC output. Providing you with an adjustable voltage and amperage, the Omni Ultimate ensures a tailored charging experience.PASS-THROUGHCHARGINGCharge and recharge at the same time.Independent charging and discharging circuit modules allow you to power or charge your devices while simultaneously recharging the Omni Ultimate.INTELLIGENT CHARGE ALGORITHMProtects the battery life of your devices.The Intelligent charge algorithm not only simplifies the charging process, but also protects the battery life of your devices and shelf life of the Omni Ultimate.STANDBY POWER DEPLETIONLonger battery shelf life than similar products on the market.Our smart power management system provides power depletion protection, meaning when you store the battery without use, the circuit board won't draw any power.REAL-TIME DATAMonitor all metrics on the OLED screen.With an easy to read OLED screen, you can monitor real-time information about how your Omnicharge is interacting with your devices. You can check input and output wattage, temperature, battery percentage and time remaining.PATENTED POWERPROTECTION SYSTEM™The 12-layer power protection system protects your devices andthe shelf life of the Omni Ultimate.TIMELINEADVANCED TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONSPremium components from first class electronics suppliers.GENERAL TECH SPECSExpertly designed from the ground up.Omni UltimatePorts:AC Output: 120W Max, 120V, 60Hz, EU model (230V, 50Hz)DC Output: 150W Max, Adjustable 5-60V up to 8A, with 0.1 V/A increment.USB-C Input & Output: 60W Max, USB-PD, 5V/3A - 9V/3A - 12V/3A - 15V/3A - 20V/3AUSB-A: 5V/3A each, QC 3.0 CompatibleDC Input: 90W Max, 5V - 32V, up to 4.5ABattery:Cell Type: 18650 Li-ion batteryCapacity: 12 cells, 125±3%Wh (34800mAh±3% at 3.6V)Lifecycles: 500 times (depleted to 70% of original capacity)Shelf-life: One (1) year after full chargeGeneral:Weight: 3.1lbs. (1415g)Dimension: 6.5"" x 5.7"" x 2.1"" (167.5mm x 145mm x 54mm)Protection Level: IP54Warranty: Limited One (1) YearCertifications: FCC,IC, CE, PSE, MSDS, UN38.3Operating Temp: 32 - 104 F (0 - 40C)In the box:Omni Ultimate60W AC Wall ChargerDC Out Cable (MR30 to 5.5 x 2.1mm Female)Note:The Omni Ultimate ships with 60W charger allowing you to fully recharge in 3 hours. With a 90W charger the Omni Ultimate can recharge in 2.5 hours.CHARGING TIME OF DEVICESPower any device up to 150W using DC Out , 120W using AC Outlet or 60W using USB-CRECHARGING SPECSOmni Ultimate can be recharged with almost any power adapter.We have teamed up with MiaSolé to deliver the best 70W solar panel to the market. MiaSolé is a producer of lightweight, flexible and powerful solar cells. The innovative solar cell is based on the highest efficiency thin film technology available today, and its flexible cell architecture makes it ideal for a wide variety of solutions ranging from commercial roofing solar panels to flexible mobile devices.ADVANTAGES OF THIN FILM SOLAR PANELHigh EfficiencyOur thin film solar cells provide a 16.5% conversion efficiency, providing competitive efficiency compared to traditional monocrystalline panels.LightweightOur 70W CIGS panel only weighs 1.3kg, which is 38% lighter than crystalline silicon panels which would normally weigh about 2.1kgFlexibleOur thin-film solar cells are among the thinnest on the market. With a flexible and durable build, it can withstand over 90° bends without cracking the panel.DurableA major benefit of thin film solar cells are their durability, allowing them to function even with minor damage.*See drop test results below.Low Light PerformanceIn dim light conditions, our silicon-based thin-film solar cells are still able to maintain a high conversion efficiency.In a scenario where 10% of the panel is covered up, a conventional crystalline silicon panel will not generate any power, while CIGS could still maintain 85% efficiency.*See comparison table belowHigh Temperature PerformanceIn high temperature conditions, our silicon based thin-film solar cells can generate 8% more electricity than traditional crystalline-silicon cells.Laminated EncapsulationThe Solar Panel is laminated with Ethylene Tetrafluoroethylene. This material has a very high sunlight absorption to reflection ratio and provides water-resistance and UV-resistance.CertificationPasses the IEC61646 and IEC61730, as well as UL1703 and UL790 certification standards. Provides A grade (highest) fire safety certification, with high reliability and security.Drop Test ResultsDrop both crystalline silicon solar panel and Miasole CIGS solar panel from 2 meters height 10 times.Drop Test ResultsGeneral Tech SpecsWeight: 2.87lbs. (1300g)Size Folded: 13x11"" (330x280mm)Size Unfolded: 41.9x26"" (1064x660mm)Ports: 1x Barrel Port (5.5x2.5mm ) & 1x USB-A portDC Output: 22V@3.5AUSB Output: QC2.0 & QC3.0 Compatible (5V/3A

column1:
What is Pixelinvaders?

PixelInvaders is an open-source hardware project for artists, geeks and YOU!
The PixelInvaders LED system consists of 3D RGB LED panels, that are capable of playing back real-time generated video animations or simple color changes.

Multiple PixelInvader panels can be connected with each other to form a panel of any size. The panels are based on the latest LED technology - besides low heat dissipation and long life, a panel may illuminate an entire room and consume less energy than a standard lightbulb!
PixelInvaders panels are perfectly used as effect lighting in clubs, bars, fairs, museums, on stage, in a lobby or in your living room.

The control software ""PixelController"" generates the video animation in real time. This has the advantage of video animations that are synchronized to music. PixelController is released as open-source project on GitHub.

What are you using the money for?

I'm running this Indiegogo crowd funding campaign to enable me to bulk purchase parts for at least 20 PixelInvaders DIY kits in order to offer you a great price.

And after about 9 months of private alpha testing, I want a public beta test phase to get other ideas, to find bugs and maybe find one or more talented developer supporting me. Your pledge is what makes this project possible, I need your support!

What do I need to use the PixelInvader panel?

Besides a computer running OSX, Windows or Linux you need a 12V power supply and an Arduino compatible microcontroller board. I recommend a
column3: target="""" title="""">Teensy microcontroller board due to the performant
column5: target="""" title="""">serial throughput/latency. You may (re-)use an old ATX power supply as 12V power source.

column2: >What do I need to build the PixelInvader panel?You need some cables, a cutter, a drilling machine and plexiglas adhesive like Acrifix 116 or Ruderer L530. And of course time and patience.

column1: How do I control a PixelInvaders panel?
By using the Open Source matrix controlling software ""PixelController"". I published the source on my GitHub site, some features:
• Multi platform, tested on OSX, Windows and Linux

• The fronted is coded in PureData, this means you can control your PixelInvaders panels by using a Midi device (for example MPD26), an OSC application from your iPhone/Android Phone or tablet or by keyboard and mouse.
• Control the PixelInvaders Panel by yourself or let the application handle that stuff depending on its environment.

Shipping

You will be sent a Paypal request for the postage costs just before shipping. Please do not add these costs to the contribution.

Please note: shipping costs will be added based on location, but will be charged at cost and should be less than $25 for the ""LED Pack"" and less than $100 for the ""Mini Pack"" and ""Complete Pack"".
If you have any questions regarding this campaign, please feel free to contact me at michu at pixelinvaders dot ch.

Multiple PixelInvader panels can be connected with each other to form a panel of any size. The panels are based on the latest LED technology - besides low heat dissipation and long life, a panel may illuminate an entire room and consume less energy than a standard lightbulb!

Multi platform, tested on OSX, Windows and Linux
