Phone Toaster is the world’s most feature-packed phone sanitizer. Make phone sterilization a daily habit by disinfecting effortlessly every time you charge your phone. Phone Toaster removes nearly all harmful bacteria and viruses swarming on your phone in just 5 minutes.

Short answer: because your phone is filthy. Really filthy. A cell phone is typically ten times dirtier than a toilet seat. More than 17,000 bacterial gene copies may exist on your phone. Phones can also harbor bacteria and current deadly viruses as well like E.coli and Staphylococcus.
Sounds gross? Well, consider that you spend all day holding that dirt and disease in your hands or next to your face. No wonder acne and other infections can be traced to mobile phones.

Because you bring it everywhere. In the subway. On the bus. To the gym. You eat with it. You sleep with it. And let's be honest — you bring it with you to the bathroom, too. It’s a big, dirty world out there, and your phone gets to experience ALL of it.

You should wash your hands six to ten times a day, so why not do the same with your phone? We designed Phone Toaster so phone sanitization becomes a daily habit, just like charging your phone — something you hardly need to think about. Phone Toaster’s sophisticated design also makes it perfect for any environment, be it your living room, your bedroom or even your office.

Phone Toaster is very effective at killing germs. Phone Toaster uses five powerful UV-C LEDs to kill nearly ALL harmful bacteria and viruses on your phone in just 5 minutes. Ultraviolet light between 200-280nm — called UV-C, or the ‘germicidal range’ — is proven to kill harmful bacteria like E. coli and Staphylococcus. It’s also proven effective against viruses like SARS and MERS, close relatives of the pandemic we're facing today, for which similar results can be expected, according to a factsheet published by the International Ultraviolet Association.

Phone Toaster uses a custom configuration of five LEDs inside a touchless light-proof enclosure to deliver germ and bacteria-destroying UV-C light to your phone’s entire surface, regardless of the make or model. There’s no need to flip your phone! In contrast, the majority of our competitors are only able to sanitize part of the phone at any one time. With Phone Toaster, you can always rest assured your phone will be “evenly toasted.”

Hey, aren’t UV-C rays harmful? Yes, they are. Which is why we painstakingly designed Phone Toaster to be perfectly safe. Its unique light-proof seal completely prevents harmful UV-C from escaping from the internal sanitizing and charging chamber. And its internal UV-C lights only operate when the device is completely closed.
Sure, there are a ton of phone sanitizers on the market now. We think Phone Toaster eclipses the competition, however, with its full-phone coverage and safety-first design. Plus we look cool.
- 1 power adapter with the proper plug and voltage for your country
- Max Phone Size: 80.8 x 172.3 x 11.9 mm
- Accommodates: iPhone11 Pro Max, Galaxy S20 Ultra and all smaller phones

Phone Toaster was developed by April Stone. We’re an experienced internal innovation team at SK Networks, one of South Korea’s largest companies. We’ve already brought a dozen April Stone products to market in South Korea and Japan.

Our mission here at April Stone is to create products that make our lives safer, more productive and more convenient. We’re also committed to ensuring our products meet the demands of the most sophisticated customers, in terms of product specifications and design.
""Phone Toaster can make a difference in the world by bringing phone hygiene into public awareness to keep people safe and healthy""
We developed Phone Toaster with the global public in mind, by using crowdsourcing and surveys as key steps in our development process.
We used 'OpenSurvey' to investigate pain points in real people's lives and identify ways we could help them. This helped us come up with the idea for Phone Toaster.
Based on all the crowdsourced feedback we received, we set to work developing prototypes #1 and #2. We are now in preparation for mass production, which will start in September.

","Phone Toaster is the world’s most feature-packed phone sanitizer. Make phone sterilization a daily habit by disinfecting effortlessly every time you charge your phone. Phone Toaster removes nearly all harmful bacteria and viruses swarming on your phone in just 5 minutes.

Short answer: because your phone is filthy. Really filthy. A cell phone is typically ten times dirtier than a toilet seat. More than 17,000 bacterial gene copies may exist on your phone. Phones can also harbor bacteria and current deadly viruses as well like E.coli and Staphylococcus.
Sounds gross? Well, consider that you spend all day holding that dirt and disease in your hands or next to your face. No wonder acne and other infections can be traced to mobile phones.

Because you bring it everywhere. In the subway. On the bus. To the gym. You eat with it. You sleep with it. And let's be honest — you bring it with you to the bathroom, too. It’s a big, dirty world out there, and your phone gets to experience ALL of it.

You should wash your hands six to ten times a day, so why not do the same with your phone? We designed Phone Toaster so phone sanitization becomes a daily habit, just like charging your phone — something you hardly need to think about. Phone Toaster’s sophisticated design also makes it perfect for any environment, be it your living room, your bedroom or even your office.

Phone Toaster is very effective at killing germs. Phone Toaster uses five powerful UV-C LEDs to kill nearly ALL harmful bacteria and viruses on your phone in just 5 minutes. Ultraviolet light between 200-280nm — called UV-C, or the ‘germicidal range’ — is proven to kill harmful bacteria like E. coli and Staphylococcus. It’s also proven effective against viruses like SARS and MERS, close relatives of the pandemic we're facing today, for which similar results can be expected, according to a factsheet published by the International Ultraviolet Association.

Phone Toaster uses a custom configuration of five LEDs inside a touchless light-proof enclosure to deliver germ and bacteria-destroying UV-C light to your phone’s entire surface, regardless of the make or model. There’s no need to flip your phone! In contrast, the majority of our competitors are only able to sanitize part of the phone at any one time. With Phone Toaster, you can always rest assured your phone will be “evenly toasted.”

Hey, aren’t UV-C rays harmful? Yes, they are. Which is why we painstakingly designed Phone Toaster to be perfectly safe. Its unique light-proof seal completely prevents harmful UV-C from escaping from the internal sanitizing and charging chamber. And its internal UV-C lights only operate when the device is completely closed.
Sure, there are a ton of phone sanitizers on the market now. We think Phone Toaster eclipses the competition, however, with its full-phone coverage and safety-first design. Plus we look cool.
Every Phone Toaster order will include:
- 1 power adapter with the proper plug and voltage for your country
- Max Phone Size: 80.8 x 172.3 x 11.9 mm
- Accommodates: iPhone11 Pro Max, Galaxy S20 Ultra and all smaller phones

Phone Toaster was developed by April Stone. We’re an experienced internal innovation team at SK Networks, one of South Korea’s largest companies. We’ve already brought a dozen April Stone products to market in South Korea and Japan.

Our mission here at April Stone is to create products that make our lives safer, more productive and more convenient. We’re also committed to ensuring our products meet the demands of the most sophisticated customers, in terms of product specifications and design.
Phone Toaster can make a difference in the world by bringing phone hygiene into public awareness to keep people safe and healthy""
We developed Phone Toaster with the global public in mind, by using crowdsourcing and surveys as key steps in our development process.
We used 'OpenSurvey' to investigate pain points in real people's lives and identify ways we could help them. This helped us come up with the idea for Phone Toaster.
Based on all the crowdsourced feedback we received, we set to work developing prototypes #1 and #2. We are now in preparation for mass production, which will start in September.",18.0,1,"1 Campaign
To offer a quick and simple protection method for smartphones and tablets utilising effortless technology that anyone can use.

Screen protectors are historically gruelling to install. It is a difficult task to align the protector properly so that it goes on evenly. Constantly removing and repositioning the protector causes it to bend and trap dust and air bubbles.
Our Snap ITPosition-Lock Design solves the problem!

Snap IT comes with a disposable mould that fits perfectly around the device. Simply push the mould over the device peel back the arrow the mould leaves the screen protector flawlessly installed.

Our Product -

 Snap IT combines this innovative material with new manufacturing process to insure the easiest installation on the market! Using a reusable high strength adhesive only on the edges of the protector allows for easy placement, and 100% no bubbles... EVER! It literally takes 5 seconds to install perfectly!

We would spend the backing money on -

column2: >Our super-thin, self-adhesive film protects your screen from scratches with an unbeatable 9H hardness rating. Our Anti-Blue Light Glass is also easy to clean, with an oil-resistant, anti-fingerprint coating.

column1: Our Anti-Blue Light Glass significantly reduces blue light emissions, which are proven to suppress melatonin levels, causing havoc with sleep patterns. With Our Anti-Blue Light Glass protecting your iPhone 6, you really can sleep easy.

Unlike thin plastic protectors, the Snap IT Series actually are impact resistant! Did you know an that the latest smart phones utilize in-cell touch technology. This allows for ultra thin phones, but unfortunately, it is also very expensive to replace. For example, a simple drop of your iPhone 6 can land you up with a £200 repair, as the front glass is part of the entire screen assembly. The Snap IT Series screen protector can save the day, and your wallet, by taking the abuse so your phone doesn't have to!

All our screen protectors undergo a 4 hour hardening process to ensure they give your phone the best protection it can get!
Do you want to stock our product? Or know anyone that would? Get in contact with us now!

LocalJob is a cross-platform mobile application based on geo-localisation, and aimed towards connecting users who need household-related services (e.g. plumbing work, electrical repair) with technicians who offer them.

The application allows customers to ask for a professional service in the local area of interest, while professionals offer price quotes in an effort to win the contract on the basis of a competitive auction.

This intuitive reverse auction-based platform strengthens local markets, fosters diffusion of reliable professional services and promotes activities with a strong connection to the adjacent territory. Additionally, the application has an integrated payment system, along with a feedback-based rating platform.

LocalJob is available for iPhone, Android, Windows Phone and BlackBerry systems and uses standard-web technologies (HTML5, CSS3, AJAX), open-source platforms for JavaScript libraries (JQuery) and geographic data (OpenLayers maps).
Follow us: SocialCitiesIT on Facebook and Twitter!

The idea came from my personal experience of living in several different cities and being in the need of maintenance services for my apartment without having any established contact with local professionals. Another important factor was also the relatively high price usually asked for this kind of interventions
column2: I felt the need to find a way to increase competition in the market and allow customers like me to compare prices and services offered.

column1: What is the customer problem we will address?

The venture will address and solve the troubles related to finding reliable, fast and cheap technicians, who provide a spectrum of house maintenance services. The rating system and the auction mechanism will allow customers to find high-standard services at the lowest possible cost.

The app also meet the need for advertising of small enterprises and professionals, who can benefit of an easy and cheap way to promote their activities and gain visibility in their local area of interest.

Given the bifocal nature of the venture, two are the main market segments. One is represented by young people (20-40), prone to use web-based services or mobile apps and open to new technologies, living in medium-to-big cities
column2: the second consists in small enterprises and indipendent professionals, who operate in local markets and cannot afford extensive marketing and promotional strategies.

column1: The initial launch phase will be limited to selected cities (Milan and Bologna in Italy), which provide the sufficient critical mass of users, combined with a predominating presence of a substrate of SME and professionals operating at a local and hyper-local level.
Relevant competitors and substitutes for LocalJob can be classified into three main categories.
• Traditional advertisement, such as Yellow Pages, which are slower, less cost-efficient and with limited interactivity compared to LocalJob.

• Web-based advertisement services, such as craigslist.com (or subito.it, bakeka.it or Ebay Annunci in the italian market targeted in the launch phase), which do not provide neither an integrated payment system nor a feedback-based valuation systems.

• Other geolocalization-based social apps with advertisement components, such as Foursquare, which do not allow the bi-directional interaction provided by LocalJob (customers asking for interventions, professionals offering services and promoting their activities).
LocalJob is based on two main revenue centers, a transaction fee on every transaction and the possibility to buy premium accounts.
• The transaction fee consists in either 3% of the transaction amount (if the payment is processed via the internal payment system) or a fixed fee of 3€ (in case of cash payments)
• The premium accounts require the payment of a monthly fee, and offer to professionals more efficient advertising, greater visibility and a software for invoice management.
Main costs are represented by software development costs, salaries for IT experts and marketing and promotion.
What are the three biggest risks for the venture?

The first critical risk for the venture is related to the fact that the apps needs an initial critical mass of users to be effective and useful. In fact, the service start being competitive compared to traditional methods only when a sufficient amount of costumers starts being involved in the network.

The second main risk is connected to the limited barriers to entry protecting the business from incumbent and new entrants, and to the possibility that established players in the classified advertisement market could jump on the opportunity with greater resources and platforms.

The third risk is represented by the considerable impact that phenomena like black markets and shadow economy have in the main target market (Italy). The established use of avoiding formal economy channels, especially in the market for professional services provision, could significantly hamper the development of a venture like LocalJob, that requires payment to be registered and formalized.

The only thing this money will be used for pay the servers and we will handle all other costs ourselves too. We just want to hire two extra developers and hope that by doing some pre-sales here we will be able to delay having to raise funding, and maybe even prevent ever having to raise funding at all.

Thanks! :)

What We Need & What You Get

The only thing this money will be used for pay the servers and we will handle all other costs ourselves too. We just want to hire two extra developers and hope that by doing some pre-sales here we will be able to delay having to raise funding, and maybe even prevent ever having to raise funding at all.

A BIG THANK YOU TO ALL THE BACKERS OF THE PREVIOUS CAMPAIGN! THANK YOU FOR YOUR TRUST AND SUPPORT. IT MEANS A LOT TO US! 


Small, stylish wearable device that fits in your pocket. Pull it out when your other devices need saving in any emergency. Jiffy uses the new technology ""Quick Charge 2.0"" This is the fastest technology out at the moment for charging devices.

We are living in the time of technology that has been developing more and faster than ever. Technology has become essential in today’s world. Our lives have become closely linked to mobile electronic devices, because they give us freedom of communication.


Jiffy helps your devices when they run out of juice.

When the battery runs out devices and gadgets become useless pieces of plastic and metal. They become unusable.

Jiffy is an eco-charger and using the new technology ""Quick Charge 2.0"" will assure your device a quick charge that truly offers freedom and unlimited independence when it comes to charging your mobile devices and gadgets.That’s it! You are completely independent of any power supply, electric network, or wall outlet.  Jiffy is an eco-charger that has a priceless advantage both in everyday life and especially when travelling and going on new adventures even to the ends of the world.

THE IDEAL SITUATION- to maintain a last call, an emergency call when you are in a critical situation, to send a last text, or study a map with GPS in case you get lost and can’t find sources to charge your device nearby.

TOTAL ENERGY INDEPENDENCE- charge devices and gadgets at any time, any place and without taking in to consideration the weather, or temperature outside.


Imagine a scenario of being lost in the woods, in the desert, or in a jungle. Your phones battery will be assured only by Jiffy!


PRIORITY- compared to other methods of charging gadgets, Jiffy doesn’t need gas balloons with chemical reactions as other chargers. You can use it at night, in the shade, in thick forests unlike solar chargers. Jiffy also doesn’t need wind, or water currents.

IMPORTANT-No traditional electricity, no air pollution, and you don’t need to look for a power outlet. In this way you don’t need to worry about where you will charge your mobile phone, camera, Bluetooth headset, or any other devices that can be charged through USB.

Charge while on any type of transportation: train, ship, bus, or even wagon. You can rest assured and camp as much as you want, do extreme mountain sports, go hiking, or rock climbing without worrying that your camera, or smart phone will be without battery and you will remain without communication.

We all know how problematic it is to find an electrical power outlet when going on longer trips. Also we know situations when electricity shuts off at home because of powerful rain, wind, or other natural phenomena that cause damage to power grids. You will be able to access the internet, radio, or other news portals in times of danger and emergency.

Thanks to the USB attachment with LED light, Jiffy can be used as a light source. It does not need batteries and can be used at any time when there are blackouts and electricity and light are most needed. It is perfect to have a Jiffy handy in your emergency kit.
column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

MULTI USB- the cable is perfect to charge any gadget at any time. Charge your devices and gadgets, or help a friend that needs help, but needs a different kind of cable.

How does Jiffy work? 

Jiffy represents a USB charger that mechanically produces electricity without eliminating toxic substances into the atmosphere. Electricity production is carried out by a three phase asynchronous micro generator with very high productivity, which is driven by a complex mechanical watch. With a simple movement the mechanism is charged with kinetic energy which is transmitted to the micro generators. The charging module is 5V USB that charges all the devices that support the standard USB. The intensity of electric current is up to 2200 mA and this offers a faster charge, by using the new tehnology ""Quick Charge 2.0"".

For the people that are less technical, Jiffy with the 2200mA can simultaneously charge 6 smart phones with 4” screens that are navigating the internet through Wi-Fi, or 4 smart phones that are navigating the internet through 3G. 

Technical info about the prototype:

Behind the micro generator is mounted a controller that has the function of continuously recovering the current and 5V voltage stabilization. Also an electrolytic capacitor which has the function of a micro accumulator is connected in the scheme to remove the current fluctuations produced by mechanical processes under the influence of kinetic energy.

Electrical scheme

We documented our work process and wanted to share with you the important steps. Also watch the first prototype we tested.
column11:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">


Thanks for making it all the way down here to meet team Jiffy!

What we intend to do after the campaign is finished?

After the Indiegogo campaign is finished we will start work on Jiffy immediately because we know that time is the biggest enemy for a start up. We know that we will encounter obstacles along the way, but we are ready to face them and if everything goes as planned we will deliver Jiffy within the timeline that we estimated. 

We hope that Jiffy is just the first of many devices that we work on. For us this is hopefully going to be a successful campaign that will turn into a small business and generate enough income to give us the possibility to work on bigger projects. It would be great to work on other projects that will bring solutions to problems like reusable energy, eco friendly energy, global warming etc. These are the problems that bother us and we hope that with your help we will be able to start attending to them.

TIMELINE


Perks

LABB – SAY WHAT? What happens when you cross building blocks with a self-gripping band? The LABB: short for The Loopless And Buckleless Band. #welcometothefuture
column17:
s=fcc08317cc293f6bbaf016d8c13041a3"" src="""" style=""""/>

LESS IS MORE. The LABB’s strength lies in its apparent simplicity. No buckle, no loop, but a secure, hard-wearing, easy-to-use fastener. #smallbutstrong
column19:
showinfo=0"">
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The LABB is available in 5 different colors and 2 types of lugs (black and silver), a unique patented fastening system. Customising your Apple Watch with the LABB becomes a fun game.
 
 
Due to a lot of requests, we wanted to show you that black lugs with rose gold Apple Watch looks awesome too!
column23:
s=7cf73095c00602c67ad81e23203e50d9"" src="""" style=""""/>

If you get two LABB you can start personalising your band by mixing colours depending on your mood.

At Noomoon, we don’t « do » theory, we apply it. From purchase to use, it’s all about experience, with each new discovery becoming a part of who you are. So take a deep breath and get the Noomoon reflex! #noomoonwayoflife
column27:
s=722b1d14a848b2a0ef8f2db2e88e4888"" src="""" style=""""/>

The strictiest tests from the industry have been made to make sure the LABB is safe.

This amazing material called FKM can only be found on luxury watches nowadays. The cost is a lot higher than regular silicone or PU but it's totally worth it. 

At Noomoon, we speak a language full of acronyms and technical terms. The LABB is the perfect expression of the innovative, 100% Swiss material from which it’s made. A unique, future-proofed object – call it a UFO. – that is supple, soft to the touch, odourless, waterproof, resistant, smart and skin-friendly.  

The LABB can currently only fit the 42mm Apple Watch! But depending on the success of the project, we might quickly adapt it the 38mm version of the Apple Watch. Also, it can fit wrists from 155mm to 220mm. 

In order to bring the LABB to life, we partnered with LAYER design studio, owned by the creative and multi-award wining designer, Benjamin Hubert.

About a year ago we got an idea and felt we were on to something, but also realised the amount of work needed to accomplish it. Thanks to our amazing team and partners we are now reaching the final stage of development. Last but not least, we need your support to launch extra moulds and kick off the production!

Noomoon is about dynamics and synergies pulling together. It’s about the hard core of individuals who built the brand, the boss who has faith in his employees, the designers who work on the products, the customers and fans who help pick out the colours and generally make their input felt. And the creative types who swear by nothing more than innovation and can’t wait to get onboard. Because creativity is always better when it’s shared. You are Noomoon.

Want to write about NOOMOON and the LABB? Download our Press Pack (http://bit.ly/noomoon)! 

Any questions or concerns? Feel free to email us at press@noomoon.ch

column1: ","LABB – SAY WHAT? What happens when you cross building blocks with a self-gripping band? The LABB: short for The Loopless And Buckleless Band. #welcometothefutureLESS IS MORE. The LABB’s strength lies in its apparent simplicity. No buckle, no loop, but a secure, hard-wearing, easy-to-use fastener. #smallbutstrong         The LABB is available in 5 different colors and 2 types of lugs (black and silver), a unique patented fastening system. Customising your Apple Watch with the LABB becomes a fun game.  Due to a lot of requests, we wanted to show you that black lugs with rose gold Apple Watch looks awesome too!  If you get two LABB you can start personalising your band by mixing colours depending on your mood.At Noomoon, we don’t « do » theory, we apply it. From purchase to use, it’s all about experience, with each new discovery becoming a part of who you are. So take a deep breath and get the Noomoon reflex! #noomoonwayoflifeThe strictiest tests from the industry have been made to make sure the LABB is safe.This amazing material called FKM can only be found on luxury watches nowadays. The cost is a lot higher than regular silicone or PU but it's totally worth it. At Noomoon, we speak a language full of acronyms and technical terms. The LABB is the perfect expression of the innovative, 100% Swiss material from which it’s made. A unique, future-proofed object – call it a UFO. – that is supple, soft to the touch, odourless, waterproof, resistant, smart and skin-friendly.  The LABB can currently only fit the 42mm Apple Watch! But depending on the success of the project, we might quickly adapt it the 38mm version of the Apple Watch. Also, it can fit wrists from 155mm to 220mm. In order to bring the LABB to life, we partnered with LAYER design studio, owned by the creative and multi-award wining designer, Benjamin Hubert.About a year ago we got an idea and felt we were on to something, but also realised the amount of work needed to accomplish it. Thanks to our amazing team and partners we are now reaching the final stage of development. Last but not least, we need your support to launch extra moulds and kick off the production!Noomoon is about dynamics and synergies pulling together. It’s about the hard core of individuals who built the brand, the boss who has faith in his employees, the designers who work on the products, the customers and fans who help pick out the colours and generally make their input felt. And the creative types who swear by nothing more than innovation and can’t wait to get onboard. Because creativity is always better when it’s shared. You are Noomoon.Want to write about NOOMOON and the LABB? Download our Press Pack (http://bit.ly/noomoon)! Any questions or concerns? Feel free to email us at press@noomoon.ch
The World's First Smart Screen Protector with Smart Buttons for the iPhone!

Intelli+ is the world's first smart screen protector that simplifies navigating your iPhone. With 2 action keys built directly into the screen protector, you no longer have to struggle to reach the top of your screen. Instead, just tap on an action key and let it do the reaching for you.
column2:
>

Easily navigate with Intelli+'s built in action keys
column3:
> 

If you're like us, you've noticed that the iPhone has gotten larger and but our thumbs haven't. We struggle to reach the navigation icons at the top corners and as result are dropping our iPhone's more frequently.  

But, like you, we also love having a larger screen. So what are we supposed to do? Whether you have large or small hands, you shouldn't be limited in your choice of size when it comes to the iPhone.
column4: >Intelli+ makes one hand use easy
column5:
> 

That's why we invented the Intelli+ smart screen protector
column6: to make your life easier. Intelli+'s dual actions keys are conveniently located on either side of the home button. bringing back one handed use.
column7:
>Intelli+'s minimalist design includes 2 invisible buttons

 

 With the invention of the Intelli+, your screen protector doesn't have to be limited to just protecting your iPhone.
column8: >Use the left or RIGHT action key to open a message
column9:
> Get more from your screen protector with Intelli+’s integrated action keys.

Whether you're the next social media mogul or just a business oriented individual trying to be more productive, the Intelli+ will work with any app that you have. Tweeting, DM's, emails or answering text messages, Intelli+ is compatible with all apps.
column10:
>The Intelli+ is compatible with all apps

 

Intelli+ is the first dual action key screen protector for the iPhone 8. It was primarily designed with the iPhone 8 in mind. However the Intelli+ has been adapted for the iPhone 7/7 Plus and 6/6 Plus line up to work flawlessly.

 

A quick anatomy review:  

The human body generates a small electrical charge. It's this principal that current phone screen tech depends on to function. Intelli+ uses similar technology to create an circuit layer embedded within our glass. 

Our smart buttons are ergonomically placed next to the home button. Tapping them will result in your signal being carried to the top instantly. So now you never have to struggle to reach the top of your screen.  

Taking pictures, navigating back, answering messages or posting just got a whole lot easier.
column11: >Intelli+ circuit layer is the technology behind the action keys.
column12: >Highly protective while conserving the iPhone’s pressure sensitive 3D touch function
column13: >Intelli+ tempered glass is heated to 430 degrees Celsius, that’s just over 800 degrees Fahrenheit, making sure you get the most protection possible.
column14: >Carry your iPhone in your pocket, secure in the knowledge that keys and coins won’t damage your screen.
column15: >Oil resistant coating to prevent the accumulation of fingerprints and smudging. A quick wipe will keep your iPhone looking brand new.
column16:
>Made with Japanese glass for ultra clarity and unobstructed use of your iPhone

We're so proud with how far we've come. From a simple problem that was mentioned in passing over drinks, to research, design, development and production of the Intelli+. We hope to help alleviate all those whom are frustrated with their iPhones.
column17: >From idea to our finished product.
column18:
>Risks and challenges

We are already in touch with manufacturing and distribution partners, meaning that we are well on our way to making this product happen. Whatever issues may arise, we will be ready to face them.

This is where we need your help. With everything in place, cost effective manufacturing requires a large amount of units produced. The higher the demand and support from the community, the quicker we can scale our production, after all manufacturing is all about the numbers.

Our goal, is to meet delivery deadlines and make sure that each Intelli+ is the best quality and most useful screen protector you'll ever use.

So if you're a fan of Intelli+, please back our campaign, share with friends and family and help us spread the word. Your support will make all the difference in the world.

","The World's First Smart Screen Protector with Smart Buttons for the iPhone!

column1: KOTERIE was born in response to the disconnect that occurs from an ever-connected world.  As traditional and non-traditional college students, we have come to the common realization that there is now networking overload.
In class were are indoctrinated to use professional networking sites when we are not yet professional
column2: we are just another entry level candidate, playing dress up for a headshot, sending in a resume that is vetted by keywords ( which we use because we know we are reduced to key words.)

column1: “Well, it’s not what you know, it’s who you know”. Fine, let’s throw the last paragraph out the window. How do you get to know people in 140 characters? Is a recruiter going to meet you at a bar at 11 p.m. on a Tuesday? Is the person sitting next to you in senior seminar not going to meet you anywhere besides a bar at 11 p.m. on a Tuesday?
We were not alive the last time a campus bulletin board was useful.

We get it. All we do is stare at our phones and not talk to each other. KOTERIE seeks to be the artifact of our unique time and situation, an app, simple and straight forward.  Four windows into our world:  calendar, on-campus information feed (R.I.P bulletin boards), off-campus information feed (R.I.P paid social media postings), peer-to- peer connection (R.I.P keyword filters).

Community, consistency and creative collaboration are our core values—we seek to offer our clients mutually beneficial connections on a stable, reliable platform that rewards collaborative voices and efforts. In short we believe in Unity in Community.

1. Why Sports.ws Needs Your Help

Hello general managers, as you may already know Sports.ws is owned and operated by one guy - me. Lately I find myself struggling to pay off the debt associated with the purchase of the website, with the revenue from advertisements barely covering costs associated with the site (server costs, stat licenses, etc.). I'm afraid that, without outside help, I'll have to look for work elsewhere - and that means less time and attention for Sports.ws.

With your help I can ensure that my financial situation doesn't hold me back and that Sports.ws remains my full-time priority. How can I prove I'm serious about this? If we meet the campaign goal, I'll even vow to develop an official Sports.ws app in time for the 2016-17 NBA season.

A Sports.ws App? Really?

Yes. For at least iOS and Android. So long as I am able to afford to give the time and labor required, I want Sports.ws to have an official app. If we reach this campaign goal, I'll be able continue to work on new Sports.ws features like this without having to waste my time dealing with new advertisers or looking for an alternative full-time job.

In addition to a Sports.ws app, if we meet this campaign goal, I can cut back on parts of our advertising campaigns to ensure a faster user experience on the website. Why? Because I won't need to pay off the original purchase.

Oh, and just for the fun of it, I'll give every user at Sports.ws advanced commissioner tools for the 2015-16 season.

Individual Donor Perks

Although everybody will benefit from the creation of an app and the aforementioned rewards, I've made unique perks available specifically to users who donate towards this Indiegogo campaign. Some are low key, some are pretty significant.

It would be a lifesaver for me personally if commissioners in Sports.ws keeper leagues tried to round up money from their owners. I wanted to set up perks that could benefit an entire group. If you donate as a group, you can secure some pretty substantial features.

If a league is able to top $1,000, for example, I want to let them design their very own default scoring method. That means every single league will have the option of using your scoring format, the same way that they do Standard or Production scoring.

A Personal Letter From Austin Kent

Hey Sports.ws GMs, my name is Austin Kent - I'm the one who has been running things around here for the past few years. I've proposed this Indiegogo campaign because I need your help.

Three years ago I bought the fantasy basketball site off of the original creator. It's been an honor to run Sports.ws ever since, but it's also been a challenge. You see, when I bought Sports.ws, I did so as an individual, not as a company or corporation. To be honest, the website has been on a line of credit for my wife and I ever since.

These days Sports.ws is barely able to cover its operating costs (servers, stat licenses, etc.) through our ad revenue and annual perk campaigns. The problem is that the debt associated with the original purchase has proven to be a concern and the attention required by the advertising campaigns to keep up with the ever-changing online ad industry takes up the majority of my Sports.ws time. 

It has me wondering how much longer I'll be able to continue.

I don't want to have to advertise more than we already do, nor do anything that would more intrusively monetize the site. That being said, if I don't get a handle on this original purchase debt, there may come a time when I would have to walk away from Sports.ws altogether.

I love managing Sports.ws and being there when users need me. If we work toward this campaign goal together, I can guarantee that Sports.ws will always get the attention that it deserves.

2. ¿Por Sports.ws necesita tu ayuda?

Hola gerentes generales, como usted ya sabe, Sports.ws es propiedad y está operado por un hombre - yo. Últimamente me encuentro luchando para pagar la deuda asociada a la compra del sitio web, con los ingresos de la publicidad apenas cubren los costos asociados con el sitio (costos de servidores, licencias de estadísticas, etc.). Me temo que, sin ayuda externa, voy a tener que buscar trabajo en otros lugares - y eso significa menos tiempo y atención por Sports.ws.

Con su ayuda puedo asegurar que mi situación económica no me detenga y que Sports.ws sigue siendo mi prioridad de tiempo completo. ¿Cómo puedo demostrar que soy serio sobre esto? Si nos encontramos con el objetivo de la campaña, yo incluso comprometo a desarrollar una aplicación oficial Sports.ws a tiempo para la temporada de 2016 a 17 de la NBA.

Una aplicación Sports.ws? De Verdad?

Sí. Durante al menos iOS y Android. Así que mientras yo sea capaz de permitirse el lujo de dar el tiempo y el trabajo necesarios, quiero Sports.ws tener una aplicación oficial. Si llegamos a este objetivo de la campaña, voy a poder seguir trabajando en la nueva Sports.ws características como esta sin tener que perder el tiempo tratando con nuevos anunciantes o en busca de un trabajo a tiempo completo alternativo.

Además de una aplicación Sports.ws, si cumplimos con este objetivo de la campaña, puedo recortar partes de nuestras campañas de publicidad para garantizar una experiencia de usuario más rápida en la página web. ¿Por qué? Porque no voy a necesitar para pagar la compra original.

Ah, y sólo por el gusto de hacerlo, voy a dar a cada usuario en Sports.ws herramientas comisionado avanzada para la temporada 2015-16.

Beneficios de los donantes

Aunque todo el mundo se beneficiará de la creación de una aplicación y los beneficios antes mencionados, he hecho ventajas únicas disponibles específicamente para usuarios que donan a esta campaña Indiegogo. Algunos son de bajo perfil, algunas son bastante significativos.

Sería un salvavidas para mí personalmente si los comisionados en ligas keeper Sports.ws intentaron acorralar a dinero de sus propietarios. Quería establecer ventajas que podrían beneficiar a un grupo entero. Si usted dona como grupo, usted puede asegurar algunas características muy importantes.

Si una liga es capaz de superar los US $ 1.000, por ejemplo, yo quiero dejar a diseñar su propio método de puntuación por defecto. Eso significa que todas las ligas solo tendrá la opción de usar el formato de puntuación, del mismo modo que lo hacen de puntuación estándar o Producción.

Una carta personal de Austin Kent

Hey Sports.ws GMs, mi nombre es Austin Kent - Yo soy el que ha estado funcionando las cosas por aquí en los últimos años. Me he propuesto esta campaña Indiegogo porque necesito tu ayuda.

Hace tres años me compré el sitio de baloncesto de fantasía fuera del creador original. Ha sido un honor para funcionar Sports.ws desde entonces, pero también ha sido un desafío. Usted ve, cuando compré Sports.ws, lo hice como un individuo, no como una empresa o corporación. Para ser honesto, el sitio ha estado en una línea de crédito para mi esposa y yo desde entonces.

Estos días Sports.ws apenas es capaz de cubrir sus costos de operación (servidores, licencias de estadísticas, etc.) a través de nuestro ingresos por publicidad y las campañas de gratificación anual. El problema es que la deuda asociada a la compra original ha demostrado ser una preocupación y la atención requerida por las campañas de publicidad para mantenerse al día con la industria de la publicidad en línea siempre cambiante ocupa la mayor parte de mi tiempo Sports.ws.

Me ha preguntaba cuánto tiempo más voy a ser capaz de continuar.

Yo no quiero tener que anunciar más de lo que ya hacemos, ni hacer nada que más intrusiva monetizar el sitio. Dicho esto, si no consigo una manija en esta deuda original de compra, puede llegar un momento en que tendría que alejarse de Sports.ws completo.

Me encanta la gestión Sports.ws y estar ahí cuando los usuarios me necesitan. Si trabajamos hacia esta meta campaña juntos, puedo garantizar que Sports.ws siempre recibirá la atención que se merece.

Beneficios

2015-16 Forum Package

Los donantes que se comprometen esta cantidad obtendrán los paquetes estándar Foro y Daily Dubs disponible a través de la campaña gratificación anual.

2015-16 Ad-Free Package

Los usuarios que llegan a este hito tendrán la 2.015-16 paquete sin publicidad que ha estado disponible como un beneficio adicional en el sitio web. Navegar por el sitio sin ningún tipo de anuncios en todo y también tener acceso a nuestros foros VIP y herramientas comisionado avanzadas.

Beta Access to the Sports.ws App

Siempre y cuando nos encontramos con nuestro objetivo de la campaña, voy a necesitar los usuarios que ayudan con el desarrollo de la aplicación Sports.ws. Los donantes que llegan a este hito tendrá acceso a la aplicación para iOS / Android tan pronto como esté disponible. Este beneficio incluirá el 2015 a 16 sin publicidad paquete de beneficio.

Two Pixelated Posters

Realmente no hay mejor manera de mostrar su apoyo a su equipo de fantasía que muestra un cartel en su casa u oficina. Usuarios que donan para este paquete tendrán la opción de dos carteles, en contraposición a uno del paquete Poster estándar. Quiero dos equipos de fantasía? ¿Quieres un equipo de fantasía y otro de su equipo favorito de la NBA? Usted nos dice.

Lifetime Ad-Free Package

Los anuncios son un mal necesario, todavía, usted puede deshacerse de ellos por completo al llegar a este hito. No sólo va a navegar sin anuncios en 2.015-16, podrás navegar sin anuncios durante el tiempo que usted tiene una cuenta en Sports.ws. Esto incluye el acceso beta de la aplicación Sports.ws cuando esté disponible.

Sponsor an NBA Player Profile

De manera similar a la forma en sitios como baloncesto Referencia permiten patrocina perfiles individuales de los jugadores, vamos a dejar que usted pone su marca en una página jugador Sports.ws. En tanto que su mensaje es apropiado para todos los usuarios, le daremos 250 caracteres de texto para hacer algo de publicidad de su propio blog para presumir de su carrera Sports.ws ganar porcentaje. También vamos a lanzar en un perfil de jugador 12 ""-18"" - del reproductor usted patrocinó o que alguna vez jugador, equipo de la NBA o de la fantasía del equipo que desee.

Immortalize a Sports.ws Legend

Barney Stinson ... Kimmy Gibbler ... Un Pony ... ________. Alcanzar este hito dará donantes la oportunidad de decidir quién será la próxima leyenda Sports.ws. ¿Eres tú? Un cibernéticamente mejorado Stephon Marbury? Tu personaje favorito de esa demostración usted y sus leaguemates siempre citar? Siéntase libre para recoger sus leaguemates y donar como uno para tener derecho a este beneficio. Este beneficio vendrá con acceso a la beta de la aplicación y el paquete 2015-16 sin publicidad por 10 cuentas de usuario.

Design a New Scoring Method

Usted ha jugado en las ligas y ligas estándar de producción, pero tal vez no haya cautivado bastante la forma en que el método de puntuación de encargo que usted y sus amigos se le ocurrió hace. Los donantes que llegan a este hito puede diseñar un formato de puntuación que va a vivir para siempre, accesible por todos los que juegan en Sports.ws. Siéntase libre para recoger sus leaguemates y donar como uno con el fin de alcanzar este hito. Este beneficio vendrá con acceso a la beta de la aplicación y el paquete 2015-16 sin publicidad por 20 usuarios.

Lifetime Support VIP SportsWS

Comisionados, se reúnen sus leaguemates y se comprometen como uno. Además del diseño de un beneficio Método de puntuación, seré directamente accesible, 24/7, para ayudar con cualquier asunto relacionado liga-de dificultades técnicas al arbitraje de transacciones durante el tiempo que soy propietario y operar el sitio. Va a diseñar su propio método de puntaje y obtener para inmortalizar una leyenda Sports.ws. Este beneficio vendrá con acceso a la beta de la aplicación y el paquete sin publicidad por vida para 30 usuarios.

3. Perché Sports.ws ha bisogno del vostro aiuto

Ciao General Manager, come forse già sapete Sports.ws è posseduto e gestito da una sola persona – me. 

Ultimamente mi sono trovato in difficoltà nel saldare i debiti associati all’acquisto del sito web, con il guadagno proveniente dalle pubblicità che copre a mala pena le spese relative al sito (costi del server, licenze delle statistiche ecc.). 

Temo che, senza un aiuto dall’esterno, dovrò cercare lavoro da un’altra parte – e questo significa meno tempo e attenzione per Sports.ws. 

Con il vostro aiuto posso garantire che la mia situazione finanziaria non ostacolerà il mio impegno e che Sports.ws rimarrà la mia priorità a tempo pieno. 

Come posso provare di essere serio riguardo a ciò? Se noi raggiungiamo l’obiettivo di questa iniziativa, io posso anche promettere di sviluppare una applicazione ufficiale di Sports.ws in tempo per la stagione NBA 2016-2017. 

Una app di Sports.ws? Veramente?

Certo. Almeno per iOS e Android. Finchè sarò in grado di garantire il tempo e il lavoro necessari, vorrei che Sports.ws avesse una sua app ufficiale. 

Se raggiungiamo l’obiettivo di questa iniziativa, io potrò continuare a lavorare su funzioni di Sports.ws come questa senza dover perdere il mio tempo con altre pubblicità o per cercare un altro lavoro a tempo pieno. 

In aggiunta all’applicazione, se raggiungiamo l’obiettivo di questa iniziativa, potrò diminuire i banner pubblicitari per assicurare una navigazione più veloce sul sito. Perchè? Perché avrei una minore necessità di rientrare nei costi dell’acquisto originario di questo sito. 

Oh, e solo per il gusto di farlo, darò ad ogni utente gli strumenti avanzati del Commissioner della stagione 2015-2016. 

Particolari vantaggi per i donatori

Sebbene tutti usufruiranno della creazione di una app e dei benefici sopra menzionati, io creerò unici vantaggi disponibili solo agli utenti che doneranno per questa “Indiegogo Campaign”. Alcuni sono di poco conto, altri invece sono particolarmente significativi. 

Personalmente per me sarebbe una benedizione se i Commissioner delle leghe keeper di Sports.ws raccogliessero donazioni dai loro owner. 

Voglio creare vantaggi che possono dare un beneficio all’intero gruppo. Se donate come gruppo, potrete assicurarvi sostanziali e significative features. 

Se una lega è in grado di raggiungere $1,000 per esempio, io lascerei ideare ai suoi utenti un proprio sistema di calcolo dei punteggi di default. 

Questo significherebbe che ogni singola lega avrebbe la possibilità di scegliere il vostro scoring format, allo stesso modo in cui è possibile scegliere tra Standard o Production scoring. 

Una lettera personale da Austin Kent

Hey GM di Sports.ws, il mio nome è Austin Kent, io sono colui che sta facendo funzionare le cose in questo sito negli ultimi anni. 

Io ho proposto questa “Indiegogo campaign” perché ho bisogno del vostro aiuto.

Tre anni fa ho acquistato questo sito dal creatore originario. E’ stato un onore gestire Sports.ws da allora, ma è stata anche una sfida. Vedete, quando ho acquistato Sports.ws, io l’ho fatto come singolo, non come compagnia o corporation. 

Ad essere onesto, il sito è diventato una linea di credito per me e mia moglie da allora. 

In questi giorni Sports.ws è a mala pena in grado di coprire i suoi costi operativi (server, licenze per le statistiche) attraverso i nostri redditi pubblicitari e le nostre iniziative di donazione annuali. 

Il problema sta nel fatto che il debito associato all’acquisto originario si è rivelato sempre più motivo di preoccupazione e l’attenzione richiesta per le iniziative pubblicitarie necessarie a tenere il passo con la continua evoluzione del settore pubblicitario online sta occupando la maggior parte del mio tempo su Sports.ws. 

Mi sto chiedendo per quanto tempo sarò in grado di andare avanti. 

Non voglio dover pubblicizzare più di quanto già facciamo, né fare qualcosa che possa monetizzare intrusivamente il sito. 

Detto questo, se non riesco a gestire questo debito dell’acquisto originario, potrebbe arrivare il momento in cui dovrò allontanarmi definitivamente da Sports.ws. 

Amo gestire Sports.ws ed essere qui quando gli utenti hanno bisogno di me. Se lavoriamo all’obiettivo di quest’iniziativa insieme, posso garantire che Sports.ws avrà sempre l’attenzione che merita. 

Benefici

2015-2016 Forum Package 

I donatori che si impegnano per questo importo riceveranno l’accesso ai pacchetti standard Forum e Daily Dubs disponibili attraverso la campagna annuale di donazione. 

2015-2016 Ad-Free Package 

Gli utenti che raggiungono questo traguardo riceveranno il pacchetto 2015-16 senza pubblicità, disponibile come beneficio accessorio sul sito. Sfoglia il sito senza alcuna pubblicità e ottieni anche l'accesso ai nostri forum VIP e agli strumenti avanzati del Commissioner. 

Beta Access a Sports.ws 

Fino a quando non raggiungeremo l’obiettivo della nostra iniziativa, avrò bisogno di utenti che mi aiutino nello sviluppo dell’app. di Sport.ws. 

I donatori che raggiungono questo traguardo otterranno l’accesso alla app. iOS/Android non appena sarà disponibile. Questo vantaggio include il pacchetto Ad-Free. 

Two Pixelated Posters 

Non c’è veramente miglior modo per supportare il tuo fantasy team di esporre il poster a casa o in ufficio. Gli utenti che acquistano questo pacchetto potranno scegliere tra due poster, a differenza del singolo poster del pacchetto standard. Lo vuoi di due fantasy team? Lo vuoi di un fantasy team e della tua squadra NBA preferita? Contattaci. 

Lifetime Ad-Free Package 

I banner pubblicitari sono un male necessario, ancora, ma è possibile sbarazzarsi del tutto di loro raggiungendo questo traguardo. 

Non solo navigherai senza banner pubblicitari nel 2015-2016, ma potrai navigare senza pubblicità per tutto il tempo in cui avrai un account di Sports.ws. Questo pacchetto include l’accesso beta alla app. appena sarà disponibile. 

Immortalize a Sports.ws Legend

Allo stesso modo in cui siti come Basketball Reference ti permettono di sponsorizzare i profili individuali dei giocatori, noi ti permetteremo di lasciare il tuo segno sulla pagina del profilo di un giocatore. A condizione che il tuo messaggio sia appropriato, ti daremo 250 caratteri per scrivere qualsiasi cosa, dal pubblicizzare il tuo profilo al vantarti per la tua percentuale di vittorie in carriera su Sports.ws. 

Rendi immortale una Leggenda di Sports.ws Barney Stinson…Kimmy Gibbler… A Pony... _________. Il raggiungimento di questo traguardo darà ai donatori la possibilità di decidere chi sarà la prossima leggenda di Sports.ws. Sei tu? Un cibernetico Stephon Marbury? Il tuo personaggio preferito dello show che tu e i tuoi compagni di lega citate sempre? Sentitevi liberi di riunire i vostri compagni di lega e di donare insieme per usufruire di questo vantaggio. Con questo benefit saranno disponibili l’accesso beta all’applicazione e il pacchetto 2015-16 senza pubblicità per 10 utenti. 

Design a New Scoring Method

Avete giocato nelle Standard e nelle Production league, ma forse nessuno dei due scoring format vi ha accattivato quanto il custom scoring che avete creato con i vostri amici. I donatori che raggiungono questo traguardo possono progettare un metodo di calclo che vivrà per sempre, accessibile a tutti coloro che giocano su Sports.ws. Sentitevi liberi di riunire i vostri compagni di lega e di donare insieme al fine di raggiungere questo traguardo. Con questo benefit saranno disponibili l’accesso beta all’applicazione e il pacchetto 2015-16 senza pubblicità per 20 utenti. 

Lifetime VIP Sports.WS Support 

Commissoner, riunite i vostri compagni di lega e donate insieme. Oltre al vantaggio di ideare un metodo di punteggio, mi renderò direttamente disponibile, 24/7, per assistervi riguardo a qualsiasi questione, da questioni connesse ad eventuali problemi tecnici a dispute riguardanti le transazioni del gioco, fino a quando possiederò e gestirò il sito. Potrete progettare il vostro metodo di punteggio e rendere immortale una leggenda di Sports.ws. Con questo benefit saranno disponibili l’accesso beta all'applicazione e il pacchetto senza pubblicità per sempre per 30 utenti.

4. Bakit kailangan ng Sports.ws ang inyong tulong? 

Hello General Managers, para po sa kaalaman ng lahat, ang Sports.ws ay nasa pag-aari at ino-operate ng iisang tao - ako. Nitong mga nagdaang araw, ang inyong lingkod ay nagkakaproblema sa kung papaano mababayaran ang pagkakautang sa pagkaka-purchase nitong ating mahal na website. Ang kinikita po sa mga advertisements ay halos sumasapat lang sa mga bayarin ng website (such as server costs, stat licenses, etc.). Ang kinakatakot ko, kung wala akong matatanggap na tulong, baka kailanganin na maghanap ako ng panibagong trabaho/pagkakakitaan, na nangangahulugan ng kaunting oras at atensiyon ng inyong lingkod sa pag ooperate ng Sports.ws. 

Sa pamamagitan ng inyong tulong, masisigurado ko sa inyo na hindi tayo maapektuhan ng aking financial situation, at mananatiling ang Sports.ws ang aking magiging priority. Sa katanuyan, kung ating mapagtutulungan na maabot itong ating campaign goal, ako po ay nangangako na magdedevelop ng Official Sports.ws app na magagamit natin sa 2016-17 NBA Season. 

Isang Sports.ws app? Seryoso? 

Opo, atleast sa IOS at Android. Hangga't kaya kong makapagbigay ng sapat na oras at paggawa, gusto kong magkaroon ng Sports.ws app. Kung maaabot natin ang ating campaign goal, maipagpapatuloy ko ang pag iimprove sa mga Sports.ws features nang hindi nag aaksaya ng oras sa pakikitungo sa mga bagong advertisers o sa paghahanap para sa isang alternatibong trabaho. 

Bilang karagdagan sa Sports.ws app, kapag ating natugunan ang campaign goal, pwede kong putulin ang ibang mga advertising campaigns para mas mapabilis natin ang paggamit sa ating mahal na website. Bakit? Dahil hindi ko na kailangan pang bayaran ang pagkakapurchase ko sa ating website. 

Oh, at para sa ikasisiya ng lahat, bibigyan ko ang lahat ng user ng Sports.ws advanced commissioner tools para sa 2015-16 season. 

Mga benepisyo para sa mga donor

Kahit na ang lahat ng users/general managers ay makikinabang sa paggawa ng Sports.ws App at sa mga nabanggit na premyo, Gumawa ako ng mga ""Unique Perks"" partikular sa mga users na nagdonate o sumuporta sa Kampanyang Indiegogo na ito. Ang ilan ay low key, ang ilan ay medyo exciting at makabuluhan. 

Ito ay magiging lifesaver sa akin kung ang lahat ng commissioners sa Sports.ws keeper leagues ay makikipagtulungan sa kanilang mga owners/GMs para makalikom ng pera. Gusto kong gumawa ng ""perks"" na magbebenefit sa inyong league/grupo. Kung magdodonate kayo as a group, masesecure niyo at maeenjoy ang ilang magagandang substantial features. 

Kung halimbawang ang isang grupo ay makakalikom ng $1,000, gusto kong mabigyan sila ng priviledge na gumawa ng sarili nilang default scoring method. Ibig sabihin lang noon ay lahat ng league sa Sports.ws ay magkakaron ng option na magamit ang dinesign ninyong scoring format, katulad lang din ng pagpili sa Standard or Production scoring method. 

Isang personal na liham, mula kay Austin Kent

Magandang araw Sports.ws GMs, Ang aking pangalan ay Austin Kent - Ako ang siyang nagpapatakbo ng site na ito sa mga nakalipas na taon. Iminumungkahi ko ang Indiegogo Campaign dahil kailangan ko ng inyong tulong. 

Tatlong taon na ang nakakaraan, binili ko ang fantasy basketball site na ito sa orihinal nitong creator. Isang karangalan ang pamamalakad ng Sports.ws simula noon, subalit naging isa din itong hamon. Para sa inyo pong kaalaman, binili ko ang Sports.ws bilang isang indibidwal, at hindi isang korporasyon o isang kumpanya. Sa totoo lang,ang website na ito ay naging isang linya ng pagkakautang sa akin at ng aking asawa. 

Nitong mga nagdaang araw, ang Sports.ws ay bahagya nang nacocover ang operating costs ( servers, stat licenses, etc. ) sa tulong ng mga ad revenue at annual perk campaigns. Ang problema ay yung pagkakautang noong orihinal na nagmamay ari ang aking inaalala at ang kinakailangang atensyon ng mga advertising campaigns para lang makasabay sa malimit na pagbabago ng online ad industry, ang siyang kumokonsumo ng karamihan ng aking oras sa Sports.ws. 

Na nagpapa-isip sa akin kung hanggang kailan kong kakayanin na ipagpatuloy pa ito. 

Hindi ko nais na mag-advertise ng higit pa sa ginagawa namin ngayon, at hindi rin gumawa ng anumang bagay na mas makakapagbigay ng pera sa site. That being said, kung wala akong makakatulong sa pagbabayad ng pagkakautang noong orihinal na pagkakapurchase, maaaring dumating ang oras na iwanan ko na ang pagmamanage ng Sports.ws. 

Mahal ko ang pamamahala sa Sports.ws at ang pagiging laging andiyan kapag ako ay kinakailangan ngmg users. Kung sama sama nating pagtutulungan na maabot ang campaign goal na ito, sinisiguro ko na ang Sports.ws ay palaging makakakuha ang atensiyon na nararapat. 

Mga Pakinabang

2015-16 Forum Package

Donors na isangla ang halaga na ito ay makuha ang standard Forum at Daily Dubs pakete na magagamit sa pamamagitan ng taunang sumigla kampanya.

2015-16 Ad-Free Package

Ang mga gumagamit na maabot ang milestone na ito ay makuha ang 2015-16 ad-free package na naging magagamit bilang isang sumigla sa website. I-browse ang site nang walang anumang mga advertisement sa lahat at din makakuha ng access sa aming mga VIP mga forum at mga advanced na tool commissioner.

Beta Access to Sports.ws App

Kaya't hangga't matugunan namin ang aming layunin sa kampanya, ako pagpunta sa kailangan ang mga gumagamit sa pagtulong sa pag-unlad ng Sports.ws app. Donors na maabot ang milestone na ito ay makakuha ng access sa mga iOS / Android app sa lalong madaling ito ay magagamit. Sumigla ito ay kasama na ang 2015-16 sumigla package ad-free.

Two Pixelated Posters

May tunay ay walang mas mahusay na paraan upang ipakita ang suporta para sa iyong pantasya team kaysa sa pagpapakita ng isang poster sa iyong bahay o opisina. Ang mga gumagamit na mag-abuloy para sa paketeng ito ay makakuha ng isang pagpipilian ng dalawang taga-post, bilang laban sa isa ang standard na Package ng Poster. Gusto dalawang koponan pantasiya? Gusto mo ng isa team fantasy at iba ng iyong mga paboritong koponan sa NBA? Sabihin mo sa amin.

Lifetime Ad-Free Package

Mga patalastas ay isang kinakailangang kasamaan, pa rin, maaari kang magtanggal ng mga ito nang sama-sama sa pamamagitan ng pag-abot ito milestone. Hindi lamang ikaw ay mag-browse nang walang mga ad sa 2015-16, makikita mo mag-browse nang walang mga advertisement para sa hangga't hawak mo ang isang account sa Sports.ws. Ito ay kasama na beta access sa Sports.ws app kapag ito ay magagamit.

Sponsor an NBA Player Profile

Katulad ng kung paano mga site tulad ng Reference Basketball ipaalam sponsor mo indibidwal na mga profile player, ipapakita namin sa inyo na ilagay ang iyong mga marka sa isang pahina Sports.ws player. Hangga't ang iyong mensahe ay angkop para sa lahat ng mga gumagamit, bibigyan ka namin ng 250 mga character ng teksto upang gumawa ng kahit ano mula sa advertise ng iyong sariling blog upang magmayabang tungkol sa iyong karera Sports.ws manalo porsyento. Magpapadala rin kami itapon sa isang 12 ""-18"" profile player - ng player mo sponsored, o kung saan ang koponan kailanman player, team NBA o pantasya na gusto mo.

Immortalize a Sports.ws Legend

Barney Stinson ... Kimmy Gibbler ... A parang buriko ... ________. Umaabot ang milestone na ito ay magbibigay sa mga donors ng pagkakataon upang magpasya kung sino ang susunod na legend Sports.ws ay. Mo ba ito? A cybernetically pinahusay Stephon Marbury? Ang iyong mga paboritong character mula sa na ipakita mo at ng iyong leaguemates laging quote? Huwag mag-atubiling upang lumikom ng iyong leaguemates at mag-abuloy bilang isa upang maging kuwalipikado para sa mga ito na maging masigla. Sumigla na ito ay darating sa beta access sa app at ang 2015-16 ad-free package para sa 10 mga user account.

Design a New Scoring Method

Nag-play sa Standard liga at Produksyon liga, ngunit marahil hindi na captivated sa iyo ng lubos ang mga paraan na ang mga paraan ng Custom pagmamarka sa iyo at sa iyong mga kaibigan ay dumating up gamit ang ginagawa. Mga donor na maabot ang milestone na ito ay maaaring disenyo ng isang format ng pagmamarka na nakatira sa walang hanggan, naa-access sa pamamagitan ng lahat na nag-play sa Sports.ws. Huwag mag-atubiling upang lumikom ng iyong leaguemates at mag-abuloy bilang isa upang maabot ang milestone na ito. Sumigla na ito ay darating sa beta access sa app at ang 2015-16 ad-free package para sa 20 na mga gumagamit.

Lifetime VIP SportsWS Support

Commissioners, magtipon ng iyong leaguemates at pangako bilang isa. Bilang karagdagan sa mga Design isang sumigla Pagmamarka Pamamaraan, ako ay gumawa ng aking sarili direkta mapupuntahan, 24/7, upang makatulong sa anumang bagay na may kaugnayan league-mula sa mga teknikal na paghihirap sa arbitrasyon na transaksyon para sa hangga't pagmamay-ari ko at magpatakbo ng mga site. Makikita mo idisenyo ang iyong sariling paraan ng pagmamarka at makapunta sa papanatilihing-buhay ang isa Sports.ws alamat. Sumigla na ito ay darating sa beta access sa app at ang buhay na ad-free package para sa 30 na mga gumagamit.

1. Why Sports.ws Needs Your HelpHello general managers, as you may already know Sports.ws is owned and operated by one guy - me. Lately I find myself struggling to pay off the debt associated with the purchase of the website, with the revenue from advertisements barely covering costs associated with the site (server costs, stat licenses, etc.). I'm afraid that, without outside help, I'll have to look for work elsewhere - and that means less time and attention for Sports.ws.With your help I can ensure that my financial situation doesn't hold me back and that Sports.ws remains my full-time priority. How can I prove I'm serious about this? If we meet the campaign goal, I'll even vow to develop an official Sports.ws app in time for the 2016-17 NBA season.A Sports.ws App? Really?Yes. For at least iOS and Android. So long as I am able to afford to give the time and labor required, I want Sports.ws to have an official app. If we reach this campaign goal, I'll be able continue to work on new Sports.ws features like this without having to waste my time dealing with new advertisers or looking for an alternative full-time job.In addition to a Sports.ws app, if we meet this campaign goal, I can cut back on parts of our advertising campaigns to ensure a faster user experience on the website. Why? Because I won't need to pay off the original purchase.Oh, and just for the fun of it, I'll give every user at Sports.ws advanced commissioner tools for the 2015-16 season.Individual Donor PerksAlthough everybody will benefit from the creation of an app and the aforementioned rewards, I've made unique perks available specifically to users who donate towards this Indiegogo campaign. Some are low key, some are pretty significant.It would be a lifesaver for me personally if commissioners in Sports.ws keeper leagues tried to round up money from their owners. I wanted to set up perks that could benefit an entire group. If you donate as a group, you can secure some pretty substantial features.If a league is able to top $1,000, for example, I want to let them design their very own default scoring method. That means every single league will have the option of using your scoring format, the same way that they do Standard or Production scoring.A Personal Letter From Austin KentHey Sports.ws GMs, my name is Austin Kent - I'm the one who has been running things around here for the past few years. I've proposed this Indiegogo campaign because I need your help.Three years ago I bought the fantasy basketball site off of the original creator. It's been an honor to run Sports.ws ever since, but it's also been a challenge. You see, when I bought Sports.ws, I did so as an individual, not as a company or corporation. To be honest, the website has been on a line of credit for my wife and I ever since.These days Sports.ws is barely able to cover its operating costs (servers, stat licenses, etc.) through our ad revenue and annual perk campaigns. The problem is that the debt associated with the original purchase has proven to be a concern and the attention required by the advertising campaigns to keep up with the ever-changing online ad industry takes up the majority of my Sports.ws time. It has me wondering how much longer I'll be able to continue.I don't want to have to advertise more than we already do, nor do anything that would more intrusively monetize the site. That being said, if I don't get a handle on this original purchase debt, there may come a time when I would have to walk away from Sports.ws altogether.I love managing Sports.ws and being there when users need me. If we work toward this campaign goal together, I can guarantee that Sports.ws will always get the attention that it deserves.
