Este beneficio vendrá con acceso a la beta de la aplicación y el paquete sin publicidad por vida para 30 usuarios.

3. Perché Sports.ws ha bisogno del vostro aiutoCiao General Manager, come forse già sapete Sports.ws è posseduto e gestito da una sola persona – me. Ultimamente mi sono trovato in difficoltà nel saldare i debiti associati all’acquisto del sito web, con il guadagno proveniente dalle pubblicità che copre a mala pena le spese relative al sito (costi del server, licenze delle statistiche ecc.). Temo che, senza un aiuto dall’esterno, dovrò cercare lavoro da un’altra parte – e questo significa meno tempo e attenzione per Sports.ws. Con il vostro aiuto posso garantire che la mia situazione finanziaria non ostacolerà il mio impegno e che Sports.ws rimarrà la mia priorità a tempo pieno. Come posso provare di essere serio riguardo a ciò? Se noi raggiungiamo l’obiettivo di questa iniziativa, io posso anche promettere di sviluppare una applicazione ufficiale di Sports.ws in tempo per la stagione NBA 2016-2017. Una app di Sports.ws? Veramente?Certo. Almeno per iOS e Android. Finchè sarò in grado di garantire il tempo e il lavoro necessari, vorrei che Sports.ws avesse una sua app ufficiale. Se raggiungiamo l’obiettivo di questa iniziativa, io potrò continuare a lavorare su funzioni di Sports.ws come questa senza dover perdere il mio tempo con altre pubblicità o per cercare un altro lavoro a tempo pieno. In aggiunta all’applicazione, se raggiungiamo l’obiettivo di questa iniziativa, potrò diminuire i banner pubblicitari per assicurare una navigazione più veloce sul sito. Perchè? Perché avrei una minore necessità di rientrare nei costi dell’acquisto originario di questo sito. Oh, e solo per il gusto di farlo, darò ad ogni utente gli strumenti avanzati del Commissioner della stagione 2015-2016. Particolari vantaggi per i donatoriSebbene tutti usufruiranno della creazione di una app e dei benefici sopra menzionati, io creerò unici vantaggi disponibili solo agli utenti che doneranno per questa “Indiegogo Campaign”. Alcuni sono di poco conto, altri invece sono particolarmente significativi. Personalmente per me sarebbe una benedizione se i Commissioner delle leghe keeper di Sports.ws raccogliessero donazioni dai loro owner. Voglio creare vantaggi che possono dare un beneficio all’intero gruppo. Se donate come gruppo, potrete assicurarvi sostanziali e significative features. Se una lega è in grado di raggiungere $1,000 per esempio, io lascerei ideare ai suoi utenti un proprio sistema di calcolo dei punteggi di default. Questo significherebbe che ogni singola lega avrebbe la possibilità di scegliere il vostro scoring format, allo stesso modo in cui è possibile scegliere tra Standard o Production scoring. Una lettera personale da Austin KentHey GM di Sports.ws, il mio nome è Austin Kent, io sono colui che sta facendo funzionare le cose in questo sito negli ultimi anni. Io ho proposto questa “Indiegogo campaign” perché ho bisogno del vostro aiuto.Tre anni fa ho acquistato questo sito dal creatore originario. E’ stato un onore gestire Sports.ws da allora, ma è stata anche una sfida. Vedete, quando ho acquistato Sports.ws, io l’ho fatto come singolo, non come compagnia o corporation. Ad essere onesto, il sito è diventato una linea di credito per me e mia moglie da allora. In questi giorni Sports.ws è a mala pena in grado di coprire i suoi costi operativi (server, licenze per le statistiche) attraverso i nostri redditi pubblicitari e le nostre iniziative di donazione annuali. Il problema sta nel fatto che il debito associato all’acquisto originario si è rivelato sempre più motivo di preoccupazione e l’attenzione richiesta per le iniziative pubblicitarie necessarie a tenere il passo con la continua evoluzione del settore pubblicitario online sta occupando la maggior parte del mio tempo su Sports.ws. Mi sto chiedendo per quanto tempo sarò in grado di andare avanti. Non voglio dover pubblicizzare più di quanto già facciamo, né fare qualcosa che possa monetizzare intrusivamente il sito. Detto questo, se non riesco a gestire questo debito dell’acquisto originario, potrebbe arrivare il momento in cui dovrò allontanarmi definitivamente da Sports.ws. Amo gestire Sports.ws ed essere qui quando gli utenti hanno bisogno di me. Se lavoriamo all’obiettivo di quest’iniziativa insieme, posso garantire che Sports.ws avrà sempre l’attenzione che merita. Benefici2015-2016 Forum Package I donatori che si impegnano per questo importo riceveranno l’accesso ai pacchetti standard Forum e Daily Dubs disponibili attraverso la campagna annuale di donazione. 2015-2016 Ad-Free Package Gli utenti che raggiungono questo traguardo riceveranno il pacchetto 2015-16 senza pubblicità, disponibile come beneficio accessorio sul sito. Sfoglia il sito senza alcuna pubblicità e ottieni anche l'accesso ai nostri forum VIP e agli strumenti avanzati del Commissioner. Beta Access a Sports.ws Fino a quando non raggiungeremo l’obiettivo della nostra iniziativa, avrò bisogno di utenti che mi aiutino nello sviluppo dell’app. di Sport.ws. I donatori che raggiungono questo traguardo otterranno l’accesso alla app. iOS/Android non appena sarà disponibile. Questo vantaggio include il pacchetto Ad-Free. Two Pixelated Posters Non c’è veramente miglior modo per supportare il tuo fantasy team di esporre il poster a casa o in ufficio. Gli utenti che acquistano questo pacchetto potranno scegliere tra due poster, a differenza del singolo poster del pacchetto standard. Lo vuoi di due fantasy team? Lo vuoi di un fantasy team e della tua squadra NBA preferita? Contattaci. Lifetime Ad-Free Package I banner pubblicitari sono un male necessario, ancora, ma è possibile sbarazzarsi del tutto di loro raggiungendo questo traguardo. Non solo navigherai senza banner pubblicitari nel 2015-2016, ma potrai navigare senza pubblicità per tutto il tempo in cui avrai un account di Sports.ws. Questo pacchetto include l’accesso beta alla app. appena sarà disponibile. Immortalize a Sports.ws LegendAllo stesso modo in cui siti come Basketball Reference ti permettono di sponsorizzare i profili individuali dei giocatori, noi ti permetteremo di lasciare il tuo segno sulla pagina del profilo di un giocatore. A condizione che il tuo messaggio sia appropriato, ti daremo 250 caratteri per scrivere qualsiasi cosa, dal pubblicizzare il tuo profilo al vantarti per la tua percentuale di vittorie in carriera su Sports.ws. Rendi immortale una Leggenda di Sports.ws Barney Stinson…Kimmy Gibbler… A Pony... _________. Il raggiungimento di questo traguardo darà ai donatori la possibilità di decidere chi sarà la prossima leggenda di Sports.ws. Sei tu? Un cibernetico Stephon Marbury? Il tuo personaggio preferito dello show che tu e i tuoi compagni di lega citate sempre? Sentitevi liberi di riunire i vostri compagni di lega e di donare insieme per usufruire di questo vantaggio. Con questo benefit saranno disponibili l’accesso beta all’applicazione e il pacchetto 2015-16 senza pubblicità per 10 utenti. Design a New Scoring MethodAvete giocato nelle Standard e nelle Production league, ma forse nessuno dei due scoring format vi ha accattivato quanto il custom scoring che avete creato con i vostri amici. I donatori che raggiungono questo traguardo possono progettare un metodo di calclo che vivrà per sempre, accessibile a tutti coloro che giocano su Sports.ws. Sentitevi liberi di riunire i vostri compagni di lega e di donare insieme al fine di raggiungere questo traguardo. Con questo benefit saranno disponibili l’accesso beta all’applicazione e il pacchetto 2015-16 senza pubblicità per 20 utenti. Lifetime VIP Sports.WS Support Commissoner, riunite i vostri compagni di lega e donate insieme. Oltre al vantaggio di ideare un metodo di punteggio, mi renderò direttamente disponibile, 24/7, per assistervi riguardo a qualsiasi questione, da questioni connesse ad eventuali problemi tecnici a dispute riguardanti le transazioni del gioco, fino a quando possiederò e gestirò il sito. Potrete progettare il vostro metodo di punteggio e rendere immortale una leggenda di Sports.ws. Con questo benefit saranno disponibili l’accesso beta all'applicazione e il pacchetto senza pubblicità per sempre per 30 utenti.

4. Bakit kailangan ng Sports.ws ang inyong tulong? Hello General Managers, para po sa kaalaman ng lahat, ang Sports.ws ay nasa pag-aari at ino-operate ng iisang tao - ako. Nitong mga nagdaang araw, ang inyong lingkod ay nagkakaproblema sa kung papaano mababayaran ang pagkakautang sa pagkaka-purchase nitong ating mahal na website. Ang kinikita po sa mga advertisements ay halos sumasapat lang sa mga bayarin ng website (such as server costs, stat licenses, etc.). Ang kinakatakot ko, kung wala akong matatanggap na tulong, baka kailanganin na maghanap ako ng panibagong trabaho/pagkakakitaan, na nangangahulugan ng kaunting oras at atensiyon ng inyong lingkod sa pag ooperate ng Sports.ws. Sa pamamagitan ng inyong tulong, masisigurado ko sa inyo na hindi tayo maapektuhan ng aking financial situation, at mananatiling ang Sports.ws ang aking magiging priority. Sa katanuyan, kung ating mapagtutulungan na maabot itong ating campaign goal, ako po ay nangangako na magdedevelop ng Official Sports.ws app na magagamit natin sa 2016-17 NBA Season. Isang Sports.ws app? Seryoso? Opo, atleast sa IOS at Android. Hangga't kaya kong makapagbigay ng sapat na oras at paggawa, gusto kong magkaroon ng Sports.ws app. Kung maaabot natin ang ating campaign goal, maipagpapatuloy ko ang pag iimprove sa mga Sports.ws features nang hindi nag aaksaya ng oras sa pakikitungo sa mga bagong advertisers o sa paghahanap para sa isang alternatibong trabaho. Bilang karagdagan sa Sports.ws app, kapag ating natugunan ang campaign goal, pwede kong putulin ang ibang mga advertising campaigns para mas mapabilis natin ang paggamit sa ating mahal na website. Bakit? Dahil hindi ko na kailangan pang bayaran ang pagkakapurchase ko sa ating website. Oh, at para sa ikasisiya ng lahat, bibigyan ko ang lahat ng user ng Sports.ws advanced commissioner tools para sa 2015-16 season. Mga benepisyo para sa mga donorKahit na ang lahat ng users/general managers ay makikinabang sa paggawa ng Sports.ws App at sa mga nabanggit na premyo, Gumawa ako ng mga ""Unique Perks"" partikular sa mga users na nagdonate o sumuporta sa Kampanyang Indiegogo na ito. Ang ilan ay low key, ang ilan ay medyo exciting at makabuluhan. Ito ay magiging lifesaver sa akin kung ang lahat ng commissioners sa Sports.ws keeper leagues ay makikipagtulungan sa kanilang mga owners/GMs para makalikom ng pera. Gusto kong gumawa ng ""perks"" na magbebenefit sa inyong league/grupo. Kung magdodonate kayo as a group, masesecure niyo at maeenjoy ang ilang magagandang substantial features. Kung halimbawang ang isang grupo ay makakalikom ng $1,000, gusto kong mabigyan sila ng priviledge na gumawa ng sarili nilang default scoring method. Ibig sabihin lang noon ay lahat ng league sa Sports.ws ay magkakaron ng option na magamit ang dinesign ninyong scoring format, katulad lang din ng pagpili sa Standard or Production scoring method. Isang personal na liham, mula kay Austin KentMagandang araw Sports.ws GMs, Ang aking pangalan ay Austin Kent - Ako ang siyang nagpapatakbo ng site na ito sa mga nakalipas na taon. Iminumungkahi ko ang Indiegogo Campaign dahil kailangan ko ng inyong tulong. Tatlong taon na ang nakakaraan, binili ko ang fantasy basketball site na ito sa orihinal nitong creator. Isang karangalan ang pamamalakad ng Sports.ws simula noon, subalit naging isa din itong hamon. Para sa inyo pong kaalaman, binili ko ang Sports.ws bilang isang indibidwal, at hindi isang korporasyon o isang kumpanya. Sa totoo lang,ang website na ito ay naging isang linya ng pagkakautang sa akin at ng aking asawa. Nitong mga nagdaang araw, ang Sports.ws ay bahagya nang nacocover ang operating costs ( servers, stat licenses, etc. ) sa tulong ng mga ad revenue at annual perk campaigns. Ang problema ay yung pagkakautang noong orihinal na nagmamay ari ang aking inaalala at ang kinakailangang atensyon ng mga advertising campaigns para lang makasabay sa malimit na pagbabago ng online ad industry, ang siyang kumokonsumo ng karamihan ng aking oras sa Sports.ws. Na nagpapa-isip sa akin kung hanggang kailan kong kakayanin na ipagpatuloy pa ito. Hindi ko nais na mag-advertise ng higit pa sa ginagawa namin ngayon, at hindi rin gumawa ng anumang bagay na mas makakapagbigay ng pera sa site. That being said, kung wala akong makakatulong sa pagbabayad ng pagkakautang noong orihinal na pagkakapurchase, maaaring dumating ang oras na iwanan ko na ang pagmamanage ng Sports.ws. Mahal ko ang pamamahala sa Sports.ws at ang pagiging laging andiyan kapag ako ay kinakailangan ngmg users. Kung sama sama nating pagtutulungan na maabot ang campaign goal na ito, sinisiguro ko na ang Sports.ws ay palaging makakakuha ang atensiyon na nararapat. Mga Pakinabang2015-16 Forum PackageDonors na isangla ang halaga na ito ay makuha ang standard Forum at Daily Dubs pakete na magagamit sa pamamagitan ng taunang sumigla kampanya.2015-16 Ad-Free PackageAng mga gumagamit na maabot ang milestone na ito ay makuha ang 2015-16 ad-free package na naging magagamit bilang isang sumigla sa website. I-browse ang site nang walang anumang mga advertisement sa lahat at din makakuha ng access sa aming mga VIP mga forum at mga advanced na tool commissioner.Beta Access to Sports.ws AppKaya't hangga't matugunan namin ang aming layunin sa kampanya, ako pagpunta sa kailangan ang mga gumagamit sa pagtulong sa pag-unlad ng Sports.ws app. Donors na maabot ang milestone na ito ay makakuha ng access sa mga iOS / Android app sa lalong madaling ito ay magagamit. Sumigla ito ay kasama na ang 2015-16 sumigla package ad-free.Two Pixelated PostersMay tunay ay walang mas mahusay na paraan upang ipakita ang suporta para sa iyong pantasya team kaysa sa pagpapakita ng isang poster sa iyong bahay o opisina. Ang mga gumagamit na mag-abuloy para sa paketeng ito ay makakuha ng isang pagpipilian ng dalawang taga-post, bilang laban sa isa ang standard na Package ng Poster. Gusto dalawang koponan pantasiya? Gusto mo ng isa team fantasy at iba ng iyong mga paboritong koponan sa NBA? Sabihin mo sa amin.Lifetime Ad-Free PackageMga patalastas ay isang kinakailangang kasamaan, pa rin, maaari kang magtanggal ng mga ito nang sama-sama sa pamamagitan ng pag-abot ito milestone. Hindi lamang ikaw ay mag-browse nang walang mga ad sa 2015-16, makikita mo mag-browse nang walang mga advertisement para sa hangga't hawak mo ang isang account sa Sports.ws. Ito ay kasama na beta access sa Sports.ws app kapag ito ay magagamit.Sponsor an NBA Player ProfileKatulad ng kung paano mga site tulad ng Reference Basketball ipaalam sponsor mo indibidwal na mga profile player, ipapakita namin sa inyo na ilagay ang iyong mga marka sa isang pahina Sports.ws player. Hangga't ang iyong mensahe ay angkop para sa lahat ng mga gumagamit, bibigyan ka namin ng 250 mga character ng teksto upang gumawa ng kahit ano mula sa advertise ng iyong sariling blog upang magmayabang tungkol sa iyong karera Sports.ws manalo porsyento. Magpapadala rin kami itapon sa isang 12 ""-18"" profile player - ng player mo sponsored, o kung saan ang koponan kailanman player, team NBA o pantasya na gusto mo.Immortalize a Sports.ws LegendBarney Stinson ... Kimmy Gibbler ... A parang buriko ... ________. Umaabot ang milestone na ito ay magbibigay sa mga donors ng pagkakataon upang magpasya kung sino ang susunod na legend Sports.ws ay. Mo ba ito? A cybernetically pinahusay Stephon Marbury? Ang iyong mga paboritong character mula sa na ipakita mo at ng iyong leaguemates laging quote? Huwag mag-atubiling upang lumikom ng iyong leaguemates at mag-abuloy bilang isa upang maging kuwalipikado para sa mga ito na maging masigla. Sumigla na ito ay darating sa beta access sa app at ang 2015-16 ad-free package para sa 10 mga user account.Design a New Scoring MethodNag-play sa Standard liga at Produksyon liga, ngunit marahil hindi na captivated sa iyo ng lubos ang mga paraan na ang mga paraan ng Custom pagmamarka sa iyo at sa iyong mga kaibigan ay dumating up gamit ang ginagawa. Mga donor na maabot ang milestone na ito ay maaaring disenyo ng isang format ng pagmamarka na nakatira sa walang hanggan, naa-access sa pamamagitan ng lahat na nag-play sa Sports.ws. Huwag mag-atubiling upang lumikom ng iyong leaguemates at mag-abuloy bilang isa upang maabot ang milestone na ito. Sumigla na ito ay darating sa beta access sa app at ang 2015-16 ad-free package para sa 20 na mga gumagamit.Lifetime VIP SportsWS SupportCommissioners, magtipon ng iyong leaguemates at pangako bilang isa. Bilang karagdagan sa mga Design isang sumigla Pagmamarka Pamamaraan, ako ay gumawa ng aking sarili direkta mapupuntahan, 24/7, upang makatulong sa anumang bagay na may kaugnayan league-mula sa mga teknikal na paghihirap sa arbitrasyon na transaksyon para sa hangga't pagmamay-ari ko at magpatakbo ng mga site. Makikita mo idisenyo ang iyong sariling paraan ng pagmamarka at makapunta sa papanatilihing-buhay ang isa Sports.ws alamat. I have partnered with Northern California inventor and
entrepreneur Frank E. Smith to bring you this ground-breaking product. Frank has patented his secure thumbprint technology, and he has incorporated

this into a revolutionary system: “GoPay” – the only secure payment system backed by thumbprint identification.

information, as well as your fingerprint, are NOT being placed or shared
into any other system, company or organization.

which is not connected to any other entity, ensuring your information
remains secure for YOUR OWN use only.

column1: have microchips embedded within the card. European countries have
implemented this exclusively, and the United States will soon be
changing over to this technology as well. With the GoPay card, you are

one step ahead because it has a microchip embedded into it.

CreditCards.com states: ""If you've traveled overseas recently, you may have had a
moment when your magnetic stripe credit card didn't work. In places where most
credit cards are identified by microchip -- Europe, Asia, Canada, Mexico,
Brazil, to name a few -- relying on standard American magnetic-stripe cards can
be inconvenient.  It can also make you

more vulnerable to fraud."" 
Source: http://www.creditcards.com/credit-card-news/us-slowly-rolls-out-emv_chip-technology-1276.php

one step ahead because it has a microchip embedded into it.CreditCards.com states: ""If you've traveled overseas recently, you may have had a
moment when your magnetic stripe credit card didn't work. In places where most
credit cards are identified by microchip -- Europe, Asia, Canada, Mexico,
Brazil, to name a few -- relying on standard American magnetic-stripe cards can
be inconvenient.  It can also make you
more vulnerable to fraud.""  Source: http://www.creditcards.com/credit-card-news/us-slowly-rolls-out-emv_chip-technology-1276.php PROTECT YOUR NEST EGG!As
you know, these are treacherous times for even the most careful individual
making payments with their credit and debit cards. The GoPay card and partner
device uses patented thumbprint technology*  to create a completely secure
environment for consumers, so they can feel good about swiping their card whenever
and wherever they need to, whether at a business, or with another person, using
a card swiping device on their cell phone.
We  have a manufacturer standing by, ready to begin the tooling and

creating of our prototype reader/writer device. We have the patented micro-chipped credit cards made and ready, so we are raising $350,000 in order to get the prototype device made. The design and technical specs are in place, so now need your help in order to begin manufacturing
the most secure Payment System in the world!
The GoPay System by Chameleon ID will allow only
you (and no one else) to shop with your credit or debit card! All of your
credit cards are stored electronically within the GoPay Device
your physical cards at home and store them in a safe place.BE A ROCK STAR
column2: Help us reach our goal, so we can create this device and bring our system to the world. You’ve seen the headlines, and by now you’re wondering

column1: how consumers and retailers alike can secure their information and payment
‘Target data breach affects at least 70 million customers, online shopper’
“…Target said an investigation has found that the hackers
stole the personal information of at least 70 million customers, including
names, mailing addresses, telephone numbers and email addresses. Previously,
the No.3 U.S. retailer said the hackers stole data from 40 million credit and
“Luxury retailer Neiman Marcus announced that customers’ credit card data
may have been stolen in a hack similar to the Target security breach that
affected millions. On Jan. 1 the company found evidence that hackers had breached
“Consumers are getting bombarded with news of cyber security attacks at
well-known retail stores such as Target and Neiman Marcus. They are concerned
about their personal information and are left to wonder what can be done to

protect themselves…” [LowCards.com]*Pay close attention to what Mr. Crapo says in the following video, particularly at  2:45*Of course the risk goes beyond the consumer to retailers as well, with the government's own Homeland Security warning retailers about sophisticated malware that potentially affected a large number of stores.
By now you can see what the GoPay card  system can do for consumers
column2: the convenience of making all your payments and purchases from ONE credit card, along with the added security of being protected by thumbprint identification, and the potential uses beyond those basic options.How It Works

column1: When you feel like shopping, simply
turn on your GoPay Device by scanning your fingerprint, choose which card account you’d like to use, and
start shopping. The GoPay card can also be converted to any number of other
types of cards – Gift Cards, Pre-paid Cards, Transit cards, etc. You can even
check into a hotel right from where you’re standing, your GoPay Card can then
The GoPay Device doesn’t have an ordinary everyday on/off switch like a cell

column2: instead, you turn the device on by using your unique fingerprint. This

column1: means no one else can turn on your
device and begin shopping except you, and only you!
devices lack any real security for their users. It's WAY too easy for high-tech
crooks to swipe your card information, and ultimately your identity, through
and Device use our patented and extremely secure payment system for the
protection of any consumer’s identity while making transactions on a daily
basis. The GoPay System combines an electronic payment system with access to
a new electronic content system - all on one standard wallet card, and all
absolutely secured by the user’s thumbprint. Addressing privacy concerns, the
thumbprint is scanned and stored only in the user’s own device, and is only
activated by that user’s thumbprint. This virtually eliminates the
possibility of identity theft and other security issues that face the average
The GoPay Device is controlled and directed by the user to
write and re-write the GoPay Card by selecting one of multiple card
held only in the user’s own device, never outside of the user’s control,

answering common privacy concerns. Join our campaign and help save people all over the world from identity theft - help us reach our goal, and provide people everywhere with this revolutionary system, and rest easy knowing you've brought something important to humanity!
As you can see, this groundbreaking technology has significant relevance to
today's user - placing patented thumbprint technology in the hands of consumers
and businesses all over the world, and eliminating most of the risks of
identity theft in regards to day-to-day transactions, payment methods and
If you believe that security plays
an important role in how we shop, in stores, online, or with cell phones and mobile devices,

pledge now!What will we do when we surpass our goal? I'm glad you asked. When we have our prototype device designed and made, the next phase is the production process. The company that designs the device will also be manufacturing them in bulk for the marketplace.We then plan to have a custom designed wallet produced,  in which to carry the GoPay reader device, along with the GoPay card, ID, and cash. The wallet will be available in different colors and styles once it is in production.
Rewards:Since we are in the prototype phase, the GoPay device
has yet to be manufactured, so we are offering our sincere gratitude for your
contributions, also check out all our nifty perk items. We love all our IndieGoGo friends, and we appreciate your
support of secure fingerprint technology for everyone using Credit Card and Mobile
Payment Systems. Pledges will receive awesome rewards, such as our VERY cool,

Chameleon ID Thumbprint Tee Shirt: (Actual design may vary from image)We also have some VERY cool gifts in addition to the fashionable shirts:Above is the flash drive card, the size of a credit card for easy storage in your wallet^This is the super-suave flash drive pen, and yes, it writes too! ^And then there's our executive memory drive gift set. You know you want it!Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:
Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
Please use the awesome Indiegogo share tools to let everyone you know find out about GoPay!",13.0,1,"1 Campaign
Diamond Nano Shield is a remarkable Super Science  in nanotechnology. It is a fluid
that can be applied across the surface of the entire mobile device, including
overtop a touch screen, glass, any surface, that will protect your device against scratches and
water damage while sacrificing none of the appearance or functionality of your
display. Diamond Nano Shield is Invisible by the naked eye and is synthesized to be
next only to gemstones in hardness. It is also substance tough, suitable for

those who must retain their particular unit’s sanitation. it will make the glass 9 times stronger and durable.

Water Resistant



At
one point we’ve all done it – spilt a drink over a laptop, gotten our
tablets soaked in the rain, or even dropped our phone in the
toilet. Water has always been the bane of electronics, but now Diamond
Nano Shield Using a revolutionary process, Diamond Nano Shield applies
a hydrophobic nano coating to your devices that  water Resistant it
and protects it against accidental exposure to liquids.
The coating is completely invisible to the human eye and is
virtually undetectable. In fact, Diamond Nano Shield promise the coating
will in no way “compromise the look, feel, and performance of your

electronics.” In fact, the coating is 1000 X thinner than a human hair 

Anti Scratch


Anti FingerPrint

Diamond Nano Shield Coating Clear is an invisible glass coating that protects all types
of glass. It provides a water repellent, non-stick barrier which
prevents glass damage from scale, salt, scum, air pollutants, and other
The non-stick protective coating minimizes dirt and grime build up on
the glass, so glass requires much less maintenance. No scraping
scrubbing or harsh chemical cleaners are needed to clean the glass.
The Diamond Nano Shield Coating Clear protective coating is chemically bonded to the
glass, so will not rub off. This glass protection product does not
change the appearance or clarity of the glass and is not affected by
long term exposure to heat or UV light.
revents damage from salt, hard water minerals, dirt, grime and soap scum
Surfaces look and feel the same after application
Reduces cleaning time and effort along with maintenance costs
Not affected by extreme heat or UV exposure
One application lasts 3-5 years in most conditions
Water and dirt repellent surface, so no scraping, scrubbing or harsh chemical cleaners needed
Tiles, bath tubs, basins and toilets.
want to put this incredible invisible Diamond Nano technology out there
available for everyone. By donating a certain amount as outlined on the
you can have your own bottle of Diamond Nano Shield to use on your

devices and much more thing you can work with to prevent liquid damage.

The Diamond Nano Shield Story
Has your cell phone, tablet damage with liquid ? Diamond Nano Shield
founded on the idea of solving the problem. Headquartered in Garden
Grove, CA, the company is best known for liquid protection devices.
Their products can be found in thousands of locations around the world.
Shouldn't free liquid damages to all of your devices ?
We believe that ""Diamond Nano Shield  Coating"" will change the

column2: empowering people to do things they never could before. It

column1: brings convenience into people's everyday lives.
of the biggest challenges is the manufacturing process. Quality control
will be at the top of the list and most important issue. There are many
reasons why the manufacturer's cooperation will not be easy. We
understand that Indiegogo backers want their product as soon as
possible, but we are limited by factory's capabilities. In our
experience, most pre-production samples still have a slight variation
from the final mass produced unit.
Diamond Nano Shield Coat Clear is a glass protection treatment which provides an
invisible, water repellent, non-stick barrier to protect the glass
surface. It chemically bonds to the glass, so won't rub off, and
protects against scale and/or salt damage, while making the surface
Works on ALL glass types, phone, tablet, , e.g., windows, pool fencing, shower screens,
splashbacks, exterior glass doors, facades, balustrades, skylights,
Does it work on ceramic tiles or grout?
Diamond Nano Shield Coat  Clear will work on glazed ceramic tiles, and ceramic baths,
basins and toilets (treat the toilet BEFORE you fill it with water) as
it would on glass. The product will work on new grout for a limited
time, but will wear off long before it will on glass. Diamond Nano Shield Coat Clear was
Yes. Application is simple and instructions are included with each purchase.
Diamond Nano Shield Coat Clear is alcohol based, so safe to use.
Diamond Nano Shield Clear 5 ml will protect approximately 4 square Ft of glass,
Depends upon the age of the surface and level of exposure to environmental conditions. Typically 2-3 years in most conditions.
Does it work on other surfaces?
Will it leave a mark or stain the surface?
No. The appearance and clarity of the glass will not change after treatment.
Does the surface need to be cleaned prior to application?
Yes. Surface preparation is important to obtain maximum effects. A
special glass cleaner is available (Quartz-Clean) and cleaning
instructions are provided with each purchase.
What if the surface has already been marked or stained?
If the glass is scale or salt damaged (cloudy appearance which will not
clean off), the damaged areas will need to be repaired before Diamond Nano Shield Coat
Treated glass becomes easy to clean, NOT self cleaning. Regular wiping
with a wet microfibre cloth is all you need. Avoid the use of harsh
chemical cleaners on the glass or ceramic surfaces as this may reduce
the lifetime of the product, and are not needed to clean the treated
Will the coating crack, peel or discolour over time?
No. Diamond Nano Shield Coat Clear chemically bonds to the glass, and is not affected
by UV light or heat (up to 250°C) so will not crack or discolour over

time.

column2: >Thank You for contributing to the realization of the HIRIS project.
column3: >Unfortunately we weren’t able to follow the path described on the Indiegogo campaign and the project evolved during the years to HIRIS.IO.
column4: >Please visit gethiris.com for more information.
column7:
>Meet the first wearable computer

HIRIS capture your movements, allows you to improve your fitness and sport activity while you are controlling the world of technology around you. Keep your hands free while you are enjoying your time.
column15:
width=""620"">

 

 

 

 

 

With a wave of the hand, HIRIS’ gesture-controlled commands allows you to seamless interact and intelligently control the world of technology around you. Take a video with your GoPro or skip your track on Spotify with a simple flick of the wrist.
column17:
>Simplify Your Life
 

Thanks to the Air Touch
column18: > function, HIRIS allows you to navigate all of its features also when you are wearing gloves or your hands are wet or dirty, making HIRIS usable in any situations.

column8: >WHAT HIRIS CAN DO
column11:
/>

 

From monitoring your heart rate, temperature and fitness performance to enabling you to control almost any connected device, HIRIS is the only wearable computer that brings style and infinite functionality together as one.
column15:
>Find your perfect app
 

HIRIS effortlessly captures your every movement and intelligently adapts it features through different applications - you choose what you need.

column1: • Download the HIRIS App and configure HIRIS features as preferred
• Download new applications according to your style

Gesture controlled applications allows you to control other devices or software with a simple flick of your wrist, keeping you focused on what you are doing and providing you a new way to communicate with the world that surround you.

column12: >) and will be soon compatible with

column9: >These kind of app allows HIRIS to interpret your motion data depending on which sport are you passionate of, to improve your workout and to receive feedback of your improvements.

column1: While we are continuing to introduce HIRIS to all these applications, more is on the way for you to choose what best suits your life!

HIRIS’ incredibly powerful and flexible capabilities can be realized in many ways, which is why we created the HIRIS Store: to enable the discovery of apps best suited to you. The HIRIS Store offers a range of apps such as ones related to health and fitness to allow you to monitor steps taken, calories burned or your tennis form. Simply download the HIRIS App for your smartphone, choose the app you need from the HIRIS Store, and enjoy!

column3: >Wireless charger and up to 4 days battery life

column1: Unlike most wearables, HIRIS was born as a unit to be embedded on different mounts like bracelets, bands or adhesive mounts to let you being free to place your HIRIS anywhere or on anything.
HIRIS works with a wide range of wristbands, casual or sporty, as well as waterproof or adhesive mounts. Wear either a band or a mount however you want and then download your favorite app and go!

column7:
>EXTENSION CARDS

HIRIS offers expansion cards, such as GPS and audio, to boost its hardware capabilities.

>DIMENSIONS

The HIRIS weighs 42g (1.48 oz.) and its hexagonal face has a radius of 20mm (0.78 in.) and height of 12.25mm (0.48 in.)

column1: HIRIS comes available in two models: HIRIS Core and HIRIS Tracker.
While the HIRIS Core was born to be worn on the wrist and it is able to capture movements, temperature, heart rate and it comes with an OLED screen and the AirTouch function
column2: the HIRIS Tracker could be used in a specific applications to better analyze better complex movements in real time. Combine more than one unit to track better your moments and acquire new data to improve the HIRIS capabilities.

column1: Mix the music using your body movements: transform your performance in something amazing to amuse your audience with HIRIS.
With more HIRIS unit you can track specific movement, record them and give feedback to your patients.

When you use more units, HIRIS is able to collect more data and use it with different applications to allow you to do what you want when you want to. We made this possible for you, by designing the HIRIS Tracker, a smaller, more affordable unit  that comes with some sensors.
Develop new applications with HIRIS Studio and publish them to the HIRIS Store!

If you have an inspiring idea on how to use HIRIS, share them with others in the HIRIS Store. With HIRIS Studio, developers can create the next killer app using the capabilities offered by our units.

Apps can be written in HTML5 whether they contain WebGL or other JavaScript APIs.

“Since the beginning of my life, I had the need to destroy things because I had to know how they were built … how they worked. Every time I saw a lamp, a LED, a moving component a electronic device ... I had to disassemble it. The more machines and electronic components I destroyed, the more machines I would buy and tear apart.”

Marco progressed from the inside workings of toy trains and radios to laptops and phones – his attention shifted to connecting with and controlling the world around him, a lamp, a TV and even an airplane. HIRIS’ goal is to put in the hands of every person an instant but natural ability to control the world around them.

“Freedom is the idea behind the HIRIS philosophy. I want people to think about HIRIS as a new type of key, not as a wellness companion. Our lives are made up of several different tasks, HIRIS will help us manage these tasks with simple gestures.”
Meet our team while we enjoy the HIRIS features during its test:
• Marco controls the Parrot ARDrone 2.0
• Simone takes a video with GoPro
• Luca analyses his movements with two HIRIS units
And there are also Alessia, Marco, Fabio, Andrea and Giuseppe.

Robust Supplier Partner Network – We have built an extensive network of partners across Europe, e.g. Italy, China, South Korea and the United States in order to circumvent component procurement and limited stock issues, and ultimately, shipment delays.

Expedited Shipping – We have already implemented key shipment procedures and are working in partnership with a major worldwide shipping service to ensure expedited delivery.

FCC and CEE Certification – We are collaborating with a number of FCC and CEE experts, with more than 20 years of experience in hardware development, to avoid any unforeseen certification delays.

CARLO PURASSANTA - CEO Microsoft Italia - via twitter
""HIRIS is a promising project, 9 days to go to fund it ! Let's help this team to START-UP !""

","Thank You for contributing to the realization of the HIRIS project.Unfortunately we weren’t able to follow the path described on the Indiegogo campaign and the project evolved during the years to HIRIS.IO.Please visit gethiris.com for more information.- - -[VERSIONE ITALIANA]Meet the first wearable computerHIRIS capture your movements, allows you to improve your fitness and sport activity while you are controlling the world of technology around you. Keep your hands free while you are enjoying your time.     With a wave of the hand, HIRIS’ gesture-controlled commands allows you to seamless interact and intelligently control the world of technology around you. Take a video with your GoPro or skip your track on Spotify with a simple flick of the wrist.  Simplify Your Life Thanks to the Air Touch function, HIRIS allows you to navigate all of its features also when you are wearing gloves or your hands are wet or dirty, making HIRIS usable in any situations.

WHAT HIRIS CAN DO      From monitoring your heart rate, temperature and fitness performance to enabling you to control almost any connected device, HIRIS is the only wearable computer that brings style and infinite functionality together as one. Find your perfect app HIRIS effortlessly captures your every movement and intelligently adapts it features through different applications - you choose what you need. SET UP Simply:
Download the HIRIS App and configure HIRIS features as preferred
Download new applications according to your style

Gesture controlled applications allows you to control other devices or software with a simple flick of your wrist, keeping you focused on what you are doing and providing you a new way to communicate with the world that surround you.
While HIRIS tracks your movements you can activate your GoPro camera, or your Drone. Thanks to HIRIS controlled technologies are endless and you can use it for what works better for you.
HIRIS is also compatible with other technologies such as Smart-lamps (e.g. Philips HUE) and will be soon compatible with Nest Thermostat and IFTTT!

SPORT & FITNESS APPLICATIONThese kind of app allows HIRIS to interpret your motion data depending on which sport are you passionate of, to improve your workout and to receive feedback of your improvements.
While we are continuing to introduce HIRIS to all these applications, more is on the way for you to choose what best suits your life!

HIRIS’ incredibly powerful and flexible capabilities can be realized in many ways, which is why we created the HIRIS Store: to enable the discovery of apps best suited to you. The HIRIS Store offers a range of apps such as ones related to health and fitness to allow you to monitor steps taken, calories burned or your tennis form. Simply download the HIRIS App for your smartphone, choose the app you need from the HIRIS Store, and enjoy!
Wireless charger and up to 4 days battery life
Unlike most wearables, HIRIS was born as a unit to be embedded on different mounts like bracelets, bands or adhesive mounts to let you being free to place your HIRIS anywhere or on anything.
HIRIS works with a wide range of wristbands, casual or sporty, as well as waterproof or adhesive mounts. Wear either a band or a mount however you want and then download your favorite app and go!
EXTENSION CARDSHIRIS offers expansion cards, such as GPS and audio, to boost its hardware capabilities.
DIMENSIONSThe HIRIS weighs 42g (1.48 oz.) and its hexagonal face has a radius of 20mm (0.78 in.) and height of 12.25mm (0.48 in.)

","Why Ladybugs?

Smart devices have become the most popular and used electronic devices in our lives. We also love to carry our favorite musics and enjoy them during commuting, traveling, or even just while sitting back and relaxing in the sofa. So, why don't we deserve to have a Hi-Fi environment anytime and anywhere, just as easily as we use our smart devices? No heavy equipment, and no lousy cabling!
The Ladybugs will give you the tiniest form factor but prime Hi-Fi listening experience, which your smart devices never do!
Use lossless audio source. Consider the limited storage size of mobile device, 16Bit/48KHz, or 24Bit/96KHz FLAC files are highly recommended.
Use native 24Bit/96KHz player app like ""USB Audio Player PRO"" on Android, and ""FLAC Player"" on iOS.

Definitely use Ladybug1 for most popular CD format, or Ladybug2 for Hi-Res 24Bit/96KHz format. Most importantly, with our design, they provide high volume output, and just consume few power from the mobile devices.
Android Phone with app ""USB Audio Player PRO"":
iOS Device with app ""FLAC Player"" (Camera Connection Kit Needed):

The higher input impedance of your headphone, the higher output voltage ES9023 delivered. Perfectly match with the premium headphones like Sennheiser's HD650, HD800, or Beyerdynamic's DT990, DT90, T1 etc.

The audio signal goes straight out of the DAC chip and into headphone or amplifier.  There is no DC voltage to remove from the output of ES9023, which guarantee not only the widest audio bandwidth, but also the excellent sound quality.
Patented Hyperstream(TM) architecture for Time Domain Jitter Eliminator.
The ultra low noise low drop voltage regulator used: Ultra Low Noise (<30uVrms) from 10Hz to 100KHz. High power-supply rejection ration (>70dB) from 10Hz to 10MHz.
1-oz copper, 4-layer PCB design with star-routing methodology for power trace routing.
Aluminum case used, to provide better noise immunity.

>With PANDOO, you’re no longer limited by devices or hardware. All you need is a web browser to access your own personal cloud computer, on any desktop or laptop computer, tablet, or smartphone. Whether you’re on the go, on a public computer, or sharing a device with friends and family, PANDOO gives you access to a fully functional, personalized operating system that securely stores and runs all your apps, documents, files, and web services on the cloud, providing unlimited processing power and storage.

With PANDOO, you get your favorite apps and web services—plus new ones you haven't even dreamed of—all integrated directly into the PANDOO desktop. Get everything you need, customized just the way you like it, running side-by-side in one window. That makes PANDOO more powerful, more personalized, and more fun to use than anything else out there.

At PANDOO, we believe the traditional PC or personal computing device as we know it is in a fundamental transformation phase. What comes next will be something very different.

We have a vision of people all over the world being able to harness the power of the cloud to be more productive, more creative, and more social—regardless of what kind of device or hardware they have. PANDOO will help individual users, businesses and developers break free of the boundaries of their devices and system requirements.
PANDOO, students, institutions, entrepreneurs and people with limited budgets
or limited access to the latest technology will be able to do more
with less—accessing their information, apps and web services from any web
institutions and individuals who may not be able to afford the latest, most
expensive computers, providing true computing equality for anyone with access

to any Internet-connected device. That’s why we're partnering with Computer Aid, a UK-based charity dedicated to reducing poverty by distributing IT equipment to hospitals, universities, schools and not-for-profit organizations in over 100 countries. Every Indiegogo donation at the ""Philanthropist"" level of $100 or more will be split 50/50 to help bring computers to people who need them!
will be able to use PANDOO to build apps that can be deployed on the cloud to

any user, regardless of the device. PANDOO also plays a large role in the Internet of Things (IoT)-era as a seamless and abstract unified interface for all of the ""things"" that are connected on the Internet.

Development Status

The PANDOO team has spent years on the underlying technology that makes PANDOO possible, and have created an early DEMO (Alpha version) where more than 700 registered users are already getting a sense of what’s possible with PANDOO. The demo is only the beginning, and we have many plans for future development and improvement.

Here is what we are presently working on:

· PANDOO M@il: The easiest way to manage all of your email accounts on the cloud, in one intuitive and cool environment.

· PANDOO Social: Interact with all of your social media apps in one screen, and get instant notifications for all of them—along with an advanced solution to organize, manage, and keep track of multiple accounts.

· Enhanced Integration: PANDOO already integrates with many of the Web 2.0 apps you already use, and we’re actively working on expanding the list!

· New Apps: The PANDOO community, together with the large open source community, is working hard to develop new apps and provide a unified mechanism that enables all apps, games and services to operate seamlessly on PANDOO.

· Better Mobile Functionality: Creating an amazing experience for mobile users is one of our top priorities.

· PANDOOster: A smart, personalized calendar, scheduler and alert generator for your daily chores and appointments.

· PANDOO Talk: A cool messenger that allows you to easily communicate with anyone at any time.

· PANDOO Share: Share all you want with other PANDOO users, easily and securely.

· PANDOO Cloud: This ultimate cloud storage will provide unlimited storage and integrate all of your existing cloud storage accounts and beyond... FREE!

· EUREKA: Your personal search engine that knows what you are looking for before you search!

With your help, we expect to have a new and improved version of PANDOO by the end of 2014. The new PANDOO will include most of the above features, as well as the
column3:

Use of Funds

Every dollar raised through Indiegogo will go directly toward our goal of building the best PANDOO possible!

Indiegogo funds will help with:

· Software development: We’re hiring the best talents from everywhere in the world to work on writing the code and delivering the interfaces that will make the next generation of computing a breeze!

· Marketing and branding: Our aim is to make PANDOO a household name and change the future of computing!

· Cloud infrastructure: We are committed to utilizing the best cloud infrastructure and recruiting the most capable people to manage and run it!

Not ready to contribute? 

That’s OK! Register for the PANDOO DEMO today. The more users we have, the better the experience will become!

column1: How is it Different? |
Who is it for? |

The idea for PANDOO goes back to 1999, when co-founder Michael Patellis conceived of a way to connect medical patients and providers online, while digitizing and centralizing medical records. At that time, the notion of “the cloud” was in its infancy, and Michael’s idea took a back seat on his list of priorities, but was never forgotten!

Michael spent the next 10 years on other projects, but continued to believe the world needed a better way to store, access, and use information and services online. In late 2012, he carefully adjusted his cloud platform
project with a new vision: to give people the ability to do everything they do on their computers in one place, on the cloud.

In March of 2013, Michael met George Delaportas, a talented enterprise IT architect, entrepreneur, and self-described “geek,” who immediately saw the potential to revolutionize people’s lives with the first-ever personal computer, on the cloud. So Pandoo TEK, the company behind PANDOO, was born!

Pandoo TEK incorporated in Vancouver, Canada, in June 2013. In addition to Michael and George, the company currently consists of an international team of five developers and two designers. Our backgrounds and talents are diverse, but we all have one thing in common: ""A belief that PANDOO will change the world by building a powerful cloud-based O/S that makes computing more affordable, accessible, and easy to use—for everyone"".

column2: >You've got questions—we've got answers! Want to know even more about PANDOO? Contact us with any questions that aren't covered in the FAQ.

column1: Q: How is PANDOO different from other personalized web platforms?

column2: >A: PANDOO is the world’s first personal computer on the cloud. It functions as a virtual computer that runs its own web-based O/S where everything is on the cloud. Unlike other web dashboards, which are just shortcuts that lead to services and apps on other web pages or platforms, PANDOO provides a real web desktop where apps are being developed and run in one screen. PANDOO is also the only system that offers true personalization and multitasking.
column3:
>

Q: What is the difference between PANDOO and Google Chrome OS?

A: Chrome OS is a downloadable Linux kernel-based operating system designed to work primarily with web applications. The user interface is entirely based on the Google Chrome web browser and it's like a dashboard. All the apps are links or shortcuts to other pages. Finally, it's performance is highly dependent on the computer you have. PANDOO, on the other hand, is a non-downloadable web-based Ecosystem and Meta-O/S where apps, games and services are being coded, deployed and run. PANDOO provides a universal desktop, not a dashboard, that resembles the classic Windows/Mac/Linux desktops. Finally, PANDOO disengages the device resources and uses the merits of the cloud and the web.

column2: >Q: Can I use the applications installed on my computer (such as MS Office) with PANDOO?

>A: Currently, PANDOO supports only web-based apps. However, we are working hard with a large open source community in order to provide a unified mechanism that enables all native and downloadable apps, games, and services, on Windows, Mac and Linux, to operate seamlessly on PANDOO. For now, PANDOO enables integration with numerous cloud applications and office suites that are 100% compatible with MS Office—such as Zoho, Google Docs, and more.
>Q: With PANDOO, can I continue to use all the cloud-based applications I already use, and access the data I already have stored on the cloud?

>A: Absolutely! PANDOO makes the process of using your favorite apps and cloud storage services many times easier and more user-friendly by integrating them all in one browser window, using one secure login.
>Q: Does PANDOO work on a smartphone or tablet?

>A: PANDOO operates regardless of the device since it lives on the cloud. Currently, PANDOO has limited functionality on smaller screens, but we are working hard to offer an amazing experience to mobile users.
>Q: Can PANDOO be used with any web browser?
>A: PANDOO can run on all major web browsers. It is 100% compatible with any device and its minimum requirements are less than that of a 10-year-old computer.

column1: Q: Can I access any of my critical data on PANDOO even if I don't have the Internet?

column2: >A: You can access recent data without the Internet using PANDOO's temporary local cache. However, PANDOO offers a better experience if you have Internet access.
>Q: Why are some of the perks not available immediately at campaign launch?

>A: Because we need your support to make PANDOO a reality, it is still in the early alpha stage / demo phase. Perks that involve app development and early access to the PANDOO API and Integrated Development Environment won't be available until PANDOO is fully launched.
>Q: When will a premium sponsored listing for development of an app in the PANDOO Marketplace be available if I purchase the Vendor perk?
>A: A premium sponsored listing for development of an app in the PANDOO Marketplace will be available at Beta launch—less than a year from now, in March 2015.
>Q: When will early access to the PANDOO API and Integrated Development Environment be available if I purchase the Developer or Builder perks?
>A: Early access to the PANDOO API and Integrated Development Environment will be available after the Beta launch—approximately one year from now, in May 2015.
column3:
>

Q: What programming languages does PANDOO support for development?

A: PANDOO supports all server-side programming languages and JavaScript for client-side (browser) development. The concept behind PANDOO is that the diversity of the cloud technologies and programming languages should continue to extend and evolve while PANDOO silently and transparently unifies them into a seamless interface.

column2: >Q: What are the possibilities for customizing my PANDOO interface and apps?

>A: PANDOO is all about you. You can personalize your PANDOO desktop by customizing everything from sounds and music, to colors, skins, and FX. PANDOO's functionality is also personalized to the user, with a dynamic environment that adjusts buttons, images, window sizes, etc. to fit your activities and preferences.
>Q: Can I share and work collaboratively on documents and files using PANDOO?

>A: PANDOO is THE platform for managing, collaborating and sharing your work efficiently and securely. With PANDOO Cloud, which provides UNLIMITED space, and “PANDOO talk”, the unique Internet communicator of PANDOO, you can easily do your work any time of day regardless of your location or the device you use.
>Q: How does PANDOO use the login and other data I provide? Is my information private and secure?

>A: Unlike other web desktops, PANDOO enables users to choose the kind of information they share with PANDOO and/or others. PANDOO also has a “Swipe Everything” mechanism so that users can delete every piece of information. Finally, PANDOO stores information only temporarily. In contrast to all other systems that store every single piece of information on you, PANDOO uses only information on-demand and then discards any data when you finish your tasks. We are working hard to develop smart technologies so that you enjoy secure cloud computing. Your personal data has never been more

>A: PANDOO is FREE—for everyone. However, PANDOO makes money from personal and highly targeted advertising. We also receive commissions from apps sold on the PANDOO Marketplace and fees from developers who want to register and develop apps on the PANDOO Platform.

Silicon Anode Li-Ion Battery (7 days stand-by)

Teal comes with a clean minimal interface that boots PANDOO over the Internet. Teal is your direct connection with the PANDOO Cloud. Now you have immediate access to your files, games and apps. Teal is also smart. So, if your Internet access gets interrupted, don't worry. Teal synchronizes with PANDOO and caches your most recent work so that you work efficiently and smoothly without problems even if you don't have access for a certain period of time!
is building a better computing experience for everyone. We need your support to
make it the best it can be—so people like you can truly harness the power of
the cloud to do more, from anywhere, with any Internet-connected device. After all, YOU are the power
At PANDOO, we believe the traditional PC or personal computing device as we know it is in a fundamental transformation phase. What comes next will be something very different.

We have a vision of people all over the world being able to harness the power of the cloud to be more productive, more creative, and more social—regardless of what kind of device or hardware they have. PANDOO will help individual users, businesses and developers break free of the boundaries of their devices and system requirements.
PANDOO, students, institutions, entrepreneurs and people with limited budgets
or limited access to the latest technology will be able to do more
with less—accessing their information, apps and web services from any web
PANDOO levels the playing field for
institutions and individuals who may not be able to afford the latest, most
expensive computers, providing true computing equality for anyone with access

to any Internet-connected device. That’s why we're partnering with Computer Aid, a UK-based charity dedicated to reducing poverty by distributing IT equipment to hospitals, universities, schools and not-for-profit organizations in over 100 countries. Every Indiegogo donation at the ""Philanthropist"" level of $100 or more will be split 50/50 to help bring computers to people who need them!
will be able to use PANDOO to build apps that can be deployed on the cloud to

any user, regardless of the device. PANDOO also plays a large role in the Internet of Things (IoT)-era as a seamless and abstract unified interface for all of the ""things"" that are connected on the Internet.

Development StatusThe PANDOO team has spent years on the underlying technology that makes PANDOO possible, and have created an early DEMO (Alpha version) where more than 700 registered users are already getting a sense of what’s possible with PANDOO. The demo is only the beginning, and we have many plans for future development and improvement.Here is what we are presently working on:· PANDOO M@il: The easiest way to manage all of your email accounts on the cloud, in one intuitive and cool environment.· PANDOO Social: Interact with all of your social media apps in one screen, and get instant notifications for all of them—along with an advanced solution to organize, manage, and keep track of multiple accounts.· Enhanced Integration: PANDOO already integrates with many of the Web 2.0 apps you already use, and we’re actively working on expanding the list!· New Apps: The PANDOO community, together with the large open source community, is working hard to develop new apps and provide a unified mechanism that enables all apps, games and services to operate seamlessly on PANDOO.· Better Mobile Functionality: Creating an amazing experience for mobile users is one of our top priorities.· PANDOOster: A smart, personalized calendar, scheduler and alert generator for your daily chores and appointments.· PANDOO Talk: A cool messenger that allows you to easily communicate with anyone at any time.· PANDOO Share: Share all you want with other PANDOO users, easily and securely.· PANDOO Cloud: This ultimate cloud storage will provide unlimited storage and integrate all of your existing cloud storage accounts and beyond... FREE!· EUREKA: Your personal search engine that knows what you are looking for before you search!With your help, we expect to have a new and improved version of PANDOO by the end of 2014. The new PANDOO will include most of the above features, as well as the PANDOO Marketplace, a global apps, services, and games store, by the spring of 2015.Use of FundsEvery dollar raised through Indiegogo will go directly toward our goal of building the best PANDOO possible!Indiegogo funds will help with:· Software development: We’re hiring the best talents from everywhere in the world to work on writing the code and delivering the interfaces that will make the next generation of computing a breeze!· Marketing and branding: Our aim is to make PANDOO a household name and change the future of computing!· Cloud infrastructure: We are committed to utilizing the best cloud infrastructure and recruiting the most capable people to manage and run it!Not ready to contribute? That’s OK! Register for the PANDOO DEMO today. The more users we have, the better the experience will become!

The idea for PANDOO goes back to 1999, when co-founder Michael Patellis conceived of a way to connect medical patients and providers online, while digitizing and centralizing medical records. At that time, the notion of “the cloud” was in its infancy, and Michael’s idea took a back seat on his list of priorities, but was never forgotten!

Michael spent the next 10 years on other projects, but continued to believe the world needed a better way to store, access, and use information and services online. In late 2012, he carefully adjusted his cloud platform
project with a new vision: to give people the ability to do everything they do on their computers in one place, on the cloud.

In March of 2013, Michael met George Delaportas, a talented enterprise IT architect, entrepreneur, and self-described “geek,” who immediately saw the potential to revolutionize people’s lives with the first-ever personal computer, on the cloud. So Pandoo TEK, the company behind PANDOO, was born!

Pandoo TEK incorporated in Vancouver, Canada, in June 2013. In addition to Michael and George, the company currently consists of an international team of five developers and two designers. Our backgrounds and talents are diverse, but we all have one thing in common: ""A belief that PANDOO will change the world by building a powerful cloud-based O/S that makes computing more affordable, accessible, and easy to use—for everyone"".
Connect with us to spread the word!
We are PANDOO. Nice to meet you!

Michael Patellis :: Founder, President, CEO, Treasurer.Michael was born in Greece and has lived in Canada since 1973. He has been a “serial entrepreneur” since 1985. Over the years, Michael has initiated, invested in and promoted numerous new ideas and companies in industries such as transportation and technology. For the past ten years, he has worked to

You've got questions—we've got answers! Want to know even more about PANDOO? Contact us with any questions that aren't covered in the FAQ.
Q: How is PANDOO different from other personalized web platforms?

A: PANDOO is the world’s first personal computer on the cloud. It functions as a virtual computer that runs its own web-based O/S where everything is on the cloud. Unlike other web dashboards, which are just shortcuts that lead to services and apps on other web pages or platforms, PANDOO provides a real web desktop where apps are being developed and run in one screen. PANDOO is also the only system that offers true personalization and multitasking.Q: What is the difference between PANDOO and Google Chrome OS?A: Chrome OS is a downloadable Linux kernel-based operating system designed to work primarily with web applications. The user interface is entirely based on the Google Chrome web browser and it's like a dashboard. All the apps are links or shortcuts to other pages. Finally, it's performance is highly dependent on the computer you have. PANDOO, on the other hand, is a non-downloadable web-based Ecosystem and Meta-O/S where apps, games and services are being coded, deployed and run. PANDOO provides a universal desktop, not a dashboard, that resembles the classic Windows/Mac/Linux desktops. Finally, PANDOO disengages the device resources and uses the merits of the cloud and the web.
Q: Can I use the applications installed on my computer (such as MS Office) with PANDOO?

A: Currently, PANDOO supports only web-based apps. However, we are working hard with a large open source community in order to provide a unified mechanism that enables all native and downloadable apps, games, and services, on Windows, Mac and Linux, to operate seamlessly on PANDOO. For now, PANDOO enables integration with numerous cloud applications and office suites that are 100% compatible with MS Office—such as Zoho, Google Docs, and more.
Q: With PANDOO, can I continue to use all the cloud-based applications I already use, and access the data I already have stored on the cloud?

A: Absolutely! PANDOO makes the process of using your favorite apps and cloud storage services many times easier and more user-friendly by integrating them all in one browser window, using one secure login.
Q: Does PANDOO work on a smartphone or tablet?

A: PANDOO operates regardless of the device since it lives on the cloud. Currently, PANDOO has limited functionality on smaller screens, but we are working hard to offer an amazing experience to mobile users.
Q: Can PANDOO be used with any web browser?
A: PANDOO can run on all major web browsers. It is 100% compatible with any device and its minimum requirements are less than that of a 10-year-old computer.
Q: Can I access any of my critical data on PANDOO even if I don't have the Internet?
A: You can access recent data without the Internet using PANDOO's temporary local cache. However, PANDOO offers a better experience if you have Internet access.
Q: Why are some of the perks not available immediately at campaign launch?

A: Because we need your support to make PANDOO a reality, it is still in the early alpha stage / demo phase. Perks that involve app development and early access to the PANDOO API and Integrated Development Environment won't be available until PANDOO is fully launched.
Q: When will a premium sponsored listing for development of an app in the PANDOO Marketplace be available if I purchase the Vendor perk?
A: A premium sponsored listing for development of an app in the PANDOO Marketplace will be available at Beta launch—less than a year from now, in March 2015.
Q: When will early access to the PANDOO API and Integrated Development Environment be available if I purchase the Developer or Builder perks?

A: Early access to the PANDOO API and Integrated Development Environment will be available after the Beta launch—approximately one year from now, in May 2015.Q: What programming languages does PANDOO support for development?A: PANDOO supports all server-side programming languages and JavaScript for client-side (browser) development. The concept behind PANDOO is that the diversity of the cloud technologies and programming languages should continue to extend and evolve while PANDOO silently and transparently unifies them into a seamless interface.
Q: What are the possibilities for customizing my PANDOO interface and apps?

A: PANDOO is all about you. You can personalize your PANDOO desktop by customizing everything from sounds and music, to colors, skins, and FX. PANDOO's functionality is also personalized to the user, with a dynamic environment that adjusts buttons, images, window sizes, etc. to fit your activities and preferences.
Q: Can I share and work collaboratively on documents and files using PANDOO?

A: PANDOO is THE platform for managing, collaborating and sharing your work efficiently and securely. With PANDOO Cloud, which provides UNLIMITED space, and “PANDOO talk”, the unique Internet communicator of PANDOO, you can easily do your work any time of day regardless of your location or the device you use.
Q: How does PANDOO use the login and other data I provide? Is my information private and secure?

A: Unlike other web desktops, PANDOO enables users to choose the kind of information they share with PANDOO and/or others. PANDOO also has a “Swipe Everything” mechanism so that users can delete every piece of information. Finally, PANDOO stores information only temporarily. In contrast to all other systems that store every single piece of information on you, PANDOO uses only information on-demand and then discards any data when you finish your tasks. We are working hard to develop smart technologies so that you enjoy secure cloud computing. Your personal data has never been more

A: PANDOO is FREE—for everyone. However, PANDOO makes money from personal and highly targeted advertising. We also receive commissions from apps sold on the PANDOO Marketplace and fees from developers who want to register and develop apps on the PANDOO Platform.

Citizens who lose power because of a natural or man-made disaster, lose access to their normal electronic communications channels. Televisions and cable modems stop working. Often, the only communications devices left are battery-powered radios and mobile phones.
Also, the information that citizens need after an emergency is different than during normal times.

There needs to be a system that lets local government create instant hubs for the information citizens need after an emergency – accessible to the devices they have. Not Facebook, not Twitter, but an online place specifically created for collecting and distributing reliable information.

I experienced this need myself last year after Hurricane Irene, so I created MarkerFlare, a web-app for creating local information hubs and optimized for smartphones. It provides citizens with the community-specific information they need during emergency events, adds mass notification via text, email and online posting, and collects official and citizen-contributed reports. It includes an automated routing mechanism for authorities so that they can fact-check and approve everything before it is publicly posted. The entire system can be accessed by citizens or managed by officials from any web device, even if that can only be a smartphone at a WiFi hotspot.

MarkerFlare fills a huge hole in the emergency information collection and distribution abilities of local governments and their citizens. It provides the capabilities of social media, but incorporates fact-verification processes critical to official communications.

The prototype has already gotten great reviews from emergency managers and they want to include MarkerFlare as one of their tools. But it needs some additional development and a very large test before it can be certified as ready. If MarkerFlare can sustain the load of the test, our region's largest emergency management agency has arranged a space for us in the data center of their hurricane-proof data center, which means instant credibility and the opportunity to really spread this product across the country. Getting to that point and launching for our first communities will take about $65,000.

Unfortunately, I have already invested all that I can and have no more to go forward. Thus this campaign. The funds will let us augment system security and optimize performance, pay for better servers and hosting, reskin the software, conduct our benchmarking test – and pay to have all of the legal work done.  Completing all of this gets us to where we can actually turn the system on for a couple of early adopter towns. If we go over our target and get all the way to $125,000, we will be able to actually launch and operate the system for a year.

MarkerFlare is a necessary service that can help lots of communities, but it may not be the most thrilling sounding product ever. That’s why we came up with testing it by having an interactive story created by the noted science fiction/fantasy author, Gene Doucette. He’s going to create an amazing scenario, and then we’ll run our emergency management test of MarkerFlare as if that scenario is actually occurring.

For perks we are offering permanent recognition on the individual launch screens that appear for each community as well as bigger benefits like actually experiencing or helping to manage the test. For companies, we are offering the chance to be exclusive sponsors of the product for individual communities, states, or the whole country. It’s a corporate social responsibility opportunity like nothing before.

column2:
> 
Upper left: ONE TOWN, ONE SPONSOR - A sponsor's social responsibility splash screen, linkable to their own sub-site. Appears on launch if there is no active emergency, or anytime with the ""Sponsor"" button. Users receive obvious benefit and sponsors get an undiluted platform limited to one sponsor per town.
Upper right: SECURE, SIMPLE MANAGEMENT - Only authorized users can see or access official tools. Extremely simple design lets Administrators operate all system functions with virtually no training needed.

> 
Lower left: EVERY USER CAN CONTRIBUTE - Citizens can submit their own information, not just passively receive. They can provide the eyewitness detail necessary to provide a real understanding of any situation. A citizen-submitted bulletin is shown.
Lower right: AUTOMATIC APPROVAL WORKFLOW - Local administrators can vet official and citizen-submitted bulletins for completeness, accuracy and benefit using a fully customized and automated routing process before anything is posted. It makes sure that everyone who needs to sign-off, does.

column1: We see reports of towns that need this service every week. MarkerFlare isn't free, but we designed it from the start to be very inexpensive. Because of that, it's a perfect vehicle for companies to engage in true social responsibility. After we get going, companies of any size that now just talk about social responsibility will be able to prove their commitment, by sponsoring MarkerFlare for their state, area, or local communities. It's an overt way that they can do something good, by providing a benefit to citizens and local governments that really matters. Also, there needs to be a different way to do important things. There is no reason a service designed specifically to help people can't be built while keeping the profit motive in check. We want to benefit from what we are creating so that we can keep doing it, but there’s a difference between profiting and pillaging.

The majority of broadcast and cable news channels focus on wide distribution of a narrow range of content. Even if they are accessible, they are not set up to gather or provide the kind of local information that citizens need to answer all of the questions that arise during an emergency. Neither news outlets, or local agencies can mobilize all of the eyeballs needed to collect detailed information from every place within an emergency-affected area, evaluate it, and then incorporate it into a digestible form. Only the on-location involvement of citizens can fill the gap.
SOCIAL MEDIA AND TOWN WEBSITES AREN'T THE ANSWER

Local government agencies in many communities have begun to use a combination of their own websites, Facebook, and Twitter to distribute local information online, understanding that smartphones and some tablets can still access the web wirelessly. This approach might seem like the ‘Grail’ but it’s not. Town websites are often hosted in the affected area and can easily become inaccessible, or the personnel needed to update them may have no way to connect. Facebook and Twitter are free and more robust, but because they are social media services they are open to a vast range of modern-day abuses, such as “trolling” and “flaming.”  They have also become so large that navigating through them for specific local emergency information is a daunting task.

When a citizen’s last powered communications device has ten minutes of battery-life remaining, using it to wade through advertisements, searching a giant municipal web site, or dodging requests to “Like” the latest dance video, are frustrations that no one should need to experience.

Public Postings: After the MarkerFlare system has been activated by officials, it displays official information and accepts crowd-sourced bulletins. Above, the content and possible treatment of three posts submitted by citizens. The green post was accepted and posted by town officials. The red posting was rejected as trolling. The yellow post was not posted, but was passed on to the agency referenced in the comments.

I am Fred Maynor, an information technologist with over thirty years experience in building publishing systems for companies like Time Inc., Forbes and dozens of others. My design of the Remembrix multi-graphic recording system is cited as a prior art patent reference by Microsoft, IBM, Matsushita, and Ricoh. The team I assembled to build MarkerFlare have backgrounds in information systems, IT operations, open-source, database design, software development for state government, creative services, and game development.
YOU CAN ALSO HELP GET THIS GOING BY EMAILING SOMEBODY OR PICKING UP THE PHONE

If you can’t contribute, you can still help by sending links to the campaign to (ALL OF) your friends, and contacting your town government. Tell local officials about what we are building. Ask them to contact us at learnaboutus@markerflare.com to discuss how MarkerFlare can be activated for your town.

Please take a moment now to look at the perks and join this campaign. It is going to be a fun way to do something important.
