Please take a moment now to look at the perks and join this campaign. It is going to be a fun way to do something important.",5.0,0,"1 Campaign

Imagine you could create, arrange and group notes online as you can do with your sticky notes on a whiteboard. This is Noo. This will be Noo, with your support. It will be a visually appealing, easy-to-use open-source note taking application. Implemented using latest HTML5 standards and supporting mobile devices, too.
I'm the co-founder of Mediabird (famous for its
column3: filter=1"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"" title=""Mediabird Moodle Integration"">Moodle integration) and I've created web apps (such as StreamDocs) for almost four years now - using various technologies from Java, PHP, jQuery, Grails, Google Web Toolkit, HTML5 etc. I am constantly getting emails what has happened to the Mediabird Moodle extension. With this project, I want to make it easy for students to prepare for exams by taking lecture notes, memorizing important facts from their notes and discussing topics in detail. By arranging sticky notes on a virtual white board.

column1: From my exam preparations at university, I remember how important it is to keep notes organized and to collaborate with study mates to get better results. Providing the students with the right tools to do so, is my key motivation why I'm doing this. Now I need your financial support to work on this project.

Since I cannot charge for this open-source project and have no particular funding also, I rely on your financial support to be able to invest my time in this project. Fully funded, this project will cover my personal expenses for about three/four months which is the rough estimate of how long it will take me to implement everything.

What you will get is a well-documented, highly-scalable application that you can integrate into your own web app, deploy it onto your intranet or host in the cloud. The bigger perks include support as well as individual instructions on integration patterns.
If I don't reach the entire goal, I hope to be able to at least start this project and find other contributors and get it running (I'm using git)

Noo will not only make it easier for you to manage your notes, collaborate on your notes and group these, with the legacy intuitive usability known from sticky notes on a whiteboard. Additionally, it will allow you to enrich your existing web app or mobile application with the ability to easily manage notes.
As with the open-sourced version of Mediabird, I am looking forward to all the community contributions and use cases of this tool.

Supporting this project, you will allow educators, teachers, students, business people, teams, volunteers and many many more to easily create, arrange and group notes online. This project is about making this visually appealing and easy-to-use. No list-based approach, but all graphical.
Since I am creating Noo open-source, other developers can not only participate, but also benefit from my work.
Once this is done, I am looking forward to Dropbox, Google Drive, Moodle, Google Apps and further integrations.
If you're a Grails or jQuery developer, software architect, designer or someone who'd like to give me some feedback, please get in touch with me
And please share this pledge with your friends, colleagues or people that will be willing to support me! Thank you very much.

Imagine you could create, arrange and group notes online as you can do with your sticky notes on a whiteboard. This is Noo. This will be Noo, with your support. It will be a visually appealing, easy-to-use open-source note taking application. Implemented using latest HTML5 standards and supporting mobile devices, too.

I'm the co-founder of Mediabird (famous for its Moodle integration) and I've created web apps (such as StreamDocs) for almost four years now - using various technologies from Java, PHP, jQuery, Grails, Google Web Toolkit, HTML5 etc. I am constantly getting emails what has happened to the Mediabird Moodle extension. With this project, I want to make it easy for students to prepare for exams by taking lecture notes, memorizing important facts from their notes and discussing topics in detail. By arranging sticky notes on a virtual white board.

From my exam preparations at university, I remember how important it is to keep notes organized and to collaborate with study mates to get better results. Providing the students with the right tools to do so, is my key motivation why I'm doing this. Now I need your financial support to work on this project.
What We Need & What You Get

Since I cannot charge for this open-source project and have no particular funding also, I rely on your financial support to be able to invest my time in this project. Fully funded, this project will cover my personal expenses for about three/four months which is the rough estimate of how long it will take me to implement everything.

What you will get is a well-documented, highly-scalable application that you can integrate into your own web app, deploy it onto your intranet or host in the cloud. The bigger perks include support as well as individual instructions on integration patterns.
If I don't reach the entire goal, I hope to be able to at least start this project and find other contributors and get it running (I'm using git)

Noo will not only make it easier for you to manage your notes, collaborate on your notes and group these, with the legacy intuitive usability known from sticky notes on a whiteboard. Additionally, it will allow you to enrich your existing web app or mobile application with the ability to easily manage notes.
As with the open-sourced version of Mediabird, I am looking forward to all the community contributions and use cases of this tool.

Supporting this project, you will allow educators, teachers, students, business people, teams, volunteers and many many more to easily create, arrange and group notes online. This project is about making this visually appealing and easy-to-use. No list-based approach, but all graphical.
Since I am creating Noo open-source, other developers can not only participate, but also benefit from my work.

About The New Alexandrian Library Project and The Assembly of the Sacred Wheel

The New Alexandrian Library (NAL) will be a resource for those that believe in true freedom and equality for religious studies - a resource that includes all of the esoteric and non-mainstream (but growing!) religions - not just the the usual 3 or 4.  The NAL will make as much content (literature, periodicals, art...) available via the web the greates extent allowed by copyright law, etc.  - so it can be a true resource for ALL of those that can benefit from such a resource!

We are the Assembly of the Sacred Wheel, a legally recognized Wiccan non-profit religious organization based in the Mid-Atlantic region. The form of Wicca that the Assembly practices is syncretic and draws inspiration from Astrology, Qabala, the Western Magickal Tradition and the folk religions of Europe. Keepers of the Holly Chalice, the founding coven of the Assembly began its life in February of 1984. The Assembly was incorporated in the state of Delaware in 1993 and was granted 501(c)(3) status by the IRS in 1995.
We are a responsible and respected esoteric religion with a history of taking on and succedding with large projects.  Check us out at www.sacredwheel.org

column2: How We Would Like To Thank You For Your Support

column1: The total project construction cost is around $175,000 for the first phase.  To date, the Assembly of the Sacred Wheel (ASW) has raised $46,687 in direct donations (80% of that from ASW members.  We put our own money where our mouth is!) and $84,000 from fundraisers over the last 10 years. The land was donated by ASW members and is not counted in these figures.

We need a total of an additional $50,000 in the next 5 months, BUT RIGHT NOW, we are asking for immediate funds to cover the next construction payment of $12,500 by October 1, 2012. That means a deadline for this campaign of September 11, 2012 to let the funds clear.

And while we know you know this project is worthy of support all on its own, we have produced several products over the years to help fundraising and we would like to send you a selection fo them to say 'Thank You!"" for your support.  See the Perks!

The NAL will serve to support and advance serious academic study for new, non-mainstream, esoteric, 'living' religions that are most likely to be the guiding forces in guiding the Earth and Humans back to health and evolution of Spirit in the coming century.

Like the original Great Library of Alexandria, the schools of Qabala in medieval Spain, and the flourishing of magick that occurred in renaissance Italy, the diverse confluence of minds and resources would result in great leaps forward in theory and practice. The NAL will be one of the cornerstones (of many created by various groups across the globe we hope!) of a new magickal renaissance. The benefits of this growing network for future generations will be incalculable.

The content of the library will also be made available via internet to the greatest extent possible (respecting copyrights, etc.) to be a resource for the entire esoteric community.  The facility will evolve to meet accreditation criteria and serve as the library of record for formal esoteric religion studies at a variety of institutes of higher education.

The NAL will be located on 100 acres of Sacred Land at Seelie Court  - a third of which has been donated to the NAL project - in Georgetown, DE.  The facility will be accessible to visiting scholars and is serviced by Philadelphia and Washington, D.C. airports - while maintaining a wonderfully secluded atmosphere for serious study.

If you cannot donate right now, PLEASE help by posting links to this campaign and the New Alexandrian Library Project in as many places as possible!  This is a much needed project for our troubled times - intending to provide real resource for spiritual development and evoution over the next hundred years to come!

Apple‘s magnetic charging connector has been one of the best features in the Mac line for many years. It helps to save your laptop at significant moments. However, the useful staple  gone on the new Mac products, which makes our life quite inconvenient when we rip our laptop off a table unwarily. Now say cheese, MagSafe is back!

Baseus is the world’s first, fastest and strongest magnetic USB Type-C cable. It adopts the most innovative way to charge your New MacBook (Pro) and any USB-C devices with 4.3 A fast charging. By applying the unique “L” design, the Baseus Type-C cable also helps you to achieve the most convenient and comfortable user experience. Say goodbye to tangled cables and simplify your charging life with the Baseus magnetic Type-C cable from now on.

  Current Test Video

With superior wiring technology, the Baseus Type-C cable achieves the max current range of 4.3 Amps, which is equal to the highest current Apple applies for the 15’’ MacBook Pro and faster and more stable than any other magnetic USB Type-C cable. It charges at 86 watts and supports USB Power Delivery (USB PD)*.
* USB Power Delivery (USB PD) is the newest power standard that has a maximum power output of 100 W (20V / 5A).

Apple’s magnetic charging connector has been a great convenience of Mac line for years, which saves your laptop from crashing to the floor through careless ripping. Now MagSafe is back, with superior features.
Unlike traditional cables, Baseus adopts the innovative “L” design, which prevents the cord from being bent, increases the cable’s lifespan, and makes your desk neater.
Baseus is a magnetic USB Type-C cable designed specifically for the New MacBook and MacBook Pro. Change the way you charge your new Mac today.

The premium TPE braided nylon cable has been tested and proved stronger and more durable than any other cable on the market.

You will have no more dust in your power socket with Baseus magnetic Type-C cable.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

Apart from the new MacBook and MacBook Pro, Baseus Type-C cable is also compatible with other USB-C devices like Notebooks, Tablets and Smartphones.

column1:
Hitch Free

 Connect With One Hand

 No More Bending

 

Charge In The Dark

Baseus Type-C cable is the only magnetic cable specifically designed for new MacBook (Pro) and achieves the highest charging speed at 4.3 Amps. The design concept originated from pogo pins, which are arranged in a dense array, connecting many individual nodes of the two circuit boards together. That means these tiny parts require high exquisite craftsmanship and polished assembling fitting degrees in order to ensure stability, as well as preventing pin blocking and spring burning. The Baseus team performed long-term research and development month by month. Finally, we broke the current limitation to magnets and achieved the highest output in themagnetic Type-C cable market.

Baseus Magnetic USB-C Cable VS. Apple USB-C Cable Charging MacBook Pro 13''
column3:
showinfo=0"">
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With this USB Type-C to USB 3.0 adapter, you are able to continue using your current wall charger or car charger to charge your USB-C devices at speed of 2.4 A and 5V. Correspondingly, you can also charge your USB-C devices with normal laptop by using Baseus cable and the adapter.

 

Baseus is a technology company composed of a group of skilled and energetic talents who are experts in breaking limitations, excavating ideas from daily life, and bringing the most convenience to everyone. The Baseus team aims to solve those neglected details and helps more and more people achieve the best user experience. Apart from focusing on highly precise technology, the team also pay great attention to stylish design and products with extremely exquisite craftsmanship. We do small things, but we do them perfectly. Make your life easier with the Baseus team.

column1:
The Hangout Case is made for adventure:

Hangout's dual-material technology protects iPhone 5/5s from bumps, falls and drops:
- Engineered Polycarbonate structures and reinforces 
- TPU absorbs shock and is smooth and flexible enough to allow Hangout to slide in and out of pockets easily

column4:
>
The Hangout will be released in four colors:

column1: (Please review our Perks and the 'Important Notices' (below) for more details on how to get Hangout in your preferred color!)
column5:
>Important Notices

International Shipping

To avoid any delays in delivery, please make sure to add the International Shipping Perk ($5) to your order if you require delivery outside Hong Kong.

Product Color by Perk

For the Indiegogo Backer's Special, please make sure to order the appropriate Perk so that you may receive the Hangout Case in your preferred color. 

For the Hangout Party of Two and Four, please let us know what colors you would like to order, choices include: Onyx (Black), Graphite (Gray), Surf (Blue), and Mojito (Green).

Packaging

The Hangout Case will come neatly packaged ready for you to gift to yourself or a friend!

column1: My name is James Ng – I’m a mechanical engineer that has
found passion in product design. After nearly 20 years of working in manufacturing, much of my work is now focused on product design. I am continuously striving to create products that help
people in their every day lives.
Variform is a collection of projects I have started with my
partner, Erin Hung. Our team hopes to launch products in various categories
ranging from smartphone camera lenses and photography accessories to Bluetooth enabled
camera remotes and personal training devices. We have a strong interest in lifestyle
innovation and hope to introduce fresh and novel products to the market.
I’ve come to Indiegogo to bring my ideas directly to the
public and I hope to help close the gap between product design and the people.

Crowd-funding will allow our team to produce a product ourselves and reduce the time to market.  We believe in the creative goal of design. That, overall, the goal is to help people. Through this project, we want to bring this objective front and center.
The Hangout Case concept was inspired by the very people we ‘hang out’ with - our friends! As people living in the bustling and
work-obsessed metropolis of Hong Kong, time is precious and

opportunities to see friends are often few and far between. When we do have the chance to catch up, we just want to kick back and unwind. 

The
Hangout Case is the perfect iPhone accessory that allows you to open a
few bottles of beer, light up that bbq, and capture that group pic you can wait to post
Having your phone with you everywhere you go is the perfect
opportunity to make it a tool that comes in handy! Invite the Hangout Case to your next hangout! It’ll be an instant
Development of the Hangout Case began with 3D engineered drawings of its components on a computer. After drafting multiple
versions, it was prototyped and some internal components were fitted
to the prototypes. At the moment, we only have several of these prototypes, but we are
hoping to get production rolling with your support.
production process is costly, and often requires a great deal of investment. If
we are successful, our Indiegogo campaign will allow us to not only gauge the
interest of the public in the Hangout Case, but it will also allow us to
advance it’s overall development and enable us to share the Hangout Case with the world.
funds that are contributed will be used to:

-  Tooling
-  Production
-  Packaging

We hope that we can raise the funds required to get going on the tooling, production, and packaging of the Hangout Case. We have acknowledged the risks and challenges of delivering products to customers spread around the world, but we are ready to leverage the 25 years of combined work experience we have in Asia and manufacturing. 

We are ready and eager to deliver the Hangout Case and put it in the hands of our contributors. We are grateful for your support and are looking forward to the adventure ahead.

Along with our production partners, we hope to have Hangout Cases ready to arrive at your door by July 2014!

column6: >

column1:
0,"

 

- AnyTouch Blue makes you possible to have a precise control of an HID keyboard and mouse on a client that accessed with BLE(Bluetooth Low Energy).
- Simply working when hardware dongle is connected to the device that supports USB HID devices.
- Using a dedicated application for iOS and Android devices, precisely control is available.

Windows system wireless control demo – Presentation and shortcut functions​
   - The following video illustrates how to control a presentation using the three built-in shortcut functions.

Windows PC Game wireless control demo – XCOM Gameplay Demo​
   - The following video shows the wireless mouse function in real time while playing the game XCOM.

Android Set-top Box wireless control
   - Android Set-top Box is normally controlled using remote control, however this is very limited and uncomfortable
   - The video shows how Android Set-top Box can be conveniently controlled using AnyTouch Blue
   - Virtually any computer system that supports HID mouse and keyboard can be used with AnyTouch Blue

PS4 wireless control
   - Video of PS4 wireless control using AnyTouch Blue.
   - Also compatible with PS3 and other types of consoles that support HID mouse and keyboard.

- This is our second crowdfunding project. Our first crowd funded project failed just before going into production. However, we have learned lessons and now better understand the risks across the product development and mass production cycles that startups have to experience. In our previous project there were risks of launching our crowdfunding campaign without knowing the specific mass production and final costs of the product, but we launched anyway hoping to be able to succeed. For AnyTouch Blue we have resolved to start our funding campaign once the production schedule and costs are definitely determined.

- Cost risks. Our previous project consumed more than a million US dollar and the development also took more time than expected. Because of the current tight budget and production costs we are in need of supporters that believe in and can pre-order the product.

- Global market risks. Because AnyTouch is a new product, how to use it and the different ways it can be used are not widely known. We would like to overcome this through our backers by turning this product into a viral campaign.
- Finally we would like to thank everyone with interest in our product and specially our supporters.

","- AnyTouch Blue makes you possible to have a precise control of an HID keyboard and mouse on a client that accessed with BLE(Bluetooth Low Energy).- Simply working when hardware dongle is connected to the device that supports USB HID devices.- Using a dedicated application for iOS and Android devices, precisely control is available.
Windows system wireless control demo – Presentation and shortcut functions​   - The following video illustrates how to control a presentation using the three built-in shortcut functions.
Windows PC Game wireless control demo – XCOM Gameplay Demo​   - The following video shows the wireless mouse function in real time while playing the game XCOM.

Android Set-top Box wireless control   - Android Set-top Box is normally controlled using remote control, however this is very limited and uncomfortable   - The video shows how Android Set-top Box can be conveniently controlled using AnyTouch Blue   - Virtually any computer system that supports HID mouse and keyboard can be used with AnyTouch Blue
PS4 wireless control   - Video of PS4 wireless control using AnyTouch Blue.   - Also compatible with PS3 and other types of consoles that support HID mouse and keyboard.

- This is our second crowdfunding project. Our first crowd funded project failed just before going into production. However, we have learned lessons and now better understand the risks across the product development and mass production cycles that startups have to experience. In our previous project there were risks of launching our crowdfunding campaign without knowing the specific mass production and final costs of the product, but we launched anyway hoping to be able to succeed. For AnyTouch Blue we have resolved to start our funding campaign once the production schedule and costs are definitely determined.

- Cost risks. Our previous project consumed more than a million US dollar and the development also took more time than expected. Because of the current tight budget and production costs we are in need of supporters that believe in and can pre-order the product.

- Global market risks. Because AnyTouch is a new product, how to use it and the different ways it can be used are not widely known. We would like to overcome this through our backers by turning this product into a viral campaign.
- Finally we would like to thank everyone with interest in our product and specially our supporters.",20.0,9,"3 Campaigns
changes the default for written digital messages from unencrypted and unprotected to anonymized and encrypted.
is open source and available as free software.

provides end-to-end encryption, peer-to-peer without central infrastructure. Our objective is to revolutionize the security industry by making privacy and security available to everyone. And that with no hassle!

is zero-touch, secure and private communication on your own servers and on any hosted communication platform, like Microsoft Office365, Gmail, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Twitter Private Messages, SMS, ….
p≡p is peer-to-peer communication with end-to-end encryption and an unmatched meta-data level of privacy.
p≡p will synchronize keys and contacts between all devices and hence provides a back-up of your key chain and contacts.
p≡p means converging all Mail and Messaging services into one single mobile App.
p≡p removes the complicated user driven key management through a zero-touch user experience.
p≡p works on any communication channel like E-Mail, Jabber, WhatsApp, Twitter,… and can integrate with any E-mail platform providing an API (Kolab, Gmail, ….)
p≡p is an automated key management solution for various key systems combined. It implements OpenPGP, S/MIME, CMS among others.
p≡p avoids all central infrastructure - like servers, portals, directories - and the vulnerabilities related to such centralized setups.
p≡p eliminates the man-in-the-middle with a simple 'handshake' based on safe words in your own language.
p≡p encrypts even without the same client on both sides.
p≡p does not slow down your computer.
Our goal is to set the new Internet standard for digital written communication from unencrypted and unprotected to anonymized and encrypted.
p≡p solutions are needed today to reclaim our privacy, not in two or three years. Please support us to make these solutions available now.

p≡p is the only solution that allows you work with existing communication tools to provide full Internet privacy to private and corporate users. The solution can be implemented in an invisible layer to accommodate users’ existing ways of communicating. There is no learning curve! No changes! No pressures!
pEp-project.org is the open source project that is set to finally deliver free software for what the cypher-punk movement has been striving for since the late 1980: Easy Encryption for Everyone.

You double-click on the p≡p Outlook install file, then ‘Install’ and then ‘Finish’.
Et voilà - you are up and running. No other action needed.
When you e-mail a new friend, the first message will be unencrypted at trust level ‘Gray’, meaning it is as secure as any normal internet communication.

If your friend can encrypt already, p≡p will automatically encrypt with him in his standard (PGP, S/MIME, CMS,…) at trust level 'Yellow', meaning the encryption is technically safe. Only the risk of a man-in-the-middle attack remains.
You eliminate that risk with a simple phonecall (the Handshake) to exchange ‘Safe Words’ in your own language. p≡p issues these safe words once to you upon installation.
Now you have reached trust level green: you are fully protected from any known attack.
We will use the funds to create a foundation and to ramp up the delivery of more solutions based on the p≡p engine. We will also expedite the penetration of p≡p solutions in the community.
The commercialization of the corporate solution will happen through p≡p Security SA and provide a sustainable long-term funding for support and innovation.
As our goal is to provide everything as open-source software, your contributions will offer the financial means to create this software faster. This is where your contributions make a difference.

The indicated US$ amounts below are cumulative, in other words for $300k we develop both an Android and iOS App.

If we do not reach a level, we will nevertheless produce the solutions. If we receive only $200k for the iOS App (shortfall of $50k), we will nevertheless produce it. Only the timing and sequencing might change.

column1: Leon V. Schumacher (Mr. Corporate) is the former Group CIO of 2 leading companies in the world - Mittal Steel and Novartis. He ran organizations of 2,500 people and budgets of $2 billion and he has intimate knowledge of the needs and functioning of Fortune 500 companies. He is part of the CIO community leaders in US and Europe. Leon comes from Luxembourg.

Volker Birk (Mr. Technology) is the Technical Wizard, Software Architect and Security Specialist. He already created free Security Software with a million users, without marketing. He has been a Researcher and Lecturer in IT and Engineering for 11 years. He has been involved in many start-ups in Technology. Volker comes from Germany and has been a long term member of the largest Hacker Club in Germany.

Sandro Koechli (Mr. Linux Switzerland) is the link between the technical and the business brains of the p≡p team. He has been active in the Open Source business as an entrepreneur for more than a decade and he is widely known in the industry. Sandro focuses on technical services and comes from Switzerland.

Edouard Tisserant (Mr. Engineer) is our second programming Wizard and Software Architect on the project. He is a Free Software author and the lead developer of Beremiz and other Free Software for Automation projects. In addition to writing code, Edouard builds real things. Edouard comes from France and is an amazing engineer and innovator.

column1: Wake-up call to start work on the first implementation
First version of the p≡p Engine is running
p≡p version for Microsoft Outlook is in pilot stage
p≡p version for Microsoft Outlook is in pre-release and for prime time

Several initiatives were launched since the ‘Snowden Revelations’, and we support all of them. Nevertheless none of them has enabled the Internet users to easily protect their privacy and led to mass adoption yet.

We designed p≡p with the user in mind, as the solution that seamlessly integrates with the habits of the user, avoids central infrastructure and is available for many platforms, mail clients, and communication channels. And we need that solution – p≡p – now for all environments!

Help us promote the spread of p≡p solutions by multiplying our development team and regain your privacy now. Your donations will ensure that we can continue to provide you further free, open source versions of the p≡p software to protect your digital privacy.
Make a difference now! Contribute here please!

Why do we still need p≡p?
column3: >p≡p is needed because as of today no solution has been brought to market that is transparent to the user and that requires no interaction on the user’s part. We are still without a simple, open and common system to protect our privacy, which is appreciated by all user groups – corporate, consumer &

column1: In what ways is p≡p different from other encryption solutions?
column3:
>Most solutions are too difficult to use, others have introduced central elements (and hence unnecessary risk) to simplify key management.
p≡p eliminates the complicated key management with a zero-touch approach for the users as well as the administrators.
p≡p is the only solution that allows you work with existing communication tools to

column1: provide full Internet privacy to private and corporate users. The solution
can be implemented in an invisible layer to accommodate users’ existing ways of

communicating. It will protect you automagically on all channels (e-mail, messaging, SMS, …). It also supports multiple encryption standards automatically and you do not need p≡p client on both sides to encrypt successfully. However, if you have p≡p on both sides, you will get meta-data anonymization in addition to encryption.
Am I supporting terrorism while using p≡p?
column3:
>No, absolutely not. Cryptography solutions have existed for a long time. Sophisticated and motivated users have mastered these tools since the late ‘90s.
p≡p does not create anything new, only integrates these existing tools and makes them available to less sophisticated users. p≡p does not protect any suspect(s) against a targeted surveillance by our law enforcement services. p≡p only protects your constitutional rights to privacy.

column1: Please find here two pertinent quotes from the White House NSA Review Panel
a) “[…] there has been no instance in which NSA could say with confidence that the outcome [of a terror investigation] would have been any different” [without the metadata]
b) Communication metadata adds “only a modest contribution to the nation security”
Can I still send encrypted messages if my friends don`t have p≡p?
column3: >If your friends cannot encrypt, we offer 2 possibilities:

column1: 1) You can send an encrypted message to your friend with a link that allows them to download a free p≡p reader.

2) You can send them an unencrypted message inviting them to install p≡p or another encryption tool like OpenPGP, and your first reply after this installation will be encrypted completely automatically.
Does it work with all mail providers?
column3: >Yes, if you use p≡p in your mail client, such as Microsoft Outlook, Thunderbird, Apple Mail...

column1: If you only use webmail through a browser, then we will support all those webmail providers that provide an API for our browser plug-ins. This will be the case with providers like Kolab, Gmail, …
How long does it take to set up p≡p?
column3: >On your computer, the automated set-up takes about 30 seconds and does not ask any questions. The installer does it all for you in the background.

column1: How can I send an encrypted mail to a new contact?
column3: >Simply by installing p≡p or sending a message if you already have p≡p installed. If your friend has p≡p already installed then your communication is encrypted, if your friend uses another technology like S/MIME or PGP, it will work seamlessly as well.

column1: Is the subject and metadata of my email encrypted as well?
column3: >If both parties use p≡p, then the subject and metadata are encrypted as well.

column1: What happens if I already have PGP installed on my computer?
column3: >p≡p will recognize this automatically upon installation and will use the installed keys for encryption.

column1: Will p≡p indicate how good my privacy is?
column3: >p≡p shows the level of trust you have with your contacts. If the trust level is grey, there is not enough information to indicate any trust. If the trust level is yellow, your encryption is technically perfect, but you are still vulnerable to a man-in-the middle attack. After the handshake with safewords, you have the highest trust level (green) where you are protected against any known attack and you can securely communicate with that contact on all your p≡p devices.

column1: Can I use webmail in the browser with p≡p?
column3: >Yes, we will provide free browser plugins for all major browsers that allow you to use p≡p with webmail in the browser.

column1: What do you mean by zero touch?
column3: >Zero-touch means that the user does not need to do anything to create and manage keys nor to communicate at the highest level of privacy available with his/her counterpart (other than the handshake).

column1: Do you store my data?
column3: >No, p≡p is completely peer-to-peer with end-to-end encryption. Hence we are not storing any data of any kind. We just provide you with the p≡p software or app.

column1: Are e-mails and instant messages stored encrypted on my iPhone or Android phone?
column3: >No, they will be stored unencrypted but you have the option to store them encrypted.

column1: Can I use p≡p with WhatsApp or Facebook Messenger?
column3: >p≡p mobile app will encrypt communication with WhatsApp or Facebook Messenger contacts if both parties use p≡p.

column1: Which versions of Outlook are supported?
column4: up. And Office365 is secured of course.

column1: I use different e-mail accounts. Can p≡p work with all of them when I install it on my computer?
column3: >Yes, p≡p works with all accounts and will add those addresses to your key if needed.

column1: I want to reinstall my computer, do I have to backup p≡p or can I just re-install it and will p≡p function immediately?
column3: >If you have p≡p on a single device, you will need to back-up. If you have p≡p on another device it is possible to receive the key pair without backing up from that device using the new key from your newly installed system - as p≡p synchronizes all your devices securely peer-to-peer.

column1: What type of contribution do you prefer?
column3: >We prefer and recommend that you contribute directly by credit card, not via Paypal.

column1: Paypal’s support for privacy initiatives is at least questionable, as the disaster it caused for the crowdfunding campaign of our same minded friends from Protonmail shows.
As in the support of all communication tools, we decided not to limit the options of our contributors and impose channels. Hence we keep Paypal switched on for those that prefer this option.
We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project.
We also would like to extend special thanks to Emmet Keeffe and iRise for providing us with a simulation and visualization of our idea from the inception.
Please share our project through Twitter(#pEp4Privacy), Facebook and other social media platforms. We appreciate your support.
If you have any questions, please contact us at pep@pep-project.org
For Press Inquiries, please contact us at press@pep-project.org

Why do we still need p≡p?p≡p is needed because as of today no solution has been brought to market that is transparent to the user and that requires no interaction on the user’s part. We are still without a simple, open and common system to protect our privacy, which is appreciated by all user groups – corporate, consumer & community.

In what ways is p≡p different from other encryption solutions?Most solutions are too difficult to use, others have introduced central elements (and hence unnecessary risk) to simplify key management.p≡p eliminates the complicated key management with a zero-touch approach for the users as well as the administrators.p≡p is the only solution that allows you work with existing communication tools to
provide full Internet privacy to private and corporate users. The solution
can be implemented in an invisible layer to accommodate users’ existing ways of

communicating. It will protect you automagically on all channels (e-mail, messaging, SMS, …). It also supports multiple encryption standards automatically and you do not need p≡p client on both sides to encrypt successfully. However, if you have p≡p on both sides, you will get meta-data anonymization in addition to encryption.

Am I supporting terrorism while using p≡p?No, absolutely not. Cryptography solutions have existed for a long time. Sophisticated and motivated users have mastered these tools since the late ‘90s.p≡p does not create anything new, only integrates these existing tools and makes them available to less sophisticated users. p≡p does not protect any suspect(s) against a targeted surveillance by our law enforcement services. p≡p only protects your constitutional rights to privacy.
Please find here two pertinent quotes from the White House NSA Review Panel
a) “[…] there has been no instance in which NSA could say with confidence that the outcome [of a terror investigation] would have been any different” [without the metadata]
b) Communication metadata adds “only a modest contribution to the nation security”
Can I still send encrypted messages if my friends don`t have p≡p?If your friends cannot encrypt, we offer 2 possibilities:
1) You can send an encrypted message to your friend with a link that allows them to download a free p≡p reader.

2) You can send them an unencrypted message inviting them to install p≡p or another encryption tool like OpenPGP, and your first reply after this installation will be encrypted completely automatically.
Does it work with all mail providers?Yes, if you use p≡p in your mail client, such as Microsoft Outlook, Thunderbird, Apple Mail...
If you only use webmail through a browser, then we will support all those webmail providers that provide an API for our browser plug-ins. This will be the case with providers like Kolab, Gmail, …
How long does it take to set up p≡p?On your computer, the automated set-up takes about 30 seconds and does not ask any questions. The installer does it all for you in the background.

How can I send an encrypted mail to a new contact?Simply by installing p≡p or sending a message if you already have p≡p installed. If your friend has p≡p already installed then your communication is encrypted, if your friend uses another technology like S/MIME or PGP, it will work seamlessly as well.
Is the subject and metadata of my email encrypted as well?If both parties use p≡p, then the subject and metadata are encrypted as well.
What happens if I already have PGP installed on my computer?p≡p will recognize this automatically upon installation and will use the installed keys for encryption.

Will p≡p indicate how good my privacy is?p≡p shows the level of trust you have with your contacts. If the trust level is grey, there is not enough information to indicate any trust. If the trust level is yellow, your encryption is technically perfect, but you are still vulnerable to a man-in-the middle attack. After the handshake with safewords, you have the highest trust level (green) where you are protected against any known attack and you can securely communicate with that contact on all your p≡p devices.
Can I use webmail in the browser with p≡p?Yes, we will provide free browser plugins for all major browsers that allow you to use p≡p with webmail in the browser.

What do you mean by zero touch?Zero-touch means that the user does not need to do anything to create and manage keys nor to communicate at the highest level of privacy available with his/her counterpart (other than the handshake).
Do you store my data?No, p≡p is completely peer-to-peer with end-to-end encryption. Hence we are not storing any data of any kind. We just provide you with the p≡p software or app.
Are e-mails and instant messages stored encrypted on my iPhone or Android phone?No, they will be stored unencrypted but you have the option to store them encrypted.
Can I use p≡p with WhatsApp or Facebook Messenger?p≡p mobile app will encrypt communication with WhatsApp or Facebook Messenger contacts if both parties use p≡p.
Which versions of Outlook are supported?From Outlook 2010 & up. And Office365 is secured of course.
I use different e-mail accounts. Can p≡p work with all of them when I install it on my computer?Yes, p≡p works with all accounts and will add those addresses to your key if needed.

I want to reinstall my computer, do I have to backup p≡p or can I just re-install it and will p≡p function immediately?If you have p≡p on a single device, you will need to back-up. If you have p≡p on another device it is possible to receive the key pair without backing up from that device using the new key from your newly installed system - as p≡p synchronizes all your devices securely peer-to-peer.
What type of contribution do you prefer?We prefer and recommend that you contribute directly by credit card, not via Paypal.
Paypal’s support for privacy initiatives is at least questionable, as the disaster it caused for the crowdfunding campaign of our same minded friends from Protonmail shows.
As in the support of all communication tools, we decided not to limit the options of our contributors and impose channels. Hence we keep Paypal switched on for those that prefer this option.
We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project.
We also would like to extend special thanks to Emmet Keeffe and iRise for providing us with a simulation and visualization of our idea from the inception.
Please share our project through Twitter(#pEp4Privacy), Facebook and other social media platforms. We appreciate your support.
If you have any questions, please contact us at pep@pep-project.org
For Press Inquiries, please contact us at press@pep-project.org",89.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: Help me help myself to get TMS treatment for Autism/Depression:

My name is Sharmaine. I am 35 and from California. I have high-functioning Autism or what used to be called Asperger's Syndrome and Major Depression/GAD and I need help. I was misdiagnosed for many years and was put through the torture of pretty much every psychiatric medicine out there.

This campaign is to raise funds to have a treatment called TMS or Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation. You can learn more at Neurostar.com and also see a first hand experience told by a famous author who is also Autistic(linked in videos). Medicare currently only covers this treatment in 3 states and I am unfortunately not a resident of any of them and cannot afford this on my fixed limited income.

This treatment has the potential to completely alter my life and give me a better chance at being a successful member of your community. I want to go to college successfully and be able to function on my own.

Your contributions not only help me out but they help everyone out if you think about it. If I'm able to lead a more successful life I will no longer be completely dependant on my family, friends, community and government to take care of me.
I'm raising a base amount of $12,000 dollars. This is a new treatment, and although approved by the FDA it's expensive.
The only thing I can offer in return at the moment is my unending gratitude and I can knit scarves and make necklaces for donors. Any additional monies left over will go towards my education.

This is so important. As we move forward as a society with so many people being affected by Autism, people have to take notice. We need help and we want to be functioning people. We aren't lazy, we aren't stupid. We just function differently and need some assistance navigating humanity so we can be successful too.
Even if you can't donate, pass this around to the people you know. I don't have a lot of friends and could use the visability.

column1: Our M24 Solar Generator can power enough devices simultaneously for up to 1200 watts (M12: 600 watts)- that could be up to 24 full charges for a laptop! You get DC from the battery via two 5V USB ports, 12V from the two cigarette lighter connectors, and thanks to its internal inverter, you get alternating current (AC) via the two 110V (or 220V) sockets.

The mPower unique smart App will estimate the time to charge or discharge of the battery, help you orientate the solar panels with respect to the sun for optimum power generation and might even suggest you to save energy based on your typical consumption and the local weather forecast.
So what can you do with the mPower Solar Generator? Here are some applications:

Use your mPower Solar Generator to power a portable cooler, an electric burner, a coffee maker, an air mattress blower or even a heated blanket to keep you warm at night. And of course you can use it to recharge all your devices from smartphones, to digital cameras and tablets.

See the table below for the battery capacity of our three models (M6, M12 &

column1: The solar panel charges the battery during the day and the battery provides you electricity day and night. The following day, the panel recharges the battery, restarting the process.

column1:
Key Features


Sturdy off road wheels

Sturdy, off-road wheels that don’t break and don’t sink into the sand.

Light durable casing
column3:
/>

The mPower Solar Generator's casing is made from the lightest, yet most durable, polypropylene material on Earth. It is the same material used by the world’s top suitcase manufacturers, to ensure that almost everyone in your family can load the mPower in your trunk.

Outlets
column5:
/>

Each mPower comes with two USB sockets and two 12V socket, and our M12 and M24 also have 110V (220V) outlets. So you can connect just about any appliance, such as a stove top, 12V thermo-electric cooler, your smartphone and more.

column1: Our M24 mPower Solar Generator can power enough devices simultaneously for up to 1200 watts. See the application examples above for more details.
If you need even more power from your generator, you can daisy chain two or more mPower Solar Generators to double, triple or more, the available energy.
The mPower is the world’s first solar generator to come with a smart App, which is very much needed to keep you powered, extend the life of the battery and deliver the best value for your investment.
• Estimated time to charge or discharge of the battery.
• How to orientate the solar panels with respect to the sun for optimum generation of power.

• Local weather forecast for the coming days. If cloudy or rainy, the App calculates if the reduced solar generation will be enough to power your typical consumption. If needed, it alerts you so you can choose to save energy today to have more power during the upcoming cloudy days.
These are but a few of the gifts that you'll find bundled into our Perks.

column2: >Recharge your smartphone a few times during the day while keeping up the battery power with the solar panels.

column8: >Quick page links: Top | #LightUptheWorld | BUY 1-DONATE 1 | Product details | About | FAQ's

column1: Because in developing countries, one billion people still depend on kerosene for light. And the burning of kerosene lamps leads to:
• The equivalent of smoking 4 packs of cigarettes a day
• Respiratory illnesses such as asthma, bronchitis, pneumonia and lung cancer
• The premature death of 1.5 million people every year
• Trapping a family in poverty—about 20% of their income goes into buying kerosene
• Global warming—kerosene burnt in Africa releases more CO2 than all CO2 released in the UK

Within our Perks (see right column) you'll find that when you buy one M12 or one M24 Solar Generator, we'll donate in your name one M6 Solar Generator plus an LED light to one family without electricity. Enough for this family to charge their cellphones, have harmless light at night and stop using their kerosene lamp. The M6 and the LED light save them time and miles of walking, and give them a better quality of life so they can read and study to escape poverty.
This may feel like a drop in the ocean, helping a handful of people out of the billion without electricity, but your contribution will be LIFE-CHANGING for the one family that receives an mPower Solar Generator because of your purchase.

column2: >IMPORTANT NOTE: You do not pay more because of the donations.

column1: Why? Because instead of spending money on advertising, we redirect this money and part of our profits, towards the donations.
We believe every adult and child in the world should have access to electricity and through our BUY 1 — DONATE 1 model, we aim to provide millions of units to developing countries.
Access to electricity is essential to a family’s health, safety, education, economic progress and quality of life.

Imagine what your life would be without electricity. Say goodbye to your cellphone, laptop, internet, TV, radio, music, refrigerator, air conditioning, lights at night, most medical exams, treatments, surgeries and much more.

column6: >Well, one billion people don’t need to imagine life without electricity, they experience it every day of their lives.

column1: Read how these people manage their lives without electricity.
<td>“To study at night I use the light of a kerosene lamp. Many
children in our town have developed early sight problems due to the effort they

have to make to read.""
—Nordine, from La Hatt, Haiti
<td>“There’s no electricity in our village. We need to recharge
our cellphones to stay connected and to use them as a lamp at night. To
recharge my phone I travel to the nearest town with electricity, which is 15

miles away.”
—Lacrete, from La Digue, Haiti

“Whenever my little brothers need my help with their homework when I return from work, I take them to la route nationale, which is an illuminated road about one mile away from home and our closest source of light at night. Many neighbors do the same.”
—Louis, from La Hatt, Haiti
Let’s change people’s lives around the world

column1: The mPower comes in three sizes starting from the M6, M12, and the M24.
Looking at the interior of the mPower Solar Generator you get all of the required electronics for a perfectly balanced system.

The charge controller and the battery management system optimize the transfer of electricity from the solar panels to the battery and keep the batteries properly fed and safe for the long term. The inverter provides you with the alternating current.

We source the very best components around the world to ensure that you get the very best Solar Generator your money can buy at an incredibly competitive price. For example, the world’s best solar cells of today are made in California, the best material for the case are made in Germany, and so on. Finally, we invented the mPower Solar Generator in Florida, USA, the Sunshine State, where we will continue to design, develop and ultimately assemble the product.
• Identified the best vendors around the world for each component of the mPower.
• Built a fully-functional prototype following precise UL Certification guidelines.
• Produced a case to fine-tune the design and test connecting parts.
• Engaged the electronics experts to design the Communications module.
• Engaged a top App programming company to create our IOS and Android Apps.
• Produce the aluminum mold to thermoform the case.
• Once we know demand to Indiegogo campaign, place order with the vendors.
• Assembly at our facility in Melbourne, Florida.
• Quality control of the manufactured Solar Generators.

In 2013 we started a cleantech incubator—GreenTech Endeavors—to find, fund and launch revolutionary green technologies that can help create an abundant, safe and non-polluted world where no one is left behind.

Our vision is to help solve many of the world’s most pressing challenges by incubating and marketing revolutionary clean technologies developed by some of the brightest scientists working at American Universities and Federal Labs.
The mPower Solar Generator is our first product to market. We continue to research other very exciting clean technologies.

column2: the Caribbean. All logistics will be taken care of and managed.

column1: Create awareness – One billion people still don’t have access to electricity. In collaboration with the United Nations’ “Sustainable Energy for All” Practitioner Network, the Global Ambassador will report back to the world via social media, blogging, interviews with journalists and YouTube updates.

#LightUptheWorld – By bringing light to this dramatic human condition, the Global Ambassador will be instrumental in assisting the United Nations in achieving its Sustainable Development Goal #7, “to ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all” by 2030.
• Passionate for volunteerism and for helping families in need

On July 14th the mPower Ambassador will be announced. Good luck!

TECHO is youth led and present in Latin America &

Upon completion, TECHO implements social inclusion programs to show these people how to escape poverty for good.

column1: Prestigious newspaper The Economist considers Future In Review, ""The best technology conference in the world.""
Every year, Future In Review showcases up to 12 top startups, called FiReStarters, that are ""on the cusp of making great strides in improving our world"".
We are honored to have been selected a 2016 FiReStarer see details here: www.futureinreview.com/firestarters

column8: >Quick page links: Top | #LightUptheWorld | BUY 1-DONATE 1 | Product details | About | FAQ's

column1: ** We are constantly adding more FAQs into this section, if your
question is NOT covered here please send as an inquiry and we'll get back to
you as soon as we can**
How do I share this campaign to get Referrals for the #LightUptheWorld Challenge?
Just make sure you are signed in to Indiegogo and use the social sharing menu on the left of this page (see below) to send a personalized link to your friends and family.

Anyone from around the world that is 18 years old or older, by Apr-11-2016. General requirements are: passion for volunteerism and for helping families in need, enthusiasm about the outdoors and overcoming challenges, ability to engage with others and successfully lead teams, willingness to visit places with precarious accommodations and good written and verbal English skills
Does it matter for the #LightUptheWorld Challenge the amount contributed by the 'Referrals' I attract to the campaign?

No. The only thing that matters for the #LightUptheWorld Challenge is how many 'Referrals' actually visit the campaign. They do NOT need to contribute to add 'Referrals' points to your performance in the challenge.
Can I check how many 'Referrals' I’ve attracted so far within the #LightUptheWorld Challenge?
Of course. You can check as often as you want to. Please refer to the following instructions to do so: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683
How do I know if I am within the 12 finalists in the #LightUptheWorld Challenge?

Starting May-10 we will send a weekly email informing their performance to the participants ranked within the Top 12 in the challenge (and also to those that are close to reach the Top 12). To make sure you will be receiving these emails please send us an email to community@mpowersolargenerator.com with the subject '#LightUptheWord Challenge' and your Indiegogo user name.
Are there other compensation components beyond the US$ 150,000 annual salary?

Yes! Additionally to the salary, the company will provide the mPower Ambassador with 12 round trip airfares from Applicant’s home nearest capital city, all travel expenses paid during the year of the assignment while delivering the donated solar generators and travel insurance for the same period.
Does the Buy 1-Donate 1 business model impact the retail prices of the mPower Solar Generators?
No. For-profit companies spend lots of money in advertising.  We use the advertising money (plus, a portion of our profits) for donations instead of doing

advertising. We are confident that lots of caring people also want to help create a better world and one way of helping is by spreading the word about causes and products they care about.  In this way, the portion of the sale that
usually gets reinvested in advertising, we can instead use it for donations resulting in a win/win/win for our customers, the company and the recipient of
Where will you send the donated mPower Solar Generators?

The units donated as a result of the current Indiegogo campaign will be delivered by the mPower Ambassador jointly with TECHO's team to families without access to electricity in Haiti. After this campaign we will evaluate and design a distribution program to bring much needed mPower Solar Generators to other countries.
TECHO.org (which means roof, in Spanish) is a youth led organization present in Latin America &
column2: the Caribbean that seeks to overcome poverty in slums through engaging the joint work of volunteers and families living in extreme poverty. Over the last 19 years, through the work and donations of more than 750,000 caring volunteers and donors, TECHO has built over 100,000 transitional homes in 19 Latin-American countries for the poorest of the poor. Upon completion, TECHO implements social inclusion programs to show these people how to escape poverty for good.

column1: Are mPower Solar Generators available in stores?
Currently, mPower products are available exclusively on Indiegogo.
Where is the mPower Solar Generator manufactured?

We invented the mPower Solar Generator in Florida, USA, the Sunshine State, where we will continue to design, develop and ultimately assemble the product with the very best components sourced from around the world.
What are the characteristics of the main components of the

The mPower M12 and M24 include: crystalline silicon flexible solar panels, lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries with an embedded battery management system (BMS) that includes overcharge and over discharge protection, pure sine wave inverters, and thermal circuit breakers.
Do I need any additional cables or components in order to use
No. The mPower Solar Generator has been designed to be ready to
use by any adult without the need of additional cables or components.
Can anyone use the mPower Solar Generator?
The mPower Solar Generator generates and store electric power similar to that of the electric grid at home. Minors should never use the mPower Solar Generator without adult supervision.
Can I connect additional solar panels to the mPower Solar Generator?

Yes, the mPower M12 and M24 accept additional solar panels to be connected to them. You will need special cables available from mPower that are not included with the product since they are not part of its core functionality.
Can I get more power by connecting two mPower Solar Generators together?
Yes, you can connect (daisy-chain) two mPower Solar Generators with special cables available from mPower.
What warranty do you offer on the mPower Solar Generator?

All mPower Solar Generators have a 1 year warranty including all of the components, even the battery. The above warranty covers only defects arising under normal use and does not include malfunctions or failures resulting from misuse, abuse, neglect, alteration, problems with electrical power, usage not in accordance with product instructions, acts of nature, or improper installation or repairs made by anyone other than mPower or mPower’s authorized third-party service provider.
We ship worldwide! We make sure we ship the mPower Solar Generator according to safety transportation requirements.
Yes! We’ve built a fully-functional prototype following precise UL Certification guidelines and then produced a 3D printed case to fine-tune the design and test the connecting parts.
","When you Buy One mPower Solar Portable Generator (see Perks) we’ll Donate One, in your name, to a family without electricity, without impacting the retail price.
Our mPower Solar Generator provides a way to charge your devices & appliances with clean power anytime, anywhere.

In the U.S. there are instances when grid electricity is not available: outdoor recreation (camping, off-road & RV travel, boating), off-grid homes, outdoor work (film, photography, construction), and blackouts that affect some 150 million Americans annually.
In developing countries, one Billion people depend on kerosene for light with no access to a power source during the night. Kerosene smoke causes asthma, bronchitis, pneumonia, and cancer
column2: leading to the death of 1.5 million people every year. Your purchase of one mPower Solar Generator provides one family with clean electricity.

column1: Quick page links:  Top | #LightUptheWorld | BUY 1-DONATE 1 | Product details | About | FAQ's

Our M24 Solar Generator can power enough devices simultaneously for up to 1200 watts (M12: 600 watts)- that could be up to 24 full charges for a laptop! You get DC from the battery via two 5V USB ports, 12V from the two cigarette lighter connectors, and thanks to its internal inverter, you get alternating current (AC) via the two 110V (or 220V) sockets.

The mPower unique smart App will estimate the time to charge or discharge of the battery, help you orientate the solar panels with respect to the sun for optimum power generation and might even suggest you to save energy based on your typical consumption and the local weather forecast.
So what can you do with the mPower Solar Generator?  Here are some applications:

Use your mPower Solar Generator to power a portable cooler, an electric burner, a coffee maker, an air mattress blower or even a heated blanket to keep you warm at night.  And of course you can use it to recharge all your devices from smartphones, to digital cameras and tablets.See the table below for the battery capacity of our three models (M6, M12 & M24) for camping applications.
Use your mPower for critical needs such as light, coffee maker and microwave, as well as to stay connected to the world through your smartphones, tablets, laptops and Wi-Fi
column2: and why not for entertainment powering your TV, DVR and even a game console.See the table below for the battery capacity of our three models (M6, M12& M24) for blackout situations.

column1: And this is not all, just about anywhere you need portable power you can consider using an mPower Solar Generator.
The solar panel charges the battery during the day and the battery provides you electricity day and night.  The following day, the panel recharges the battery, restarting the process.
Quick page links:  Top | #LightUptheWorld | BUY 1-DONATE 1 | Product details | About | FAQ's

Key FeaturesSturdy off road wheelsSturdy, off-road wheels that don’t break and don’t sink into the sand.Light durable casingThe mPower Solar Generator's casing is made from the lightest, yet most durable, polypropylene material on Earth. It is the same material used by the world’s top suitcase manufacturers, to ensure that almost everyone in your family can load the mPower in your trunk.OutletsEach mPower comes with two USB sockets and two 12V socket, and our M12 and M24 also have 110V (220V) outlets. So you can connect just about any appliance, such as a stove top, 12V thermo-electric cooler, your smartphone and more.
Our M24 mPower Solar Generator can power enough devices simultaneously for up to 1200 watts. See the application examples above for more details.
If you need even more power from your generator, you can daisy chain two or more mPower Solar Generators to double, triple or more, the available energy.
The mPower is the world’s first solar generator to come with a smart App, which is very much needed to keep you powered, extend the life of the battery and deliver the best value for your investment.
The App delivers the following information:
Estimated time to charge or discharge of the battery.
How to orientate the solar panels with respect to the sun for optimum generation of power.

Local weather forecast for the coming days. If cloudy or rainy, the App calculates if the reduced solar generation will be enough to power your typical consumption. If needed, it alerts you so you can choose to save energy today to have more power during the upcoming cloudy days.
These are but a few of the gifts that you'll find bundled into our Perks.
Recharge your smartphone a few times during the day while keeping up the battery power with the solar panels.
View our Perks to see how these great gifts are bundled together.
Quick page links:  Top | #LightUptheWorld | BUY 1-DONATE 1 | Product details | About | FAQ's
Because in developing countries, one billion people still depend on kerosene for light. And the burning of kerosene lamps leads to:
The equivalent of smoking 4 packs of cigarettes a day
Respiratory illnesses such as asthma, bronchitis, pneumonia and lung cancer
The premature death of 1.5 million people every year
Trapping a family in poverty—about 20% of their income goes into buying kerosene
Global warming—kerosene burnt in Africa releases more CO2 than all CO2 released in the UK

Within our Perks (see right column) you'll find that when you buy one M12 or one M24 Solar Generator, we'll donate in your name one M6 Solar Generator plus an LED light to one family without electricity. Enough for this family to charge their cellphones, have harmless light at night and stop using their kerosene lamp. The M6 and the LED light save them time and miles of walking, and give them a better quality of life so they can read and study to escape poverty.This may feel like a drop in the ocean, helping a handful of people out of the billion without electricity, but your contribution will be LIFE-CHANGING for the one family that receives an mPower Solar Generator because of your purchase.
IMPORTANT NOTE: You do not pay more because of the donations.
Why? Because instead of spending money on advertising, we redirect this money and part of our profits, towards the donations.
We believe every adult and child in the world should have access to electricity and through our BUY 1 — DONATE 1 model, we aim to provide millions of units to developing countries.
Access to electricity is essential to a family’s health, safety, education, economic progress and quality of life.

Imagine what your life would be without electricity. Say goodbye to your cellphone, laptop, internet, TV, radio, music, refrigerator, air conditioning, lights at night, most medical exams, treatments, surgeries and much more.
Well, one billion people don’t need to imagine life without electricity, they experience it every day of their lives.
Read how these people manage their lives without electricity.
“To study at night I use the light of a kerosene lamp. Many
children in our town have developed early sight problems due to the effort they
have to make to read.""—Nordine, from La Hatt, Haiti
“There’s no electricity in our village. We need to recharge
our cellphones to stay connected and to use them as a lamp at night. To
recharge my phone I travel to the nearest town with electricity, which is 15
miles away.”—Lacrete, from La Digue, Haiti

“Whenever my little brothers need my help with their homework when I return from work, I take them to la route nationale, which is an illuminated road about one mile away from home and our closest source of light at night. Many neighbors do the same.”—Louis, from La Hatt, Haiti
Let’s change people’s lives around the world

Looking at the interior of the mPower Solar Generator you get all of the required electronics for a perfectly balanced system.

The charge controller and the battery management system optimize the transfer of electricity from the solar panels to the battery and keep the batteries properly fed and safe for the long term.  The inverter provides you with the alternating current.

We source the very best components around the world to ensure that you get the very best Solar Generator your money can buy at an incredibly competitive price. Our vision is to help solve many of the world’s most pressing challenges by incubating and marketing revolutionary clean technologies developed by some of the brightest scientists working at American Universities and Federal Labs.
The mPower Solar Generator is our first product to market. We continue to research other very exciting clean technologies.

Passionate Travelers Apply for Rewarding Travel-with-Purpose Position to Provide Portable Electricity to Families in Need
Apply today for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to travel around the world and dramatically improve the lives of thousands of families in need.
The Global Ambassador will deliver donated solar generators to families without electricity around the world.
If you care about people and want to help us #LightUptheWorld, you’re in the right place. It’s easy to apply.
A salary of US$150,000 for the twelve-month contract, starting on January 1, 2017*
12 roundtrip airfares from Ambassador’s nearest capital city
All travel expenses and travel insurance paid

Deliver solar energy – The Global Ambassador will bring the donated Solar Generators to families without electricity, in collaboration with mPower’s non-profit partner: TECHO. TECHO has built more than 110,000 transitional homes throughout Latin-America & the Caribbean. All logistics will be taken care of and managed.

Create awareness – One billion people still don’t have access to electricity. In collaboration with the United Nations’ “Sustainable Energy for All” Practitioner Network, the Global Ambassador will report back to the world via social media, blogging, interviews with journalists and YouTube updates.

#LightUptheWorld – By bringing light to this dramatic human condition, the Global Ambassador will be instrumental in assisting the United Nations in achieving its Sustainable Development Goal #7, “to ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all” by 2030.
Passionate for volunteerism and for helping families in need
Enthusiastic about the outdoors and overcoming challenges
Able to engage with others and successfully lead teams
Willingness to visit places with precarious accommodations
Good written and verbal English skills
18 years or older as of April 11, 2016
The top 12 applicants with the most Referrals’ visits to our mPower Indiegogo campaign by May 24th will become the Finalists and will be invited to an online interview selection process.
Between June 30th and July 14th a jury of distinguished business professionals and philanthropists will select the most qualified person among the 12 Finalists.
On July 14th the mPower Ambassador will be announced. Good luck!

Through this campaign we are launching the mPower Solar Generator to provide clean portable energy, with a business model aimed at improving the daily life of families in need around the world.
Your contribution to this campaign will directly impact many of the one billion people without access to electricity.
Historically, gas generators have provided off-grid or portable electricity.
But gas generators have significant limitations
Solar energy has hardly any of these problems

Some products claim to be solar generators but they come in separate pieces with solar panels on one hand and batteries on the other, and they require you to carry each piece separately and additional setup.
Our mPower Solar Generator is all-in-one, easy to carry, easy to set up and easy to use.

Through our BUY 1 — DONATE 1 program, initially, we’ll make donations through the amazing non-profit organization TECHO (which means roof in Spanish).
TECHO is youth led and present in Latin America & the Caribbean. Through the joint work of families living in extreme poverty with youth volunteers, TECHO seeks to overcome poverty in slums.

Over the last 19 years, through the work and donations of more than 750,000 caring volunteers and donors, TECHO has built over 100,000 transitional homes in 19 Latin-American countries for the poorest of the poor. Upon completion, TECHO implements social inclusion programs to show these people how to escape poverty for good.
We will be distributing the mPower Solar Generators with TECHO's Haiti organization.
United Nations has called on businesses, governments, and civil society to achieve Sustainable Energy for All by 2030.

The Energy Access Practitioner Network is at the heart of the movement to bring sustainable energy for all, helping expand energy access in 170 countries, facilitating partnerships and finance and catalyzing national efforts to move towards a clean energy future. We are proud members of the Energy Access Practitioner Network.
