** We are constantly adding more FAQs into this section, if your
question is NOT covered here please send as an inquiry and we'll get back to
you as soon as we can**
How do I share this campaign to get Referrals for the #LightUptheWorld Challenge?
Just make sure you are signed in to Indiegogo and use the social sharing menu on the left of this page (see below) to send a personalized link to your friends and family.
Who can participate in the #LightUptheWorld Challenge?

Anyone from around the world that is 18 years old or older, by Apr-11-2016. General requirements are: passion for volunteerism and for helping families in need, enthusiasm about the outdoors and overcoming challenges, ability to engage with others and successfully lead teams, willingness to visit places with precarious accommodations and good written and verbal English skills
Does it matter for the #LightUptheWorld Challenge the amount contributed by the 'Referrals' I attract to the campaign?

No. The only thing that matters for the #LightUptheWorld Challenge is how many 'Referrals' actually visit the campaign. They do NOT need to contribute to add 'Referrals' points to your performance in the challenge.
Can I check how many 'Referrals' I’ve attracted so far within the #LightUptheWorld Challenge?
Of course. You can check as often as you want to. Please refer to the following instructions to do so: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683
How do I know if I am within the 12 finalists in the #LightUptheWorld Challenge?

Starting May-10 we will send a weekly email informing their performance to the participants ranked within the Top 12 in the challenge (and also to those that are close to reach the Top 12). To make sure you will be receiving these emails please send us an email to community@mpowersolargenerator.com with the subject '#LightUptheWord Challenge' and your Indiegogo user name.
Are there other compensation components beyond the US$ 150,000 annual salary?

Yes! Additionally to the salary, the company will provide the mPower Ambassador with 12 round trip airfares from Applicant’s home nearest capital city, all travel expenses paid during the year of the assignment while delivering the donated solar generators and travel insurance for the same period.
Does the Buy 1-Donate 1 business model impact the retail prices of the mPower Solar Generators?
No. For-profit companies spend lots of money in advertising.  We use the advertising money (plus, a portion of our profits) for donations instead of doing

advertising. We are confident that lots of caring people also want to help create a better world and one way of helping is by spreading the word about causes and products they care about.  In this way, the portion of the sale that
usually gets reinvested in advertising, we can instead use it for donations resulting in a win/win/win for our customers, the company and the recipient of
Where will you send the donated mPower Solar Generators?

The units donated as a result of the current Indiegogo campaign will be delivered by the mPower Ambassador jointly with TECHO's team to families without access to electricity in Haiti.  After this campaign we will evaluate and design a distribution program to bring much needed mPower Solar Generators to other countries.

TECHO.org (which means roof, in Spanish) is a youth led organization present in Latin America & the Caribbean that seeks to overcome poverty in slums through engaging the joint work of volunteers and families living in extreme poverty. Over the last 19 years, through the work and donations of more than 750,000 caring volunteers and donors, TECHO has built over 100,000 transitional homes in 19 Latin-American countries for the poorest of the poor. Upon completion, TECHO implements social inclusion programs to show these people how to escape poverty for good.
Are mPower Solar Generators available in stores?
Currently, mPower products are available exclusively on Indiegogo.
Where is the mPower Solar Generator manufactured?

We invented the mPower Solar Generator in Florida, USA, the Sunshine State, where we will continue to design, develop and ultimately assemble the product with the very best components sourced from around the world.
What are the characteristics of the main components of the

The mPower M12 and M24 include: crystalline silicon flexible solar panels, lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries with an embedded battery management system (BMS) that includes overcharge and over discharge protection, pure sine wave inverters, and thermal circuit breakers.
Do I need any additional cables or components in order to use
No. The mPower Solar Generator has been designed to be ready to
use by any adult without the need of additional cables or components.
Can anyone use the mPower Solar Generator?
The mPower Solar Generator generates and store electric power similar to that of the electric grid at home. Minors should never use the mPower Solar Generator without adult supervision.
Can I connect additional solar panels to the mPower Solar Generator?

Yes, the mPower M12 and M24 accept additional solar panels to be connected to them. You will need special cables available from mPower that are not included with the product since they are not part of its core functionality.
Can I get more power by connecting two mPower Solar Generators together?
Yes, you can connect (daisy-chain) two mPower Solar Generators with special cables available from mPower.
What warranty do you offer on the mPower Solar Generator?

All mPower Solar Generators have a 1 year warranty including all of the components, even the battery.  The above warranty covers only defects arising under normal use and does not include malfunctions or failures resulting from misuse, abuse, neglect, alteration, problems with electrical power, usage not in accordance with product instructions, acts of nature, or improper installation or repairs made by anyone other than mPower or mPower’s authorized third-party service provider.
We ship worldwide! We make sure we ship the mPower Solar Generator according to safety transportation requirements.
Do you have a prototype ready?

Yes! We’ve built a fully-functional prototype following precise UL Certification guidelines and then produced a 3D printed case to fine-tune the design and test the connecting parts.",42.0,1,"1 Campaign

Imagine a tool that compiles a list of public events. Events everywhere that you live, work and play! Imagine this tool on your mobile device! Your contributions will help us develop and launch a free mobile application Every Event  a user friendly app that organizes local events into 4 categories: Arts and Leisure, Sporting Events, Free or Inexpensive Events, and Bars and Restaurant Events. Every Event is developing and launching the app for i phones, then Android, and then Blackberry. Our corporation is formed, we own the URL, mapped out all the app functions, contracted a firm to develop the app, and crafted an innovative event gathering and marketing plan. We will micro test the app., run a a small ad campaign and track the results of the tests. Once we feel confident that this app will function flawlessly, we will launch it. Our strategy is to build a team of commissioned, local experts that are experts on their communitie's events. Every Event will achieve profitablity by selling localized push through advertising to local businesses. The mobile app advertising market is the fastest growing advertising segment and we will be able to tell advertisers when potential customers are nearby! Every Event will allow anyone to post an event in minutes right from their mobile device and envisions helping businesses grow.

Hi! I am Jackie Rennie a single Mom from the Philly area. I spend a lot of time running my teenaged boys around to their activities. I am also an Event Planner and an expert at knowing what's going on in our community.  My decades of outside sales, training and management experience have prepared me for this amazing journey. I am highly motivated and in great physical and mental shape.
What we will use the money for?

1) The app development costs over $35,000 for each type of device and we want everyone to have access to this app. i phones, android and blackberry users. Could spend less, but we want to produce an excellent product!
2) Microtest the app. expenses $2,000 for a solid validation study.
4) Travel expenses to develop a highly tained and polished sales team $5,000.
If we don't reach our goal, we will use your generous contributions to develop the i phone app. and delay the android and blackberry apps. development.

Update: We didn't make the fundraiser goals. But for validation of our concept, see now twitter owned Vine and Cesar Kuriyama’s 1 Second Every Day that emerged later.
Hi! We're Francis and Vidar - and we're building an iPhone app that revolutionizes how you capture and share your experiences - your life - by changing the format to one second videos. Less is more.
Not convinced of the potential? Watch this AMAZING video by Kevin Kelly to see the real power of one second videos:

We love photography AND we love video. But shooting and editing good videos can be hard. Especially on a mobile phone. Long videos are also less immediate than a still image. That's why we often end up shooting pictures instead of videos.
But a static image can only contain so much information. Only so many emotions. Only so much of the ambience. And it has no sound.
That's why we created OneSec! It combines the simplicity and immediacy of pictures with all the advantages of video.
OneSec makes shooting and sharing videos fun and simple by changing the format to one second shots!
Like Twitter limits your tweet to 140 characters, OneSec limits your video to one second per shot. You then use the app to combine those shots into an awesome video.
We were inspired by the work of the awesome Cesar Kuriyama and Kevin Kelly to create this app.
We're ready to build an awesome iPhone app for you to shoot and share one second videos!
But before we continue, we need to secure a little bit of funding. That's where YOU come in.

As much as this is a labor of love for us, love doesn't pay our rent or feed our families as we work on this. That's why we are asking for a donation, only as much as you think you can spare and as much as you think it would be worth to you.
Once we have secured basic funding, you can expect us to complete the app by the end of the summer.
In return we'll give you appropriately awesome high-quality perks! Just check out the amazing list of perks on the right hand side of this page. Check back regularly - The list is always growing!
We're confident you'll find something that tickles your fancy and suits your budget.
And of course you'll get the OneSec app! It will be yours for free on the AppStore. Be sure to grab the $100 perk if you want it sooner, though!
And you'll get the satisfaction of seeing decent folks succeed.

column1: Francis is a Belgian developer genius, Vidar is a Norwegian product wizard and we both live in Cologne, DE and love developing iPhone apps.
We're both independent, self-financed startup entrepreneurs. Francis is doing something called
column2: ign-mpt=uo%3D2"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">Addy, and Vidar is doing Gauss. (Not to worry - those projects are still going full steam ahead. We're just continuing building while our teams take a well-deserved summer break.)

column1: Together we thought we'd test and validate if crowd funding is a viable way to finance the creation great iPhone apps. So we decided to collaborate on this next awesome social mobile video photo app for you!
It sounds like a fun and exciting summer project to us.

Between us we have about a gazillion years of experience creating great stuff, both web-based software and mobile apps, winning accolades and recognition from the likes of Seedcamp, Ycombinator, Blackbox.vc, LeWeb, TechCocktail SXSW &
column2: the London Web Summit and a partridge in a pear tree.

column1: Just google us if you want to know more.
How are we going to spend it all?
Noooo! Good party hats are actually hard to come by and this amount won't cover boats to go with the drinks.
We might have some awesome developer superpowers, but we still have to eat and pay our bills just like everybody else. You see, the boring truth is that awesome app creators are just people too.

The amount we are looking to raise will go towards covering the income lost (we're self-employed) in the period that we are focusing 100% on finishing OneSec. Just to make sure it gets the undivided love it deserves and to deliver an amazing product to you.
We think it's a modest amount, considering the collective awesomeness we're putting into it.
And some of what you pledge is of course also going towards assuring that you get really awesome high-quality perks for your money.
And most likely, it cost more to create all of this than the amount pledged in total.
What will we do if we raise more?
We'll add it to our boat drinks and party hats slush fund.
No - We're kidding! We already tried that last year. The party hats didn't qualify as a tax deductible and everything sort of backfired. Don't ask.
Seriously - We will put all proceeding funds in a bucket for our next app project - where YOU get to vote on what we should build next!
What if you can't or won't donate some of your hard earned money?
You'll have to pay for boat drinks and party hats the next time you see us.
There are however three - 3 - other things we'd like you to consider:
Share this project to all your friends, contacts and random strangers! Again. And again! Share the link to this page on Facebook, Twitter and Google+.
At least you can pretend that you care, right? Everybody's good enough for some share-care.
2. A little like-love goes a long way!
It's more than symbolic - it actually helps us. Seriously! The more you share and like, the more exposure we get on this awesome IndieGoGo thing!
Like THIS page, like our page on Facebook and like our videos on YouTube, share us on Facebook, Twitter and Google+. Click, click, click!
At least you're good for a little (or A LOT of) like-love, right?
Talk about this project with your friends, family, contacts and random strangers!
We know you know someone that may know someone who knows someone who would love to publish something about this somewhere. We know. Don't deny it.

It's SUMMER and everybody is craving for a story - and we're it! We'll sing, dance - and wear party hats for anyone remotely interested. We'll make it worth their while and do zany interviews. We're easy!

We also know that you know people who are not on the Internet. Yes. We know. Drag them over to the nearest browser and show them our project page, have them pull out their wallets and sit them through the whole payment process. You know they want to support us!

column2: >INCREDIBLY STABLE CAR MOUNT THAT SECURES YOUR PHONE ON ITS OWN
column3: >Infrared-sensors locate phone and secure it without your help. Fast-charge car mount with wireless charging for Samsung, iPhone, Nexus, and other Qi phones.
column10: >Qi certification ensures safety, quality, and compatibility with all other wireless-charging products. Qi certification for Esoqi car mount is set to be publicly announced late April. All Esoqi pre-orders will meet Qi certification standards.
column13: MORE STABLE THAN LEADING PHONE MOUNTS
column14: >With just a single touch of your finger, Esoqi has sure-lock grip and release for all phone sizes.
column25: >Compatible with Qi-wireless-charging devices such as Samsung Galaxy S8, S8 Plus, S8 Note, S7, S7 edge, iPhone 8, 8 Plus, X, and Nexus. See our full list of devices compatible with our 10W Qi mount in our specs sections.
column29: >SECURE TO DASH, WINDSHIELD, OR AIR VENT
column30: >Securely install to the car's air vent, dashboard or to windshield in seconds using Esoqi's lock-tight, 3-inch suction cup.Then, lock your phone in place with the padded protective grips.
column33: >NO-SLIP GRIP FOR THE BUMPIEST OF RIDES
column34: >Auto-grip technology fits perfectly to your phone with no room for movement across event the roughest of terrains. Your phone's not going anywhere unless you want it to.
column40: >EASILY ADJUSTS TO YOUR PERFECT VIEWING ANGLE
column41: >Esoqi's ball joint allows for a full 306° rotation in viewing options. No matter your favorite angle, Esoqi can keep up.
column46: >Esoqi's  built-in battery will support about 120 days on standby (that's about 300 opens/closes). Standby battery only applies to open/close elements of Esoqi mount.
column47: >YOUR ESOQI ORDER COMES WITH...
column50: >No additional accessories are needed.

column1: PRE-ORDER NOW FOR BEST DEAL

column2: >Help us reach our stretch goals to unlock 4 new colors. Our first one is at $100k. You'll be able to select your color via survey at the end of our campaign.

column5: >When we hit $100,000, we'll release two free color upgrades. All current and future backers will be able to choose between these colors, and the gray already available when we confirm your color choice at the end of the campaign.
column6:
>REFER AS MANY FRIENDS AS YOU CAN

From now until the end of our campaign, you can refer your friends to get great prizes for free! Let’s begin the sharing fun!

The rules are simple:

column1: • Share your unique sharing referral link with your friends and ask them to join us by placing an order on Indiegogo. A successful referral is only counted if someone pre-orders an Esoqi Indiegogo campaign perk via your link.
• You’ll receive FREE referral prizes! Types of prizes vary depending on how many referral orders are tracked via Indiegogo.
See below for prize options.
column2:
>

For every 5 friends you successfully refer, we'll give you a free Esorun Air wireless phone charger! If you refer 20 or more friends, we'll give you a free Esoqi wireless charging car mount.

The Who: 
You must be a backer on Indiegogo to qualify. Each backer has a unique Indiegogo ID and unique referral URL.

The How:
Log in to Indiegogo. Then, visit our campaign page on Indiegogo and look to the right of the main video to share using Indiegogo’s share tools.

How to Track Your Results:

column1: • Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
• Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
• See the number of funders and your total referred contribution amount.

column2: >THE TEAM BRINGING YOU ESOQI
column3:
>
""Enjoy your life"" is our slogan and ""Making life easier"" is our vision.

Dedicated to bringing convenience and safety back to driving, we are a small team with dozens of successfull phone products under our belt. 
 
As a certified Qi member, Esorun has independent research and development and technical departments to develop wireless electronic products. We own independent intellectual property rights with original design, including utility model patents and exterior design patents. We refuse to offer inferior and unlicensed products.  We pride ourselves on listening to our users and creating products and gadgets to make their lives easier.
column7: >IN YOUR HANDS BY THIS SUMMER
column11: >FROM EARLY CONCEPTS TO PRODUCTION

column1: You can see more tooling videos here and here.

column4: >We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.
column6: >We plan to ship the product in June 2018. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.
column8: >This is a brand new product: the first of its kind. By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first to own the next must-have phone product. You'll be part of a group giving valuable feedback that will shape the future of phone charging.
column10: >

column1: Esoqi is a smart car mount with automatic locking and unlocking, Qi wireless charging added on the wireless-charging model.
Esoqi was created by the company Esorun.
Existing car mounts are not user-friendly for drivers.  Esoqi is the world's first automatic car mount with single-handed operation.
Esoqi MSRP will be $89, but you can get it for less via backing us on Indiegogo.
What do we get when we order?

This depends on the perk you select. Please see perk options for details. Standard orders include: one Esoqi car mount, one air vent holder, one dash board holder( telescopic arm, adjustable length),one dual outputs car charger, one 1M charging cable and manual. The ball design will compatible with other mountings such as CD holder and Cup holder.
Infrared-sensing technology and standard vs wireless charging options.
As of right now, gray is our available color. We will unlock additional colors via stretch goals.
All Esoqi mounts come in one size: 118.3*71.9*20.3mm. It works with all smartphones or GPS between 4-7 inches.
Which option is best for me?
Esoqi fits most smart phones. If your smartphone supports Qi wireless charging,  Esoqi 10W would be the best for you. If it does not, please select a standard model.
What is the battery life? Hours of continuous use? How to charge?

The built-in battery will support about 120 days on standby (about 300 opens/closes). Just plug it back in to charge Esoqi's standby battery back up. Standby battery only applies to open/close elements of Esoqi mount. To wirelessly charge your device, your mount must be plugged into continuous power. As a Qi wireless charging car mount, it will connect with power via a micro USB cable.
What are the dimensions and weight?

To install Esoqi on dashboard / windshield / air vent, simply insert and remove your smartphone with just one touch (automatically triggers locking and unlocking). Once a Qi compatible smartphone is mounted, it will begin to automatically charging wirelessly if compatible.
What kind of sensors are you using?
Infrared trigger for locking and static touch switch for unlocking.
Qi certified is pending and expected before May.
Can I charge my Smartphone while using Esoqi?
The Esoqi 10W mount allows for smartphone wireless charging. The standard mount does not.
Does this rotate? Can it be vertical?
Esoqi phone mount section can rotate 360 degrees with its ball design. The angles of the ball join on the Esoqi back should be about 270 degrees. It can rotate both horizontally and vertically.

column3: >

column1: How do I turn it on and off?
There is a power button located on the right side of your Esoqi phone mount.
Can I use it with a phone case?

Yes, works with almost any phone case (includes the typical bulky Otter box case Defender). Since Esoqi’s Qi fast wireless charging supports up to 8 mm distance, it works with most cases less than 5-6mm.
What is the grip range of the clamp?
How much weight will it support?
450 gr or 16 Oz. (Modern smartphones weigh 5 oz. on average. For example, iPhone X weighs 6.14 ounces (174 grams), iPhone 8 weighs 5.22 ounces (148 grams))
How do I install Esoqi in my vehicle?

There are 3 installation options to enhance hands-free driving experience: Air vent, Dashboard and Windshield. You will select the attachment right for you. Please see the installation video in our gallery.
We plan to ship the product in June 2018.
When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?
We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.
Esoqi will ship worldwide. Please see shipping costs for your country per perk selection.
US and Canada shipping is free. Shipping for the rest of the world will be under $10 USD for all perk offerings.
I'm interested in a distribution partnership.
We'd love to hear from you! please contact with sales@eosrun.com.
Do I have to pay VAT / GST?
VAT and GST not included in your order. You may have to pay VAT/GST.
We will offer an 18-month warranty for our Indiegogo backers. Our standard warranty is 12 months.
<td>Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis
column2: at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production and shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.

column1: What is your return / exchange policy?
If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, shipping and handling fees may apply.
How do I choose more than one reward?
To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.
How can I check the status of my pre-order?
By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.
Why do I have to wait longer than usual?

This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.
If I have other questions, who should I contact?

column3: >

","INCREDIBLY STABLE CAR MOUNT THAT SECURES YOUR PHONE ON ITS OWNInfrared-sensors locate phone and secure it without your help. Fast-charge car mount with wireless charging for Samsung, iPhone, Nexus, and other Qi phones.  Qi certification ensures safety, quality, and compatibility with all other wireless-charging products. Qi certification for Esoqi car mount is set to be publicly announced late April. All Esoqi pre-orders will meet Qi certification standards.  FASTER, MORE CONVENIENT, & MORE STABLE THAN LEADING PHONE MOUNTSWith just a single touch of your finger, Esoqi has sure-lock grip and release for all phone sizes.  BOTH QI FAST WIRELESS & STANDARD CHARGINGCompatible with Qi-wireless-charging devices such as Samsung Galaxy S8, S8 Plus, S8 Note, S7, S7 edge, iPhone 8, 8 Plus, X, and Nexus. See our full list of devices compatible with our 10W Qi mount in our specs sections.  SECURE TO DASH, WINDSHIELD, OR AIR VENTSecurely install to the car's air vent, dashboard or to windshield in seconds using Esoqi's lock-tight, 3-inch suction cup.Then, lock your phone in place with the padded protective grips. NO-SLIP GRIP FOR THE BUMPIEST OF RIDESAuto-grip technology fits perfectly to your phone with no room for movement across event the roughest of terrains. Your phone's not going anywhere unless you want it to.  EASILY ADJUSTS TO YOUR PERFECT VIEWING ANGLEEsoqi's ball joint allows for a full 306° rotation in viewing options. No matter your favorite angle, Esoqi can keep up.Esoqi's  built-in battery will support about 120 days on standby (that's about 300 opens/closes). Standby battery only applies to open/close elements of Esoqi mount. YOUR ESOQI ORDER COMES WITH... No additional accessories are needed.

All current and future backers will be able to choose between these colors, and the gray already available when we confirm your color choice at the end of the campaign. REFER AS MANY FRIENDS AS YOU CANFrom now until the end of our campaign, you can refer your friends to get great prizes for free! Let’s begin the sharing fun!The rules are simple:
Copy your unique sharing referral link .

Share your unique sharing referral link with your friends and ask them to join us by placing an order on Indiegogo. A successful referral is only counted if someone pre-orders an Esoqi Indiegogo campaign perk via your link.
You’ll receive FREE referral prizes! Types of prizes vary depending on how many referral orders are tracked via Indiegogo.

See below for prize options.For every 5 friends you successfully refer, we'll give you a free Esorun Air wireless phone charger! If you refer 20 or more friends, we'll give you a free Esoqi wireless charging car mount.The Who: You must be a backer on Indiegogo to qualify. Each backer has a unique Indiegogo ID and unique referral URL.The How:Log in to Indiegogo. Then, visit our campaign page on Indiegogo and look to the right of the main video to share using Indiegogo’s share tools.How to Track Your Results:
Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
See the number of funders and your total referred contribution amount.

THE TEAM BRINGING YOU ESOQI""Enjoy your life"" is our slogan and ""Making life easier"" is our vision.Dedicated to bringing convenience and safety back to driving, we are a small team with dozens of successfull phone products under our belt.  As a certified Qi member, Esorun has independent research and development and technical departments to develop wireless electronic products. We own independent intellectual property rights with original design, including utility model patents and exterior design patents. We refuse to offer inferior and unlicensed products.  We pride ourselves on listening to our users and creating products and gadgets to make their lives easier.  IN YOUR HANDS BY THIS SUMMER  FROM EARLY CONCEPTS TO PRODUCTION

We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.This is a brand new product: the first of its kind. By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first to own the next must-have phone product. You'll be part of a group giving valuable feedback that will shape the future of phone charging.
Esoqi is a smart car mount with automatic locking and unlocking, Qi wireless charging added on the wireless-charging model.
Esoqi was created by the company Esorun.
Existing car mounts are not user-friendly for drivers.  Esoqi is the world's first automatic car mount with single-handed operation.
Esoqi MSRP will be $89, but you can get it for less via backing us on Indiegogo.
What do we get when we order?

This depends on the perk you select. Please see perk options for details. Standard orders include: one Esoqi car mount, one air vent holder, one dash board holder( telescopic arm, adjustable length),one dual outputs car charger, one 1M charging cable and manual. The ball design will compatible with other mountings such as CD holder and Cup holder.
Infrared-sensing technology and standard vs wireless charging options.
As of right now, gray is our available color. We will unlock additional colors via stretch goals.
All Esoqi mounts come in one size: 118.3*71.9*20.3mm. It works with all smartphones or GPS between 4-7 inches.
Which option is best for me?
Esoqi fits most smart phones. If your smartphone supports Qi wireless charging,  Esoqi 10W would be the best for you. If it does not, please select a standard model.
What is the battery life? Hours of continuous use? How to charge?

The built-in battery will support about 120 days on standby (about 300 opens/closes). Just plug it back in to charge Esoqi's standby battery back up. Standby battery only applies to open/close elements of Esoqi mount. To wirelessly charge your device, your mount must be plugged into continuous power. As a Qi wireless charging car mount, it will connect with power via a micro USB cable.
What are the dimensions and weight?

Infrared trigger for locking and static touch switch for unlocking.
Qi certified is pending and expected before May.

The Esoqi 10W mount allows for smartphone wireless charging. The standard mount does not.

Esoqi phone mount section can rotate 360 degrees with its ball design. The angles of the ball join on the Esoqi back should be about 270 degrees. It can rotate both horizontally and vertically.

There is a power button located on the right side of your Esoqi phone mount.

Yes, works with almost any phone case (includes the typical bulky Otter box case Defender). Since Esoqi’s Qi fast wireless charging supports up to 8 mm distance, it works with most cases less than 5-6mm.
What is the grip range of the clamp?
How much weight will it support?
450 gr or 16 Oz. (Modern smartphones weigh 5 oz. on average. For example, iPhone X weighs 6.14 ounces (174 grams), iPhone 8 weighs 5.22 ounces (148 grams))

column2: >
/>We all know how the fidget spinner craze took over the world to help people release their stress and regain focus, and that got us thinking…

column1: Why carry around an extra gadget when you already have a smartphone that you handle hundreds times a day?
That’s when we started thinking of a well designed protective case that would double as the perfect stress reliever.
Ludicase may be one of the coolest cases you’ll ever own. It’s more than the other simple stress relievers out there, it offers multiple ways to play and reduce stress. Try it, you’ll love it!
Ludicase it combines polycarbonate shell and soft touch materials for uncompromising protection.
Ludicase powerfully safeguards your phone with intelligent Drop Safe Protection. Impact is absorbed and dissipated.
After months of hard work with designers and engineers, we were able to get Ludicase as thin as the bestselling cases of the market!

It’s well-designed protective case that can also double as the perfect stress reliever.
Ludicase is not only a case, it’s a spinning case.
And it’s the first case on Earth to get its own dedicated IOS app!
There are multiple ways to use it:
• Challenges Mode: Challenge your friends to see who can get the most turns or spin the fastest!
• Random Mode: An arrow will point who wins or who loses, you make the rules!
• FX Mode : Spin the case and get hypnotized by the moving graphics and optical effects!
The Rocket Spinner that makes your phone spin at top speed!
Because we want see Ludicase on both side
The LUDICASE 2.5D tempered glass screen protector for your iPhone is more than meets the eye. The rounded edges offer comfort in the hand and compatibility with your Ludicase for extreme production.
With the POP range, you get a fresh, colorful look
And the metal finish gives it a cool designer look.
For believing in our project, we want to thank you! Check out our rewards below
Bringing the right features at the right place to create a unique stylish case while optimising thickness and protection has been Ludicase Design challenge we have been fully dedicated to.

Researches on materials and assembly led to an incredible compact size to perfectly fit in your pocket. Soft finishes and trendy colors has been chosen to please your hand and match your style. Ludicase has been designed to be a whole new experience at your fingertips.
Olivier is more than ready to run the machines

The story began five years ago when two tech enthusiasts and challenge addicts met. Each had a strong and unique background in different areas, and when they combined their ideas, a new creation was born!

0,"

Hands free, Voice based, Neck Wrap, General Purpose Mobile Phone. Especially handy during Personal Emergency Situations and for Personal Reconnaissance and/or Monitoring... A HUMAN BLACK BOX if you may...

some projects which are similar to us in terms of SOS and Monitoring
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1226890823/iota-never-lose-sight-of-whats-important
http://techcrunch.com/2014/04/30/tinitell-kickstarter/


The usual phones which are kept in pockets or handbags or even slung around the neck or shoulders do not come very handy during personal emergency situations like vehicle accidents, attacks by animals and people, drowning, caught in fire, hanging over a cliff by the hands, remote monitoring of kids and elderly people and the handicapped, emergency situation while sleeping or bathing, personal surveillance, etc. A bluetooth handsfree headset is more reliable in many of such situations but with some major drawbacks. The phone can become separated from us and can go beyond the bluetooth range. The bluetooth units consume a lot of power to operate. They are not very discreet, do not work reliably in noisy windy conditions. They do no pick up low intensity whispers and grunts. We have to carry two different piece of devices. Wearing the headset while sleeping or bathing is not comfortable. Bluetooth device radiation adds to the radiation pollution already around us. But, this new piece of device which is worn as a neck sweatband with a sensitive throat microphone has none of these drawbacks, and will have a unique voice based SOS switch apart from the usual SOS push button (the stretch sensors or the capacitive touch sensors would anyway switch on if anyone presses on the neck too hard). Will be water resistant and washable. No skin irritation on long term wearing. Would be recharged once in a week or so. Offers 2-way voice communication in the most ergonomic way possible.

Hi I am Bharath, and I have an Engineering degree from the Computer Science &
column2: Engineering Department of the National Institute of Technology Karnataka (NITK at Surathkal) and a Masters degree in Physical Oceanography from the Center for Atmospheric and Oceanic Sciences (CAOS) at the Indian Institute of Science (IISc, Bangalore). I do not have any work experience as I did not become a software guy, instead I spent most of the time trying to learn about the Indian Monsoons, Indian Oceans and partly about the Indian People. Right now I am kind of on a long break from my PhD thesis submission for various reasons (of which the top 2 are
column3:
not enough pay, not enough freedom) and I want to make money by creating some wearable smart products to begin with, if possible. And be an independent researcher with my own source of funding later.

I have a bunch of loosely organized (but dedicated) people as a team, mostly research scholars related with IISc, like an Aerospace engineer working on creating solid rocket propellents, a Biophysics guy working on Proteins and Drug delivery systems (at Pandorum Technologies Pvt. Ltd., http://companyinfoz.com/company/pandorum-techno...), A Civil engineer studying Earth quakes, An Electronics engineer studying Fluid Turbulence and a Mechanical engineer working on Transportation systems. All of us have various startup ideas and are looking for money from investors to work on those ideas further. For now, in a concrete form, if there is enough money on the table we could quickly make prototypes of these voice based(SOS) phones and take it to the next round of investment with proper manufacturing and marketing teams. I think this device along with the wearable glasses (like a Lumus, http://www.lumus-optical.com/) and a Stylus (like http://www.winbeta.org/news/microsofts-multi-pu...) can disrupt the way the present day hand held format phones are designed.

We hope to raise $10,000 funds from Indiegogo contributors to make the initial prototype of this specified neck wearable mobile phone (could be customised to look like fancy neckwrap jewellery if necessary). About $5000-$6000 will go in buying the specified components, integrating them,  testing the device, giving it an aesthetic and comfortable form, digging out one or two patentable ideas. Assuming about $1000 would be paid to the Indiegogo team the rest $3000-$4000 would be used by the people working on the prototype as TA/DA and for paying for food, water, power for a maximum of four months (Sep 2014 to Dec 2014). Beyond that, let us see how we manage to raise funds, how the product shapes up and how the interaction with contributors proceed. It could even turn into a cooperatively owned open-sourced product bundled with heart(http://news.stanford.edu/news/2013/may/skin-hea...), lung(http://www.azosensors.com/News.aspx?newsID=3412) and blood(http://home.lu.lv/~spigulis/mnm-final.htm) BIO SENSORS with publicly accessible ""impersonal"" health BIG DATA server depending on the budget. We would think about more creative perks, a proper business plan and a better pitch video as and when we procure more funds and suggestions and an organized 'well paid' team. Please share this link as widely as possible and also suggest improvements. Thank you for your time and interest.

Regards,
Bharath.

PS
Special Note for Mums who want to use it to monitor their kids.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Say in the age range 0-12 years when privacy is of not much concern, mothers can use this device to remotely monitor the location and activity of their kids by switching on the audio-video transmission system on demand, whenever, wherever. Or even establish a two way voice communication without the kid needing to press any button or handle any device. Or simply listen to the ambient voices using the ambient microphone. The kids can also establish a two way communication by switching on a button or by simply making some voice gestures like ""call mom"" (in their respective languages). Remotely track the wearer using the GPS and the geo-referenced public CCTV/Camera systems. Keep track of the kids eating, breathing and drinking (even smoking!) habits through the throat sounds. The throat microphones are very sensitive and can pick up many other voice signatures than beyond what is spoken. They can pick up distress signal even from the unspoken sounds of pain, detect crying, gagging, wheezing, yelling and such other abnormal sound pattern or detect patterns peculiar (or unique) to the person under different circumstances even if they do not or can not speak well and notify the guardians. It can also track the breathing pattern to a certain extent. The external pressure and temperature sensors can detect if there is any fire accident or drowning and rise an alarm (i.e. notify the guardians on their phones). The throat microphone works reliably well in highly noisy environment as proven by the military grade tactical throat microphones. Also this device can be used to enhance the spoken language skills of the wearer by tracking their speech pattern in realtime. And this device will be very handy in lecture halls for giving individualised attention to the wearer. When we get to the prototype phase we will be able to show all these functionalities and a bit more if possible....

The throat microphone works reliably well in highly noisy environment as proven by the military grade tactical throat microphones. Also this device can be used to enhance the spoken language skills of the wearer by tracking their speech pattern in realtime. And this device will be very handy in lecture halls for giving individualised attention to the wearer. When we get to the prototype phase we will be able to show all these functionalities and a bit more if possible....",0.0,0,"5 Campaigns

Fin Robotics becomes neyya on Nov 17, 2015! 

You maybe wondering what happened to Fin Robotics ? Well the exciting news is that Fin has become something bigger, better and even more exciting as we've rebranded the company.

So please welcome 'neyya' - a brand new smart ring from an exciting new consumer electronics company.

We have taken the Fin ring and in neyya made it even more useful, even more stylish and even more fun.

So if you want to find out more about neyya, please check the following places:

Website - www.myneyya.com

Facebook - hopefully www.facebook.com/myneyya

Twitter - www.twitter.com/MyNeyya

Thanks once again to all our Indiegogo backers. If you were impressed by Fin, just wait until you see neyya!

>We were working on Touchless Technology devices for over more than 8 months from the initial stage of the company. We had developed a couple of products called Tryara, a virtual tool where you can try out jewelry without even touching them, Ferne Player- a Blackberry store app by which you can control the music player of your smartphone touch-less. After these products we always felt some factor missing in the technology itself.and it was the interaction mode. We stood in customer shoes and found its most suitable when you can actually feel it very close to you. That's how Fin was evolved. Fin removes all the stress and strain required while interacting with touchless devices.Your palm is your control.

Fin is a tiny hardware product that you can

column1: wear on your thumb as a ring and it will make your whole palm as a gesture

we can connect to three different digital gadgets like Smartphones, Smart
TVs, Automobiles, and Home automation devices providing multiple device
compatibility. Fin reads different gestures from your palm and its

corresponding values control connected devices.

THANK YOU FOR HELPING US REACH OUR GOAL! TYMPANI WILL CONTINUE TO BE HALF OFF FOR THE REMAINDER OF OUR INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN.
WHAT ARE PEDIATRICIANS SAYING?
column5: >""Technology is changing how I am able to care for my patients, in and

column1: out of the office.  I encourage my patients to track their health and I
have been looking for better apps and tools to use at our Pediatric
practice. Tympani is a great example of a Smart device that will

accurately document and record information between Dr. visits.""

-Dr. Daniel Selig


A THERMOMETER FOR EVERYONE

Temperature is your body’s red-flag. A warning system for when you are not well. The thermometer is the first line of defense when you or your children are sick. Every parent needs one, and the carrying case included with Tympani makes it perfect for on-the-go.

column6: ><b>Tympani was developed out of a need for an alternative to traditional thermometers
column7: one that was less invasive, more accurate, and worked for everyone from infants to seniors.  Tympani addresses all of these needs! As an Infra-Red In-Ear thermometer, there is no more holding it in your little one's mouth and waiting for 30 seconds to get their temperature. Tympani is compact and gives you an accurate temperature reading in 2 seconds!
column9: />

column4: >Tympani and its Companion App allow you to track and monitor each member of your family's temperature readings.  It is safe for anyone to use, from infants to seniors!
>Tympani comes with a carrying case, and was designed to be compact enhancing its durability. No matter where life takes you, Tympani easily fits into any sized pocket.

>Tympani has a soft, rubber tip that not only ensures comfort, but keeps you from entering the device too far into the ear which can lead to damage. Tympani has be extensively beta tested, and from the data and feedback collected, the units we ship to you will have the most accurate and consistent readings possible.

>If your little one wakes up sick in the middle of the night and you worry about whether you should make the drive to Urgent Care,  you can call up a Dr. virtually using telemedicine and share with them your little one’s temperature readings live and from the comfort of your own home.

>Do you have an ailment that requires you to check your vitals on a regular basis? Through our Companion App, you can designate a Caregiver who will receive notifications if you forget to take your temperature for the day. They in turn will be able to remind you to complete that task.

>Tympani is a CE-certified Class 2 Medical Device, meeting all required technical and calibration standards. Your Tympani is also fully covered by a 12-month warranty. Within that first year, if it quits working or you experience issues that cannot be fixed by troubleshooting, we will send you a new one free of charge!
>Don't Want To Wait For Your Tympani?

>We have several Tympani produced and ready to go! If you absolutely cannot wait, choose our ""Get It Now"" perk for $49 and you will have it shipped within 3 weeks of your contribution! Please note, you will be using the Beta version of our App with this perk. We will notify you once the new version is available for download!

column1:
Team

We are an international team with product development and engineering in Taipei, Taiwan and Marketing, Sales and Operations in Columbus, Ohio.  Our Company is Caring Things and our first product is Tympani!

column3:
> Founder / Inventor / Engineer

""I invented Tympani because regular thermometers were impossible to use with my son.  We needed a thermometer that traveled with us too.  Body temperature is an important indicator of our health so I started with a thermometer as our first home healthcare product.""

column1: ""I want to make devices that tell us something useful about how we live and how we can live better.  My contribution to Tympani is team building, marketing, and resources from ContentVia.""

Todd Leveque - Product Manager

""Tympani really is the perfect device. Not only is it a useful tool to help track and monitor you and your family's health, it's also fast and accurate! So it saves me time, money, helps me stay healthy, AND it's affordable?! Tympani is a must have!""

Tympani is the first product introduced by Caring Things.  We are a health tech startup that is developing affordable home healthcare devices that work with your smart phone.  Caring Things was founded by Lee and Ryan Our vision of the future includes expanded home healthcare that connects virtual doctors with smart devices that monitor, track, and describe your wellness.  The Caring Things team includes software developers, UI/UX designers, social media specialists, our super sales team,

column4:
/>

To learn more about Caring Things and sign up to beta test future devices, visit www.CaringThings.com.
>NOPE! Tympani is powered once you plug it into you iPhone or Android device.

column1: What is the MSRP/selling price of Tympani?

column4: >Once Tympani launches we plan to sell at the retail price of $35USD.
>You’ll receive a cord to connect with your smart device, a portable carrying case, and, of course, a Tympani!

column1: Are there any risks with using Tympani?

column4: >Digital ear thermometers provide some of the most accurate readings among thermometers and are less invasive than oral and rectal thermometers. In addition, Tympani’s shell is designed to prevent over-insertion into the ear, preventing both discomfort and damage.

column1: What are some of the features of the app?

column4: >Users will be able to connect with Tympani and take accurate readings in under 2 seconds. In addition, users who create an account will be able to add family members to the app and keep track of temperatures, symptoms, and medical history for the whole family in the specialized “journal” function.

column1: Is this safe to use with children?

column4: >Absolutely. We recommend that you supervise young children wanting to take their own temperature. And NEVER force the device into an ear.

column1: Are there any existing reviews of the Tympani?

column4: >Check out our blog post here to see what beta testers have been saying about Tympani. (SPOILER ALERT: they love it!)

column1: Is Tympani used only for body temperature?

column4: >In addition to body temperature, Tympani can also take the temperature of liquids such as baby formula and bath water.

column1: What do I get if I choose Get It Now?

• You will receive a Tympani, carrying case, and extension cable. The App that you will use is a Beta version, and not final. We will notify you once the Full Version is ready for Download. This will most likely be post campaign.

column2: >For further questions please email us: Hi@tympani.com or submit questions

column1: Conducting self-diagnosis and/or treatment based on measurement results can be dangerous. Be sure to follow the instruction of your doctor.
Do not touch or breath on the infrared sensor.  If the sensor becomes dirty, follow the care and cleaning instructions within the packaging to clean it.
Do not use any accessory from a third party manufacturer
If the ear is cold due to being exposed to cold temperatures for a long period, wait until the ear is warmed up to measure.
Store unit out of children’s reach.  Children may try to measure by themselves and cause damage to the ear.  If a child accidentally swallows a thermometer or its parts, immediately consult a doctor.
If there is a difference in temperature between the place you are going and the place where the unit is stored, leave unit in the room for 30 minutes prior to measuring.
This thermometer is intended for household use only.
Children must be supervised by an adult when using the device to prevent potential ear damage.

have been looking for better apps and tools to use at our Pediatric
practice. Tympani is a great example of a Smart device that will

The thermometer is the first line of defense when you or your children are sick. Every parent needs one, and the carrying case included with Tympani makes it perfect for on-the-go.
Tympani was developed out of a need for an alternative to traditional thermometers
column2: one that was less invasive, more accurate, and worked for everyone from infants to seniors.  Tympani addresses all of these needs! As an Infra-Red In-Ear thermometer, there is no more holding it in your little one's mouth and waiting for 30 seconds to get their temperature. Tympani is compact and gives you an accurate temperature reading in 2 seconds!

column1: Perfect for Families and All Ages
Tympani and its Companion App allow you to track and monitor each member of your family's temperature readings.  It is safe for anyone to use, from infants to seniors!
Tympani comes with a carrying case, and was designed to be compact enhancing its durability. No matter where life takes you, Tympani easily fits into any sized pocket.

Tympani has a soft, rubber tip that not only ensures comfort, but keeps you from entering the device too far into the ear which can lead to damage. Tympani has be extensively beta tested, and from the data and feedback collected, the units we ship to you will have the most accurate and consistent readings possible.

If your little one wakes up sick in the middle of the night and you worry about whether you should make the drive to Urgent Care,  you can call up a Dr. virtually using telemedicine and share with them your little one’s temperature readings live and from the comfort of your own home.

Do you have an ailment that requires you to check your vitals on a regular basis? Through our Companion App, you can designate a Caregiver who will receive notifications if you forget to take your temperature for the day. They in turn will be able to remind you to complete that task.

Tympani is a CE-certified Class 2 Medical Device, meeting all required technical and calibration standards. Your Tympani is also fully covered by a 12-month warranty. Within that first year, if it quits working or you experience issues that cannot be fixed by troubleshooting, we will send you a new one free of charge!
Don't Want To Wait For Your Tympani?

We have several Tympani produced and ready to go! If you absolutely cannot wait, choose our ""Get It Now"" perk for $49 and you will have it shipped within 3 weeks of your contribution! Please note, you will be using the Beta version of our App with this perk. We will notify you once the new version is available for download!

TeamWe are an international team with product development and engineering in Taipei, Taiwan and Marketing, Sales and Operations in Columbus, Ohio.  Our Company is Caring Things and our first product is Tympani!

Lee Wang - Founder / Inventor / Engineer""I invented Tympani because regular thermometers were impossible to use with my son.  We needed a thermometer that traveled with us too.  Body temperature is an important indicator of our health so I started with a thermometer as our first home healthcare product.""
I want to make devices that tell us something useful about how we live and how we can live better.  My contribution to Tympani is team building, marketing, and resources from ContentVia.""

Todd Leveque - Product Manager""Tympani really is the perfect device. Not only is it a useful tool to help track and monitor you and your family's health, it's also fast and accurate! So it saves me time, money, helps me stay healthy, AND it's affordable?! Tympani is a must have!""

Tympani is the first product introduced by Caring Things.  We are a health tech startup that is developing affordable home healthcare devices that work with your smart phone.  Caring Things was founded by Lee and Ryan Our vision of the future includes expanded home healthcare that connects virtual doctors with smart devices that monitor, track, and describe your wellness.  The Caring Things team includes software developers, UI/UX designers, social media specialists, our super sales team,
To learn more about Caring Things and sign up to beta test future devices, visit www.CaringThings.com.
NOPE! Tympani is powered once you plug it into you iPhone or Android device.
What is the MSRP/selling price of Tympani?
Once Tympani launches we plan to sell at the retail price of $35USD.
What is included with my Tympani?
You’ll receive a cord to connect with your smart device, a portable carrying case, and, of course, a Tympani!
Are there any risks with using Tympani?

Digital ear thermometers provide some of the most accurate readings among thermometers and are less invasive than oral and rectal thermometers. In addition, Tympani’s shell is designed to prevent over-insertion into the ear, preventing both discomfort and damage.
What are some of the features of the app?

Users will be able to connect with Tympani and take accurate readings in under 2 seconds. In addition, users who create an account will be able to add family members to the app and keep track of temperatures, symptoms, and medical history for the whole family in the specialized “journal” function.
Is this safe to use with children?
Absolutely. We recommend that you supervise young children wanting to take their own temperature. And NEVER force the device into an ear.
Are there any existing reviews of the Tympani?
Check out our blog post here to see what beta testers have been saying about Tympani. (SPOILER ALERT: they love it!)
Is Tympani used only for body temperature?
In addition to body temperature, Tympani can also take the temperature of liquids such as baby formula and bath water.
What do I get if I choose Get It Now?

You will receive a Tympani, carrying case, and extension cable. The App that you will use is a Beta version, and not final. We will notify you once the Full Version is ready for Download. This will most likely be post campaign.
For further questions please email us: Hi@tympani.com or submit questions here
Conducting self-diagnosis and/or treatment based on measurement results can be dangerous. Be sure to follow the instruction of your doctor.
Do not touch or breath on the infrared sensor.  If the sensor becomes dirty, follow the care and cleaning instructions within the packaging to clean it.
Do not use any accessory from a third party manufacturer
If the ear is cold due to being exposed to cold temperatures for a long period, wait until the ear is warmed up to measure.
Store unit out of children’s reach.  Children may try to measure by themselves and cause damage to the ear.  If a child accidentally swallows a thermometer or its parts, immediately consult a doctor.
If there is a difference in temperature between the place you are going and the place where the unit is stored, leave unit in the room for 30 minutes prior to measuring.
This thermometer is intended for household use only.
Children must be supervised by an adult when using the device to prevent potential ear damage.",18.0,1,"8 Campaigns

column6:
/>

Puracoat is a remarkable leap in nanotechnology. It is a fluid

column1: that can be applied across the surface of the entire mobile device, including
overtop a touch screen, that will protect your device against scratches and
water damage while sacrificing none of the appearance or functionality of your
display. Puracoat is undetectable by the naked eye and is synthesized to be
next only to gemstones in hardness. It is also substance tough, suitable for

those who must retain their particular unit’s sanitization.

Say goodbye to sticky plastic screen protectors, which
can trap air bubbles on your display and cause your touchscreen to respond
inaccurately. With Puracoat, you can protect your entire device with one
permanent application (only removable via polishing) and never have any of
these issues. Puracoat is also water resistant, anti-static, anti-bacterial,
weather resilient, and helps repel dust and staining. It even improves the

quality of the display screen.


We originally developed this technology for high-rise building
glass, but quickly realized its other applications for the casual consumer.
This technology was very expensive, but we endeavoured to create a variant that
is affordable and easy to use, while still retaining its quality. The result is
Puracoat will be produced in liquid form and packaged in small
bottles. After opening a bottle of Puracoat, its life is 18 months. Puracoat is
nontoxic and hazard-free, and has been tested on many different devices to

ensure that its effects work on all types of devices and device screens.

The nanotechnology used to create Puracoat is expected to be
found in most touchscreen displays in the future. Puracoat is ahead of the
curve and is able to offer these benefits to devices on the current market and
Puracoat has also been tested on device speakers, and is found
to have no influence whatsoever on the effectiveness of finely-tuned acoustic
We want to put this incredible technology out there and
available for purchase. By donating a certain amount as outlined on the right,
you can have your own bottle of Puracoat to use on your devices.
column4: >Even if you cannot fund us at this time, we encourage you to

column1: share our campaign with the tools found below. If someone you know has a device
they need to protect permanently and completely, consider letting them know
about this project and what it can do for them.
column4:
>

1) What is the capacity of 1 Puracoat?

5ml per bottle.


2) How many mobile phones can be coated from 1 bottle of Puracoat?

1 bottle can be coated up to 4 smart Phones or an iPad with a consistent maintenance or re-coating every 3 months for a year or more depending on the usage.


3) How long does the the Puracoat effect last?

Puracoat for normal usage can last up to a year. However, it is advisable to re-coat once every 3 - 6 months to ensure tip top protection.


4) shipping fee for multiple perks?

1 shipping address requires a shipping fee of $5, unless is stated free shipping.


5) How to add the shipping fees?

You may select the ""forget shipping"" perk. Otherwise, just top up an additional $5 on top of the perk amount.


6) When will you possibly ship the first batch?

When we achieving the first 250 bottles of order on Puracoat. We will immediate arrange the posting and packaging. We experted able to complete the packaging and shipment in a week later.


7) Does it affect the TouchID on iPhone 5s?

No. it will not block the performance on the Touch ID sensor or even the performance of the Touch Screen.


8) Can the device be submerged if the product is applied correctly?

No, Water will only flow pass the device. If we submerged the device, the water pressure will force the water into device because every different device have different hole.


9) Can it apply for glasses with plastic lens?

Yes, it can apply to glasses with plastic lens. But some of the lens are come with existing coating, it may affect the existing coating of the lens.

Final Hours!!!

If you've been holding back, you're about to miss your chance. During our campaign we have hit a number of milestones and beyond what was originally promised, the following upgrades are already promised:
• Free filament for everyone. Explorer versions get one roll. Professional and Evil Scientist versions get 2 rolls
• Carbon Fiber arms - The rods that control the effector are all carbon fiber now
• All versions get Kysan stepper motors - yes, everyone gets Kysan motors
• Evil Scientists versions get free dampers for the motors

• You will get to add upgrades to your kit before it ships. If you don't want everything but (for example) wanted to add an LCD or Heated Bed, you get the chance to do so at a significantly reduced rate
• Everyone who backs us get 5USD off on MakerLibre filament that they add to their printer.....
• Our frames are all 100% openbeam usa frames. Also, everyone gets the choice to upgrade their frames to black.
• If we hit $45K as our stretch goal, everyone who gets an LCD controller will get a free SD card!!!!

---- now back to our story ---

Welcome back to the new and improved MakerLibre 3D Printer project page. We learned a lot from our last kickstarter and really thought about how to make a reliable, cost-effective 3D printer for the masses and we think we have the solution you've been seeking.
column2: >
column3:
>

The Kossel-Mini printer is a wonderful, high-quality printer design that has a hundreds of users worldwide and a huge user community. We chose to offer a Kossel-Mini rather than a new design because one of the most common problems faced by new users is where to get support when something goes wrong. If you need a part replaced or if you find a bug, it's best to have some help from people besides the manufacturer. While the Kossel-Mini has many advantages, we want to provide the following enhancements as part of this offering:

column1: We will only ship with the highest quality parts. There are so many options for things such as hotends, controllers, motors, switches and other components. We have the experience necessary to find the best components rather than the cheap knockoffs from overseas. For example, we will not use cheap hotend knockoffs... your hotend will come from hotends.com For the upgraded kits, the stepper motors will come from Kysan and the controller board will be Panucatt Azteeg X5 mini controller.
We will start shipping in September 2014. Most kickstarters that we see have long leadtimes before delivery. We have existing relationships and will begin shipping kits almost immediately.

We will document every aspect of building and tuning these marvelous printers. One of the most common complaints about delta printers (and repraps in general) is that the documents are so hard to find. Every printer can have dozens of variants with little differences that can be hard to spot in the beginning. Every single printer that comes from this kickstarter will use the same parts and we will be able to tell you exactly what to do. All of the documents will come from us as either YouTube videos or blog entries (with photos) that we will save as a PDF on git (so that it will always be around). You won't have to search for anything.

So, what is a Kossel-Mini?
    The Kossel-Mini is a delta 3D printer with the following design goals:
• Speed: 320mm/s in X, Y and Z directions.

column2:
>

We are using the standard Bill of Materials (BOM) including printed parts. The main reason for this is that you should be able to get replacement parts from anywhere and not be tied to any particular manufacturer. You should also be able to do upgrades later when improvements become available or if you discover your own preferences that differ from our design.

Why a Kossel-Mini?  

There are many printers to compare to the Kossel-Mini, but one of the most popular commercial printers today is the Replicator 5th generation:
column3:
>

How good is a Kossel-Mini?  

Here are a few samples to let you see the quality of this printer.
column4: >
column5: >
column6: >
column7: >
column8: >
column9:
>

 Upgrades

The Explorer Version of the Kossel-Mini is a reliable, full-featured printer. For advanced users, a number of different upgrades are available through the Professional and Evil-Scientist versions of the kit
column10: >
column11: >
column12: >
column13:
>

 Rewards
column14:
>

 Shipping

The MakerLibre Kossel-Mini 3D Printer will ship anywhere in the world. Once the kits are ready to ship, we will publish the shipping costs for you to pay. We will provide all shipping details so that you know we aren't marking up the shipping in any way.

Assembly

You will receive a complete kit and can assemble it yourself using the complete instructions that we will publish. If you prefer, we can assemble your printer for you for an additional charge. Once the kits are ready for shipping, you can contact us for estimates and lead times.

Risks and Challenges

* Components could take longer than expected to reach us for packing and assembly - As part of contacting the manufacturers, I verified their lead times. If the manufacturers hold to these quotes, this risk will be minimized. However, some parts will be imported and the delays at customs cannot be guaranteed. Therefore, I have added some time to the delivery schedule to accommodate a reasonable customs delay. 
* Component flaws could cause a supply chain disruption - If the parts we get from manufacturers do not meet our standards, they would need to be sent back to the factory. This can cause a work stoppage and delays. We are mitigating this by ordering standard parts from reputable manufacturers. 
* Excitement could be greater than we anticipated. - We sized our deliveries for a limited run so that everyone would be happy and we would meet our deadlines. If we are wildly successful, we may exceed some of our vendors lead times and there could be delays. Also, our shop can produce a limited set of parts per day. We would mitigate this by expanding our production capacity or alternatively having some of the kits injection molded. Furthermore, we could source some parts from alternate vendors as long as the products are identical. Finally, we will ship items as they are done so the first contributors would get the first kits and so forth until everyone is taken care of

Speed: 320mm/s in X, Y and Z directions.

The standard Kossel-Mini with optional Viki controllerWe are using the standard Bill of Materials (BOM) including printed parts. The main reason for this is that you should be able to get replacement parts from anywhere and not be tied to any particular manufacturer. You should also be able to do upgrades later when improvements become available or if you discover your own preferences that differ from our design.Why a Kossel-Mini?  There are many printers to compare to the Kossel-Mini, but one of the most popular commercial printers today is the Replicator 5th generation:The Kossel-Mini compares favorably to the ReplicatorHow good is a Kossel-Mini?  Here are a few samples to let you see the quality of this printer.The Kossel-Mini can print with a variety of materials including Laywood (left), PLA (center) and Laybrick (right)One of these parts were printed on a Kossel-Mini and the other was printed on a Replicator. There is no distinguishable differenceA number of different useful objects can be printed on the Kossel-MiniThe Kossel-Mini is excellent at printing precision parts as well... such as gears and other mechanical partsThe Kossel-Mini supports the fine detail needed to make beautiful decorative prints.With Vapor Smoothing, your prints can look injection molded. Both parts were printed with 200 micron resolution, but the cat on the right was vapor treated for 15 minutes. We love printing in ABS for just this reason. UpgradesThe Explorer Version of the Kossel-Mini is a reliable, full-featured printer. For advanced users, a number of different upgrades are available through the Professional and Evil-Scientist versions of the kitThe Azteeg X5 32 bit integrated controllerThe mini-Viki LCD controller (for Evil Scientist Versions only)The heated bed is required to print ABS (Evil Scientist Version only)imagine this masterpiece in your evil-scientist lair. Rewards ShippingThe MakerLibre Kossel-Mini 3D Printer will ship anywhere in the world. column2:
>

HOW TO GET A FREE STAGE5 DOCK:

column4: >You have to be logged in to your Indiegogo account.
>Use any of the share buttons below the campaign video or copy and share the link in the browser address bar. If anyone contributes to our campaign by using your link, you get one point.

>After campaign ends, we will select 20 of the top referrers and award them with one STAGE5 dock in a color of their choice, so if at least two of your friends contribute- you could get a free STAGE5 dock. If five friends contribute- definitely a sealed deal, you are getting a free STAGE5 dock.

column3:
>

Stage5 is a multifunctional dock, which supports most of the smartphones and tablets out there - all iPhones, iPads and any smartphone or tablet with a standard Micro USB port. In addition, you can listen to the music by connecting it to any other Bluetooth enabled device that plays music. Stage5 takes advantage of vibration speaker technology making any resonant surface into a high quality surface speaker which envelops the listener in immersive sound. Stage5 can be used for charging your device even if away from power supply.
column4: >
column5: >Designed to fit tablets and bigger size smartphones. Tablet dock works also with regular size smartphones.

column4:
>

• Made of aviation grade aluminum

• Size 100mm x 90mm x 40mm

• Weight ~400-600g

• Vibration speaker 10W RMS or 20W RMS

• Bluetooth 4.0

• Touch sensitive power button

• Battery 2000mAh (3200mAh upgrade optional)

• Replaceable connector tips

• Fits all iPhone, iPad models, other smartphones and tablets (connector                bottom center)

• AC/DC Power converter 100-240V to 5V 3.1A

• Standard Micro USB cable
column7:

Stage5 control application adds functionality and makes Stage5 Dock even more fun and easy to use. App will be available for iOS/Android/Windows Phone.
column8:
>

App’s features include:

column1: • Advanced features – including but not limited to auto connection, standby settings
• Notifications - select the applications that are allowed to use vibration speaker for alert sounds.

• Battery - shows battery charge status and allows setting at what percentage a low battery warning is displayed. Using APP you can switch between using battery for speaker and charging phone from battery (Please note, battery mainly is used for powering speaker and you may not get a full charge when charging a high capacity smartphone battery).
• Profile - lets you save and load specific settings for different devices.
• Equalizer - allows improving the sound by tuning different frequencies

column4:
>

Stage5 is made from aviation grade aluminum and it will be available in a variety of colors(clear coated glossy or bead blasted, anodized matte finish), so you can pick your favorite.
column5:
>

The bottom side of the dock is made of micro suction rubber – it allows vibration speaker to transfer sound with greater efficiency. It also ensures that dock does not move when undocking your device.
column6:
>

Micro suction rubber sticks to surfaces, but it won’t leave any residue when removed.
column7:
>

The angle of the dock makes it convenient for video calls and skyping.
column8:
>

You do not have to worry about changing the dock once you upgrade to different device as we offer a dock with multiple charger tips.
column9:
>

It will also come in handy in case you charge various smartphones and tablets.
column10:
>

Currently Stage5 will be available with replaceable connector types (Micro USB, Apple 30-pin and Lightning, Asus 40-pin, Samsung 30-pin). Apple connectors will be MFi certified.
