","HOW TO GET A FREE STAGE5 DOCK:

column1: You have to be logged in to your Indiegogo account.
Use any of the share buttons below the campaign video or copy and share the link in the browser address bar. If anyone contributes to our campaign by using your link, you get one point.

After campaign ends, we will select 20 of the top referrers and award them with one STAGE5 dock in a color of their choice, so if at least two of your friends contribute- you could get a free STAGE5 dock. If five friends contribute- definitely a sealed deal, you are getting a free STAGE5 dock.

Stage5 is a multifunctional dock, which supports most of the smartphones and tablets out there - all iPhones, iPads and any smartphone or tablet with a standard Micro USB port. In addition, you can listen to the music by connecting it to any other Bluetooth enabled device that plays music. Stage5 takes advantage of vibration speaker technology making any resonant surface into a high quality surface speaker which envelops the listener in immersive sound. Stage5 can be used for charging your device even if away from power supply.Designed to fit tablets and bigger size smartphones. Tablet dock works also with regular size smartphones.

•	Made of aviation grade aluminum•	Size 100mm x 90mm x 40mm•	Weight ~400-600g•	Vibration speaker 10W RMS or 20W RMS•	Bluetooth 4.0•	Touch sensitive power button• Battery 2000mAh (3200mAh upgrade optional)•	Replaceable connector tips•	Fits all iPhone, iPad models, other smartphones and tablets (connector                bottom center)•	AC/DC Power converter 100-240V to 5V 3.1A•	Standard Micro USB cable Stage5 control application adds functionality and makes Stage5 Dock even more fun and easy to use. App will be available for iOS/Android/Windows Phone.App’s features include:
Advanced features – including but not limited to auto connection, standby settings
Notifications - select the applications that are allowed to use vibration speaker for alert sounds.

Battery - shows battery charge status and allows setting at what percentage a low battery warning is displayed. Using APP you can switch between using battery for speaker and charging phone from battery (Please note, battery mainly is used for powering speaker and you may not get a full charge when charging a high capacity smartphone battery).
Profile - lets you save and load specific settings for different devices.
Equalizer - allows improving the sound by tuning different frequencies

Stage5 is made from aviation grade aluminum and it will be available in a variety of colors(clear coated glossy or bead blasted, anodized matte finish), so you can pick your favorite.The bottom side of the dock is made of micro suction rubber – it allows vibration speaker to transfer sound with greater efficiency. It also ensures that dock does not move when undocking your device. Micro suction rubber sticks to surfaces, but it won’t leave any residue when removed. The angle of the dock makes it convenient for video calls and skyping. You do not have to worry about changing the dock once you upgrade to different device as we offer a dock with multiple charger tips. It will also come in handy in case you charge various smartphones and tablets.Currently Stage5 will be available with replaceable connector types (Micro USB, Apple 30-pin and Lightning, Asus 40-pin, Samsung 30-pin). Apple connectors will be MFi certified.Vibration speaker will reveal you new and unforgettable way of listening to the music by using the surface as a speaker. Due to the output of powerful micro vibrations, Stage5 transducer energizes large areas of surfaces generating sound around the entire surface.Traditional speaker sends sound waves in a certain directionStage5 vibration transducer uses the whole surface as a speakerEvery time you change the surface, you will get a new and unique sound. It sounds equally well on wood, metal, glass, tiles and other resonant surfaces. The micro suction rubber on the bottom will not let it scratch the surface.Stage5 is equipped with low energy Bluetooth technology. You can sync it with any smartphone, tablet or Bluetooth enabled music player. It will allow for a smooth connection and the next time you use it, the link with your device will be established automatically.Stage5 can also be used when away from power supply – just put on your favourite song and place it anywhere in the room. You don’t have to worry about finding an electricity cable as Stage5 has a built-in battery allowing you to enjoy up to 3 hours of music without plugging it in. And battery can be used to charge your device as well.Stage5 is a perfect fit for your phone or tablet – docking and undocking is simple and easy. It doesn't matter if your phone has a case/cover – it will fit equally well.Stage5 has been designed with passion and
engineered with precision. Developed by an experienced team of members based in
London. At Rocket Sound Systems our product design goal is not just to be
different, but to make a real difference to the life of an everyday Stage5
user. This meant developing design specs., functions, hardware and software

from the ground up. Stage5 dock has been in development for over a year and our team has invested a lot of time and effort, as well as money, in this unique product.Currently we have made a couple of 3D printed and CNC machined prototypes and we do feel that we have found the best acoustic shape for the dock to provide an outstanding sound.June 2014

We are about to go into production and want to raise as much capital as possible in order to do a large production run.  Your perks will go into tooling, assembly and packaging.We set our project goal so low and have chosen flexible funding, because we already have other sources of funding at our disposal.If you are a backer of our project you will receive your reward regardless if the project gets successfuly funded or not.",40.0,1,"1 Campaign

column7:
>Who is Red Harbinger?

We are a veteran owned and operated group of guys from all over the

column1: world who are very passionate about breaking the limits of what is currently
offered in the computer case market.
Most people who have heard of us know us from the Cross Desk, a full
computer desk that doubles as a dual PC case with ample room for liquid cooling
systems, 2 full pc setups, and more storage than most people will ever use in
their lifetime - all wrapped in a killer looking design.  We are a small company that thinks very large
scale.  We have been fortunate enough to see a lot of traction with our designs in the past few
months with HGTV and the DIY Channel and sites like PCWorld, Maximum PC,
and PC Gamer taking interest in the versatility of our designs.  We constantly strive to break the

mold with our PC designs - and we'd love your help!

What is Dopamine?
column2: >In short - Dopamine is the world's first actual computer case designed specifically with mining in mind.  As a happy byproduct of its design, it works just as well for extreme gaming setups and test bench purposes!
column4: >In the past couple of years cryptocurrency mining has exploded. Today

column1: there are numerous types of mining that are suitable for everyone from average PC users with a decent computer to massive companies with server farms
Litecoin, Dogecoin and many others have been in the headlines for what seems
like an eternity now - but surprisingly not a single reputable PC case company
has come to the table with dedicated cases that have been optimized and
tailored for mining - and those few ""cases"" (mostly cobbled together
using a complex and confusing series of metal rods) that do exist are extremely expensive for what you receive, difficult
to assemble, and the majority of them are a complete eyesore.  Because of the cost vs. value of what is
currently on the market, some people have even gone so far as to use modified

milk crates and clothing racks to house their mining rigs.  Dopamine aims to solve this problem.

Features include:
• High Quality Materials and Construction - Manufactured in the USA.
• Spaced Expansion Slots - allow for airflow around GPUs to assist in cooling
• Multiple Form Factor Support - supports mini-ITX, micro-ATX, ATX, and extended ATX motherboards
• Dual Power Supply Support - compatible with all standard ATX power supplies
• Triple 120/140mm Fan Support - provide airflow allowing for assistive ambient cooling
• Built-in PSU Shroud - hide unneeded PSU cables allowing for increased airflow and aesthetics
• Built-in Cable Management - allows only the cables you need to be seen and connected
• Stackable Design - cases are scalable and can be easily stacked to fit any desired mining setup.
• HDD/SSD support - compatible with all standard 2.5"" and 3.5"" drives.

No clue what this cryptocurrency mining is all about?  No Problem!

As hard as it is for us to believe sometimes, we realize that there is still a significant number of people who know very little about this subject aside from what they may have seen in news headlines.  We won't get into the myriad of benefits that cryptocurrency mining provides here, but we will say - regardless of whether you buy Dopamine or not, we'd suggest doing a bit of research on the topic to familiarize yourself if you haven't.  A bit of education is never a bad thing right?  And these days, it's very easy for an average PC user to dive right into mining and start reaping the benefits.

While Dopamine was designed with scalable mining systems in mind, versatility is always a key component of Red Harbinger's cases.  With that in mind, this case can also easily be built into an open air gaming
column2: >PC, a test bench for hardware testing, or any other type of PC that you can think of.  Easy access to core components makes upgrading and adding parts a breeze.
column5:
what you get:

In order to proceed and be successful with this product, we have to hit an acceptable price point in manufacturing so that we can offer a fair price for the quality of goods that you'll recieve.  With low
column6:
>production quantities, the price per unit increases. So, like every other product, more = better.

As early adopters, your contributions will come at a lower-than-retail cost, and your investment will go into packaging, printing, hardware (nuts, bolts, screws, switches, grommets, etc), powder coating,
column7: >manufacturing, assembly, shipping parts, tooling fees, designer costs, advertising, and distribution.
column9: >To keep things interesting, we've gathered a bit of help from some of our friends and have lined up some pretty sweet rewards, including:

column1: • A chance to hang out with the Red Harbinger crew and our friends Vanilla Ice and 3x UFC World Champion Jens Pulver while filming and live streaming the release announcement of our next product
• Fully loaded turnkey Dopamine systems that are ready to be plugged in and start mining
• Special forum access on the Red Harbinger website
• Access to Red Harbinger's team and products - see our products in the development stage before they are publicly announced - voice your opinions throughout the design process
• Early access and options to purchase all future Limited Edition products before the general public

By supporting Red Harbinger's Dopamine case, you are directly and indirectly assisting the mining community's growth.

Your
contribution also assists the evolution of function into function and form
more milk crate Franken-cases or strictly utilitarian and less functional
that “did the job” and glittery blinged out Myspace pages, we'd like those to
be a thing of the past.<span style=""line-height: 1.45em
Red Harbinger is a small team -  we know what we are doing.  We are everyday folks with traditional jobs,
the same as all of you - but we have the experience of globally releasing the
most complex PC case ever designed (The Cross Desk).  With only 5 employees, we have managed to
amass customers in Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, UK, Canada, Mexico,
United States, Netherlands, Sweden, Singapore, and Korea and a global community
following that is MUCH larger.  We want
to continue this trend by getting fresh ideas to market - and only YOU can help

us achieve this. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Without a doubt, Red Harbinger was built by the Internet Community at large sharing our designs, ideas, and love of taking something PC cases to the extreme.  Even if
you can't assist financially, we would LOVE to have you help our cause by
sharing this project on your social media pages.
By sharing, you are helping a group of everyday people do our part to
continue ending routine and boring ideas.
awesome - and we would really appreciate just a quick shout out to your friends
and family to show them that a veteran based company is doing their part to

make some waves.

world who are very passionate about breaking the limits of what is currently
offered in the computer case market.
Most people who have heard of us know us from the Cross Desk, a full
computer desk that doubles as a dual PC case with ample room for liquid cooling
systems, 2 full pc setups, and more storage than most people will ever use in

and PC Gamer taking interest in the versatility of our designs.  We constantly strive to break the

mold with our PC designs - and we'd love your help!What is Dopamine?In short - Dopamine is the world's first actual computer case designed specifically with mining in mind.  As a happy byproduct of its design, it works just as well for extreme gaming setups and test bench purposes! In the past couple of years cryptocurrency mining has exploded. Today
there are numerous types of mining that are suitable for everyone from average PC users with a decent computer to massive companies with server farms
Litecoin, Dogecoin and many others have been in the headlines for what seems
like an eternity now - but surprisingly not a single reputable PC case company
has come to the table with dedicated cases that have been optimized and
tailored for mining - and those few ""cases"" (mostly cobbled together
using a complex and confusing series of metal rods) that do exist are extremely expensive for what you receive, difficult
to assemble, and the majority of them are a complete eyesore.  Because of the cost vs. value of what is
currently on the market, some people have even gone so far as to use modified
milk crates and clothing racks to house their mining rigs.  Dopamine aims to solve this problem.Features include:
High Quality Materials and Construction - Manufactured in the USA.
Multi GPU Support - 6 GPU expansion slots
Spaced Expansion Slots - allow for airflow around GPUs to assist in cooling
Multiple Form Factor Support - supports mini-ITX, micro-ATX, ATX, and extended ATX motherboards
Dual Power Supply Support - compatible with all standard ATX power supplies
Triple 120/140mm Fan Support - provide airflow allowing for assistive ambient cooling
Built-in PSU Shroud - hide unneeded PSU cables allowing for increased airflow and aesthetics
Built-in Cable Management - allows only the cables you need to be seen and connected
Stackable Design - cases are scalable and can be easily stacked to fit any desired mining setup.
HDD/SSD support - compatible with all standard 2.5"" and 3.5"" drives.

So, like every other product, more = better.As early adopters, your contributions will come at a lower-than-retail cost, and your investment will go into packaging, printing, hardware (nuts, bolts, screws, switches, grommets, etc), powder coating, manufacturing, assembly, shipping parts, tooling fees, designer costs, advertising, and distribution.  To keep things interesting, we've gathered a bit of help from some of our friends and have lined up some pretty sweet rewards, including:

I recently defended my PhD thesis Nov. 2014 at 27 years old in Education Leadership and Policy at the University of Toronto.  I have posted the thesis and several articles up on academia: https://utoronto.academia.edu/NathalieCarrier

Having gone straight through school with two masters, I hope to take a pause in my life and pursue my passion for competitive platform diving before moving into an academic job/postdoc. For various reasons, I stopped diving when I was 16
column2: but I remain an acrobat at heart and have always been active. I believe I have unfulfilled and great potential in the sport.

column1: The city of Toronto has just built an astoundingly beautiful facility at the University of Toronto, ""TPASC"", for the Pan American Games 2015, and I am eager to stay in Toronto and train there (even leave my west coast ocean behind!) See a video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KWhkpflFmEQ

I hope to focus the next year and a half on training with a goal to qualify for nationals 2015 and Olympic trials 2016 on the 10 m platform. I have found a coach willing to invest and work with me to get there.

Please consider helping me on this journey by making a donation to help get me started. Even a small amount can help significantly with initial training costs (travel to meets, gym, competition/club fees, etc).
As a contributor, I promise to send you updates and many (fun) videos of diving crashes as I work on getting a 10 m list quickly.

stuffs. It is BASEQI team great achievement to integrate aluminum material to
memory card. The silver aluminum edge sits smoothly in the side of MacBook. We

Power Meter is a new power meter for cyclists integrated in a pair of pedals. The
installation is simple and the power is measured in both pedals separately. The
power meter, called Hexxagon, is easy to use and compatible with both ANT+ and
Bluetooth Smart<sup>®</sup> head units. The unique RSG technology is very
stable and will give you an accurate power measurement without the need of any
wires or additional hardware. It's just a pair of pedals! If you want to measure
power while cycling, this will be your most accurate, stable and on top of that
the most affordable power meter out there.
power meter to the market. Check out the perks and decide if you want to be a
Weekend Warrior, a Roaring Supporter or even get your own Yellow Jersey so that we
can give power to the people!

Please also spread the word about this campaign if you like our power meter! The more funding we get, the faster the Swedish Adrenaline Power Meter will hit the market. Share our campaign through Indiegogo's share tools and via your own social network.
only a pair of pedals! Easy to switch between your bikes and to take with you
• An affordable power meter. Power to the People, finally!
with both ANT+ and Bluetooth Smart® head units.
technology which is used is robust, stable and very accurate.
If you know how to mount a pair of pedals you know how to use the Swedish
The Swedish Adrenaline Power Meter is the only
power meter using the RSG (Resonant String Gauge) technology. This means that
the sensing element is passive with no need for electrical power and can easily be integrated into a bicycle pedal. The problem that traditional
sensors have with high costs and unstable functions can therefore be avoided.
The RSG technology works a bit like an electric guitar. The string is attached
to the axle inside the pedal. The transceiver electronics operate with high
frequency microwaves and is placed in the pedal. When the axle is bent, ever so
little, the string frequency is changed. This is picked up by the transceiver which

Power Meter is a new power meter for cyclists integrated in a pair of pedals. The
installation is simple and the power is measured in both pedals separately. The
power meter, called Hexxagon, is easy to use and compatible with both ANT+ and
Bluetooth Smart® head units. The unique RSG technology is very

the most affordable power meter out there.

The Swedish Adrenaline Power Meter is the only
power meter using the RSG (Resonant String Gauge) technology. This means that
the sensing element is passive with no need for electrical power and can easily be integrated into a bicycle pedal. The problem that traditional
sensors have with high costs and unstable functions can therefore be avoided.
The RSG technology works a bit like an electric guitar. The string is attached
to the axle inside the pedal. The transceiver electronics operate with high
frequency microwaves and is placed in the pedal. When the axle is bent, ever so
little, the string frequency is changed. This is picked up by the transceiver which
translates this induced power and sends it to the ANT+ or Bluetooth Smart®

column1: that is dedicated to helping people make their dreams become a reality.  Our project is the Pro Lottery Mills App for
your phone, iPad, or tablet.  We are
bringing lottery science to life, in a quick, easy, Google-Play format, so that
the average lottery player can now have a better chance at success.
How many success stories have been told over the years about
the person who was unemployed, down on their luck, and with one last gasp of
hope…bought a lottery ticket?  They took
one last shot, at a chance, to live a dream.
How many people could use some help trying to pay their bills, keep
their cars, or even their homes?  This
App is for countless gamers to use just for fun.  But it is also a way for the more serious
lottery player to try to get an upper hand.

numbers, and obtain rankings of the most popular “Pick 3” and “Pick 4” winning
lottery combinations.  With this App, you
can get instant notifications of your winning numbers, so you can keep up on
what is working and what is not.  The user
can save their history of numbers played, and winning numbers, to establish
can even use this App to share your winnings on Facebook.

Kenzie will be competing in the javelin, high jump, and the pentathlon in Virginia Beach, August 1 - 6. Her pentathlon consists of the 100 M hurdles, shot put, long jump, high jump, and the 800 M dash. This is her second year to be a junior Olympian in the javelin. She has been training since February in 7th grade track. Your donations are greatly appreciated and will be used to help with all expenses.

column4:
>SAV MkI Summary


This 3D printer board electronics has been designed and developed using all the great contributions and feedback from the RepRap CloneWars group in Spain. All shortcomings from other similar boards have been addressed, providing an affordable yet feature rich 3D printer electronics. The result, the SAV MkI.

We have addressed the main problems and functionality limitations that equivalent electronics have:

column1: • No more heat sinks or fans to keep the hotend and heatbed FETs cold.
High speed native USB connectivity going up to 8Mbps
• Builtin uSD reader for autonomous printing
• Bluetooth dongle interface (dongle not provided, tested with HC-05 and HC-06) with level adapter built in for wireless operation.
This is your one stop electronics to get your 3D printer up and running
column2:
simply connect and you are ready to print. Small, high performance, feature rich and affordable.

The SAV MkI comes preloaded with Marlin with its own personality, interfacing to all the great 3D printer host software out there, including non-attended printing!

To complete the package we have even designed a complete open source housing for the board to tidy up the end result and enable you to mount your electronics on your printer.

Don't miss the story behind the SAV - ""The making of..."":

Link here.
column7:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

This board is brought to you by electroFUN LTD.
column9:
/>

Acknowledge: This board is a derivative of Teensylu.

Features

Feature rich yet affordable 3d printer electronics. The SAV MkI has been designed after taking feedback from the Clone Wars RepRappers out there. We have come through with an electronics that we believe will meet your expectations.

column1: • Hotend and heatbed well dimensioned FETs that can take up to 15A without heat-sinks.
• High speed native USB interface connectivity going up to 8Mbps so that there is no lag on your prints.
• 12V built-in fan controller for your layer fan or hot end cooling.
• Bluetooth dongle (dongle not provided, tested with HC-05 and HC-06) interface adapted to its logic levels for wireless operation.
• Expansion bus to connect a keyboard and LCD.
• Support for 4 standard pololu compatible stepper motor drivers.
We have even made a housing for your SAV MkI so that you can keep it nice and tidy in your printer. You can download the CAD files from here:
column4:
/>

The box has been designed to house the board, a cooling fan for your stepper drivers (if needed), bluetooth dongle (HC-05 or HC-06) and for easy 3D printer and power supply wiring.

Read more on the RepRap SAV MkI wiki page: RepRap wiki

Specifications

HW

Processor

column2: >Native USB interface @ 12Mbps, instead of the usual 38400-115200 baud via FTDI. The results: Virtually no serial communication errors (common with Sanguinololu and Gen6/7 Electronics).
>Logic can also be supplied through USB (internal source selection).
>1 x switching N-MOSFET for low power fan.
>Bluetooth interface output levels adjusted for 3.3V logic (connected to UART1 - Rx and Tx).
>Four Endstop connectors supplied @ 5V. Includes X, Y, Z and E

column3:
>14 Extra pins available for expansion and development, with the following capabilities
-- UART1 (RX and TX)

column1: -- JTAG (uses some of the ADC pins)

column3: >Board schematic (larger image on the board´s web page):
column4:
>

Read more on the RepRap SAV MkI wiki page: RepRap wiki

SW, Firmware and SDK

column2: >Marlin (pre-loaded) - Marlin´s main branch already supports the SAV-MkI (MOTHERBOARD==83)
>Windows users only, will need to install USB Serial device (will be downloaded with the Teensy environment).

What You Get

By backing-up this opensource hardware project, you are supporting the creative contributions of the CloneWars RepRap group members. Come on-board and share our passion for 3D printing!

We are seeking your support to make this project a reality and enable the evolution of our creativity for more future exciting projects. We already have a line of accessories in mind, but we need to get this project off the ground before we start developing new ideas.

We are looking to fund our first production batch and deliver this great board to you an to the community. Our main goal is to support our designers and local manufacturing capabilities using crowdfunding as the resourcing model.

The SAV MkI is already a reality. We have assembled and distributed several prototypes with excellent results. Our intention is to move beyond the pilot run stage and bring the benefits of this board to an even larger community of enthusiasts. You can help by donating to the project or pre-ordering the product. Either way you will be helping this and future creations. By pre-ordering you are also ensuring that you get your hands onto what we believe is the best value for money 3D printing control solution in the market.

Project Status

We have completed a first proto-run and we have qualified the complete board for mass production. The final stage is to take this project to production and make these boards in volume. This is why we need your help so, let's get this project off the ground.

Project Schedule

We have gone past the testing stage and the prototypes we have tested are delivering excellent results. The performance of the board is way beyond anything out there in the same price range and even boards that are more expensive.

During the crowd-funding campaign we will be distributing to beta testers the boards we built during the pilot run. Once we achieve our goal, we will give our manufacturer the green light to start assembling the boards. The sooner we achieve our goal, the sooner we will start to manufacture the boards.

Impact

As soon as we achieve our goal, we will be releasing all the schematics and board layout, driving SW and housing to the community.

By contributing and supporting this project you are supporting the opensource maker movement and giving us that incentive to continue on our creative journey and community sharing.

We think that we can deliver a very competitive, high quality 3D printer controller board completely assembled and manufactured in Europe without skimping on components or manufacturing costs. 

The boards proudly have the ""Design in the EU"" and ""Made in Spain"" credentials. By supporting this project you know what you will be supporting our local industry too. Why pay more for a lower quality product which is not even as feature rich as the SAV MkI?

Shipment

All shipments within the EU are included in the perks through registered mail, if you wish to receive a board else where in the world, please add five (5) additional euros.

Stretch Goals
column3: >If we hit our goal, we will expand out objectives and start our LCD control panel board design and offer it to you at a very attractive price. The SAV MkI already supports the a range of LCDs and configurations using the ""New LiquidCrystal Library"" but we will add a custom control panel with encoder for autonomous printing.
column4:
>

If we hit the 300 mark, we will be designing a very attractive LCD control panel with room to connect a fifth driver, thermistor and FET.

If we reach the 500 mark, all of the above plus a nice Android app to control your printer with a nice looking user interface
column5: >to make your 3D printer really rock.
column6:
>We are also looking to get volume discounts with our manufacturer but we need your help to achieve this goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

We now need your help to have a successful launch and there are many ways you can help us:

column1: • Make some noise and share this project with your friends and contacts. You can use the share tools available here or simply spread the word.
• You can make a donation that will be very much appreciated and will receive a big thanks.
• You can make a donation and take with you one of our launch special customized T-shirts: ""I am a Clone Wars maker"".
• Select one of our SAV MkI perks so that you can start printing.

column3:
/>

Thank you very much for your help, we really appreciate it!

Micro SD reader for autonomous printing.

Native USB interface @ 12Mbps, instead of the usual 38400-115200 baud via FTDI. The results: Virtually no serial communication errors (common with Sanguinololu and Gen6/7 Electronics).
Logic supplied by on-board voltage regulator through Vin
Logic can also be supplied through USB (internal source selection).
1 x switching N-MOSFET for low power fan.
Bluetooth interface output levels adjusted for 3.3V logic (connected to UART1 - Rx and Tx).
Four Endstop connectors supplied @ 5V. Includes X, Y, Z and E
14 Extra pins available for expansion and development, with the following capabilities-- UART1 (RX and TX)
-- JTAG (uses some of the ADC pins)
Dimensions: 100mm x 65mmBoard schematic (larger image on the board´s web page):Read more on the RepRap SAV MkI wiki page: RepRap wikiSW, Firmware and SDK
Marlin (pre-loaded) - Marlin´s main branch already supports the SAV-MkI (MOTHERBOARD==83)
SDK: Arduino IDE with Teensy add-on.
Windows users only, will need to install USB Serial device (will be downloaded with the Teensy environment).

column2: >The deeply awesome users of www.gmap-pedometer.com did it! I'll post pictures of the Macbook Air to this campaign site as soon as I have it! Supersonic thank-you buttslaps all around!

column1: I am the one-man coder/proprietor of www.gmap-pedometer.com. The site is a tool that allows cardio freaks (such as myself) to track the distance they have run or cycled on a google map interface. I get over a million visits a month from all over the world.

This functionality cries out to be a mobile app as well. I have a development environment set up, and coding is underway. However the greatest limitation is time. This site is still a side project, and what's it's on the side of is a busy family life (three kids ages 8 and under) and 9-5 (really 6) job.

The goal of this campaign is to  fund a Macbook Air (and backup drive) to use for coding the site during my daily bus commute. The solid state drive will prevent tragic disk crashes, and mean superfast bootup -- and every second counts! One more hour a day! Five a week! 20 a month!
This has been set up as a ""Fixed Funding"" project. If the project fails to hit its funding goal, you're off the hook and your money will be refunded.

I plan to have a lite/premium pricing model for the app. A $.99 version bearing ads, and $4.99 version without. (I also have plans to include spoken turn-by-turn directions in a future version of the premium version.)

Anyone who contributes $5 or more will get a free copy of the premium version when it is completed. If you're a techie or you just want to follow progress, I'll be updating the site's twitter and facebook accounts with the progress of development.
NOTE that currently I estimate it will take until June 2012 to complete the app. I hope this project succeeds, and I can bring it to you sooner!

PCWorld - ""Skycam also includes a night vision feature for monitoring a location in the dark""
""I will put it in my living room to see when the kids are home from school"" - Daisy

column3: > - “You can now watch what is going on in real time”

column2: >“[SKYCAM] leverages Skype to make for an inexpensive, simple solution” -
>“Installation and usage of SKYCAM unit is as simple as it can be” -

column5: >Ideal for just about anyone who want to keep an eye on their property

column4: >spending some time researching, we decided to back SKYCAM. As we have a puppy, we look forward to watch and to talk to while we are away

column1: SKYCAM is a stand-alone wireless surveillance/monitoring video camera that uses Skype to watch over your pet, home, office, and more while you’re away. Simply install SKYCAM in your desired location, then download the Skype app to your smartphone, tablet, or PC to access your video stream from anywhere at anytime.

Unlike other IP cameras, SKYCAM uses Skype as the DNS server. This means no monthly DNS fees (which add up over time) while allowing you to safely and securely video monitor an area remotely. In only four simple setup steps, you can communicate with loved ones and keep watch of any location easily and affordably.
Easy Access– SKYCAM allows you to remotely access and monitor activities in your house, office, and more!
Works With All Devices- SKYCAM uses Skype for its DNS service, so owners are able to keep watch via the Skype app on their smartphone, tablet, or PC.
Savings– Unlike other IP cameras, SKYCAM has no complicated setup, and requires no monthly DNS fee.
Simple yet Powerful– Install your SKYCAM in only four steps! This easy setup includes the many SKYCAM functions such as night vision, instant video recording, and two-way voice communication.

Safe and Reliable- Skype is one of the most popular and trustworthy online video conferencing platforms around the world. With no worries about insecure DNS passwords, Skype allows you to use SKYCAM without the threat of hackers.
• Call your loved ones when away from home
• Talk to parents, grandparents, and other relatives even without a PC
Most IP cameras come with a 20 to 30-page manual asking you to do all the IP settings, DNS, download apps and blah blah blah…forget that!

SKYCAM is as simple as it is shown in the video. With just four easy steps, your SKYCAM is installed! Plus, you may even have the Skype app already installed (Skype is the only app used to access SKYCAM), so, no extra app download step is needed.
What kind of devices work with SKYCAM?
• And any other device that supports the Skype app!
*Other marks are the property of their respective owners.

After the campaign has ended, we will be sending out surveys to all backers asking which type of plug you will need. You will then be able to choose the color of your flexible stand under the specific package you’ve selected. The more pledges we receive, the more options that will be available. If you have any other preference you’d like us to consider, feel free to direct message us!
Risks and Challenges

Most likely, SKYCAM will be produced in China. We have already talked to a few manufacturers, some of which produce products for RCA, Philips, and many other well-known brands. This means they have past experience and can be trusted in shipping goods on time. However, they require a minimum order quantity to start the production. Backers, we need your support!!

If we reach our goal, we will fly over to China to follow SKYCAM every step of the way. This includes quality inspection, logistics, production, distribution, and more. We want to ensure that everything goes perfectly with SKYCAM. Also, we will go through the certification process with Skype to build a stronger relationship with the popular online video platform. This will give SKYCAM a great opportunity to grow!
If you want us to address additional risks, then don't hesitate to ask! We want to make sure you’re happy with SKYCAM!
What is the technical specification of SKYCAM?
How many hours of video can I record with a memory card?
• About 72 hours for 4Gb and about 144 hours for 8Gb
• Good for one week under the highest quality.
Do I need Internet connection in order for SKYCAM to work?
• Yes. SKYCAM has a built-in WIFI 802.11 b/g and Ethernet port available for connection.
• No, SKYCAM has an audio output jack instead, which allows you to extend to an earphone or external speaker.
• No, it is powered by a DC power adapter.

After spending some time researching, we decided to back SKYCAM. As we have a puppy, we look forward to watch and to talk to while we are away""- Backer Joe

SKYCAM is a stand-alone wireless surveillance/monitoring video camera that uses Skype to watch over your pet, home, office, and more while you’re away. Simply install SKYCAM in your desired location, then download the Skype app to your smartphone, tablet, or PC to access your video stream from anywhere at anytime.

Unlike other IP cameras, SKYCAM uses Skype as the DNS server. This means no monthly DNS fees (which add up over time) while allowing you to safely and securely video monitor an area remotely. In only four simple setup steps, you can communicate with loved ones and keep watch of any location easily and affordably.
Easy Access– SKYCAM allows you to remotely access and monitor activities in your house, office, and more!
Works With All Devices- SKYCAM uses Skype for its DNS service, so owners are able to keep watch via the Skype app on their smartphone, tablet, or PC.
Savings– Unlike other IP cameras, SKYCAM has no complicated setup, and requires no monthly DNS fee.
Simple yet Powerful– Install your SKYCAM in only four steps! This easy setup includes the many SKYCAM functions such as night vision, instant video recording, and two-way voice communication.

Safe and Reliable- Skype is one of the most popular and trustworthy online video conferencing platforms around the world. With no worries about insecure DNS passwords, Skype allows you to use SKYCAM without the threat of hackers.
Monitor any corner of your house
Office, warehouse surveillance with night vision
Call your loved ones when away from home
Talk to parents, grandparents, and other relatives even without a PC
Setup in Less than One Minute!
Most IP cameras come with a 20 to 30-page manual asking you to do all the IP settings, DNS, download apps and blah blah blah…forget that!

SKYCAM is as simple as it is shown in the video. With just four easy steps, your SKYCAM is installed! Plus, you may even have the Skype app already installed (Skype is the only app used to access SKYCAM), so, no extra app download step is needed.
What kind of devices work with SKYCAM?
And any other device that supports the Skype app!

Why do We Need a Paper-like E-ink Monitor?

In the information age, we watch the computer and mobile more than 8 hours a day. The LCD display greatly hurts our eyes and threat our health. Strong light, screen flash and blue light make our eyes dry, inflamed, deeper myopia, and even cause dizziness, headache, etc, which is called CVS（Computer Vision Syndrome) We urgently need a paper-like monitor to save eyes.

 

Why Paperlike 3 can protect your eyes?

E-ink is the world’s best ambient-light-reflecting display technology. It drives ink droplets in microcapsules by voltage to make natural, clear images on the screen, illuminated by light in the environment rather than a backlight, commonly used in E-readers before. DASUNG’s 3rd generation E-ink monitor Paperlike 3 has HD retina display, high contrast, fine quality, paper-like, no blue light, no reflection, no flashing, excellent eye-saver.

 

13.3”Largest E-ink Monitor

2K High-Definition

207 DPI

13.3” size with E-ink monitor (Carta &
column2:
Flexible), 2200*1650 high-definition, retina display, clearer and more exquisite image, 0.71cm thickness.

 

High Speed

Low Latency

DASUNG Paperlike 3 has a pretty high speed and low latency, better any e-readers, fast nearly as LCD. You will have an amazing working journey in paper-like E-ink monitor. You can web browsing, typing, coding, reading and more. Very comfortable!

          

         

 

Multi-image Modes

column1: • Floyd model: combination of high-quality image and speed
• A5 model: display fast with fifth-order image
• A2 model: display quickly with Second-order image, filtering out useless details
• A16 model: display with 16-order fine picture, with high detail visibility
• A61 model: display with 61-order fine picture, better details visibility than A16 model

column2:
Professional

Function Enhanced Software

DASUNG Paperlike 3's enhanced software has many SMART functions created by DASUNG:

column1:
Paperlike 3's enhanced software can make your image very clear by automatic ghost clear. It can remember and storage your usage habits, and provide a most comfortable image contrast adjustment for you. We enable to accelerate the speed and deepen the ink freely in deep electrophoretic parameter adjustment function. You can weaken blue light of LCD by anti blue light mode.

HDMI Connection

Mirror Display or Extend Display

Vertically or Horizontally

We have professional E-ink monitor with HDMI connection. It can display horizontally or vertically and mirror or extend the content on your primary computer screen.

Also can Work Well with iPhone/iPad

Paperlike 3 can connect with any equipment messaging HDMI video signals, like iPhone, iPad in the need of Apple’s official adapter.

 

            

Compatible with VESA Standard

Paperlike 3 have 75mm x75mm VESA international standard hole, which is compatible with VESA standard.

About DASUNG

We have Developed E-ink Monitor for 4 Years

 

DASUNG is a creative group founded in March 2014 by science fiction writer Dong Gong, Dr. Ray Chen, and Hiro Gong. Our team comes from China Aerospace Corporation, Chinese Academy of Sciences, MIT, Belarusian State University, and other top academies.

column1: • In 2014, DASUNG as an inventor of E-ink monitor issue the world’s first E-ink monitor Paperlike.
• In 2015, we are invited to CES(Consumer Electronic Show) in America and reported by more 100 medias with more 20 kinds of languages.
• In 2017, DASUNG connect E-ink and HDMI first time, bringing out the world’s first E-ink monitor Paperlike Pro, in the same year, Paperlike 3 is released in China.

At present, the users of E-ink monitor of Paperlike set products are from 67 countries in the world.

FAQ

  • Do you offer refunds?

We are happy to provide a refund if there is a  serious quality issue, but otherwise, purchases are nonrefundable. Because shipment fee on double way and the custom when the product re-enter China are very high. And there might be the unpredictable trouble during the shipment. That is why we recommend that you carefully to understand the product before you buy. We are a start-up company, we can not afford such an expensive shipment and custom cost.

The Idea

Vita memory cards are too expensive and it would be nice to be able to use a microSD card. The 3G feature is pretty useless. Combing those two thoughts and I decided ""what if we replace that modem with USB storage?"" This works because the Vita's modem port is simply a USB 2.0 port that uses the miniPCIe form factor. A hacked Vita running 3.60 has the ability to load custom drivers, and it is just a matter of putting all the pieces together.

Features

• At the core of the adapter is the USB2244 chip, which is a SD to USB microprocessor. It is a high end chip (you won't find it in cheap SD to USB adapters) that has good power consumption and a long lifespan. It supports SD/SDHC/SDXC cards.
• You need to open up the Vita and replace the modem card. This is relatively simple and is akin to changing the battery. You can put in a large microSD card, install it, and forget about it.
• With HENkaku Ensō, you can use the adapter on boot

• Because there's extra space on the board, I also added two debug ports that the original modem uses to communicate with the Vita. Using them is optional. Developers and hackers can use this for their homebrew and hacks.
• All design files, Gerbers, schematics, layouts, BOMs, software drivers, etc will be public and open source. Anyone can produce the board as well as modify it.

Your Help

I am not doing this to make money. You will help fund all the supplies and the development process. I will work on this project on my spare time and your funds will not be towards labor costs I incur (designing, building the prototype, shipping and packing, etc). To be completely transparent, I will break down the supply costs of the project:
• $89.05: supplies for prototyping (components, solder paste, inspection microscope, tweezers)
• $13.95: breakout board I designed to test the signals from the prototypes. Design files will also be open source.
• $15.12: First prototype run. 10 boards unassembled with no special options. Just to test the design.

• $74.40: Second prototype run. 10 boards unassembled with hard gold fingers and stencil. This will be the ""product verification test"" and is a small run of production quality boards (for example, gold fingers on the connectors are expensive but required if you want any durability).

• $100 (maybe): Any additional prototypes. This is in anticipation that there's some major bug found in the second prototype. Up to two more runs with no special options. I hope this won't be the case and my estimates are overly conservative (better to factor in this cost now than ask for more money later).

• $1830.26: Final production of 100 boards assembled with hard gold fingers. The boards themselves will cost $597 and is mainly because of the gold. The components will cost $539.43 (main cost here is the mechanical microSD card slot and the USB IC). The assembly will cost $693.83 since I don't plan to solder 100 boards on my own.
• $45: shipping supplies (padded envelopes and ESD safe bags)
• $207: fees taken by Indiegogo and the credit card processor

More detailed breakdown of the component and board costs can be found in the BOM spreadsheet that will be released as part of the open source package.

Is my Vita supported?

This adapter will only work for a specific set of Vita owners. You must have a 3G OLED model (typically the model number is PCH-110X) that is running firmware 3.60 or less (in order to use the HENkaku hack, which is required). However, a quick search on Aliexpress shows that Vita motherboards running firmware <
column2:
3.60 are on sale for about $25 a piece. So you can always buy one and swap your current motherboard (even if it is a Wifi only OLED model) with it.

No Warranty

I'll be upfront about this so there won't be any confusion later. I am doing this in pursue of knowledge and expect to make no money. Therefore, I can't afford to waste time and money with customer support or technical help. You are expected to know how to open up the Vita and how to install HENkaku and the custom driver (instructions will be provided, but I won't have time to help you individually). Additionally, I cannot vouch for the quality of the PCB manufacturer and assembly service (SeeedStudios). They are the cheapest provider, but not 100% of the boards they send back are high quality. So in a order of 100 boards, I expect maybe 75 of them to be completely functional and 90 of them to be mostly working (maybe insertion will be difficult or maybe a connection won't be perfect). In that case, I will not have any extras to send nor will I be testing each unit before sending it out.

Please note that when funding this campaign, you are mostly paying for the development and getting a working board would be a bonus. You are not buying a tested and working product.

However, everything from the software and the hardware will be open source. Once the project completes, anyone can decide to invest the money in mass producing it for sale. If you do so, I don't expect any royalities or anything.

Also, the final boards all use RoHS compliant parts so it should be safe to import into Europe. The prototype boards might contain some lead solder due to the work done on them, but since they do not actually work, they are not electronic parts but ornamental pieces.

(The prototype in the video and photos features one-and-a-half length keycaps, which will be changed to more elongated double-length keycaps for more comfortable user experience in the shipped keyboard model.)

Hello Indiegogoers! Meet Ditto, our very own Fused Filament Fabrication (FFF for short) 3D Printer. Building upon existing 3D printer kits, Ditto was designed from the ground up to be an innovative and user-friendly printer for both new and experienced users alike.

So what exactly makes Ditto unique? Well for one, Ditto features a large and open work space unlike any other, allowing sizable prints to be produced with ease. The joy of use you get from tinkering with Ditto is a truly remarkable experience. The affordability is also unparalleled considering the package you’re getting. The list could go on, but the bottom line is that Ditto is one awesome printer. You have our word for it!

So what can you print with a 3D printer like Ditto? Just about anything! From creating custom game board pieces to functional gears for a machine, 3D printing allows you to quickly create solid plastic objects from a digital file. You can select from premade files on an online database such as Thingiverse or create your own with free modelling software such as Google SketchUp. Learning to create has never been easier!

Aside from being a great household electronic, Ditto is great for educational purposes. While the concept of putting together a 3D printer from scratch may seem daunting to novice users, there has never been a greater opportunity for you and your friends to get together and collaboratively assemble, tweak, and produce usable objects with a machine. The fun doesn’t stop there! As open source hardware, Ditto is open for revision and improvement by members of the 3D printer community
column2: personalize your printers, share your designs, or expand upon the works of others to help Ditto evolve with time.

column1:
So this is the part where we need your help. Over the past few months, we have devoted much time and energy into developing Ditto. During the process, we have designed many iterations of prototypes, completed a series of testing phases, and established a strong relationship with our suppliers. As we approach this final stage of delivering Ditto to the public, we need all your support to make this dream of ours a possibility.

In order to bring the cost of producing each printer down, we need to fill a sizeable order from our supplier. Your funding will help us drive down the cost of each individual part while helping us assure that our printer is produced with the utmost rigorous quality.

We plan to use the funding from this campaign to first fufill all of the orders we have received and then continue developing new and exciting 3D technologies and make them available to YOU. 3D printing should no longer be an exclusive novelty
column2: we believe that every household and school can benefit greatly from owning a 3D printer, whether you are new to the 3D printing scene or a Tinkering veteran.

column1: So pledge toward our cause today and become part of the 3D printing revolution!

~ 350mm x 380mm x 435mm (492mm w/extruder)
~ 14"" x 15"" x 17"" (19.5” w/extruder)
PLA (ABS will be supported in the future)

Drill rods, linear ball bearings, delrin bushing, PLA printed parts.

Wood Version (Pine) / Acrylic Version

Which software do I need to print with Ditto?
If you are looking to create your very own object, you will need to do so through a 3D modelling software such as Google SketchUp, SolidWorks, and Autodesk Maya
column2:
otherwise, you can simply download models made by the community from free online databases such as Thingiverse.
For the actual printing itself, everything you need is open source and available on the Internet, including Marlin, Slic3r, Skeinforge, and Pronterface.

When will Ditto be delivered?
Please allow us a few months’ time to carry out the necessary preparations for delivering Ditto into your hands. At the latest, all of the orders for both the assembled and DIY versions of Ditto will be shipped by November 19th. All the other perks will be shipped by October 19th. Shipping &
column3:
duty costs will be handled individually. For delivery outside of North America, please allow 1-3 weeks of extra lead time.

When will the Ditto files be released as open source?
All the files will be released at the end of the Indiegogo campaign
column4:
all you have to do is hold your patience for just a while longer!

A Summary of Voice Choice Nav App

This project will offer fun amazing voices, accents, dialects and slang from many regions to navigate you wherever you may be. VC Nav app will be available for free to both Android and IOS phone users. I am raising funds for the voice over's and coding that will make this app enjoyable for everyone. I have spent hundreds of hours researching accents, dialects and slang for my VC Nav app and am so anxious to continue to a finished product. Estimated time for coding and initial voice over completion is 75 days. During the final design/development process I will be recording voice overs..  4 awesome voices/characters will be recorded and ready at time of app's release. Throughout the life and popularity of VC Nav app we will offer polls on our website as well as polls on VC Nav's social media sites to find out what voices VC Nav users want next. With VC Navigation finding your way has never been so fun!
Here is what is needed to launch our app and how we show our appreciation:

• Funding will be used to record four professional voice overs: Confucius, Reckneck, Bloody Brit and of coarse an awesome Aussie. Funding will also go to coding and final design work. I want VC Nav app to be an easy, useful and most of all enjoyable experience for all users no matter what voice you choose.

• Every dollar counts not only for VC Nav app's initial launch but for many, many more voices and languages to come! VC Nav app will be free with one free voice to get users started. After that users can purchase additional voices for only $0.99!

• Our perks are simple, be among the first to have and use VC Nav app prior to release in App stores. Get free voices and more free voices for your support. We even have perks that allow you to become the voice on your own VC Nav app or even become an actual voice for sale on VC Nav app.
• Smiles and Laughter brightens everyones day especially if you're not sure how to get where you're going!
For those who love are project but just don't have funds to contribute:
• Please spread the word with Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, Email and Texts.
• Please feel free to use Indiegogo share tools!

Thank You for all your support!

column10:
>Have you ever pulled that tangled and knotted iPhone cable out of your bag?
Are you sick of cords scattered all over your kitchen counter?
Do you wish your car mount charged your phone without a separate cable?
column11: >Meet togoDock, the world's first magnetically-integrated portable dock and charge cable. Using high-strength magnetics, you can turn just about any surface into a portable iPhone dock.
column12:
>

Each togoDock Perk Includes:

column1: Embedded Magnets: strong enough to hold iPhone as a dock
Cable Wrap: to keep your cord tidy while on-the-go
Disc Mount: create a mounting surface anywhere. Includes 2 mounts
Standard USB: use it worldwide with any USB charge port
What is PLUGdock?
column2:
>

PLUGdock converts an Apple iPhone charging cable into an outlet-mounted dock. Use it in the kitchen, your nightstand, your office, or anywhere you have an outlet. PLUGdock is available as an add-on perk. Once you contribute for togoDock, just come back and select the PLUGdock add-on perk to process it as an additional perk.

Available for US version of Apple charging only at this time. However, we are awaiting the arrival of the international versions in order to finalize the design for those also.


Who is [Fuse]chicken and what is the Une Bobine perk?

Fuse Chicken is a small company of a few guys who like to create cool things. We're all engineers, designers, and tinkerers. A few years ago, we had the idea for a cool little iPhone cable that could hold your iPhone in the air while charging. A whirlwind month later and we had crowd-funded Une Bobine for $212,000 with over 4000 backers! Fast forward two years and we're back with our third campaign. We do this because we love the crowd funding community and the interaction with our backers and supporters. With everything in life, this is not about the destination... it's about the journey. And we'd love to have you come along with us.


What We Need &

column1: • In order to bring togoDock to market, we need your help to cover startup mold costs and the initial production run. We've had previous successul crowd-funding campaigns, so there should be no surprises once funded.
• We've got some great perks for you... your very own togoDock perks plus a few awesome add-ons like our last crowd-funded project, Une Bobine for iPhone 5s, 5c, and 5!
• Because we are running an all-or-nothing funding campaign, we need to reach the goal to receive the funds. If we don't reach our goal, all funding will be returned.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can't help and join in on the journey with us:

  • Just under the project video, you'll find some awesome sharing links for Facebook, Twitter, and others. Help us get the word out!
column5:
A

What devices does togoDock work with?

togoDock uses the Apple Lightning connector and will work with the following devices:
column7: >iPad 4th Generation, Air (charge/sync only. Not as a dock)
column8: >iPad mini, mini with Retina (charge/sync only. Not as a dock)
column10:
>iPod Nano 7th Generation

What cases does togoDock work with?

This depends on the Apple MFI approval process. We have shown togoDock with the design that we know it can be approved based on the MFI approval of Une Bobine. This requires the connector to be 40mm x 6mm where it attaches to the phone. This will allow it work with nearly all cases that have an open bottom. We are working towards MFI approval with an alternate design that will attach to nearly all cases. See the project update for renderings of the design that will work with cases.

Can I use the headphone jack?

The Apple MFI approval process will also affect the headphone accessibility. See the updates for photos of the design that will allow headphones to be used. If this can't be approved, the headphones may not be accessible. We have tested Une Bobine, our prior iPhone charge device with USB Car Audio inputs available in many newer vehicles and are pleased to let you know that it works perfectly. Since we're using the same Apple connector, we expect togoDock will work great with USB Car Audio.

Our commitment to you!

As with all of our past crowd-funded projects, we are committed to being open about the entire project, process and any delays. Crowd-funding is about sharing the journey with you in addition to the funding. So here is what you can expect from us: 
1. You will receive a reply to all comments, emails, messages, and questions. You read that correctly. Every. Single. One.
2. We will send a project update every Friday. This starts from day one and goes until your perks have shipped. Of course, we will always send an update early if we have big news that can't wait until our regular Friday update.

I have more questions!

Drop us a line at jon@fusechicken.com


Media Contact:
column11:
>Jennifer Reiss
Max Borges Agency

BRICWAVE has taken the next step up from the Xpress to bring you another superb product, Xpress-PRO Aluminum Edition. This new product is ready to begin full production with award-winning DESIGN, flagship PERFORMANCE, super EASY iOS App, and the necessary CERTIFICATIONS!  www.bricwave.com
column7:
s=001125e647c969ecc2eed7b788e339b3"" src="""" style=""""/>

INTRODUCING XPRESS-PRO™ (Aluminum Edition)

There are certain situations that can leave a person in a very difficult situation, involving technology. Two of the most annoying, in an ever-connected world, is needing a storage solution with none available and having a smartphone or tablet go dead with no way to charge them. We came up with an ingenious solution, the Xpress-PRO™ that helps users to manage data and to stay connected with full power all the time. It is an ultimate mobile assistant to save time and to promote maximum convenience.

s=d6317de56a9c9249569dae8506bd57e0"" src="""" style=""""/>

A single compact device could perform better than multiple devices put together. 

Xpress-PRO™ is roughly the size of a credit card and is made of high-strength aluminum alloy chosen for its long-lasting durability. With a memory capacity of up to 64GB, it assures that no data gets lost and charges your devices faster via Lightning or Micro-USB connections. One device is ""good enough"" to replace separate hard drive, charging battery, and cables.

column1: Are we frustrated with technology advancement? Why?
column6:
s=710821e3dfadc27c50aa82bc1fe51ba0"" src="""" style=""""/>

Are you carrying too many gadgets to stay connected or having too much data to handle? Or, are you juggling too many things while traveling and finding it a real struggle to try and not leave anything behind? It is quite embarrassing to be traveling with multiple tech gadgets and eventually getting stuck at the security screening gate due to increased security concerns nowadays. Of course, it is even more frustrating when your device is jammed with pictures, video, music files and email data, which leaves you out of memory space. Yes, you can easily delete them, but it’s not an easy thing to decide which part of your memories or entertainment you will erase.

Make tech gadgets streamlined and easy to transport!
column11:
s=0ed2383fa71139d3c00e0b08af0be7ee"" src="""" style=""""/>

If you are tired of carrying multiple devices on the move, think about a single compact device that could perform better than multiple devices put together. A single device could remove all frustrations. Xpress-PRO™ is an ultimate aid for mobile professionals with its 3-IN-1 stunning performance for data and power management. it could replace your old external hard drive, provide extra charging battery, and avoid those annoyingly tangled cables with just one compact device with improved function and usability.
column18:
POWER BOOSTER 

Xpress-PRO™ helps to manage your device better with the content you need to store and share. Now you can easily and securely store all your data such as documents, music, photos, videos, and all other creations and share between your digital devices or on social media or email. With built-in high transfer efficiency Li-polymer battery, it assists your devices urgently with full charging capacity, and it extends the battery life up to 18 hours of a mixed of usage (including talk, internet, standby) with the brightness set to 50%.

column6:
s=b2c7c02a993fe623a263dfa0148cabe8"" src="""" style=""""/>

small but mighty!

Wouldn't it be amazing if a package the size of a credit card did everything you need for your modern mobile devices?
column12:
s=238248c2ad83b6bcc37e381fc2478926"" src="""" style=""""/>

built-in dual cable

No need for tangling cables for data transfer and power charging. The built-in dual cable will replace old cables and they are foldable and easily stowed away.
column23:
premium quality! 

The new Xpress-PRO™ delivers stunning design and premium build quality with flagship performance. We are delighted to be a winner of the Red Dot Award: Product Design 2016. Our high competency with Xpress-PRO™ has been chosen by 41 jury members, who assessed the record number of 5,214 products from 57 nations. Only outstanding achievements received a distinction.
column41:
s=681a71d608b8c84e45ac563e3457429a"" src="""" style=""""/>

manage data like a pro! 

With a memory capacity of up to 64GB, the device also assures that no data gets lost. Compatible with iPhone, iPad, iPod AND all other Android devices, and as well as all Notebooks and Desktop computers having USB connectors.
column47:
s=184a91203e34eded40cc693454cf2be2"" src="""" style=""""/>

easy and intuitive operation! 

The operation is simple, easy, and intuitive. Its rotary type control switch not only clearly marks its operating modes but also achieves the desired function effortlessly without the need to even look at the device.

column1: Plug-in Control: No need for swapping cables to alter functionality, our easy to use rotary switch handles function changes with intuitive ease!
Function Label: Easily see the selected function at any time, thanks to our clear, crisp laser engraving.
Accurate engagement: Our rotary switch snaps into each position quickly and easily, preventing any accidental changes, while allowing for the user to be certain that the desired function is selected.

column7:
s=57e97aafc5813bb06c7393f340fcb77f"" src="""" style=""""/>

BRICWAVE XPRESS 2.0 iOS APP

The Xpress system is a multi-functional storage device for PC, MAC, iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch. The Xpress system has a standard USB interface for PC, MAC connection and a Lightning interface for iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch connection (or Micro USB interface for other mobile devices). When connected to PC with USB interface, it can be used as an external storage device. The Xpress system helps users to manage data and to stay connected with full confidence all the time. It is the ultimate mobile assistance to save time and to promote maximum convenience.

DEVELOPMENT SCHEDULE

We are making amazing progress for the development, Our goal is to ensure that the entire production line set up will be completed by no later than September 2016. By this September 2016, we will have early batch products in full production in perfect condition, and if everything is in order, we will immediately dispatch BRICWAVE Xpress-PRO™ to our backers! We want to get this out to you as soon as possible! 

ABOUT US

Striving for excellence is an important component of our developmental process. Our project team has exercised a high-level of professionalism in every aspect of production and will continue to do so. We have successfully utilized the experience we gained in a wide variety of products and services. We incorporate our strong work ethic, positivity, and humble confidence as we accept the challenges in the industry.

BRICWAVE, the birthplace of Xpress-PRO™, was founded in suburban Chicago in 2012. Since its inception, BRICWAVE has aimed to tap into creative technology ideas that strike a chord with consumers. We have designed a unique method to do just that, and the results so far are extremely encouraging. This is what we enthusiastically seek to share with you!

column4: >Türkçe için lütfen sayfayı aşağı kaydırın
>Please scroll down for t-shirts / t-shirtler için lütfen aşağı kaydırın

column1: Internet Ungovernance Forum is for those of us who demand free, secure, and open internet for the
We're organizing the Internet Ungovernance Forum on September 4-5, for people who demand that fundamental freedoms,
openness, unity and net neutrality remain the building blocks of the Internet. Our ambition is to talk about the
real problems of the internet, how we can solve these and to chart a path for action.
Our forum will be in parallel to the Internet Governance Forum (IGF) 2014 which will also be held in Istanbul
between September 2-5. Interested parties all around the world will join and follow this important event. We see
that at IGF the most urgent problems of the Internet do not get the right attention. Due to the
""multi-stakeholderism"" format, the main perpetrators of many of the Internet's problems, governments and
corporations, are getting representation in IGF they don’t deserve. Given these circumstances, we decided to take
initiative to defend the Internet as we know it and to create a space to raise the voices of civil society
For us, the most vital problems today are censorship and freedom of speech

column2: protective, prohibitionist and conservative governance approaches

column1: governance examples as in the case of Turkey and the list goes on. Further, we do not see any of these problems
independent of the greater political, social and economic contexts in which the Internet and related digital
infrastructures are embedded in. We call on our participants to resist seeing the problems of the Internet as only
technological and void of its materiality. We want to reclaim the Internet as a fundamental infrastructure of our
societies, cities, education, health, work, media, communications, culture and everyday activities.
Today, it is more imminent than ever to strengthen networks of solidarity and connect struggles across the globe for
the Internet we want. For this we envision the Ungovernance Forum to be a space in which we can discuss the problems
and solutions of the Internet openly, with courage, and without shying away from conflict. To develop the program of
the forum we have relied on our powerful but inevitably limited existing networks. We therefore invite all of you to
use this event to expand our collective imagination and circuits of action.
As Alternative Informatics Association, we underline the necessity of the Internet as a free, equal and basic human
right and regard it as fundamental to struggles of justice. If you want a free, secure and open Internet and you’re
fighting for it, we ask you to join and support us at the Internet Ungovernance Forum in Istanbul!
To boost participating, especially Turkish activists, we need:
• Simultaneous interpretation Turkish - English and English - Turkish which costs $2400
• Printing some materials for wider announcements which costs $400
By this campaign we aim to get money only for these two purposes. We
covered other expenses with our own resources and supporter NGO's
Internet Ungovernance Forum açık, güvenli ve özgür bir internet isteyenlerin buluşma noktası
4-5 Eylül'de yapılacak olan Internet Ungovernance Forum'u, temel hak ve özgürlüklerin, açıklığın birlikteliğin ve ağ
tarafsızlığının internetin yapı taşları olarak kalmasını isteyenler için organize ediyoruz. İsteğimiz, internetin şu
an sahip olduğu ciddi problemler hakkında konuşmak, bunları nasıl çözeceğimizi bulmak ve eyleme geçmek için bir yol
Forumumuz, yine 2-5 Eylül tarihleri arasında İstanbul'da yapılacak olan Internet Governance Forum (IGF) 2014 ile eş
zamanlı olarak gerçekleşecek. Dünyanın dört bir yanından gelen katılımcılar bu önemli etkinliğe iştirak edecek.
Bizler, internetin en önemli sorunlarının IGF'de hakettiği ilgiyi göremediğini fark ettik. Etkinliğin
“Multi-stakeholderism” yapısı yüzünden, internetin sahip olduğu problemlerin çoğunun asıl müsebbibi olan devlet ve
şirketler, IGF'de gereğinden fazla temsil edilmekte. Bu yüzden bizler de, interneti savunmak ve sivil toplum
örgütlerinin, aktivistlerin ve halkın da seslerini duyurabilecekleri bir alan yaratmak için önayak olmaya karar

column2: sansür ve ifade özgürlüğü, gözetim ve mahremiyet, aşırı ticarileşme ve süper

column1: tekeller, korumacı, yasakçı, muhafazakar yaklaşımlar ve Türkiye'de de tanık olduğumuz korkunç yönetişim
örneklerinden oluşuyor. Bizler bu problemleri internet ve diğer dijital altyapıların bütünleşmiş olduğu siyasi,
sosyal ve ekonomik bağlamlardan bağımsız olarak değerlendirmiyoruz. Katılımcılarımızdan da, internetin sorunlarını
sadece teknoloji kaynaklı görmemelerini, zira bu tür bir bakış açısının sorunların çok da önemli değilmiş gibi
algılanmasına yol açabileceğini bilmelerini istiyoruz. Bizler interneti toplumumuzun, şehirlerin, eğitimin,
sağlığın, iş, medya, iletişim, kültür ve günlük aktivitlerin temel altyapısı olarak yeniden yapılandırmak istiyoruz.
Artık, istediğimiz interneti yaratabilmek için tüm dünyada dayanışma ağlarını güçlendirmek ve birlikte mücadele
etmek kaçınılmaz hale gelmiştir. Bu yüzden, Ungovernance Forum'u internetin sorun ve çözümlerini cesurca, hiçbir
şeyi saklamadan ve tartışmaktan kaçınmadan konuşabileceğimiz bir etkinlik olarak hayal ettik.Forumun programını
oluşturmak için, sahip olduğumuz güçlü, fakat sınırlı çevremizi kullandık. Bu yüzden sizleri, bu etkinliği kolektif
hayalgücümüzü ve eylem taktiklerimizi geliştirmekte kullanmaya davet ediyoruz.
Bizler, Alternatif Bilişim Derneği olarak, internetin herkesin temel hakkı olduğunu, özgür ve eşit olması
gerektiğini ve hak mücadelesi için elzem olduğunu düşünüyoruz. Eğer siz de özgür, güvenli ve açık bir internet
istiyor ve bunun için mücadele ediyorsanız, sizlerden Internet Ungovernance Forum'a mümkün olduğunca katkı sunmanızı
• Toplantı öncesinde duyurular ve toplantı sırasında kullanılmak üzere çeşitli materyallerin bastırılması için de 400$'a ihtiyacımız var.
Bu kampanya ile karşılamayı hedeflediğimiz giderlerimiz bunlar. Toplantının birçok masrafını kendi kaynaklarımız ve toplantıya destek veren çeşitli STK'lar aracılığı ile çözdük.

• Toplantımızı duyurmak yapılacak en iyi yardımlardan birtanesi. Twitterda @altbilisim hesabını ve #ungovForum hashtagini takip ederek toplantı hakkındaki güncel bilgilere erişebilirsiniz. Ya da toplantı için hazırladığımız sitemize bakabilirsiniz: https://iuf.alternatifbilisim.org/index-tr.html
• Yardıma ihtiyaç duyduğumuzu ve yardım kampanyamızı arkadaşlarınızla paylaşabilirsiniz.
Please scroll down for t-shirts / t-shirtler için lütfen aşağı kaydırın

şeyi saklamadan ve tartışmaktan kaçınmadan konuşabileceğimiz bir etkinlik olarak hayal ettik.Forumun programını
oluşturmak için, sahip olduğumuz güçlü, fakat sınırlı çevremizi kullandık. Bu yüzden sizleri, bu etkinliği kolektif
hayalgücümüzü ve eylem taktiklerimizi geliştirmekte kullanmaya davet ediyoruz.
Bizler, Alternatif Bilişim Derneği olarak, internetin herkesin temel hakkı olduğunu, özgür ve eşit olması
gerektiğini ve hak mücadelesi için elzem olduğunu düşünüyoruz. Eğer siz de özgür, güvenli ve açık bir internet
istiyor ve bunun için mücadele ediyorsanız, sizlerden Internet Ungovernance Forum'a mümkün olduğunca katkı sunmanızı
Simultane çeviri sağlamak istiyoruz. Bunun maaliyeti 2400$
Toplantı öncesinde duyurular ve toplantı sırasında kullanılmak üzere çeşitli materyallerin bastırılması için de 400$'a ihtiyacımız var.
Bu kampanya ile karşılamayı hedeflediğimiz giderlerimiz bunlar. Toplantının birçok masrafını kendi kaynaklarımız ve toplantıya destek veren çeşitli STK'lar aracılığı ile çözdük.

Toplantımızı duyurmak yapılacak en iyi yardımlardan birtanesi. Twitterda @altbilisim hesabını ve #ungovForum hashtagini takip ederek toplantı hakkındaki güncel bilgilere erişebilirsiniz. Ya da toplantı için hazırladığımız sitemize bakabilirsiniz: https://iuf.alternatifbilisim.org/index-tr.html
Yardıma ihtiyaç duyduğumuzu ve yardım kampanyamızı arkadaşlarınızla paylaşabilirsiniz.

column1: Today North Americans pay some of the highest prices for cell service in the world. We pay for more services than we use and plan pricing isn’t clear as day. Bottom line is today, 75% of us are paying more than we should for plans we don’t understand. It’s time for change.
Become a beta tester: http://www.bit.ly/snoobe  and don’t forget to support us!

Snoobe tracks plans and prices for all North American letting mobile customers see the available plans that match their actual usage in real-time (soon for European countries).

column1: Snoobe doesn’t stop once the savings start. The app continues to hunt for better, more competitive plans and alerts users when it’s time to switch.  No more guess work, no more head scratching, just clear and transparent pricing across all of the competition.
WANT PROOF? Snoobe is already saving Beta testers on average $300 per year:
Try the beta app for FREE!
With your support and participation you’ll help Snoobe show mobile carriers and resellers that consumers are smart, savvy price conscious people who deserve fair and transparent pricing, period.
If you’ve ever choked at the sight of your cell phone bill
column2: if you think it’s time to demand better and more affordable services from carriers
column3: if you think we should stop complaining and actually do something we urge you to join the cause.

column1: By supporting the Snoobe team with your pledge you can help change the face of the wireless industry!

All contributions will go directly toward the final stage development of our application - the ability to switch carriers easily anywhere in the world. With over 1 billion smart phone subscribers in the world, that’s a lot of people saving a lot of money.

As a member of the Snoobe movement, we will add your name to our wall of believers - people who think getting fairer and affordable mobile services is only right and fair. You will also be front and center on new Snoobe features, lending your voice and vote on which plans and carriers we should add next. What’s more you’ll get special invites to share with your friends and family so they can join the cause.

But most importantly of course, by contributing you will also be one of the first people to get the full Premium app and start saving. This doesn’t hold true because you can be one of the first to use it without being a backer.

We are stronger together. By sharing Snoobe with your friends, family and co-workers on your favorite social networks and asking them to contribute, you become part of the mission to help protect and empower consumers like you and change the face of the mobile industry:

https://www.facebook.com/snoobemobile

http://igg.me/at/snoobe

Upon installation, Snoobe analyzes your phone usage over the preceding 90 days - your data usage, long distance, roaming etc. It then runs a complex comparative analysis between your existing plan, your actual usage and competing plans in your area computing thousands of unique parameters. It then recommends the best plan to suit your needs.
Snoobe is the Expedia of mobile communications!
A happy user with a great recommendation :)
