column1: We are independent and are not affiliated with any mobile carrier. We are working for the consumers’ best interests.

Thierry Maréchal

Co-Founder and Creator of Snoobe, Thierry is an experienced entrepreneur and UI/UX expertise and a retired international athlete. He is the Snoobe visionary and Chief Robin Hood

Stéphane Rainville

Co-Founder and tech guy. Stephane brings his social network experience and strong background in interactive marketing to the Snoobe team.
The Snoobe Team : left Frédéric Stemmelin (President US), right Dominique Gatto (COO)
A Satisfied beta tester and Thierry - Chief Robin Hood in Robin Hood :)
Our Android app is now fully developed and saving money for our beta testers. Our rewards start with early access to it.

Snoobe’s free app already enables you to find the best mobile plan according to your data usage. But the Premium version will automatically let you know if a better deal is available for you. If your provider changes your plan, or comes up with a new plan that would be a better fit for you, Snoobe will let you know! You will also be able to access your data logs for the last few months using exports, searches and advanced statistical tools.

column2: >Of course the world isn't all Android, and for all of you iOSers out there this is where it gets very interesting and very grass roots. Central to our mission of getting Snoobe into the hands of as many people as possible, our iOS version is a veritable sine qua non. Our first pledges will be put directly to this task. If you are an iOS user or care about one, this is your trigger to help build the battlements of Snoobe for the brave and noble mission that lies ahead.

column1: As you probably know, iOS is a much more closed system than android, making the development of the Snoobe app on Apple’s iPhone quite a bit more complex.  We’re making progress however, and we will offer you our Premium version with LIFETIME UPDATES.

We want to help people save money worldwide using Snoobe. Your support will give us the ability to ‘board’ the largest and smallest wireless networks around the world. And although the ultimate goal is to include everyone, your votes will help us prioritize your country and free your nation from the fear of draconian mobile contracts.

We’ve already tested our system on various countries… and it works! However, for our recommendations to be accurate, we must adapt our comparison algorithms to each country’s specific rules and regulations. In order to add new countries faster, we need your help. With your pledge, you will receive our Premium version adapted for your country, as well as LIFETIME UPDATES.

Like a gleaming rapier, our Snoobe swashbuckles through complicated mobile plans dictated by unconsciously evil and feudal wireless companies. As an objective source of consumer-centric information, we provide critical information on how wireless consumers can save by going with the best plan.  We're not saying the plans available are right for everyone. But ultimately, we hope that wireless companies will take our collective voice for fairness as a strong cue to start building plans with consumer’s needs in mind.

To help us get the word out, we urge you to share this page with anyone you know who has ever received an inflated mobile bill. 

It’s about time we find the best plans for ourselves.

Our early tests show that people on the wrong personal plan can save around $300 per year and professionals even more. Our current record holder saves a whopping $1,416 per year AND she got a brand new Nexus 4 with her new plan.
How do you know what plan I need?

column2: >We analyze your actual monthly usage including bandwidth, call times, text volume and long distance minutes. Our engine then co-relates that data with all of the mobile plans from the major providers in your area to help find the perfect match with your phone and data history.

column1: Great but I'm not in the US or Canada...
We plan to bring Snoobe to many countries and YOUR involvement will decide the order in which we add them.
Become a member of Robin's army with any contribution level and you get the ability to vote on which country we add next, plus the ability to invite your friends.

column2:
>Is my phone history safe? 

Yes! Snoobe respects and protects privacy.  We will not sell or distribute your phone history to anyone.

>

If you believe that most people are paying WAY TOO MUCH for their mobile plans and that the world needs a tool that will make mobile plans easy to understand and shop, then contribute to the Cause! A pledge is more than just helping us develop an app, it is helping thousands of people save money and letting the mobile giants know that consumers are ready to take advantage of their options.

column1: What if I am in a contract with my mobile provider?
column2: >If you find a better plan, which you most likely will, you will have to review your contract’s fine print to see what the cost of breaking the contract will be. Compare that cost to your savings with Snoobe. If your savings are higher, it’s time to make a switch! Or simply run Snoobe again in a few months.

>If you've ever been with an unfair mobile phone plan, it can feel a little like a bad feudal relationship where you are the peasant and your king, well, he doesn’t necessarily have your interests at heart. It’s exactly that dynamic that gave birth to the legend of Robin Hood and exactly what we hope to embody. Getting back your power as a consumer may feel weird at first, but it’s addictive.  And getting on a fair and appropriate plan can only mean good for the industry, consumers and our pocketbooks.  When customers don’t feel ripped off they start to develop warm feelings for their providers.

column3: >Each month about 4 million wireless customers in the US switch providers. Giving those customers a clear shot at the best plans available will, we hope change all that.

We are aiming to finish development by completing more quality tests, adding more plans, and making sure the application lives up to your expectations.

   Hello everyone! We are Cinespa Studios, a production and audiovisual training company. We are here to present the SteadiPhone,  a device to help you getting the best quality pictures with your mobile phone. From now on, you will dramatically improve the quality of your pictures and videos, in an easy and simple way, there will not be any more blurred photos and videos with vibrations for you.


An exclusive and unique product
  After many years carring out different professional projects with mobile devices, we realized that most of the users of the mobile phone cameras, were not able to take good pictures or videos because the pictures were blurred, and the videos would not stop vibrating, so most off the good memories records were ruined.

  The mobile devices are getting more and more popular nowadays, and we are constantly using them to share freshly captured pictures and videos in professional and social networks, and in the same way, the necessity of new devices to let the people get professional quality pictures are becoming more and more demanded these days. To cover this demand we have developed our “Stediphone”, an affordable device with the best results, letting you get the best pictures, in any moment and in the easiest possible way. Being a professional photographer has never been that easy.

What we need and what you get
  To carry this project out, we are putting on sale the devices for all of you. Your rewards are directed solely to cover the costs for the production process and product shipment.

  Cinespa Studios have the logistical capacity to develop SteadiPhone, with no problems to distribute the product, whatever its dimension of sale. Technicians and administrators of the organization, have conducted studies on the costs, to ensure that the product will reach its destination on said date, no delays, no excuses.

  The rewards are clearly defined so you can purchase the product for a unique price. If are working with a company interested on its distribution, you can choose the reward that best suits your interests.



Why SteadiPhone?
  Our campaign is based on the slogan ""Make the Difference"".  The use of SteadiPhone bring your photos and videos a superior quality of pictures from other users. Thus, whether for personal use (vacations, tourism, ...) or professional, you'll get outstanding results. From now on, your social networks can be filled with professional images.

Follow us
  On Twitter and Facebook, you can get in touch with us, following everything that happens in relation to the project, we will publish daily the progress of our campaign. You can visit our official website, please find the link below, There, you can upload your videos to share experiences with other users of Stediphone.

We grant you the best service for the best price.

Regards, Juan Miguel Morante and Jorge Latorre.

Official website: Web Official SteadiPhone

column1: The Discovery Channel: See CommBadge on the Discovery Channel's Daily Planet show

Android Authority: ""Star Trek style communicators could be a reality with CommBadge""

column2: utm_medium=spreadus"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"" title=""Lockergnome"">""CommBadge Brings Star Trek Communicators to Life""

column1: Wearable Technologies: ""Gadget of the Month""

CommBadge is a patent pending wearable Bluetooth speakerphone for iPhone and Android that attaches securely to your clothing. It uses the latest noise canceling chipset to minimize background noise. By combining proprietary directional and personalized speaker technology, CommBadge brings you crystal-clear handsfree communication. It's simple to use, yet amazingly convenient!
You'll have full access to Siri and Google Now voice command functions seamlessly. Also, you can customize CommBadge with the FREE companion app for iPhone and Android.*
Simply by speaking and listening through your CommBadge, while leaving your phone in a pocket, purse or backpack, you can:
• Send and receive text messages (“text-to-speech” through CommBadge)
• Use your phone's native voice commands, such as Siri, S-Voice, or Google Now, to set calendar events and reminders, get sports news, and search for information
• Receive an alert from the Wireless Tether feature that you left your smartphone behind
• Be notified of incoming calls, texts, calendar and social media events with customizable vibration, sound, and LED's

Technology has finally caught up with the science fiction that was first imagined by Gene Roddenberry in Star Trek The Next Generation and it was called combadge. Finally, there is a real CommBadge, it's a miniature speakerphone with big sound. It utilizes Bluetooth Low Energy (4.0) to pair with your iPhone or Android smartphone. CommBadge measures only 1.5"" (39 mm) in diameter.
Why Not Just Wear a Bluetooth Headset Instead?

I don’t know about you but I personally hate wearing a Bluetooth headset. I’ve tried tons of them, and they are all uncomfortable or annoying to me. However, holding your phone while busy at work or doing household chores is a pain. For many situations using a speakerphone is a better solution, and the only way to truly multitask. For example, cooking, walking the two dogs, home projects, and the list goes on.

So I started thinking. Why can’t I just wear a speakerphone? I did some online research and I couldn’t find anything! Then, about a year ago I started prototyping and experimenting with placement and functionality. The more I tested it in various environments, some being very noisy, the more I was blown away. Why hasn’t anyone done this I thought? So I formed a team of five to build a real CommBadge.

With today’s noise canceling technology wearing a speakerphone totally makes sense. It’s super convenient and really great with Siri too. Put your iPhone away, and you can still access Siri from a distance of up to 30 meters!
Can Everyone Around Me Hear My Conversation?

The answer is no! One of the most important features of CommBadge, albeit the most time-consuming aspect of it's engineering, is the technology behind the speaker enclosure or ""cabinet"". Speaker cabinet design is a complex mixture of art and science.

In order to get crystal clear sound to the user, the enclosure is designed to prevent sound waves generated by the rearward-facing surface of the diaphragm of an open driver interacting with sound waves generated at the front of the driver. SORRY, what this all means is that we designed CommBadge so the clean sound waves reach the user, but the sound waves that travel beyond a foot or so from the users ears are scrambled. Therefore, someone near you can tell you are on a call, and not directly speaking to them, but they cannot discern the other end of your conversation. Thus, preventing that public Bluetooth headset syndrome of ""are you talking to me?"" in the supermarket line.
Who cares anyway? Technology can sometimes seem quirky until it becomes ubiquitous. Nevertheless we solved this, with one quick tap you can transfer the call back to your smartphone.

Furthermore, most people are required to wear an identification badge while at work. A lot of people use badge reels for their access convenience. That’s how the CommBadge came to life, combining an ID badge reel and a tiny speakerphone. It’s always with you, and great for lunch breaks, etc. After work, simply remove your ID badge and it becomes your personal assistant. The uses are truly limitless
column2: and you’ll be hands-free in your car if your car is not Bluetooth equipped. Once you start using it you’ll never go back to a Bluetooth headset. Science Fiction has now become a reality!

column1: What We Need and What You Get!

The CommBadge demoed in the above video is an actual working pre-production model. CommBadge is beyond the prototype stage. After dozens of CAD redesigns, and over a dozen 3D printed prototypes we have finally nailed the design. We are ready for production! With your support, we can bring a real CommBadge to the world three centuries early!

While we have finalized the design for production, your contribution will move it from a functional pre-production model, to a finished commercial product. The CommBadge will require a number of manufacturing processes like final PCB design verification and then fabrication, as well as injection molding and stamping, all of which are very costly initially, which is why we're here on Indiegogo. Once the project ends in late-December, we will begin production testing shortly thereafter. We plan on partnering with Dragon Innovation, experts with facilitating all aspects of product design, production, and fulfillment. We will be posting regular updates and contributors will be able to get an inside look at our progress. CommBadge can be worn in many ways. Also, it was engineered to replace your daily corporate ID badge reel with a badge reel plus micro-sized speakerphone that's a wearable designer device.

For our Indiegogo launch we will be offering it in three configurations. The first package will include one low profile CommBadge Classic (no ID badge holder) that you can wear for personal use. The second package will include one low profile CommBadge that you can wear and display your corporate ID badge in a thin and light configuration. The third package is the CommBadge+, the ""+"" adds a built-in retractable ID badge reel. Wear it just like you do your current corporate ID badge reel
column2: either on your collar, shirt pocket, or hanging on a lanyard. After fulfillment, other accessories are in the works.

column1: Don't forget to spread the word with friends and family in the ""Share This Campaign"" section above!

FAQ: What is CommBadge? CommBadge is a next generation Bluetooth wireless speakerphone that is wearable. CommBadge is not a traditional Bluetooth headset!!! CommBadge attaches to your clothing quickly and securely. Additionally, CommBadge combines the ID badge reel you may currently be required to wear by your employer with a handsfree speakerphone.
FAQ: Can I use Siri? Yes, Siri works better with CommBadge! Access Siri handsfree around the house while your iPhone is in it's charger!
What about iOS 6 and iPhone 5? No problem, CommBadge was designed to work seamlessly with IOS 6. ALL iPhone's with IOS 4.0 and later will work with CommBadge.

FAQ: How do I wear CommBadge? CommBadge is a 39 mm diameter module that is less than 14 mm thick (before speaker dome)! It will come complete with everything you need for handsfree communication with your smartphone. The Indiegogo launch will include either the CommBadge Classic, CommBadge, or the CommBadge+ with ID Badge Reel (only adds 5 mm to the thickness), and all include a micro-USB charging cable.
FAQ: Can I run and jog with CommBadge? Yes, the clip has a secondary locking mechanism that will more than support the weight of the CommBadge without slipping or detaching.
FAQ: How do I wear CommBadge with my corporate ID Badge? The same way!!! It will clip to your shirt pocket, collar, or lanyard just like your old ID badge reel.
FAQ: How much weight does it add to my ID badge reel? CommBadge's components add less than two grams, so the weight difference is negligible
FAQ: What if I don't need an ID badge holder or reel? Great, just purchase the CommBadge Classic, it's a sleek minimalist design that's 5 mm thinner than the badge reel model.
FAQ: Can the ""gray"" securing clasp be removed? Yes, if you want to use velcro, magnets, etc., just unscrew and remove the clasp with a small phillips screwdriver.

FAQ: What is Bluetooth Smart? Bluetooth Smart also known as 4.0, enables devices to be continuously connected but with extremely low battery drain. CommBadge will last about a full day on a single charge with average use. Stand-by time is even longer.
FAQ: How do I charge it? Use the included micro-USB cable to connect to USB or a power supply
FAQ: How do I pair it to my iPhone or Android smartphone? Just like any late model Bluetooth headset. It takes less than a minute. You only have to do this once.

FAQ: What if I forget to take my smartphone with me while I’m wearing my CommBadge? CommBadge will alert you when you get a predetermined distance from your smartphone. You can adjust the range, warning tone, and vibration settings in the FREE to download iPhone and Android app.*

FAQ: Will my iPhone or Android phone detect if I forget to take my CommBadge with me? Yes, the CommBadge app works with iPhone and Android Notifications and will alert you when you get beyond the predetermined distance away from the CommBadge.*
FAQ: Where do I find the app? You can download it for free from the App Store or Google Play directly on your phone (coming soon).
*Requires iOS 4.0 or greater or Android 2.2 or greater.

CommBadge is a patent pending wearable Bluetooth speakerphone for iPhone and Android that attaches securely to your clothing. It uses the latest noise canceling chipset to minimize background noise. By combining proprietary directional and personalized speaker technology, CommBadge brings you crystal-clear handsfree communication. It's simple to use, yet amazingly convenient!
You'll have full access to Siri and Google Now voice command functions seamlessly. Also, you can customize CommBadge with the FREE companion app for iPhone and Android.*
Simply by speaking and listening through your CommBadge, while leaving your phone in a pocket, purse or backpack, you can:
Send and receive text messages (“text-to-speech” through CommBadge)
Use your phone's native voice commands, such as Siri, S-Voice, or Google Now, to set calendar events and reminders, get sports news, and search for information
Receive an alert from the Wireless Tether feature that you left your smartphone behind
Be notified of incoming calls, texts, calendar and social media events with customizable vibration, sound, and LED's

Technology has finally caught up with the science fiction that was first imagined by Gene Roddenberry in Star Trek The Next Generation and it was called combadge. Finally, there is a real CommBadge, it's a miniature speakerphone with big sound. It utilizes Bluetooth Low Energy (4.0) to pair with your iPhone or Android smartphone. CommBadge measures only 1.5"" (39 mm) in diameter.
Why Not Just Wear a Bluetooth Headset Instead?

I don’t know about you but I personally hate wearing a Bluetooth headset. I’ve tried tons of them, and they are all uncomfortable or annoying to me. However, holding your phone while busy at work or doing household chores is a pain. For many situations using a speakerphone is a better solution, and the only way to truly multitask. For example, cooking, walking the two dogs, home projects, and the list goes on.

So I started thinking. Why can’t I just wear a speakerphone? I did some online research and I couldn’t find anything! Then, about a year ago I started prototyping and experimenting with placement and functionality. The more I tested it in various environments, some being very noisy, the more I was blown away. Why hasn’t anyone done this I thought? So I formed a team of five to build a real CommBadge.

With today’s noise canceling technology wearing a speakerphone totally makes sense. It’s super convenient and really great with Siri too. Put your iPhone away, and you can still access Siri from a distance of up to 30 meters!
Can Everyone Around Me Hear My Conversation?

The answer is no! One of the most important features of CommBadge, albeit the most time-consuming aspect of it's engineering, is the technology behind the speaker enclosure or ""cabinet"". Speaker cabinet design is a complex mixture of art and science.

In order to get crystal clear sound to the user, the enclosure is designed to prevent sound waves generated by the rearward-facing surface of the diaphragm of an open driver interacting with sound waves generated at the front of the driver. SORRY, what this all means is that we designed CommBadge so the clean sound waves reach the user, but the sound waves that travel beyond a foot or so from the users ears are scrambled. Therefore, someone near you can tell you are on a call, and not directly speaking to them, but they cannot discern the other end of your conversation. Thus, preventing that public Bluetooth headset syndrome of ""are you talking to me?"" in the supermarket line.
Who cares anyway? Technology can sometimes seem quirky until it becomes ubiquitous. Nevertheless we solved this, with one quick tap you can transfer the call back to your smartphone.

Furthermore, most people are required to wear an identification badge while at work. A lot of people use badge reels for their access convenience. That’s how the CommBadge came to life, combining an ID badge reel and a tiny speakerphone. It’s always with you, and great for lunch breaks, etc. After work, simply remove your ID badge and it becomes your personal assistant. The uses are truly limitless

column2: pin headers (only these components require soldering)

column1: • Shield requires +12V power supply (Arduino Vin power supply connector)
• Just download Arduino example code from github repository
• Connect Shield via USB with your computer
• Compile and upload code to the Arduino (inside shield)
• Fahrenheit - Nixie Thermometer/Hygrometer - 3 x IN-12B + IN-15B Nixie Tubes
• Cesius - Nixie Thermometer/Hygrometer - 3 x IN-12B + IN-15A Nixie Tubes

Datasheet and examples codes can be found in the project repository. 
Code is very simple and uses only two Arduino libraries: for real time clock DS3231 and second for temperature and humidity sensor DHT22. Nixie tubes are controlled by HV5812 high voltage drivers by using only 3 arduino pins. You can modify the code according to your own ideas.
","Parameters & Components
Perfect quality housing (color: black, red, blue), laser-cut and engraved
Housing dimensions: 60 x 80 x 158 mm (~2.4"" x  3.1"" x 6.2"")
High quality connectors & pin headers (only these components require soldering)
Precise and accurate temperature & humidity sensor DHT22
Shield requires +12V power supply (Arduino Vin power supply connector)
Just download Arduino example code from github repository
Connect Shield via USB with your computer
Compile and upload code to the Arduino (inside shield)
Nixie Clock - 4 x IN-12B Nixie Tubes
Fahrenheit - Nixie Thermometer/Hygrometer - 3 x IN-12B + IN-15B Nixie Tubes
Cesius - Nixie Thermometer/Hygrometer - 3 x IN-12B + IN-15A Nixie Tubes

Datasheet and examples codes can be found in the project repository. Code is very simple and uses only two Arduino libraries: for real time clock DS3231 and second for temperature and humidity sensor DHT22. Nixie tubes are controlled by HV5812 high voltage drivers by using only 3 arduino pins. You can modify the code according to your own ideas.

    A modern person needs a lot of things during a day for a comfortable life. Such as headphones, a few charging cables, a notebook and pens, money, cards and many other things. But what chaos do these necessary things create if they are not organized ?! And how long does it take for putting them in order?! 

    It’s to solve these problems that we created Klips - it's your faithful helper in the fight against chaos!

    There are of course some tasks which Klips won’t manage so easily. But for these needs there are Klips plus. They are bigger, more powerful and they can solve problems much more difficult!

    Do you want to multiply the benefit of Klips several times? Then hold the Dock! It will help you to organize your work and personal space much better. It’s made of magnetic stainless steel and can be attached to any flat surface thanks to a micro-suction tape. This will allow it to be fixed multiple times!

    Klips is a unique accessory. There are still a huge number of ways to use the basic ones. Klips - a keychain, a magnet on the fridge for notes, a pencil case, a paper clip and even a curtain for the web camera! And the most important thing - the number of these methods is limited only by imagination!

    Your time is your most valuable resource. This is the most essential argument in favor of Klips. According to our calculations, if you spend 10 minutes a day on unraveling your headphones, you lose at least 3 days of your life per year. But if you use Klips, this action will take about a second and a few seconds to stack them. Then you will spend about 24 minutes a year. Choosing Klips, you get more free time on things that are really important.

 

 

    There are a lot of things in the world that make life easier for us. Such trifles like a bottle opener, different instruments, a lighter or even a needle - at the very right moment they are not by your side. But you can always rely on Klips. They are always at hand. 

    Just put them on and in a minute you will forget that they are on you. At the right time they will come for help!

    Klips glow in the dark! This is one of the coolest things in our organizer. Thanks to the paint developed by us to cut the skin, Klips can accumulate daylight and glow in the dark. 

    This function can be very useful when you are looking for an item with Klips in a poorly lit place!

    The main material of Klips is an Italian high-quality leather of two kinds and thicknesses.They are selected in such a way that the organizer will not be arbitrarily closed by magnets. Furthermore, to close Klips minimal human intervention is required. 

    The inner leather is thinner, in order to retain the force of the magnet cohesion and create a bulge for a better contact. The second is several times thicker for the strength and durability of the outer layer of Klips. High-quality magnets are placed between the layers of leather.

    We also got rid of stitches! But don’t worry! This is absolutely reliable due to proper pressure bonding. Instead, this method allows to use magnets of a larger diameter and, correspondingly, the force of the cohesion without increasing the area of ​​the accessory!

 

    The palette of Klips colors consists of brown, beige, gray and black. And since our organizer is bicolor, we decided to call Klips according to the external color of the skin. 

    We hope this won’t confuse anyone. And if you have any questions, feel free to send them to us! Isn’t it true that two-color Klips look great ?!

column6: >Always have your favorite fragrance or hand sanitizer connected to

column3:
>

We carry our smartphones with us everywhere we go. However, we do not have the same convenience with either our favorite fragrance or hand sanitizer. 

While they might come in small travel sized bottles, we either forget to carry the travel size solution or simply loose them. So much for being handy! 

With your Atomyzer case, if you have your phone on you, you will always have your favorite fragrance or hand sanitizer on you.  


Use Cases

column1: Getting on a flight with just a carry on bag and want to
carry your fragrance with you? Atomyzer!
Have a kid or a dog that’s always bringing in germs? Keep

losing that small hand sanitizer bottler? Atomyzer!

column2: its refillable cartridge, its lockable nozzle and secure encasing.

/>

Assembling the case is as simple as 1..2..3..4!



Feature 1 – Cartridge:

The

column1: Cartridge is fitted with our unique adapter that lets users easily
fill and refill the cartridge with their favorite fragrance or hand sanitizer.
The cartridge fills within seconds and stores up to 60 Sprays, keeping you

cartridge is made of tough plastic and is ultrasonically welded making it leak proof. 


Feature 2 - Locking Mechanism:

Butt Dial? Accidental Butt Sprays?
spray we have integrated a lock in the spray head. To lock simply twist clockwise to unlock simply twist anti-clockwise.
column4:
>Feature 3 - Style :

Let’s face it... functional case designs can be boring. To up the ante we created Atomyzer's accent snap is not only stylish but also exchangeable.  Pick your design and you’re all set to go with your favorite fragrance always with you. 



Atomyzer Dimensions Compared

column1: is the mother of all innovation. My story is no different. I spent a small
fortune on giving up my colognes at TSA checkpoints and another small fortune
losing all the small hand sanitizer bottles that were meant to be … handy.
step: Google. Of course, there were a lot of handy little solutions.
However, the issue with these handy solutions is, you have to remember to keep
them handy. Yet another thing to remember.
Honestly, the only thing that is handy these days is our phone. Ta daaa! That’s
where the idea was born. What if there was a case that safely let you carry
either a fragrance (if you like to always smell fresh) or your hand sanitizer
(If you always want to keep those germs at bay)
put my engineering knowledge to work and started designing. One thing led to

another and today here we are. 

Initial Sketches
column3: />

column1: an idea, took over 100 iterations to come to life. We struggled with making it

ergonomically, secure and sexy.

We tested numerous prototypes and considered various manufacturing processes to get a robust leak proof case that sprays liquid. 

Through trial and error we figured out the best combination of functionality as well as manufacturing process and partners.

We now need your support to help us scale the idea. The fund will be used to make full production injection molds that are capable of making a quality and consistent product. 


Color Options:

While we'd love to give you as many color options as possible, for now we have decided to limit it to the following. If you have suggestions or ideas for color scheme please write us to at rahul(at)atomyzer.com
product that serves both functionality and design. While currently limited to
fragrances, hand sanitizers and a water fight (if you will!) there are endless
possibilities for its use cases. The cartridges could hold mouth freshener, pepper spray or Asthma spray medicine  … the possibilities are endless.
to the spray though. Don’t feel like taking your fragrance out with you on a
night out, but can’t leave without your make-up. What if the Atomyzer back
plate was replaceable with a sleek make-up kit, the possibilities are endless
and we’re ready and motivated.
column11:
>Thank You

We're extremely excited about Atomyzer and hope to make it available across all phone types. While we work hard towards our dream if you have any questions, suggestions or feedback please reach out to me at rahul(at)atomyzer.com


FAQ

What iPhone model does Atomyzer support?

Currently we only support to iPhone5 and iPhone5s models. Eventually we will create Atomyzer for all iPhone models and some of the latest smartphones out there in the market.


How long does the spray usually last for a completely filled cartridge ?

Depends on how often you like to spray. The cartridge hold upto 60 sprays. In an ideal case a month.


What all is included in the package

Your package includes Atomyzer case of your color choice. One cartridge and One spray head. These elements can be easily placed together.


Does it support all fragrance bottles?

It supports most of the standard atomizing fragrance bottles.


What kind of hand sanitizers does Atomyzer support?

Atomyzer supports atomizing types of hand sanitizers which have nozzles similar to that of a fragrance sprayer.


Can I fill the cartridge with any liquid?

We strongly urge you to fill the cartridge with either a fragrance or hand sanitizer. But hey if you wanna have some fun with it, go for it. Or just get in touch with us and we can send you an extra cartridge.


Will it go through airport security?

We have carried Atomyzer through international and domestic security on numerous occasions and it has been cleared every time. Atomyzer cartridge holds liquid under the TSA liquid carrying limit.

cartridge is made of tough plastic and is ultrasonically welded making it leak proof. Feature 2 - Locking Mechanism:Butt Dial? Accidental Butt Sprays?

spray we have integrated a lock in the spray head. To lock simply twist clockwise to unlock simply twist anti-clockwise. Feature 3 - Style :Let’s face it... functional case designs can be boring. To up the ante we created Atomyzer's accent snap is not only stylish but also exchangeable.  Pick your design and you’re all set to go with your favorite fragrance always with you. Atomyzer Dimensions ComparedBackground
is the mother of all innovation. My story is no different. I spent a small
fortune on giving up my colognes at TSA checkpoints and another small fortune
losing all the small hand sanitizer bottles that were meant to be … handy.
step: Google. Of course, there were a lot of handy little solutions.
However, the issue with these handy solutions is, you have to remember to keep
them handy. Yet another thing to remember.
Honestly, the only thing that is handy these days is our phone. Ta daaa! That’s
where the idea was born. What if there was a case that safely let you carry
either a fragrance (if you like to always smell fresh) or your hand sanitizer
(If you always want to keep those germs at bay)
put my engineering knowledge to work and started designing. One thing led to
another and today here we are. Initial Sketches
an idea, took over 100 iterations to come to life. We struggled with making it

ergonomically, secure and sexy.We tested numerous prototypes and considered various manufacturing processes to get a robust leak proof case that sprays liquid. Through trial and error we figured out the best combination of functionality as well as manufacturing process and partners.We now need your support to help us scale the idea. The fund will be used to make full production injection molds that are capable of making a quality and consistent product. Color Options:While we'd love to give you as many color options as possible, for now we have decided to limit it to the following. If you have suggestions or ideas for color scheme please write us to at rahul(at)atomyzer.comTimelineFuture
product that serves both functionality and design. While currently limited to
fragrances, hand sanitizers and a water fight (if you will!) there are endless
possibilities for its use cases. The cartridges could hold mouth freshener, pepper spray or Asthma spray medicine  … the possibilities are endless.
to the spray though. Don’t feel like taking your fragrance out with you on a
night out, but can’t leave without your make-up. What if the Atomyzer back
plate was replaceable with a sleek make-up kit, the possibilities are endless

and we’re ready and motivated. Thank YouWe're extremely excited about Atomyzer and hope to make it available across all phone types. While we work hard towards our dream if you have any questions, suggestions or feedback please reach out to me at rahul(at)atomyzer.comFAQWhat iPhone model does Atomyzer support?Currently we only support to iPhone5 and iPhone5s models. Eventually we will create Atomyzer for all iPhone models and some of the latest smartphones out there in the market.How long does the spray usually last for a completely filled cartridge ?Depends on how often you like to spray. The cartridge hold upto 60 sprays. In an ideal case a month.What all is included in the packageYour package includes Atomyzer case of your color choice. One cartridge and One spray head. These elements can be easily placed together. Does it support all fragrance bottles?It supports most of the standard atomizing fragrance bottles.What kind of hand sanitizers does Atomyzer support?Atomyzer supports atomizing types of hand sanitizers which have nozzles similar to that of a fragrance sprayer.Can I fill the cartridge with any liquid?We strongly urge you to fill the cartridge with either a fragrance or hand sanitizer. But hey if you wanna have some fun with it, go for it. Or just get in touch with us and we can send you an extra cartridge. Will it go through airport security?We have carried Atomyzer through international and domestic security on numerous occasions and it has been cleared every time. Atomyzer cartridge holds liquid under the TSA liquid carrying limit.",18.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: ""AllBe1 brings DIY home security back to the basics"" - Megan Wollerton. July 7, 2015. Cnet.
""some projects do stand out of the crowd.
column4: >One such project that made us take a second look is the AllBe1.""
column7: >- Aamir Siddiqui · Jun 14, 2015.
column10: >XDA developers - click here for the full article.

column1: AllBe1 - Press release + Press kit - Click here
AllBe1 will connect to your smartphone via a unique application that will allow you to communicate with it and set the various actions you need it to do for you in your day to day activities.
AllBe1 is the perfect personal guardian. Thanks to its multiple sensors it can ensure you, your family, and your belongings a better sense of security for an affordable price.

With its advanced infrared technology, AllBe1 will alert you when someone enters your home or office uninvited, directly to your smartphone. No one will be able to get by  you without you knowing about it!
AllBe1 can help you find your valuable belongings when you’ve lost or misplaced them by directing you to their location so that you will always know where they are.
AllBe1 will alert you once your belongings have been touched or misplaced when out of your reach. Once the silent alarm is triggered the app will send you an alert to your smartphone.
You can place AllBe1 inside a drawer, and set it to send your smartphone an alert, whenever the drawer is opened in your absence.

Once you activate the AllBe1 app in your smartphone, you can set it to unlock or lock by itself, without the need for a password. The smart lock will activate according to your proximity, so if you are far away from your smartphone it cannot be opened by anyone else.

AllBe1 will detect motion changes in any given area, and alert you directly to your smartphone. This will allow you to protect your home or office, even when you are not there. If you place the AllBe1 in your car, for instance, it will alert you if anyone bumps into or moves it in your absence.

AllBe1 will count your steps, distance, and calories and then calculate the data, according to your personal physical parameters. AllBe1 will also send this information directly to your smartphone app.

AllBe1 will alert you whenever your body needs more sun exposure. You will receive this important information directly to your smartphone and be notified when it is time to spend some time in the sun.

If you find yourself in danger, AllBe1 can be used as a smart button with a preset number that it will alert with your GPS location once activated. With AllBe1, you will be safe no matter where you go.
Use AllBe1 to monitor your baby's room temperature and get an immediate alert to your smartphone if it gets too hot or cold.

Once in the sun, AllBe1 will notify you when it is time to protect your skin with additional sunscreen. This option will help you protect your children from the dangerous outcomes of excessive sun exposure.

Children have so much energy and just love to run around, sometimes it is very hard to keep track of them. Once AllBe1 is placed inside your child's pocket, it will monitor his or her movement, and send an alert directly to your smartphone once they leave your “safe zone”.
When AllBe1 is attached to your pet’s collar you will be able to keep track of them, in case they run away or go missing. Finding your lost pet has never been so easy.
You can attach AllBe1 to your t-shirt or pocket, wear it like a watch on your wrist or hang it around your neck on a necklace. This way AllBe1 will always be with you, wherever you go!
AllBe1 can be placed on your computer, inside your drawer, on your child or pet and on a shelf with it’s designated holder. AllBe1 will guard you indoors and out.

You can wear it, strap it on your wrist, attach it to your pet, your child and many other options. With AllBe1 accessories, you will have even more ways that will help you guard and protect the things dearest to you.

We have experienced a huge success with our first batch of prototypes, all of the features are working very well, as expected. We are currently working on completing the final version design and expect start production in Oct. 2016.

We are a small group of geeks who love to develop new software and hardware in our spare time, crazy we know! After working in the private security sector for many years, we realized we felt it was time to take all our knowledge, and build the perfect personal security device, and that's exactly what we have been doing over the past year. We invented AllBe1 in the shape of a small capsule, that replaces the clutter of all the tracking and security devices, to make people's lives simpler and safer.

 

Our team combines the brains of a Hardware developer, Software engineer, gifted designer and a brilliant marketing mind, each a leader in their own field of expertise who have been working in the security industry for a while now. Together, we have accumulated enough knowledge to start our own venture! With AllBe1 we believe we can change the world of personal security and make it accessible to all.
For Android phones you download the App. from Googleplay and for Apple from iTune
Is available for download at www.AllBe1.com
• How does AllBe1 connected to my mobile phone and with which phone it works?

It connects with a BLE? (blue tooth low energy) connection that is supported by iPhone 4 and up as well as various Android mobiles ( Samsung Galaxy S4 and up, LG G2 and up, Nexus 4 and up and many more devices)

 

  • What is the ""Extended Range"" mentioned in the campaign movie?

AllBe1 is a state of the art design. We have added a power amplifier to the BLE, so the AllBe1 responds significantly better than a regular BLE device (x 5-10 better). 

 

  • Does AllBe1 include a camera?

No, it does not include a camera, but since AllBe1 is an open platform developers can use one of the sensors as a trigger for your smartphone camera.

 

  • What is the battery operating time of AllBe1?

Its depends on the user profile. With average usage it remains charged for up to 2 months.  AllBe1 charges with a regular micro USB connector. Charging time is about 1 hour

 

  • Is AllBe1 waterproof?

(It meets the IP-52 standard requirements) You can take a shower with it but you can't swim with it.

 

  • What is a PIR sensor

PIR = Passive Infra Red, it’s a sensor that can feel the IR wavelength emitted by the human body. AllBe1 contains a PIR sensor that can detect humans presence if they are moving.

 

  • How many AllBe1 I can connect to my mobile phone on the same time?

Basically the BLE can support many devices connected on the same time. On the first release it will be able to support up to 6 units. We plan to upgrade it a few months later so  it will be able to connect to many more devices on the same time.

 

  • How many AllBe1 features can work on the same time?

On the first release we commit to one feature only we will upgrade it to work out several features on same time

 

  • Does AllBe1 include a GPS receiver?

No. AllBe1 use your Smartphone GPS to send your location.

 

  • What can I do with the smart  button on the AllBe1?

By pushing the button the AllBe1 will send an emergency SMS and your location and will call to a pre-set number. Send GPS location to selected contact person, shortcut to selected apps, a function of ""Find my phone"". Also cause your smartphone to make a ""selfie"" picture  and start/stop recording by your phone.

 

  • How would I know when it is time to charge my AllBe1 capsule?

Your Smartphone will alert when battery reach to 15% of capacity.  You have in the phone a capacity bar.

 

  • With how many AllBe1 devices can one smartphone communicate?”

6 AllBe1s, we will upgrade it later

 

  • How do I pair AllBe1 with my Smartphone?

Pairing will be done from within the AllBe1 app. + long press on the button. No need to set the  Bluetooth menu on your phone. From within the Smartphone app, you will be able to pair with AllBe1 that are only very close to the Phone. (About 1 feet or less). This will ensure you only pair with your device.
• Does each AllBe1 have a unique ID?
Yes. Each AllBe1 has its own MAC address.
• Is what I see on the video what I get?
Basically, yes. However, since we made the videos, we’ve added more features like the selfie pic, hidden audio recording and the kid in the car alert. We have removed the fitness feature.
Also, we stop sale the SDK protocol for developers.
*  Do you sale SDK for developers?

No, we sold it only during the campaign period time.

 

  • Can multiple phones in my site connect to an AllBe1 capsule?

You can pair the AllBe1’s to many phones, and even see all the AllBe1’s in range on the radar screen from many phones at the same time, but only one phone can control all the AllBe1’s.  

 

  • Is there any interference with or from other people's AllBe1’s?

No. BLE protocol is designed to eliminate this issue.

 

  • What happens if the AllBe1 triggered alarm when I’m out of the AllBe1 range?
The AllBe1 will save the time when alarm triggered and show you on the app when you will connect again to the AllBe1.
• How can I choose the color of the AllBe1 and it’s accessories?
You just order the color you like.
• Can I order accessories separate from AllBe1?
Yes. Just choose from the order list.
Yes. Just contact us for a price quote: support@allbe1.com
• How can I contact you if I have a question?
• You can always send any questions, comments, suggestions or feedback to support@allbe1.com. We will get back to you within one business days.

Everywhere USB stick is a USB driver+ PC application that will allow you to receive email alerts when you are away from your AllBe1. The user can customize the alerts depending on the feature of AllBe1 you are utilizing.

For example: Your AllBe1 is functioning as a  drawer open detector, with the Everywhere USB stick connected to a PC with an internet connection, you will receive real-time email alerts if that drawer is opened.  Everywhere lets you use AllBe1 even when you’re outside Bluetooth range.

The initial release of AllBe1 will include a PC version of the AllBe1 Application that will feature email only. Shortly after release an update will become available allowing push notifications directly to the AllBe1 mobile app (IOT)
• Why does Everywhere USB stick support just 10 AllBe1 sensor capsules?

Bluetooth technology can support unlimited devices, however we want to ensure a final product by the time of release, free of bugs or any other issues. An update will become available after product release that will increase the capacity of AllBe1 Capsules per Anywhere USB stick.

Maginny is the 3-in-1 Qi charger pack made for the future. Never worry about misplacing a charging cable again and always stay connected with this charging kit. Three built-in functionalities make this device unique and well-equipped to handle anything.
column8:
'>

 

         Traditional                            Magginy

Just focus on your driving. Plug your phone into the charger using one hand. Insert in your car's A/C vent and tap your phone to the holder and snap into power.

 

 

With 1.5X fast charging speed, the Magginy wireless charging pack is your dead-battery solution. Never miss an urgent call, text, or photo because of a dead battery again!

 

 

For the traditional metal plate, it is hard to make it accurately align with the centre of iPhone charging loops. And it directly covers the wireless charging loops leading to heat dissipation difficulty so that it hurt your phone.

The circled magnet design encircles the apple wireless charging centre, which can avoid accumulated over-heat because of the overlap between traditional adhesive metal past and iPhone charging centre.

 

 

Magginy is compatible with 7.5W Qi WPC as well as WPC 1.1 and 1.2 wireless charging protocol.

Part of Qi-certified fast charging smartphones:

Apple iPhone: 8, 8 Plus, X.

Samsung Galaxy: S9, S9+, Note 8, S8, S8+, S7, S7 Edge, Note 5, S6, S6 Edge.

LG: V30, G6 (US version only), G4 (optional), G3 (optional)

Microsoft Lumia: 1520, 1020, 930, 929, 928, 920.

Google Nexus: 4, 5, 6, 7 (2013)

BlackBerry: Priv.

 

 

Magginy car charger and mobile power bank feature charging power up to 7.5W (the largest output for iPhone) to juice your devices up in no time! Regular wireless chargers only offer 3W or 5W output.

Get your phone to a full charge in less than halftime.

Fast charge mode enables wireless charging up to 2⨉ faster (Note 8/Note 5 S8/S8 Plus S7/S7 edge S6 edge Plus), for standard charge mode, still up to 1.5x faster than traditional wireless chargers (iPhone X iPhone 8 iPhone 8 Plus).

 

This Magginy car mount can easily fit in the A/C vent of your car. You will never lose power wherever you are using a navigation app. You don't need to hold your phone against the charger either because of its strong magnetic connection. Release your hands and enjoy the unprecedented experience with a hold and charge.

Our charge coils were designed for the most connective fit. In any environment, enjoy 100% reliable and dependable wireless charger and the strongest magnetic power!

 

 

Exclusively applied with our most recent SmartSafe™ technology, the design encircles the wireless charging centre, which can avoid accumulated over-heat.

For the traditional metal past, it is hard to make it accurately aligns with the centre of iPhone charging loops. And it directly covers the wireless charging loops leading to heat dissipation difficulty so that it hurts your phone. However, by using Magginy secure case, you never need to worry about the alignment problem, the circled design magnet installed in the case helps the accurate magnetic positioning and also it passes by the centre charging loops to avoid overheat.
column29:
> 

Change the angle to whichever viewing angle you prefer with easy 360º rotation. See your screen the way you want without any compromises for safe driving and use.

 

 

 

The base of Magginy car charger is constructed of high-quality rubber to ensure your phone won’t slip on even the bumpiest roads. One step to stand it up and super easy to install or fix it on the A/C vent.

 

 

Along with the secure magnetic fit, Maginny features the following safety protections:

·   Short-Circuit Protection: Charge your device with peace of mind. 

·   Battery Overcharge Protection: The Magginy is entirely safe from overcharging.

·   Output Overcharge Protection: Just enough power to charge your phone and nothing more. 

·   Harsh Temperature Protection: Battery is safe from overheating to save your devices.

·   International Safety Compliance Certifications: Tested to meet all regulatory needs.

·   Drop Test-Certified: Tough enough to handle the bumps and bruises in your daily life.

·   365 Day Warranty: If anything goes wrong, we’ll fix it!

·   International Air Safety Approval: Safe for flying across countries.

'> 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Magginy team was created in 2011 and is an excellent community of innovating smart products. But we want to recognize and introduce you to the core R&
column100:
D team which is responsible for technology testing and product development. They have worked hard to make our idea a reality. We have been dedicated to developing the best electronic products - especially smartphone accessories - for a long time. Magginy is our most recent charging product. We are launching Magginy on Indiegogo and are expecting feedback from you.

 

 

 

1. Does it have Pass-Through Charging? Can I charge this power bank while charging a phone at the same time?  

Yes, it has and you can charge it while it is charging your phone. Magginy is equipped with handle pass-through charging safely without damaging your device’s battery or its own.

2. Can I use my own customized phone case?

Temporarily not. When we achieve $30K goal, we will introduce a magnetic coil. You can stick it to the back of your phone, put on your phone case, and you can use the suction function to wirelessly charge your phone at the same time.

How does wireless charging works?

It works like this: A magnetic loop antenna (copper coil) is used to create an oscillating magnetic field, which can create a current in one or more receiver antennas. If the appropriate capacitance is added so that the loops resonate at the same frequency, it will start to charge.

3. Is wireless charging safe for my device?

Yes but only if you are charging it in the right way. If the copper coil of wireless charger does not align the receiver in your device, it will cause some damage to your device such as overheat or even explosion.

So it is always wise to align your device in the right place of the wireless charger to avoid overheat. However it is hard for many products to align accurately with your device.

4. Is the magnetic design safe?

Since the magnetic plate will always be moving around in your phone case, it is hard to align with your device accurately. Also, it directly covers on the wireless charging loops leading to heat dissipation difficulty so that it definitely hurts your phone if not charged right.

That’s why we created Magginy: the coolest wireless car charging provides. Our mission is to avoid the overheat problem and protect your device while charging.

Magginy has a secure case that perfectly match the wireless charger so you never need to worry about the alignment problem. Exclusively applied with our most recent SmartSafe™ technology, the design encircle the apple wireless charging centre, which can avoid accumulated over-heat because of the overlap between traditional adhesive metal past and iPhone charging centre.The circled design magnet installed in the case perfectly helps the accurate magnetic positioning and also it pass by the center charging loops in order to avoid over heat.

5. How can I recharged the powerbank?

There are two choices that you can recharge the power bank, by doc or by USB output.

6. How many devices can the Magginy charge at the same time?

The Magginy gives you two options to charge your devices at lightning fast speeds
column101:
either set your Qi-enabled device on the power bank or plug your device’s USB charge cable into the full-size USB output of the edge. The Magginy also features a Type-C input port with fast recharge capabilities.

7. When will the Magginy be shipped?

We will be shipping out our perks in June, 2018.

8. What is included in box?

The box includes a phone charging receiver case &
column103:
magnetic hold charger. We also have other flexible charging combos with different product mix that you can choose.

9. What kinds of phone support Magginy's phone case?

 iPhone X/iPhone 8/iPhone 8 Plus/Samsung Galaxy S8/
Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus/Samsung Galaxy S9/Samsung Galaxy S9 Plus

We will send out a survey after the end of the campaign and you can fill out your phone type. We will ship your choice of phone case to you with your Magginy order. If you don't have the phone listed above, you can always order the adhesive magnet and put it into your own case.
